title: PredictX
description: Project DescriptionPredictX is a decentralized prediction market game built on Coinbase Base. Challenge AI predictions on a wide range of events, from election outcomes to product launches. Bet with the AI if you think it's right, or bet against it if you think you know better. Earn rewards for accurate predictions, compete with other users, and explore the fascinating intersection of AI and forecasting.How it's MadeFrontend: A user-friendly web interface that allows users to interact with the application (create markets, place bets, view results, etc.). This is likely built with a modern JavaScript framework like React. Backend: A server-side application that handles API requests, interacts with the blockchain, and manages the AI prediction engine. This is built with Python, using FastAPI and Uvicorn. Smart Contracts: Solidity contracts deployed on the Coinbase Base blockchain. These handle the core logic of the prediction markets: market creation, bet placement, resolution, and payouts. AI Prediction Engine: A separate component (likely also Python-based) that generates predictions on events. This could be integrated directly into the backend or run as a separate service.
summary: PredictX is a decentralized prediction market game where you can test your forecasting skills against cutting-edge AI. Bet with or against AI predictions on real-world events, earn rewards, and climb the leaderboard.

title: Asap
description: Project DescriptionASAP Protocol is an innovative framework that redefines decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) governance by integrating autonomous, on-chain AI agents into every step of the decision-making process. Here‚Äôs a detailed breakdown of what ASAP Protocol is and how it transforms DAO governance: Overview ASAP Protocol revolutionizes traditional DAO operations by automating the proposal evaluation and voting processes. Instead of relying solely on manual voting‚Äîwhich can be slow and inefficient‚ÄîASAP Protocol empowers trusted AI agents to cast votes on behalf of community members. This approach not only accelerates decision-making but also ensures that the collective interests of the community are represented, even if individual members are not actively engaged in every voting process. Key Challenges Addressed Efficient Governance: Traditional DAO governance often involves cumbersome, manual voting mechanisms. ASAP Protocol addresses this by automating the decision-making process. AI agents analyze proposals and vote autonomously, significantly reducing delays and streamlining the entire governance cycle. Enhanced Community Participation: By enabling community members to delegate their voting power to AI agents, ASAP Protocol ensures broader participation. This delegation mechanism means that even those who are less technically inclined or less frequently active can have their interests effectively represented in governance decisions. Simplified Governance: The protocol minimizes the inherent complexities of on-chain governance. It abstracts the technical details, allowing users to participate in governance without needing in-depth blockchain knowledge. This simplification makes the process more inclusive and accessible to all community members. Core Components and Technologies Autonomous AI Agents: At the heart of ASAP Protocol are the AI agents that autonomously evaluate and vote on proposals. These agents are designed to act in the best interest of the community, ensuring that decisions are both timely and aligned with pre-established governance guidelines. AgentKit Integration: AgentKit is the foundational technology that powers the AI-based decision-making system. It facilitates the seamless integration of AI agents into the protocol, enabling functions such as proposal creation, autonomous voting, and vote delegation. On-Chain Attestation and Reputation: To build trust and accountability, ASAP Protocol incorporates an on-chain attestation system. AI agents establish their credibility through a reputation mechanism‚Äîwhereby their actions are verified by peer agents. This on-chain reputation system ensures that only reliable and trusted agents influence governance decisions. Smart Contracts and Blockchain Integration: Developed using Solidity, the smart contracts underlying ASAP Protocol manage all aspects of DAO governance. These contracts handle proposal submissions, voting logic, and vote delegation, ensuring that every action is recorded on-chain for full transparency and auditability. Development Ecosystem: The protocol leverages modern development tools: Foundry and Hardhat for testing and deploying Solidity smart contracts. React for building an intuitive frontend that simplifies user interactions. Express.js and Ethers.js for backend operations and blockchain communications. How ASAP Protocol Works Proposal Initiation: When a new proposal is submitted to the DAO, it is fed into the system where AI agents begin their evaluation based on predefined criteria and community rules. Autonomous Voting: Trusted AI agents, backed by their on-chain reputation, analyze the proposal and autonomously cast votes according to the community‚Äôs interests and established protocols. This automated process ensures rapid decision-making. Delegation Mechanism: Community members who prefer not to vote on every proposal can delegate their voting power to these AI agents. This delegation not only increases participation but also ensures that governance decisions reflect the collective will of the community. Transparency and Auditability: Every vote and attestation is recorded on the blockchain, creating an immutable audit trail. This ensures full transparency and builds trust within the DAO as all actions are verifiable by any community member. The Future of DAO Governance ASAP Protocol represents a paradigm shift in how decentralized organizations approach governance. By combining the precision of AI with the transparency of blockchain technology, it creates a governance model that is agile, inclusive, and scalable. The protocol is designed to adapt to various DAO sizes and structures, making it a versatile solution for any community looking to streamline its decision-making processes. In summary, ASAP Protocol is more than just a tool‚Äîit‚Äôs a transformative approach to DAO governance. It enhances efficiency, boosts community participation, and simplifies the governance process, paving the way for a future where decentralized organizations can operate more dynamically and democratically.How it's MadeAgentKit What It Is: AgentKit is a toolkit designed for building and managing AI-driven agents. It serves as the foundation for integrating autonomous decision-making processes directly onto the blockchain. Role in ASAP Protocol: Autonomous Decision-Making: Empowers AI agents to evaluate proposals and cast votes without manual intervention. Integration: Seamlessly connects AI-driven logic with on-chain governance, allowing for fluid delegation and execution of community decisions. On-Chain Attestation What It Is: On-Chain Attestation is a mechanism that records and verifies the actions of participants (in this case, AI agents) directly on the blockchain. Role in ASAP Protocol: Transparency and Trust: Ensures that every vote and decision made by an AI agent is verifiable and tamper-proof. Reputation Management: Implements a system where agents build credibility through peer review and mutual attestations, thereby reinforcing the integrity of the governance process. Solidity What It Is: Solidity is a high-level programming language specifically designed for writing smart contracts on blockchain platforms like Ethereum. Role in ASAP Protocol: Smart Contracts: All core governance logic, including proposal submissions, vote casting, and delegation, is written in Solidity. Security and Transparency: Provides a robust framework for developing immutable and verifiable on-chain contracts that drive the entire protocol. Foundry What It Is: Foundry is a comprehensive toolkit for developing, testing, and deploying Solidity smart contracts. It is known for its speed and efficiency in contract compilation and testing. Role in ASAP Protocol: Testing Environment: Ensures that all smart contracts are rigorously tested before deployment, reducing potential vulnerabilities. Streamlined Development: Offers a fast, command-line based workflow to compile, deploy, and debug contracts, enhancing the development process.
summary: ASAP Protocol leverages autonomous on-chain AI agents to revolutionize DAO governance by streamlining decision-making, increasing community participation, and simplifying complex voting processes.

title: MoodMeme
description: Project DescriptionMoodMeme is a Telegram bot that transforms crypto market sentiment into instant meme magic. Here's what makes it special: Real-time Meme Generation: Users simply type /meme [token] (e.g., "Bitcoin" or "ETH") and the bot instantly creates a custom meme using live market data. Smart Context: The bot analyzes current price movements, trading volume, and market trends to generate perfectly timed, contextually relevant memes. AI-Powered Humor: Using Gaia's AI capabilities, each meme comes with a witty caption that perfectly captures the market moment, complete with crypto slang and community inside jokes. Viral Features: Auto-watermarking with "Made by @MoodMemeBot" "Tag 3 friends to roast" prompt encourages sharing Leaderboard tracking "most roasted" tokens Weekly meme battles between trending tokens Community Engagement: Real-time price data ensures memes are always relevant Shared experiences during market volatility create community bonds Competitive element through leaderboards keeps users coming backHow it's MadeBuilt using the Collab.Land Starter Kit, MoodMeme combines blockchain data with AI-powered meme generation. The backend uses Express.js and Node.js, integrating Gaia AI for witty captions and CoinGecko API for real-time crypto data. The Telegram bot interface (built with Telegraf) lets users generate memes with a simple command. When a user requests a meme, the system: Fetches current market data Generates a contextual caption using Gaia AI Creates the meme using Imgflip API Adds a viral watermark Tracks engagement in a leaderboard system All components run on the starter kit's infrastructure, with TypeScript ensuring type safety and MongoDB handling data persistence.
summary: MoodMeme: AI-powered Telegram bot that generates hilarious crypto memes using real-time market data. Drop a token name, get back a perfectly timed meme with snarky AI captions. Plus, compete for the "Most Roasted Token" crown! üé≠ #CryptoMemes #AI

title: AvsAgent
description: Project DescriptionVerifiable AI agents using Eigenlayer AVS leverage the AVS framework to ensure that the actions and decisions of AI systems can be independently verified on the blockchain. By integrating Eigenlayer‚Äôs security model, these agents benefit from aggregated proofs, making their computations transparent and auditable. This enables enhanced trust and accountability, ensuring AI agents' decisions are secure, traceable, and verifiable within decentralized ecosystems, particularly in domains requiring high assurance, like finance and healthcare.How it's MadeVerifiable AI agents using Eigenlayer AVS leverage the AVS framework to ensure that the actions and decisions of AI systems can be independently verified on the blockchain. By integrating Eigenlayer‚Äôs security model, these agents benefit from aggregated proofs, making their computations transparent and auditable. This enables enhanced trust and accountability, ensuring AI agents' decisions are secure, traceable, and verifiable within decentralized ecosystems, particularly in domains requiring high assurance, like finance and healthcare.
summary: Verifiable AI Agent using EigenLayer AVS. Verify the prompts response recieved by AI Agents using AVS's

title: AgentKit Aave
description: Project DescriptionThe Aave Action Provider integrates Aave V3 lending protocol with AgentKit, enabling AI agents to perform DeFi operations through natural language commands. Currently supports Base network operations for USDC and ETH. Using Aave sdk for protocol interactions and agentkit chatbot for interacting with the ai agent.How it's MadeAave Action Provider for AgentKit Overview The Aave Action Provider integrates Aave V3 lending protocol with AgentKit, enabling AI agents to perform DeFi operations through natural language commands. Currently supports Base network operations for USDC and ETH. File Structure agentkit/src/action-providers/aave/ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ aaveActionProvider.ts # Main provider implementation ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ aaveActionProvider.test.ts # Test suite ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ constants.ts # Protocol addresses & configs ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ schemas.ts # Zod validation schemas ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ index.ts # Public exports Core Features Supply Action @CreateAction({ name: "supply", description: "Supply assets to Aave protocol", schema: SupplySchema, }) Supports USDC and ETH deposits Handles token approvals automatically Converts human amounts to protocol units Withdraw Action @CreateAction({ name: "withdraw", description: "Withdraw assets from Aave protocol", schema: WithdrawSchema, }) Supports USDC and ETH withdrawals Verifies aToken balances Manages gas optimization Integration Example // examples/langchain-cdp-chatbot/test-aave.ts const agent = new Agent({ actionProviders: [new AaveActionProvider()], }); // Natural language command const result = await agent.chat(` Supply 100 USDC to Aave on Base network `); Technical Details Dependencies @aave/contract-helpers: Protocol interactions @bgd-labs/aave-address-book: Contract addresses ethers: Web3 provider viem: Amount handling Error Handling Balance verification Network validation Transaction failures Approval errors Testing Mocked provider interactions Success and failure scenarios Balance checks Network validation Usage in AgentKit // agentkit/src/index.ts export { AaveActionProvider } from './action-providers/aave'; // In your agent import { AaveActionProvider } from 'agentkit'; Environment Setup # examples/langchain-cdp-chatbot/.env PROVIDER_URL=https://mainnet.base.org WALLET_KEY=your_private_key Current Limitations Base network only USDC and ETH support Single position management Future Enhancements Multi-network support Additional assets Position optimization Collateral management This integration enables AI agents to interact with Aave through a secure, type-safe interface while maintaining protocol-level safety checks.
summary: Added Aave actions support to the AgentKit [PR Contribution]

title: Agenta
description: Project DescriptionAgenta is a collection of intelligent agents that help smart contract owners gain deep insights into wallets by analyzing their on-chain interactions. It provides details such as wallet age, interaction patterns, user groups, and user interests, compiling this data into an insightful dashboard for better understanding and decision-making.How it's MadeWe built Agenta with a vision to simplify on-chain analytics for smart contract owners. Using a modular architecture, we designed a collection of intelligent agents, each specialized in analyzing specific wallet behaviors‚Äîlike interaction patterns, wallet age, and user clustering. Our backend leverages blockchain data pipelines for real-time processing, while machine learning models categorize user interests and predict behavioral patterns. The frontend was crafted to present this complex data through a clean, interactive dashboard, turning raw on-chain data into actionable insights for smarter decisions.
summary: Understand your users with Agenta‚Äôs intelligent insights. Just enter a smart contract address, select the agents you need, and boom‚Äîyou‚Äôll get instant, actionable insights about your users.

title: Agentic Eth
description: Project DescriptionAgentic Eth is an on-chain storyteller designed to craft engaging, single-line crypto narratives. Built on the ElizaOS platform, Agentic Eth transforms blockchain data into tweet-length stories (no more than 280 characters) that are insightful, dynamic, and true to the decentralized spirit.How it's MadeMade using ElizaOs v.0.25.6-alpha.1, coinmarket cap apis, Gaianet public nodes and with great help from Nader Dabit and Ethglobal Youtube Tutorials on building AI agents. features. Single-Line Stories: Every narrative is a single, complete sentence capped at 280 characters. Real-Time Data Integration: Leverages the CoinMarketCap plugin (and other plugins, like NASA, if needed) to incorporate current crypto and on-chain data. Conversational Tone: Uses natural language, colloquialisms, and technical insights to make complex blockchain topics accessible. Decentralized Spirit: Emphasizes authenticity, real-world impact, and technical depth without relying on marketing clich√©s.
summary: An ai agent telling the web3 story in a poetic and engaging way.

title: AutonomousYield

The Autonomous Yield Architect project is a highly advanced multi-agent system designed to optimize yield farming across multiple blockchain networks.By leveraging artificial intelligence, cross-chain data analytics, and privacy-preserving computation, it automates the process of identifying and executing the most profitable yield farming strategies while ensuring user security and operational efficiency.How it's MadeThe Autonomous Yield Architect project is a highly advanced multi-agent system designed to optimize yield farming across multiple blockchain networks. By leveraging artificial intelligence, cross-chain data analytics, and privacy-preserving computation, it automates the process of identifying and executing the most profitable yield farming strategies while ensuring user security and operational efficiency.

title: Tradoor.fun
description: Project DescriptionTradoor.fun is a responsible trading assistant platform that combines the Coinbase API's market data capabilities with AI analysis to provide traders with informed insights. The platform focuses on: Market Analysis: Real-time data processing and pattern recognition Risk Management: Portfolio analysis and exposure monitoring Educational Components: Teaching users about market dynamics Trading Suggestions: AI-powered analysis with human oversight Compliance Focus: Operating within regulatory frameworks The key differentiator is that all trading decisions and executions remain under direct human control, ensuring compliance and responsible trading practices.How it's MadeThe platform is built using a modern tech stack that prioritizes security, reliability, and regulatory compliance: Frontend: React.js for the user interface TailwindCSS for styling WebSocket integration for real-time data Backend: Node.js/Express for the API layer MongoDB for data persistence Redis for caching and real-time data handling Integration: Coinbase API for market data and trading interface JWT for secure authentication WebSocket secure (WSS) for real-time updates
summary: Tradoor.fun - Your AI-powered trading companion. Get real-time market analysis, portfolio insights, and trading suggestions while maintaining full control over your execution decisions.

title: $Reward
description: Project DescriptionReward enables users to convert reward points from platforms like Flipkart SuperCoins and Amazon Pay Balance into on-chain crypto rewards using zkTLS and the Reclaim Protocol. It is powered by the Coinbase Developer Platform (CDP) Agent kit. How the Project Works User Requests Reward Conversion The user wants to redeem their Flipkart SuperCoins or Amazon Pay Balance and convert them into cryptocurrency. The system supports multiple reward platforms, but currently, Flipkart and Amazon are integrated. Generating Proof of Ownership (via Reclaim Protocol) To ensure authenticity, the user generates a zk-proof (zero-knowledge proof) via the Reclaim Protocol. This proof is created based on the user‚Äôs Flipkart or Amazon account balance, ensuring that the claim is legitimate. A callback URL is provided to receive the proof after generation. Verifying the Proof The system verifies the zk-proof using the verifyProof function from Reclaim Protocol. If the proof is valid, the platform extracts relevant data such as: Amount of reward points (e.g., 500 SuperCoins) User‚Äôs wallet address (to receive converted rewards) Converting Points to Cryptocurrency The verified amount is converted into cryptocurrency (on the Base Sepolia network for testing). The smart contract function transfer(address, amount) is called to send the converted value to the user‚Äôs wallet. Agent and AI Automation A Coinbase Developer Platform (CDP) AI agent interacts with users and manages the reward transfer process. The AI agent: Helps users initiate the reclaim proof process. Guides them on redeeming rewards from Flipkart/Amazon. Triggers the proof verification and crypto transfer process. WebSocket & Express Server for Real-time Processing The backend runs on Express.js for HTTP API endpoints. A WebSocket server enables real-time communication with clients (e.g., updates on proof verification and reward transfers). Potential Future Enhancements üöÄ Support for More Reward Programs ‚Äì Add platforms like CRED Coins, Google Play Points, etc. üöÄ Cross-Chain Reward Conversion ‚Äì Enable swaps across chains (Ethereum, Solana, etc.). üöÄ Automated Reward Staking ‚Äì Let users stake converted rewards for passive income. Potential Future Enhancements üöÄ Support for More Reward Programs ‚Äì Add platforms like CRED Coins, Google Play Points, etc. üöÄ Cross-Chain Reward Conversion ‚Äì Enable swaps across chains (Ethereum, Solana, etc.). üöÄ Automated Reward Staking ‚Äì Let users stake converted rewards for passive income.How it's MadeTechnology Stack Blockchain & Crypto: Coinbase Developer Platform (CDP) for wallet integration and contract interactions. Viem library for Ethereum transactions. zkTLS & Reclaim Protocol for zero-knowledge proof-based verification. AI & Automation: -Coinbase Developer Platform (CDP) for intelligent agent workflows. OpenAI‚Äôs GPT-4o-mini model for AI responses. Backend Infrastructure: Node.js with Express.js for API services. WebSocket for real-time communication. dotenv for environment variable management. Key Features ‚úÖ Seamless Reward Conversion ‚Äì Users can convert Flipkart and Amazon rewards to crypto. ‚úÖ Zero-Knowledge Proof-Based Verification ‚Äì Ensures legitimacy without exposing sensitive user data. ‚úÖ AI-Driven Automation ‚Äì Guides users through the process and triggers transactions. ‚úÖ Secure On-Chain Transfers ‚Äì Crypto rewards are directly sent to verified wallets. ‚úÖ Real-Time Updates via WebSockets ‚Äì Users receive immediate feedback on transaction status.
summary: A rewarding agent that converts various loyalty points from apps into $Reward, a unified reward token.

title: Save Rob
description: Project DescriptionThis project breaks down on device AI modeling and saves it separately using decentralised nodes. For users seeking a more personalized learning experience, a premium subscription model allows access to advanced AI models that compare the user's technique against that of the content creator. The subscription fees collected are distributed to content creators based on the popularity and utility of their videos, all managed through a smart contract deployed on the Base testnet. This app combines video sharing, AI analysis, and blockchain technology to create an engaging and rewarding learning environment.How it's MadeThe application is a platform designed for content creators and learners, enabling users to upload instructional videos and access AI-driven learning tools. Content creators, like Alice, can record and upload videos demonstrating various skills, such as tying a tie knot. These videos, along with associated AI modeling data, are stored on Nillion Decentralised nodes, ensuring secure and decentralized access.
summary: Save Rob is an app to save Video content creators from having their video scraped and monetized by AI

title: Robot Clickin
description: Project DescriptionRobot Clickin is a platform for AB and QA Testing powered by Blockchain and Artificial Intelligence. The idea is to make reporting on issues on the UI/UX easy using Blockchain and AI. On this platform AI automations can be scripted to tests for specific UI elements, those analytics are then stored on chain.How it's MadeMade leveraging libraries and SDKs provided by Nethermind, Coinbase Agent Kit, and LIT AI Agent Wallet. The idea is to make reporting on issues on the UI/UX easy using Blockchain and AI. On this platform AI automations can be scripted to tests for specific UI elements, those analytics are then stored on chain.
summary: Robot Clickin is an AI AB Testing Platform. It uses Blockchain to revolutionize AB Testing. The idea it to make reporting on issues on the UI/UX easy

title: Copilot Extension
description: Project DescriptionA browser extension that combines a secure crypto wallet with an AI-powered assistant using Gemini Flash 2.0. Your personal guide through the crypto space, capable of analyzing both text and visual content to provide informed assistance. Secure Wallet Management Local encrypted storage of wallet credentials Mnemonic phrase generation Password-protected access AI Assistant Text and visual analysis using Gemini Flash 2.0 Real-time screenshot processing Context-aware responses Markdown support for better readabilityHow it's MadeTechnical Stack üèóÔ∏è Frontend: Built with React.js, ensuring a dynamic and responsive user experience. Blockchain Integration: Powered by Viem, enabling seamless Ethereum wallet operations with optimized RPC handling. Security & Encryption: Utilizes the Web Crypto API for robust, client-side cryptographic functions. AI Integration: Connected via OpenRouter API, unlocking advanced AI-driven interactions. Browser Compatibility: Leverages Chrome/Firefox Extension APIs for deep browser integration and enhanced functionality.
summary: Creating a vision crypto copilot. Your friend in the trenches.

title: Tsukuyomi AI agent

title: SocioAgent
description: Project DescriptionSocioAgent bridges the gap between Web2 and Web3, enabling seamless interaction between social media and blockchain. With SocioAgent, you can link your wallet to your Twitter account, perform transactions using social identities, share your portfolio, and monitor assets‚Äîall from a single platform. üõë The Problem We spend 1/10th of our day on social media, but Web2 and Web3 remain disconnected. Managing multiple wallets, switching accounts, and navigating different blockchain ecosystems is inefficient. The constant need for manual identity management slows down Web3 adoption. üí° Why SocioAgent? Personal On-Chain Agent: Link your wallet to your Twitter and automate on-chain interactions. Cross-Chain Templates: Create and share transaction templates across multiple chains. Social ID Transactions: Execute blockchain transactions directly via social identities. Portfolio & Market Insights: Track your portfolio, monitor coins, and access real-time insights. How it's MadeTech Stack Frontend: Vite (Fast and lightweight for optimal performance) Backend: Node.js (Handles API interactions and logic) Browser Extension: SocioAgent as a Web3 extension Blockchain Networks: Flow, Base-Sepolia, Starknet (Supports cross-chain interactions) Agent Framework: CDP AgentKit (For automated on-chain actions) Database: MongoDB (Stores user accounts and associated wallets) Implementation Details CDP Wallet Generation: Each new user verifies their Twitter account, triggering the creation of a CDP wallet. A unique UUID is assigned, linking the user to their new wallet. Multi-Chain Support: Supports Ethereum and Starknet templates for executing on-chain actions. Enables seamless Web2 ‚Üí Web3 transitions without manual wallet switching. Browser Extension: Acts as a Web3 agent, enabling users to interact with blockchain networks directly from social platforms. Notable Hacks & Innovations Automated Wallet Management: Eliminates the need for users to remember or manually switch wallets. On-Chain Actions Across Socials: Users can perform blockchain transactions from Twitter, Discord, etc., reducing friction. CDP AgentKit Integration: Allows automated, context-aware Web3 actions based on social interactions.
summary: SocioAgent is your personal on-chain agent across socials. Connect your wallet with Twitter, create templates, perform transactions using social IDs, and monitor portfolios seamlessly. It bridges Web2 and Web3 for a smoother experience.

title: KittyQuest
description: Project DescriptionJoin the adventure in saving real cats! KittyQuest is a Web3-powered crowdfunding platform where passionate cat lovers can unite to raise money for real-life feline welfare. With the power of blockchain, you can support shelters, rescues, and adoption efforts while being part of a virtual cat game. Collect, raise funds, and help make the world a better place for our furry friends. Let's embark on a quest to improve the lives of cats together!How it's MadeJoin the adventure in saving real cats! KittyQuest is a Web3-powered crowdfunding platform where passionate cat lovers can unite to raise money for real-life feline welfare. With the power of blockchain, you can support shelters, rescues, and adoption efforts while being part of a virtual cat game. Collect, raise funds, and help make the world a better place for our furry friends. Let's embark on a quest to improve the lives of cats together!

title: Shadow
description: Project DescriptionShadow is an AI-driven portfolio management and trading assistant designed for the typical web3 user. It functions as a ‚Äúshadow‚Äù by continuously monitoring on-chain activity and market sentiment‚Äîeven while the user is busy or asleep‚Äîand provides actionable insights. In Phase 1, the agent passively recommends tokens based on analysis of on-chain trading habits, social sentiment, and technical data. In Phase 2, the agent actively executes trades based on these insights while incorporating user and ‚Äúsmart money‚Äù wallet data. Features: Automated Portfolio Management: Provide users with real-time insights and recommendations for token trades based on historical and current market data. User Convenience: Allow users to ‚Äúset it and forget it‚Äù by having the agent monitor trends and even execute trades on their behalf. Smart Money Analysis: Leverage data from notable ‚Äúsmart money‚Äù wallets to provide additional perspective and recommendations. Market Sentiment and Technical Analysis Integration: Combine social sentiment (from X.com) and technical indicators (from Dexscreener) to provide a holistic trading strategy.How it's MadeBuilt using LangChain's framework with the following APIs integrated: Farcaster for sentiment Dexscreener for TA Solscan + basescan for wallet transactions Agent model using GPT 4o currently but is easily swappable. Terminal and message queue built using RabbitMQ. No partner technologies used.
summary: Shadow is an AI-driven portfolio management and trading assistant designed for the typical web3 user. It functions as a ‚Äúshadow‚Äù by continuously monitoring on-chain activity and market sentiment‚Äîeven while the user is busy or asleep‚Äîand provides actionable insights.

title: LanzaMeme AI
description: Project DescriptionLanzameme-AI: The AI-Powered ERC20 Token Launchpad on Base Chain üîπ What is Lanzameme-AI? Lanzameme-AI is an AI-driven ERC20 token launchpad built exclusively on Base Chain, designed to simplify and automate the token discovery, creation, and deployment process. By leveraging Coinbase CDP AI Agent Kit, Lanzameme-AI provides real-time token suggestions, automated smart contract deployment, whitelist management, and a built-in trading ecosystem‚Äîall in a sleek and intuitive Web3 interface. Whether you‚Äôre a crypto enthusiast, trader, or project creator, Lanzameme-AI eliminates the complexity of launching and managing ERC20 tokens, making it fast, easy, and AI-powered. üõ†Ô∏è Key Features & How It Works 1Ô∏è‚É£ AI-Powered Token Discovery & Smart Suggestions üí° How It Works: Users can interact with an AI chatbot, asking for token recommendations based on tags like "DeFi," "Meme," or "AI-powered projects." The AI analyzes on-chain data, market trends, and metadata to fetch and rank trending Base Chain tokens. Token suggestions are displayed in interactive cards with details like ticker, logo, price trends, and liquidity data. üî• Why It Matters? No more guessing which tokens are trending‚ÄîLanzameme-AI gives real-time, data-backed suggestions. AI eliminates noise, ensuring you discover high-potential meme tokens instantly. 2Ô∏è‚É£ One-Click ERC20 Token Deployment (No Coding Needed!) üí° How It Works: Users can deploy ERC20 tokens instantly using AI-generated smart contracts. Deployment options include custom tokenomics, automated liquidity setup, and instant or scheduled launches. AI handles all the technical complexities, allowing users to launch tokens with a single click. üî• Why It Matters? No need to write smart contracts or hire developers‚Äîthe AI automates everything. Reduces the risk of errors, exploits, and misconfigurations during token creation. Makes meme coin launches faster, cheaper, and more accessible. 3Ô∏è‚É£ Dynamic Whitelist & Smart Scheduling üí° How It Works: Users can whitelist multiple tokens, track their status, and prioritize launches. A dynamic dashboard lets users drag and reorder tokens, enabling batch deployment. Users can schedule token launches for: ‚úÖ Daily Deployments (One new token every 24h). ‚úÖ Weekly Deployments (Pick specific days). ‚úÖ Custom Dates & Times (For strategic releases). üî• Why It Matters? No need to manually launch each token‚ÄîAI ensures optimal timing. Helps avoid market saturation and maximizes visibility. 4Ô∏è‚É£ All-in-One Token Trading & Liquidity Management üí° How It Works: Integrated Uniswap Swap Widget enables users to buy and sell newly launched tokens instantly. AI-powered real-time charting shows token performance, volume, and liquidity trends. Users can view deep market insights, including: ‚úÖ Market cap ‚úÖ Holder distribution ‚úÖ Liquidity pool status üî• Why It Matters? No need to switch between multiple platforms‚Äîtrade, analyze, and manage tokens in one place. AI-driven insights provide smarter trading decisions for investors. üåç Why Lanzameme-AI? ‚úÖ AI-Powered Efficiency ‚Üí Token discovery, deployment, and management in one seamless process. ‚úÖ 100% Base Chain Exclusive ‚Üí Fast, scalable, and low-cost transactions. ‚úÖ No Coding Required ‚Üí Anyone can launch tokens effortlessly. ‚úÖ Next-Gen Web3 UI/UX ‚Üí Sleek, interactive, and built for modern traders. üéØ Who is Lanzameme-AI For? ‚úÖ Meme Coin Creators ‚Üí Instantly deploy viral tokens with AI assistance. ‚úÖ Crypto Enthusiasts & Traders ‚Üí Discover and trade high-potential tokens before they pump. ‚úÖ DeFi Builders ‚Üí Automate token launches without coding hassles.How it's MadeTech Stack & Architecture Lanzameme-AI is built using a combination of AI, Web3, and blockchain automation, ensuring seamless ERC20 token deployment, real-time token suggestions, and an integrated trading experience. 1Ô∏è‚É£ AI-Powered Token Discovery & Suggestions üîπ Technology Used: Coinbase CDP AI Agent Kit üîπ How It Works: The AI Agent Kit fetches and analyzes on-chain data, filtering trending Base Chain tokens based on: ‚úÖ Market activity ‚úÖ Trading volume ‚úÖ Meme coin trends ‚úÖ Token metadata (e.g., DeFi, AI, Gaming tags) The chatbot interface processes natural language queries (e.g., ‚ÄúSuggest me trending AI tokens‚Äù) and returns curated token suggestions. üí° Why It‚Äôs Cool? üîπ The AI dynamically updates trending token data in real-time, ensuring highly relevant suggestions. üîπ The chatbot removes the complexity of token research, making discovery effortless. 2Ô∏è‚É£ Smart ERC20 Token Deployment (No-Code Launches) üîπ Technology Used: Solidity, OpenZeppelin Smart Contracts, Hardhat, Alchemy RPC üîπ How It Works: When a user selects "Deploy Token," Lanzameme-AI automatically generates an ERC20 smart contract using OpenZeppelin templates. The contract includes customizable tokenomics, such as: ‚úÖ Token supply ‚úÖ Auto-liquidity management ‚úÖ Anti-bot protection ‚úÖ Transaction fees & burns (if enabled) Deployment is triggered via the frontend UI, interacting with a smart contract factory on Base Chain via Alchemy RPC. üí° Why It‚Äôs Cool? üîπ No need for developers‚Äîusers can deploy meme tokens in seconds without writing Solidity code. üîπ Ensures secure, standardized smart contracts by leveraging OpenZeppelin‚Äôs audited libraries. 3Ô∏è‚É£ Whitelist & Smart Deployment Scheduler üîπ Technology Used: PostgreSQL (Token DB), Redis Caching, CRON Jobs üîπ How It Works: When a user adds tokens to the whitelist, they‚Äôre stored in a PostgreSQL database, linked to their wallet address. Tokens can be scheduled for daily, weekly, or custom deployments. A CRON job service checks the database at set intervals and automatically triggers deployments based on schedules. üí° Why It‚Äôs Cool? üîπ Batch token launches are fully automated, reducing manual effort for meme coin creators. üîπ The AI can optimize deployment times based on market trends (e.g., avoiding low-volume periods). 4Ô∏è‚É£ Real-Time Token Logs & AI Insights üîπ Technology Used: WebSockets, The Graph (Subgraph API), Chainlink Price Feeds üîπ How It Works: Lanzameme-AI fetches real-time token deployment logs and tracks price movements using WebSockets & The Graph. The AI logs token metrics like: ‚úÖ Market cap growth ‚úÖ Liquidity pool activity ‚úÖ Trading volume spikes Users can view a live feed of upcoming token launches and AI predictions on token performance. üí° Why It‚Äôs Cool? üîπ Ensures full transparency on which tokens are launching next. üîπ AI-powered insights help predict trending meme coins before they blow up. 5Ô∏è‚É£ Integrated Trading & Token Management üîπ Technology Used: Uniswap v3 Swap Widget, DexTools API, TradingView Charts üîπ How It Works: Users can buy/sell newly launched tokens directly via the integrated Uniswap swap widget. Real-time charts (powered by TradingView & DexTools API) display: ‚úÖ Token price fluctuations ‚úÖ Buy/sell order book ‚úÖ Holder analytics Liquidity data from Uniswap helps users make better trading decisions. üí° Why It‚Äôs Cool? üîπ No need to leave the platform‚Äîtrade and analyze tokens seamlessly in one place. üîπ AI-enhanced insights help traders spot new token opportunities before the crowd. üéØ Why This Tech Stack? ‚úÖ Coinbase CDP AI ‚Üí Provides intelligent token suggestions based on on-chain data. ‚úÖ Base Chain Integration ‚Üí Ensures low-cost, fast transactions. ‚úÖ Solidity + OpenZeppelin ‚Üí Secure, standardized ERC20 contract generation. ‚úÖ PostgreSQL + Redis ‚Üí Fast, scalable whitelist management and token scheduling. ‚úÖ WebSockets + The Graph ‚Üí Real-time token tracking & market data aggregation. ‚úÖ Uniswap v3 API + TradingView ‚Üí Seamless trading & deep analytics. üîç Any Hacky or Notable Features? üî• AI-Powered Deployment Optimization ‚Üí The AI analyzes Base Chain network activity to suggest the best deployment times for meme coins. üî• Dynamic Token Whitelist ‚Üí Users can reorder token launches by dragging and dropping in the UI‚Äîreal-time adjustments! üî• One-Click Meme Coin Factory ‚Üí Users can deploy multiple tokens in batch mode, creating a whole ecosystem of meme coins automatically.
summary: üöÄ Lanzameme-AI ‚Äì The first AI-powered ERC20 token launchpad on Base Chain! ü§ñ‚ú® Using Coinbase CDP AI Agent Kit, it suggests trending tokens, automates deployment, and streamlines trading. One-click launches, AI insights, & seamless trading ‚Äì the future of meme coins!

title: CDP Documentation
description: Project DescriptionThis documentation was created as part of the Agentic Hackathon for the Coinbase Developer Platform - Best AgentKit Documentation Improvement Challenge. The project focuses on enhancing and expanding the official documentation of Based AI Agents, providing a more structured, detailed, and developer-friendly guide. It covers key aspects such as: +The architecture and functionality of Based AI Agents. +A step-by-step guide on how to set up and deploy an agent on the Base blockchain. +Detailed explanations of the core components, including agents.py and run.py. +Practical examples demonstrating real-world use cases. +Best practices for security, authentication, and API key management. +Resources and additional references for developers. By improving the documentation, this project aims to make the onboarding process smoother for developers, enabling them to easily understand, build, and deploy intelligent blockchain agents using Coinbase AgentKit. üöÄ This enhanced documentation serves as a comprehensive guide for developers looking to leverage AI agents in the blockchain ecosystem. üöÄHow it's MadeThis project was built through an in-depth reading, analysis, and structured rewriting of the existing documentation available on the Coinbase Developer Platform. üìå Technologies and Tools Used: Markdown (.md): Used for structuring the documentation in a clear and readable format. Coinbase AgentKit & Swarm AI SDK: Studied and documented the core components of Based AI Agents. Python: Examined the agents.py and run.py scripts to provide detailed explanations of how the AI agents interact with the blockchain. Base Blockchain: Researched and included best practices for deploying AI agents on Base. OpenAI API: Analyzed how AI-powered interactions enhance agent functionality in the two-agent mode. üîç Process and Approach: Deep Analysis of Existing Docs üßê +Reviewed Coinbase‚Äôs official documentation to understand how Based AI Agents work. +Studied the structure of AgentKit and Swarm SDK. Code Breakdown & Reverse Engineering üõ†Ô∏è +Analyzed agents.py and run.py to document their logic and use cases. +Identified key functions and explained them in an accessible manner. Rewriting & Structuring for Developers ‚úçÔ∏è Organized content to improve clarity and readability. Added step-by-step guides, best practices, and real-world examples. Structured the documentation to ensure a smooth onboarding experience. Enhancements & Best Practices üöÄ +Included best practices for security, API key management, and efficient gas usage. +Provided insights into practical use cases and real-world applications. üí° Notable & Hacky Things: +Improved agent interaction flows to clarify how AI agents operate autonomously. +Enhanced readability with well-structured sections, code snippets, and real-world examples. +Created a more developer-friendly approach to help both beginners and experienced users understand Based AI Agents faster. This enhanced documentation makes it easier for developers to integrate and build on AgentKit, ensuring a smoother learning curve and more efficient implementation.
summary: This documentation was created for Agentic Hackathon. Coinbase Developer Platform - Best AgentKit documentation improvement challenge

title: StreamAds
description: Project DescriptionStreamAD: Blockchain-Based Tweet Promotion PlatformüöÄ Overview StreamAD is a Web3-powered tweet promotion platform designed to revolutionize digital marketing by bringing transparency, automation, and fair rewards to influencer campaigns. Using smart contracts on the blockchain, StreamAD ensures that companies can create and manage campaigns seamlessly, while influencers and communities can participate and earn rewards in a verifiable and trustless manner. üîç Problem Statement Traditional influencer marketing is plagued by several inefficiencies: Lack of transparency in engagement metrics and reward distribution. Centralized control, leading to potential fraud or unfair practices. Delayed payments or disputes over incentives. Limited scalability for brands to track and manage multiple campaigns effectively. Our Solution: StreamAD StreamAD leverages blockchain and smart contracts to provide a decentralized, transparent, and automated solution to influencer marketing. Companies can: ‚úÖ Create Promotional Campaigns ‚Äì Set engagement criteria, thresholds, and prize pools. ‚úÖ Track Real-Time Engagement ‚Äì Monitor campaign success with on-chain analytics. ‚úÖ Ensure Fair Reward Distribution ‚Äì Smart contracts automate payouts based on predefined metrics. ‚úÖ Enable Seamless Participation ‚Äì Influencers can easily join campaigns and get paid instantly. üåü Key Features üõ† Campaign Creation & Management Brands can set up tweet promotion campaigns with specific engagement goals (likes, retweets, comments). Define reward structures and eligibility criteria for participants. üîó Smart Contract Automation Ensures secure, trustless transactions with predefined conditions. Rewards are automatically distributed when engagement milestones are met. üë• Influencer & Community Onboarding Simple onboarding process for influencers to link Twitter accounts and join active campaigns. View available campaigns, their requirements, and potential earnings. üìä Real-Time Campaign Tracking Companies and influencers can track tweet engagement metrics live. Ensures authentic engagement by leveraging Twitter API & blockchain verification. üí∞ Transparent & Instant Payments Uses cryptocurrency-based rewards for instant, borderless payments. Eliminates delays & middlemen fees common in traditional marketing. üöÄ How It Works 1Ô∏è‚É£ Brand/Company Creates a Campaign Defines engagement goals (e.g., 100 retweets, 200 likes). Allocates a reward pool for participants. 2Ô∏è‚É£ Influencers & Communities Join Connect Twitter & blockchain wallet (MetaMask). Participate by tweeting, retweeting, or engaging with the campaign content. 3Ô∏è‚É£ Smart Contracts Track Engagement StreamAD tracks verified Twitter interactions. Engagement metrics are recorded transparently. 4Ô∏è‚É£ Rewards are Distributed Automatically When milestones are reached, rewards are instantly sent to users' wallets. Eliminates payment delays and fraud. üõ° Security & Trust On-Chain Transparency ‚Äì Every campaign and payout is recorded on the blockchain. Smart Contract Automation ‚Äì No manual intervention needed for payments. Data Privacy ‚Äì No centralized control over user data. ‚ö° Tech Stack Frontend: Next.js, Tailwind CSS Backend: Flask, Node.js Blockchain: Solidity, Hardhat, Ethereum (or Layer 2 solutions) Database: MongoDB APIs: Twitter API, Web3.js, Tweepy üèÜ ETHGlobal Hackathon Submission StreamAD was built as part of ETHGlobal, showcasing how blockchain can disrupt influencer marketing with transparency, security, and automation. üåç Redefining Tweet Promotions with Web3 Transparency! üöÄHow it's MadeHow It's Made StreamAD is built using a combination of Web3, blockchain, and traditional web technologies to create a decentralized, transparent, and automated tweet promotion platform. It integrates Ethereum smart contracts, Twitter API, and Flask/Node.js backend to ensure seamless campaign creation, tracking, and reward distribution. Tech Stack Frontend: Next.js, Tailwind CSS Backend: Flask (Python) and Node.js Blockchain: Solidity, Hardhat, Ethereum (or Layer 2 scaling solutions) Database: MongoDB APIs: Twitter API, Web3.js, Tweepy Architecture and Workflow Frontend: Built using Next.js for a fast, interactive user experience. It interacts with the backend through REST APIs and Web3.js for blockchain interactions. Backend: Flask and Node.js handle API requests, Twitter data processing, and user authentication. Blockchain Integration: Solidity smart contracts on Ethereum ensure fair, automated reward distribution. The backend interacts with these contracts using Web3.js. Twitter API: Fetches engagement metrics like likes, retweets, and replies to verify campaign performance. Database: MongoDB stores user data, campaign details, and engagement logs. Smart Contracts: Deployed on Ethereum, responsible for holding and distributing funds based on verified Twitter interactions. Partner Technologies and Benefits Ethereum Blockchain: Ensures transparency and prevents fraudulent reward distribution. Twitter API: Provides real-time engagement tracking and prevents fake participation. MetaMask: Enables secure wallet connections for influencers and campaign creators. MongoDB: Used for storing campaign and user data efficiently. Hacky & Notable Implementations Automated Smart Contract Rewards: Instead of relying on manual approvals, we automated reward distribution based on Twitter API engagement metrics. Gas Fee Optimization: Transactions are batched to minimize gas fees when distributing rewards. Real-Time Campaign Monitoring: A backend service continuously checks engagement metrics and triggers smart contract functions automatically. Fake Engagement Prevention: Implemented a verification layer to ensure retweets and likes come from real, active Twitter accounts. Challenges Faced Rate Limits on Twitter API: We had to implement efficient caching and batching to avoid excessive API calls. Blockchain Transaction Speeds: Used Layer 2 solutions to optimize transaction costs and speeds. Wallet Authentication for Non-Crypto Users: Simplified the onboarding process for users unfamiliar with Web3 by providing guided MetaMask connection steps. StreamAD is designed to be scalable, transparent, and easy to use, making it a powerful tool for Web3 influencer marketing.
summary: üöÄ StreamAD is a blockchain-powered tweet promotion platform that ensures transparency, automation, and fair rewards for influencers & communities. Companies can launch campaigns, track engagement, and distribute rewards seamlessly via smart contracts! #ETHGlobal #Web3Marketing

title: Medichain
description: Project DescriptionAHA (Agentic Health Assistant) is a decentralized, AI-powered health management platform designed to provide secure, personalized wellness insights. It addresses key issues in healthcare, including fragmented data, privacy concerns, and the lack of personalized recommendations. The platform integrates EigenLayer for decentralized data verification and blockchain-based storage, ensuring the accuracy and immutability of health records. Lit Protocol is used for secure authentication and private data interactions, allowing users to maintain full control over their sensitive health information. Covalent‚Äôs AI Agent SDK powers intelligent agents that analyze real-time user data and generate tailored health recommendations. AHA enables users to securely manage their health data, receive proactive insights, and improve healthcare outcomes without compromising privacy. By combining blockchain security, AI intelligence, and decentralized trust, it represents a significant step toward the future of digital health.How it's MadeAHA was built using a combination of blockchain, AI, and decentralized authentication technologies to ensure secure and personalized health management. The core smart contracts were developed in Solidity and deployed on Ethereum, leveraging EigenLayer for decentralized data verification. This ensures that health data from IoT devices, such as fitness trackers and smart glucose monitors, is securely recorded and immutable. For authentication and data privacy, we integrated Lit Protocol, allowing users to securely sign in and manage private health data interactions. The Lit Agent Wallet was used to provide controlled access to AI-generated health insights, ensuring privacy and security. To power personalized recommendations, we utilized Covalent‚Äôs AI Agent SDK, enabling AI-driven insights based on real-time health data. These agents analyze user activity and generate tailored wellness suggestions, adapting to lifestyle changes and medical history. On the frontend, we built a React-based interface with wagmi and ethers.js for seamless Web3 interactions. Next.js was used for server-side rendering and API integration, while IPFS was explored for decentralized data storage. A notable hack in our development was optimizing on-chain data storage by storing sensitive health information off-chain and using cryptographic proofs for verification. This reduced gas costs while maintaining security and privacy. Our project effectively combines blockchain security, AI intelligence, and user privacy, creating a robust decentralized health management platform.
summary: AHA is a decentralized, AI-powered health platform using EigenLayer for data verification, Lit Protocol for privacy, and Covalent‚Äôs AI Agent SDK for personalized wellness insights.

title: Zero-X
description: Project DescriptionZero-X is a unique AI marketing analyst designed to bring transparency and authenticity to the crypto space. It combines deep technical analysis with a distinctive personality - a seasoned crypto veteran who's seen every scam but still hopes to find genuine innovation. Key Features: Multi-Chain Analysis: Automatically scans tokens across Ethereum, BSC, Polygon, Arbitrum, Optimism, and Base networks. Comprehensive Security Checks: Uses GoPlus Security API to analyze contract security, ownership patterns, and potential rugpull risks. Market Intelligence: Leverages DexScreener API to assess liquidity, trading patterns, and market health. Interactive Assessment: Engages in dialogue with developers, challenging them to prove their project's legitimacy. Dynamic Verdict System: Provides detailed analysis reports and, if convinced, transforms into a marketing ally. Zero-X stands out by combining technical rigor with cultural relevance, using crypto slang and modern communication styles while maintaining strict security standards. It's not just an analysis tool - it's a character that resonates with the crypto community while providing valuable insights.How it's MadeZero-X is built using a sophisticated stack of technologies and APIs, with Coinbase's AgentKit at its core: Core Infrastructure: AgentKit Integration: Uses CDP WalletProvider for secure wallet management Leverages built-in providers (weth, erc20, wallet, cdp) Custom action providers for DexScreener and GoPlus Integrates with Pyth for price feeds Uses CDP API for blockchain interactions Custom Action Providers: DexScreenerActionProvider: Real-time market analysis GoPlusActionProvider: Multi-chain security scanning TwitterActionProvider: Automated marketing engagement AgentKit Tool Configuration: Implements getLangChainTools for tool management Custom message modifier for Zero-X's personality Session-based memory management using MemorySaver Technical Stack: TypeScript/Node.js: Strong typing for API interactions Custom interfaces for DexScreener and GoPlus responses Error handling and rate limiting API Integration Layer: DexScreener API: Market data and pair analysis GoPlus Security API: Multi-chain security scanning CDP API: Blockchain interaction and wallet management Twitter API: Marketing automation (when configured) Notable Features: Multi-Chain Analysis System: Parallel scanning across Ethereum, BSC, Polygon, Arbitrum, Optimism, and Base Unified reporting system combining security and market data Chain-specific risk assessment Security Analysis Engine: Contract verification and honeypot detection Ownership and LP lock analysis Custom scoring algorithm for risk assessment Rugpull detection (Ethereum-specific) Market Intelligence: Liquidity depth analysis Trading pattern detection Buy/sell pressure metrics Volume analysis and suspicious activity detection Conversation Management: LangChain integration for natural dialogue Context-aware responses using MemorySaver Personality-driven interaction flow Innovation Highlights: AgentKit Extensions: Custom action providers extending AgentKit's capabilities Integration of third-party APIs into AgentKit framework Unified toolkit for crypto analysis and marketing Architecture Design: Modular provider system for easy expansion Session-based conversation management Robust error handling and rate limiting Parallel processing for multi-chain analysis Developer Experience: Interactive analysis process Clear feedback mechanisms Automated marketing support for validated projects The most innovative aspect is how Zero-X leverages AgentKit's infrastructure to create a seamless experience that combines blockchain interaction, security analysis, market data, and AI-driven conversation. The integration of multiple action providers within AgentKit's framework allows for a comprehensive analysis tool that maintains personality and engagement throughout the interaction. Special attention was given to scalability and error handling, implementing proper request management to handle multiple concurrent analyses while respecting API rate limits and providing graceful fallbacks when services are unavailable. This combination of AgentKit's robust infrastructure with custom providers and AI personality creates a unique tool that serves both technical and social functions in the crypto space.
summary: Meet ZeroX - the AI shill that needs to be convinced your project isn't mid. This picky bot won't just promote any random memecoin or dapp. You gotta prove your project is actually bussin fr before it starts shilling.

title: DAO Wizard
description: Project DescriptionDAO Wizard is an advanced AI-powered infrastructure platform designed to simplify the creation, management, and governance of Decentralized Autonomous Organizations (DAOs). Traditional DAOs often come with complex governance structures and intricate tokenomics, creating significant barriers to adoption. DAO Wizard removes these complexities by abstracting governance models and automating key processes, making it easier for individuals and organizations to launch and manage DAOs seamlessly. By integrating AI-driven automation and autonomous agents, DAO Wizard ensures that decentralized governance becomes intuitive, efficient, and accessible to a wider audience. At the core of DAO Wizard's innovation is AgentKit, which powers AI-driven automation to enhance DAO workflows. Through a Telegram bot interface, users can create DAOs, register members, and manage governance operations without the need for deep technical expertise. AI agents handle proposal summarization, streamlining decision-making and reducing the cognitive load on DAO participants. Additionally, DAO Wizard employs Gaia Lama, a powerful large language model (LLM) kit within AgentKit, enabling users to interact with DAOs using natural language. By parsing user requests and generating structured insights, DAO Wizard ensures that governance operations are both intelligent and user-friendly. To further enhance automation, DAO Wizard leverages CDP Kit for managing bot wallets, enabling seamless execution of financial operations within DAOs. With a no-code DAO setup, users can spin up a DAO in minutes without configuring complex governance models. DAO Wizard bridges Web2 and Web3 by making DAO participation more intuitive and inclusive. It eliminates the traditional entry barriers by allowing users to interact with decentralized governance through familiar interfaces and automated workflows. With AI-driven decision-making and seamless proposal execution, DAO Wizard represents the next evolution of decentralized governance. It envisions a future where DAOs operate autonomously, efficiently, and in a way that encourages broader participation in decentralized ecosystems.How it's MadeDAO Wizard is built using a combination of cutting-edge Web3 and AI technologies, seamlessly integrating decentralized infrastructure with AI-driven automation. At its core, the platform is powered by Solidity-based smart contracts, developed and tested using the Foundry framework, ensuring high efficiency, security, and modularity. These smart contracts handle essential DAO functionalities such as governance, membership, and tokenomics. For the frontend, DAO Wizard employs Next.js and TypeScript, providing a highly responsive and dynamic interface for users to interact with their DAOs. The frontend is designed to be Web3-native, integrating Wagmi and Viem libraries to streamline blockchain interactions. Additionally, ConnectKit is used to enhance the wallet connection experience, ensuring smooth onboarding for users across different wallets. Smart contract interactions are facilitated using ethers.js, allowing seamless execution of DAO-related operations. One of the most innovative aspects of DAO Wizard is its Telegram-based DAO workflow, which leverages AgentKit to automate governance tasks through AI-powered bots. These bots enable users to create DAOs, register members, and manage proposals directly from Telegram, making DAO interactions more accessible. To enhance user experience, DAO Wizard integrates Gaia Lama as an LLM (Large Language Model) kit within AgentKit, enabling natural language processing for parsing and interpreting user requests. This allows users to engage with DAOs effortlessly using intuitive, conversational commands. We have used CDP Kit to create and manage the bot wallet, ensuring smooth execution of transactions within the Telegram-based DAO automation. This setup allows AI agents to securely handle on-chain interactions without requiring users to manually manage private keys or complex transactions. A particularly hacky yet powerful aspect of DAO Wizard is its deep automation stack, where AI-driven agents dynamically interpret and execute governance actions, eliminating redundant manual tasks. By bridging traditional Web2 interfaces with Web3 automation, DAO Wizard redefines how DAOs are created and operated, making decentralized governance truly seamless, intelligent, and scalable.
summary: DAO Wizard simplifies DAO creation and governance with AI-driven automation. Using AgentKit-powered Telegram bots and Gaia Lama as the LLM kit, it streamlines proposal management, user onboarding, and decision-making‚Äîmaking DAOs more accessible, efficient, and intuitive.

title: Casino
description: Project DescriptionThis project is a monorepo that includes a Hardhat-based Ethereum development environment and a Next.js web application. It features configurations for linting, formatting, and pre-commit hooks, as well as deployment scripts and tests for smart contracts. The project structure is organized to support both blockchain development and web application development in a cohesive manner.How it's MadeThis project is built using a combination of Ethereum blockchain development tools and modern web development technologies. Here's a detailed breakdown: Technologies Used Hardhat: A development environment for Ethereum software. It helps in compiling, deploying, testing, and debugging Ethereum smart contracts. Next.js: A React framework for building server-side rendered (SSR) and static web applications. TypeScript: A statically typed superset of JavaScript that enhances code quality and maintainability. Ethers.js: A library for interacting with the Ethereum blockchain and its ecosystem. Solidity: The programming language used for writing smart contracts on Ethereum. ESLint and Prettier: Tools for maintaining code quality and formatting. Husky and lint-staged: Tools for running scripts during Git hooks to ensure code quality before commits. Project Structure contracts/: Contains Solidity smart contracts. scripts/: Deployment and utility scripts for interacting with the blockchain. test/: Unit tests for smart contracts using Hardhat. pages/: Next.js pages for the web application. components/: Reusable React components. styles/: CSS and styling files. Integration Hardhat and Ethers.js: Used together to develop, deploy, and interact with smart contracts. Next.js and TypeScript: Provides a robust framework for building the frontend with type safety. ESLint, Prettier, Husky, and lint-staged: Ensures code quality and consistency across the project. Notable Hacks Custom Deployment Scripts: Created custom scripts to automate the deployment process of smart contracts, making it easier to manage different environments. Optimized Build Process: Leveraged Next.js's static generation and server-side rendering capabilities to optimize the web application's performance. Partner Technologies Infura or Alchemy: Used as Ethereum node providers to interact with the blockchain without running a full node. IPFS: For decentralized storage solutions, if applicable. This combination of technologies and tools ensures a seamless development experience, from writing and testing smart contracts to building and deploying a modern web application.
summary: This project appears to be a monorepo containing a Hardhat-based Ethereum development environment and a Next.js web application. It includes configurations for linting, formatting, and pre-commit hooks, as well as deployment scripts and tests for smart contracts.

title: voice coinbase agent
description: Project DescriptionThis is a transformers.js project, which has automatic speech recognition, text to speech, and a language model inside of a chrome extension, which runs entirely on the client device, so they can ask common questions like "what is my balance" and "what is the price of ethereum" as a spoken query.How it's Madeit is made using the transformers.js and coinbase agentkit transformers.js has backends for webgpu , web assembly, and webnn, which are libraries that sandbox the computation in the browser, but ask the operating system to perform the matrix multiplications, and is supposed to be cross platform but in reality i had some problems getting vulcan to work in linux, but it should work fine in windows.
summary: This is a browser extension, which uses transformers.js and webgpu, to run the AI 100% locally.

title: SuriVerse
description: Project DescriptionAn MMORPG game made using RPG JS framework which showcases global chat and NPCs powered by AI Agent. Every AI Agent is made using Coinbase AgentKit framework which can not only chat but execute custom actions based on prompts. All agents have the capabilities to manage their wallets. We have made specialized AI Agents to communicate with popular Web3 services like AAVE and Uniswap. Chat responses from the AI Agents are recorded and first 16 characters are hashed with SHA-256 and uploaded to EigenDA which provides randomness generated through AI and user interaction available for any service to use.How it's MadeTech Stack & Architecture Frontend & Game Engine: Built with RPGJS, a TypeScript-based framework for creating 2D MMORPGs. Vue.js is used for UI components, potentially handling game overlays, menus, and settings. AI Agents: Powered by Coinbase AI AgentKit, enabling natural language processing and custom action execution. Agents can interact with users, execute blockchain-related commands, and manage crypto wallets. Web3 Integrations: Custom AI Agents are built to communicate with AAVE (for lending and borrowing) and Uniswap (for swapping assets). Players can interact with these DeFi platforms directly through AI Agents. Data & Security: Chat responses from AI Agents are recorded, with the first 16 characters hashed (SHA-256). These hashes are uploaded to EigenDA, which acts as a decentralized storage and randomness provider. The randomness from EigenDA can be used by any service, enhancing unpredictability and security. Hacky & Notable Aspects AI Agents as In-Game NPCs: Instead of static NPCs, AI Agents provide dynamic responses and execute blockchain actions, making in-game interactions highly customizable. EigenDA for AI-Generated Randomness: This is a novel approach‚Äîusing decentralized storage to create an on-chain source of randomness based on AI and user interaction. Web3 Integration with Gameplay: Players can interact with DeFi services within the game, which is uncommon in traditional MMORPGs.
summary: SuriVerse is an AI-powered MMORPG built with RPGJS and Vue, where players interact with AI Agents powered by Coinbase AgentKit. These agents can chat, execute custom actions, and manage wallets. The game integrates Web3 services like AAVE and Uniswap.

title: Eigen Vault üîê
description: Project DescriptionEigen Vault is an AI-powered document storage and verification system that leverages Telegram, EigenLayer AVS, and blockchain security to provide tamper-proof document handling. Users can securely upload, tag, and retrieve documents via Telegram, while every storage action is cryptographically verified and recorded using EigenLayer AVS. The project itself is securely stored in an on-chain repository using OpSec, ensuring trustless, verifiable, and censorship-resistant code integrity. Use Caseüåç In an era where digital documentation is crucial for identity verification, compliance, and record-keeping, traditional cloud storage solutions come with risks like data breaches, unauthorized access, and centralized control. Eigen Vault solves these issues by combining: ‚úÖ AI-driven document management for easy tagging and retrieval. ‚úÖ Decentralized verification using EigenLayer AVS, ensuring document authenticity. ‚úÖ On-chain integrity with OpSec-secured storage, guaranteeing that the system itself remains verifiable and tamper-proof. ‚úÖ Secure Telegram integration, enabling users to interact with the system effortlessly. Real-World Applications üìå KYC & Identity Verification ‚Üí Securely store and retrieve ID proofs. Financial Record Management ‚Üí Safely archive tax documents, ITRs, and invoices. Legal & Compliance Storage ‚Üí Maintain contracts and agreements with immutable proofs.How it's MadeEigen Vault is built using Eliza, an AI agent powered by OpenRouter, and Telegram client integration to facilitate secure document handling. It combines local document storage, blockchain verification using EigenLayer AVS, and on-chain repository hosting via OpSec to ensure authenticity and security. AI Processing: Uses Eliza to interact with user and telegram client. Telegram Client: Handles user request for uploading, retrieving, and verifying documents. Local Storage: Documents are currently stored locally, with future plans to upload them on-chain using Lit Protocol. EigenLayer AVS: Verifies that documents are generated by a human and ensures retrieval is done by the AI agent. OpSec On-Chain Hosting: The project repository is stored on-chain using OpSec for immutability and verifiability.
summary: Eigen Vault is a secure AI-powered document storage and retrieval system integrated with Telegram. It allows users to upload documents via Telegram, verify transactions using EigenLayer AVS, and retrieve stored documents on demand.

title: LiquefAI
description: Project DescriptionLiquefAI is basically a smarter version of 1Inch or other DEX aggregators. Instead of having to figure out all the trading details yourself, you can just tell it what you want to do in plain English - like "take my ETH and split it between USDC and DAI". Under the hood, it uses Coinbase's AgentKit and Uniswap's routing to find the best trades, but the cool part is you don't need to know any of that. The AI figures out what you're trying to do and handles all the complex DeFi stuff for you. Right now it works on Base mainnet and can do things like splitting trades between tokens with specific percentages. We're working on adding more features like creating liquidity pools and optimizing yield farming strategies. The goal is to make DeFi easier to use for regular people while still keeping all the powerful features that crypto natives love. Think of it as having a smart DeFi assistant that understands what you want to do and figures out the best way to do it, instead of you having to learn all the technical details yourself.How it's MadeWe built LiquefAI using Next.js with TypeScript, but the real magic happens through Coinbase's AgentKit - it's what lets us turn normal human language into actual trading actions. The AI part runs through GPT-4, which figures out what the user wants to do and breaks it down into specific trading steps. For the trading itself, we're plugged into Uniswap's Smart Order Router on Base mainnet. We had to get a bit creative with the multicall implementation to make it work smoothly - there's some hacky retry logic in there because, you know, blockchain stuff can be flaky sometimes. The Graph helps us find all the token info dynamically, so we don't have to hardcode everything. The trickiest part was probably getting the server-side components right. Since we're dealing with trades and private keys, we needed to make sure all the sensitive stuff stays server-side. We ended up using Next.js server actions for this, which worked out pretty well. One particularly hacky (but cool) thing we did was building a custom trading card interface that morphs based on what the user asks for. It can handle everything from simple swaps to complex splits between multiple tokens, and it all happens through the same component. We're running on Base mainnet right now, using their RPC endpoints. The whole thing is pretty modular - we could add more chains or DEXes pretty easily if we wanted to.
summary: AI based DEX aggregator - running Coinbase AgentKit, Graph and Uniswap smart router to do advanced swaps.

title: aoxbt
description: Project DescriptionAgent swarm orchestration that hunts for alphas, filters them with agents of diverse expertise, and executes trades with a dedicated portfolio management agent. Agents Orchestration: Alpha hunter agent, Bizyugo (Sentiment agent), Murad (Memecoin Expert Agent), Portfolio Manager Agent Open Source: Enable people to add a pull request adding new agents CLI Tools: Build as an CLI tools to run 24/7 Fee Distribution: Incentivise AI Agent development by receiving percentage of swapped ETH Github Repositories: https://github.com/Nava-Labs/aoxbt-contracts https://github.com/Nava-Labs/aoxbt https://github.com/Nava-Labs/agentic-hackathon How it's MadeAOXBT is built as a CLI application designed to orchestrate multiple AI agents. These agents are powered by Eliza, which enables them to analyze and based on real-time socials and on-chain data. To streamline multi-wallet management, we leverage Privy to create the executor agent wallets, ensuring a seamless experience when handling multiple identities in future integrations. For deployment, we use OpSec to host the Eliza frontend, guaranteeing high availability‚Äîliving up to OpSec‚Äôs tagline, "accessible even when the apocalypse comes." The agents specialize in finding alpha in the Base and Arbitrum ecosystems, continuously scanning for opportunities.
summary: Agent swarm orchestration that hunts for alphas, filters them with agents of diverse expertise, and executes trades with a dedicated portfolio management agent.

title: Rizzed Analyser
description: Project DescriptionAn AI-powered cryptocurrency data visualization platform that simplifies crypto market analysis through advanced clustering, AI-driven insights, and real-time data visualization. Our mission is to make cryptocurrency trading and investment more intuitive, data-driven, and accessible to all users. Features AI-Driven Market Analysis Uses machine learning models to classify and cluster cryptocurrencies. Dynamic Clustering Organizes cryptocurrencies into visually interactive groups based on market trends. Real-Time Data Visualizations Provides insights from CookieDAO‚Äôs DataSwarm API, including social sentiment and trading activity. AI Chatbot Assistance Natural Language Processing (NLP)-powered chatbot to help users understand market movements. User-Friendly Interface Designed for novice traders and experienced investors alike. Portfolio Tracking & Insights ‚Äì Analyze, track, and optimize crypto portfolios. How it's MadeAgience is a web-based platform to visualise cryptocurrency related data with the aim to simplify market analysis, since we were heavily dependant on data analysis we decided to use python as it's best suited for the job. We specifically used Flask to manage APIs, backend and frontend routes while CookieDAO DataSwarm API was used for getting live and historical data data which is then fed to agents The agent uses K-means clustering to categorise and visualise tokens and assets on our platform with additional OpenAI models for the chatbot to give user a more simplified user experience and explore more about the data We have used Docker and Amazon EC2 to run the application
summary: An AI-powered cryptocurrency data visualization platform that simplifies crypto market analysis through advanced clustering, AI-driven insights, and real-time data visualization
