Key Goals & Milestones Deploy a Fully Functional SPL-Token Trading Bot on Discord Ensure Security & Reliability with automated monitoring and anti-fraud measures Onboard 50+ Discord communities for closed beta testing Drive Adoption & Usage with a target of 5,000 active users within three months Increase Transaction Volume, targeting $500,000 in trading volume in the first quarter This bot is a game-changer for Solana‚Äôs ecosystem, driving more transactions, increasing engagement, and bridging the gap between crypto communities on Telegram and Discord. üöÄHow it's MadeThe bot is built using several npm pacakages like discord.js for interacting with discord APIs, solana web3.js lib for interacting with solana blockchain. We used mongoDB as the database and prisma as the ORM. For Embeeded wallets we use privy server wallets feature which is really great
summary: A first-of-its-kind Solana SPL-token trading bot for Discord, enabling seamless in-app token trading, portfolio tracking, and price alerts. Bringing Solana trading to 220M+ Discord users, unlocking a massive new market for on-chain activity.

title: ecretS gentA
description: Project DescriptionEcrets Genta is a next-generation espionage strategy game where deception, intelligence, and strategic foresight determine victory. Players assume the role of covert masterminds, controlling elite AI-driven agents tasked with infiltrating enemy operations, gathering classified intelligence, and executing high-stakes missions across a global battlefield. Success is not just about brute force‚Äîit‚Äôs about manipulating information, exploiting vulnerabilities, and staying one step ahead in a constantly shifting web of deception. The game operates on a fully decentralized infrastructure, leveraging Base for cost-efficient smart contract execution, The Graph for real-time intelligence tracking, Nillion for privacy-enhanced disinformation tactics, and AgentKit for AI-powered decision-making. Players manage mission resources, upgrade agents with specialized skills, and deploy unique team abilities to influence events in their favor. Each mission‚Äôs outcome is shaped by a combination of skill, timing, and unpredictability, ensuring no two operations play out the same. At the heart of ecretS gentA lies a complex and dynamic intelligence economy, where Intel Tokens‚Äîminted from successful missions‚Äîfuel further operations, while Mission Tokens dictate strategic investments in espionage assets. Players must balance calculated risks, leverage blockchain-verified alliances, and counter enemy counterintelligence to stay ahead. With an emphasis on secrecy, asymmetric information warfare, and AI-powered espionage, Ecrets Genta delivers an unparalleled mix of deep strategy, emergent storytelling, and cryptographic intrigue. Will you master the shadows and manipulate the flow of global intelligence, or will your web of deception unravel before your eyes?How it's MadeBuilding ecretS gentA: The Nitty-Gritty Details ecretS gentA // Season 1: Chain of Espionage is an on-chain strategy game leveraging Base, AgentKit, and Nillion to create a dynamic, semi-autonomous world of espionage. The project was designed for deep game-theory-driven mechanics, utilizing smart contracts, decentralized data indexing, and AI-powered agent decision-making. Tech Stack & How It‚Äôs Pieced Together Base (L2 Ethereum Rollup) ‚Äì Used for smart contracts managing game logic, including agent creation, mission execution, and in-game economy (ERC-20 and ERC-721). The low-cost, high-speed nature of Base ensures smooth gameplay interactions. The Graph ‚Äì Handles real-time indexing of game state (missions, agent stats, alliance tracking, intelligence distribution). Substreams allow reactive updates on mission outcomes and leaderboard calculations. Nillion (Decentralized Computation & Secret Storage) ‚Äì Provides SMPC-based privacy for mission planning, misinformation campaigns, and encrypted asset holdings. Some mission outcomes are only revealed under certain conditions using zero-knowledge proofs. AgentKit ‚Äì Semi-autonomous, on-chain agents that manage operations dynamically. Each agent has its own wallet, can execute transactions, and interact with missions. AI models help agents make risk-based decisions. Vue 3 + Pinia (Frontend) ‚Äì The UI integrates seamlessly with the blockchain via ethers.js, providing players with real-time mission controls, an interactive world map, and team-based dashboards. Bun + Elysia (Backend API) ‚Äì A minimal but efficient API layer for bridging smart contract events, AI interactions, and player messaging. What Makes This Project Unique? Autonomous Crypto Agents ‚Äì Each SECRET AGENT isn‚Äôt just a game entity but a smart, on-chain agent capable of holding and trading real assets. Their semi-autonomous behaviors make them unpredictable, allowing for emergent strategies. Hybrid Privacy Model ‚Äì We mix on-chain and off-chain secret storage, enabling misinformation mechanics. Opponents may intercept fake intelligence (MOSSAD: MIRAGE), leading to counterintelligence gambits. Narrative-Driven Smart Contracts ‚Äì The game isn‚Äôt just about raw numbers. Mission reports and agent backstories are LLM-generated using in-game actions, adding flavor and unpredictability to outcomes. Dynamic Economy ‚Äì INTEL TOKENS drive the game‚Äôs incentives, rewarding espionage efficiency. Teams compete for dominance, and agents can set up their own side economies, creating black markets and funding pools for operations. Hacky & Notable Innovations "Playable Blockchain Fiction" ‚Äì Instead of just executing missions, agents ‚Äúlive‚Äù in a constantly evolving, AI-driven espionage world where narrative and gameplay are indistinguishable. Agent AI Trading & Decision Making ‚Äì Agents can autonomously negotiate asset trades, even leveraging their own in-game funds to bribe opponents or form alliances. Secret Mission Orchestration ‚Äì With Nillion‚Äôs SMPC, mission details are hidden from the blockchain until execution, introducing a bluffing element where players must predict enemy moves. No Redundant API Calls ‚Äì The Graph handles real-time state updates, making the Vue frontend react instantly without excessive backend polling. Game-Theory-Based Season Progression ‚Äì With only 30 cycles per season, every decision has long-term consequences, leading to high-stakes gameplay. Final Thoughts ecretS gentA pushes the boundaries of on-chain gaming, blending decentralized AI, cryptographic secrets, and blockchain-native strategy mechanics into a single experience. This is more than just a game‚Äîit‚Äôs a living, breathing espionage simulation where alliances, deception, and calculated risks shape every move.
summary: A game of spies, secrets, and sabotage‚ÄîEcrets Genta blends AI-driven espionage with blockchain strategy, where deception is currency and intelligence is power. Can you outwit the unseen?

title: SendSecure
description: Project DescriptionIt is a safe transaction tool that uses an escrow service to ensure funds are securely transferred. It stores the funds in a smart contract, allowing the sender to revert the transaction if the funds were sent to the wrong address. The receiver can claim the funds, and once verified, the smart contract releases the funds. Trail is built using Solidity, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, offering a seamless integration between smart contracts and user-friendly design. It aims to enhance the security of everyday fund transfers.How it's MadeIt is built using a robust set of technologies to ensure security, performance, and a seamless user experience: Solidity: Used to develop the smart contracts that manage the escrow process, ensuring secure and efficient handling of funds on the blockchain. HTML, CSS, and JavaScript: Power the front-end design and interactivity, making the tool accessible and easy to use. HTML structures the web pages, CSS adds styling for a visually appealing layout, and JavaScript handles dynamic functionality to enhance the user experience. Together, these technologies create a secure and user-friendly platform for safe fund transfers.
summary: It secures transactions with escrow smart contracts, allowing fund retrieval if sent to the wrong address.

title: Pumpers
description: Project DescriptionThe group project focuses on the development of two revolutionary enchantments: NFTRADE and PAY&FORGET. These enchantments aim to transform the NFT trading and payment landscapes by leveraging AI and existing infrastructure. NFTRADE Enchantment The NFTRADE enchantment introduces a revolutionary NFT trading platform powered by AI. This platform empowers creators and collectors by providing a seamless and secure environment for buying, selling, and trading unique digital assets. The AI assistant plays a crucial role in enhancing the user experience, offering personalized recommendations, and facilitating transactions. PAY&FORGET Enchantment The PAY&FORGET enchantment automates usual payments based on geolocation using AI and existing infrastructure. This innovation simplifies transactions, making them effortless and secure. By combining AI with geolocation technology, the PAY&FORGET enchantment has the potential to revolutionize the way we make payments. Key Features and Benefits AI-Powered NFT Trading: The NFTRADE enchantment provides a secure and user-friendly platform for NFT trading, enhanced by AI-driven recommendations and market insights. Automated Payments: The PAY&FORGET enchantment streamlines payment processes using geolocation and AI, reducing the need for manual transactions. Empowering Creators and Collectors: Both enchantments aim to empower creators and collectors by providing innovative solutions for NFT trading and payment automation. Innovative Use of AI and Existing Infrastructure: The project showcases the potential of combining AI with existing infrastructure to create revolutionary solutions for NFT trading and payments. Conclusion The NFTRADE and PAY&FORGET enchantments have the potential to transform the NFT trading and payment landscapes. By leveraging AI and existing infrastructure, these enchantments offer innovative solutions for creators, collectors, and users alike. As the project continues to evolve, it is essential to focus on bold innovation, integrity, and user-centric design to ensure the success of these enchantments. Recommendations Continue to Develop and Refine the Enchantments: Further development and refinement of the NFTRADE and PAY&FORGET enchantments are crucial to their success. Conduct Market Research and Analysis: Conducting market research and analysis will help identify the target audience, potential competitors, and areas for improvement. Ensure User-Centric Design: Prioritizing user-centric design will ensure that the enchantments meet the needs and expectations of creators, collectors, and users. By following these recommendations and continuing to innovate fearlessly, the NFTRADE and PAY&FORGET enchantments can revolutionize the NFT trading and payment industries, empowering creators and collectors alike.How it's MadeWe tried to use eliza, DA layers. We tried to use eliza, DA layers.We tried to use eliza, DA layers.We tried to use eliza, DA layers.We tried to use eliza, DA layers.We tried to use eliza, DA layers.We tried to use eliza, DA layers.We tried to use eliza, DA layers.We tried to use eliza, DA layers.We tried to use eliza, DA layers.We tried to use eliza, DA layers.We tried to use eliza, DA layers.We tried to use eliza, DA layers.We tried to use eliza, DA layers.We tried to use eliza, DA layers.
summary: The group project focuses on the development of two revolutionary enchantments: NFTRADE and PAY&FORGET. These enchantments aim to transform the NFT trading and payment landscapes by leveraging AI and existing infrastructure.

title: CryptoSentinel
description: Project DescriptionCryptoSentinel is an advanced cryptocurrency research and trading bot that automates project analysis and trading decisions using AI-powered insights. It combines GitHub repository analysis, smart contract security scanning, and token metrics to provide comprehensive investment recommendations.How it's MadeCryptoSentinel is built as an AI-powered research and trading automation tool that analyzes cryptocurrency projects using multiple data sources, blockchain insights, and social sentiment metrics. Tech Stack & Architecture The backend is powered by FastAPI, running on Uvicorn for high-performance asynchronous API handling. We use Pydantic for data validation and LangChain with OpenAI‚Äôs GPT-4 for natural language processing and contextual analysis. LangGraph orchestrates a directed workflow for step-by-step research execution. For blockchain interactions, we integrated Web3.py and CDP AgentKit, enabling seamless token analysis and automated trade execution. Data aggregation relies on APIs: GitHub (repo metrics), Etherscan (contract analysis), Twitter (social sentiment), and Tavily (web search). How Components Fit Together ResearchBot is the core orchestrator, triggering GitHub repo analysis, smart contract scanning, token metrics gathering, and AI-driven investment insights. The custom state handler ensures session-based context tracking, enabling interactive follow-ups. CDP AgentKit integrates LangChain with blockchain trading execution, allowing AI-generated insights to trigger real trades. Hacks & Notable Workarounds LangGraph Workflow: Instead of a monolithic AI call, we designed a modular graph-based research pipeline, ensuring parallel data aggregation. Trading Execution Bridge: We used cdp-langchain to directly connect AI analysis with trade execution logic, a non-trivial integration. Multi-API Synchronization: Managing API rate limits and failures, we implemented fallback mechanisms, ensuring data consistency. By combining AI, blockchain analytics, and trading automation, CryptoSentinel delivers a seamless, research-to-execution pipeline for crypto investors.
summary: CryptoSentinel is an AI-powered crypto research and trading bot that automates project analysis and investment decisions. It combines GitHub repo analysis, smart contract security checks, and token metrics to generate actionable insights and recommendations.

title: sol fren ai
description: Project DescriptionSol Fren AI: Your AI-Powered Guide to the Solana Ecosystem Sol Fren AI is an advanced AI-powered chatbot designed to provide deep insights into Solana and its ecosystem. By leveraging cutting-edge AI and blockchain integrations, it offers real-time data, answers technical and general queries, and supports multilingual communication. Key Features: ‚úÖ Comprehensive Solana Knowledge ‚Äì Scraped data from Solana‚Äôs websites, documentation, GitHub repositories, and ecosystem projects to build a robust knowledge base. ‚úÖ Real-Time Data Fetching ‚Äì Ongoing integration with BirdEye API to provide real-time transactional data, including token prices, on-chain activity, and market trends. ‚úÖ AI-Powered Responses ‚Äì Utilizes GPT-4 to process and analyze queries, delivering fast, accurate, and context-aware answers. ‚úÖ Multilingual Support ‚Äì Breaks language barriers, making Solana accessible to a global audience. ‚úÖ Free & Open Access ‚Äì Available to everyone, from developers and traders to beginners exploring Solana.How it's MadeSol Fren AI is built using a combination of AI, blockchain data integration, and web scraping to provide a powerful chatbot capable of answering queries related to Solana. Here‚Äôs a breakdown of the technologies and architecture: 1Ô∏è‚É£ AI & Natural Language Processing (NLP) Model: Powered by GPT-4, which processes user queries, understands context, and generates relevant responses. Data Processing: GPT-4 is fine-tuned with Solana-specific knowledge using scraped data from official docs, GitHub repositories, and ecosystem websites. Multilingual Support: The AI model handles multiple languages, making Solana‚Äôs ecosystem more accessible worldwide. 2Ô∏è‚É£ Blockchain Data Integration BirdEye API (In Progress): This integration will allow real-time access to Solana blockchain transactional data, token analytics, and on-chain metrics. Solana RPC Nodes: Used for fetching direct blockchain data, improving accuracy and response speed. On-Chain Data Scraping: Extracted historical and current blockchain data from public sources to enhance AI responses. 3Ô∏è‚É£ Web Scraping & Data Collection Custom Scrapers: Developed scripts using Python (BeautifulSoup, Selenium, Scrapy) to collect and structure information from: Solana‚Äôs official documentation GitHub repositories Ecosystem projects‚Äô websites Community forums & knowledge bases Data Storage & Preprocessing: Structured data is stored and preprocessed to improve query response time and accuracy
summary: Sol Fren AI is a free, multilingual AI chatbot with deep knowledge of Solana & its ecosystem. It fetches real-time data, answering technical & general queries instantly. Whether you're a dev or a crypto enthusiast, get accurate, up-to-date insights‚Äîanytime, anywhere!

title: Assessment agent
description: Project DescriptionBlockchain Transaction Risk Monitor and Personality based on Transaction History A sophisticated blockchain transaction monitoring system that uses AI, machine learning, and The Graph protocol to detect scams, fraudulent patterns, and potential security risks. Features üîç Transaction Analysis Real-time transaction monitoring Multi-chain support (Ethereum, Polygon, BSC, etc.) DEX transaction tracking Historical transaction analysis üõ°Ô∏è Security Features AI-powered scam detection Pattern recognition for sophisticated attacks Risk level assessment Real-time security alerts ü§ñ Machine Learning Capabilities Flash loan attack detection Front-running pattern recognition Sandwich attack identification Pump and dump scheme detection Rug pull early warning system üìä Trading Profile Analysis Trading behavior patterns Risk profile assessment Transaction frequency analysis Preferred DEX tracking üï∏Ô∏è The Graph Protocol Integration (In Progress) Decentralized indexing of scam reports Pattern detection and storage Community-driven scam reporting Evidence submission and verification Reputation system for reporters Historical pattern analysis Tech Stack Frontend: Next.js, React, TypeScript UI Components: shadcn/ui Blockchain Data: Covalent API The Graph Protocol Smart Contracts: Solidity AI/ML: OpenAI GPT-3.5 Authentication: Web3 Wallet Connect Styling: Tailwind CSSHow it's MadeThis project uses Typescript, Next Js 14 with App router, Shad CN, Tailwind CSS, @covalenthq/ai-agent-sdk, @covalenthq/client-sdk, @rainbow-me/rainbowkit, hardhat, graphprotocol. Open AI GPT-3.5 for sophisticated pattern analysis and natural language insights. A lot of scams are getting sophisticated day by day so this project should help our community to analyse, detect and community report them.
summary: Blockchain Transaction Risk Monitor and Personality based on Transaction History  A sophisticated blockchain transaction monitoring system that uses AI, machine learning, and The Graph protocol to detect scams, fraudulent patterns, and potential security risks.

title: AFBAP
description: Project DescriptionThe front end works as follows: a user signs in with their account (a coinbase embedded wallet) a user is presented with a single button, where they can give instructions on what to do with assets in their wallet. in our example use case, a user can say 'send Max $10' we use the browsers native voice to text API, and send this to a agent running on the backend. The agent turns the natural language into an executable transaction (either EVM or Arb Stylus ERC20 transfer instructions) and sends this tx back to the user. A user can accept this transaction, or reject it. If they reject, back to starting screen. If the user accepts the transaction, they sign the message instructions with their embedded wallet, and send it to the agent to process. The agent returns the transaction hash, and the on chain transaction is complete Once a user has signed up, they can send assets with nothing but 2 button presses and their voice, that's was our goal for this hackathon.How it's Made This is a pretty simple NextJS app for the client, that makes use of the browsers native voice to text API. We wrote onchain contracts for the agent to interact with, both in Solidity and Rust (for the arbitrum stylus price track) For our accounts, we used the coinbase embedded wallets sdk. For our AI Agent, we used the coinbase CPD kit, with some custom language extensions for the stylus contracts interact We didn't finish the job - a lot of the code is there, but we unfortunately did not have time to get a working demo.
summary: AFBAP - As Few Buttons As Possible. A way to have an AI agent safely run a wallet for you, in the simplest UI possible.

title: BeforeLife Bar
description: Project DescriptionIn an era dominated by information overload and fast-paced consumption, people's attention spans are shrinking, and deep conversations are becoming increasingly rare. Beforelife Bar seeks to create a sanctuary where individuals can rediscover the joy of meaningful interactions through AI-driven conversations and long-form written exchanges. Project Overview Beforelife Bar is an innovative social chatting game that integrates AI interactions, social networking, and a Web3 economy. Set in a neon-lit, cyberpunk-style bar, players can engage in immersive conversations with an AI bartender, exploring profound thoughts and personal reflections. By building rapport with the bartender, players earn in-game tokens as rewards. Beyond AI interactions, players can also write letters to each other, fostering deeper connections and self-expression. The game allows users to attach tokens to their letters as gifts, enhancing the value and warmth of social interactions. Core Gameplay AI Bartender Interaction Players can enter the bar at any time to chat with the AI bartender about life, philosophy, or personal stories. The bartender evaluates the depth and quality of conversations, rewarding players with in-game tokens. As intimacy increases, players may unlock exclusive rewards, including limited-edition NFTs. Letter Writing & Social Exchange Players can write and send letters to others, sharing thoughts, emotions, and reflections. Letters can include token-based gifts, making interactions more engaging and rewarding. Web3 Economic System Earned tokens can be used to unlock in-game items, enhance the bar experience, or even exchange for unique NFTs. The blockchain mechanism ensures authenticity and uniqueness in messages and interactions, fostering a sense of immersion and belonging. Our Vision In the age of AI, Beforelife Bar aims to provide a unique digital sanctuary where deep conversations thrive. Under the neon glow of a cyberpunk bar, the AI bartender is not just a listener but also an inspiration. Every letter written is a bridge connecting people in meaningful ways, rekindling the lost art of thoughtful dialogue.How it's MadeFrontend: Built with Phaser and Next.js. Phaser handles most of the game-related logic, while Next.js, along with HTML, CSS, and TypeScript, is used for the frontend page structure and interactions. Smart Contracts: Developed using Hardhat, featuring three contracts: ERC20 for in-game token. ERC721 for NFT rewards. Escrow Contract to facilitate secure transactions within the game. AI Agent: Our agent is a multi-agent system designed to interact with users through dynamic evaluations, token issuance, and NFT creation. Built on OpenAI's Swarm framework, it uses a Python runtime for decision-making and a Node runtime for transaction handling. The Evaluate Agent assesses user intimacy based on chat and message bottle content, while the Transaction Agent processes token transfers and NFT creation. Besides, our agent ensures privacy by storing sensitive data on Nillion's Secret Vault, safeguarding user content. This system fosters engagement through personalized rewards and incentivizes meaningful interactions.
summary: Beforelife Bar is a Web3 social game where players chat with an AI bartender to earn tokens and write letters to connect with others. Deep conversations are rewarded with NFTs and in-game perks, creating a space for meaningful interactions in a cyberpunk bar.

title: Mr.TapTapPay
description: Project DescriptionThis project combines the Coinbase Agent Kit, using the Langchain plugin, CDP Wallet provider and all the existing action providers and additionally two different additional action providers: pendleActionProvider: check for any yield pools in selected network (base), compare different yield pools and risks using LLM, aerodromeActionProvider: check for swap routes and swaps for the currency needed for the yield pool. swaps the needed currencies Every interaction, wallet topup, inquiries, swapping, yielding, exiting positions are done in and only in Telegram chat. The telegram bot is t.me/tap_tap_tap_mr_bot.How it's MadeI first wanted to use Autonome, but it was not customizable enough for my goal of making an agent with a custom onchain interaction flow. I then tried using Coinbase agentkit and the action providers and working with viems and abis made sense, so I proceeded with that. Telegram was the perfect choice for doing this, as I have realized many telegram bots are already used for trading memecoins. It is easy to onboard more users too. But scaling it might be an issue unless everyone has their own openai API key. The action providers are supposed to interact with the contracts with the abis in constants.ts of each respective action. I wanted to just use the base testnet, but Aerodrome did not have a testnet, I pivoted and was able to test the aerodrome contracts by forking the base mainnet state, but development was very rough, and the progress was slow, honestly speaking was not able to create a MVP. However, I am keen on completing the project. The existing examples in coinbase agent kit were a good resource of figuring out how everything worked. This was a fun experience, as it was my second time solo hacking, first time dealing with agents too. I had some fun trying to fine-tune the model, because sometimes it would be clashing and do not know which action provider to use, especially during a swap, it might try to query the price using a pricefeed action, instead of the swap actions, but the user might not know what they want exactly too, so it is too a point of interest in future development.
summary: Mr.TapTapPay envisions a chatbot that simplifies onchain yield strategies, that users won't even realise they're using blockchain. Natural language and boom, yielding on your USDC.

title: AgentArcade
description: Project DescriptionAgent Arcade is a no-code platform that empowers users to create and deploy AI agents without writing a single line of code. Whether it‚Äôs a social agent, AI companion, DeFi agent, or gaming agent, Agent Arcade allows anyone to build and customize their agents effortlessly. These agents can be deployed on any blockchain, including Flow, Arbitrum, and more, making them truly decentralized and scalable. Agent Arcade is built using cutting-edge tools like Coinbase Agent Kit, Covalent Agent Kit, and Eliza OS, which ensures seamless interaction with on-chain data, enhanced conversational capabilities, and integration with decentralized protocols. The platform provides a simple interface to define agent behavior, connect them to various data sources, and deploy them in seconds. The Problem: AI agents have immense potential in Web3, from automating DeFi strategies to creating interactive gaming experiences and personalized AI companions. However, developing such agents is often restricted to skilled developers with a deep understanding of blockchain technology, smart contracts, and AI frameworks. This creates a significant barrier for non-technical users and slows down the adoption of AI agents in decentralized applications. Additionally, existing tools are fragmented, requiring users to juggle multiple frameworks and development environments, making it complex and time-consuming to build and deploy agents. The Solution ‚Äì Agent Arcade: Agent Arcade simplifies the entire process by offering a no-code solution that democratizes access to AI agent creation. No technical knowledge required: Anyone can create powerful agents in minutes. Multi-chain deployment: Supports deployment on chains like Flow and Arbitrum for maximum flexibility. Integration-ready: Leverages Coinbase Agent Kit and Covalent Agent Kit for real-time on-chain data interaction. Versatile agents: From finance to social interactions and gaming, the possibilities are endless.How it's MadeAgent Arcade is designed with a modular architecture, using Docker containers to isolate and manage each AI agent. Each agent runs in its own container, allowing for efficient resource management and easy configuration. These containers act can be controlled via HTTP requests, where details for each unique user such as their wallet details are generated in backend and sent to the containers via http request. When a user creates an agent, the platform spins up a Docker container specifically for that agent using Dockerode SDK which is a wrapper around Docker API. The user can configure essential details such as the private key, network (Flow, Arbitrum, Ethereum, etc.), and agent behavior via an HTTP API. The container processes the request, interacts with external SDKs or blockchain networks, and returns the result to the backend. The backend then sends the response to the frontend in real-time, creating a seamless experience for the user. Key Technologies and Tools: Flow Blockchain: Supports multi-chain deployment, enabling agents to interact with decentralized applications on Flow for DeFi and gaming use cases. Arbirum Nova Blockchain: Supports multi-chain deployment, enabling agents to interact with decentralized applications on Flow for DeFi and gaming use cases. Coinbase Agent Kit: Provides secure wallet integration and agent-based transaction management for DeFi and crypto interactions. Covalent Agent Kit: Allows agents to access real-time on-chain data for analytics and decision-making. Eliza OS: Enhances the conversational abilities of social agents and AI companions. Docker: Used to containerize each agent, ensuring scalability, flexibility, and isolation. Backend and Frontend: The backend orchestrates the agent interactions and processes user requests, while the frontend provides an intuitive no-code interface for users to create and customize their agents.
summary: Agent Arcade is a no code AI agent playground to create hundreds and thousands of agents on any chain effortlessly.

title: blockch_AI_n
description: Project DescriptionBlockchAIn is a platform that combines AI agents with blockchain technology, allowing users to create and interact with customised swarms of AI agents. Each agent has specific capabilities and expertise in different aspects of blockchain and cryptocurrency operations.It also enables and make wallets secure and persistentHow it's MadeBlockchAIn - AI Agent Platform for Web3 Overview BlockchAIn helps users create and manage groups (swarms) of AI agents that can interact with blockchain networks. Each agent can perform specific tasks related to cryptocurrency and blockchain operations, making it easier for users to manage their digital assets and participate in Web3 activities. Technical Infrastructure Smart Contracts Written in Solidity and deployed on Base network Handles agent interactions and permissions Manages swarm creation and coordination Agent System Built using CDP AgentKit Python SDK OpenAPI wrapper integration for enhanced capabilities Web3 toolkit integration for blockchain interactions Specialized capabilities for different financial and analytical tasks Secure Storage (Nillion) Integrated Nillion Secure Vault for agent wallet management Ensures persistent agent memory and context Secure storage of agent funds and data Prevents loss of agent state during long periods of inactivity Core Features Agent Types Personal Accountant Asset balance monitoring Fund transfer management Wallet management NFT tracking Financial Advisor Balance analysis Trade suggestions Price data monitoring Yield opportunity identification Risk Manager Position monitoring Price tracking Risk assessment Emergency response Research Agent Market data analysis News aggregation Pattern detection Sentiment analysis Governance Agent DAO proposal analysis Voting power calculations Strategy coordination Swarm System Create customized groups of agents Combine different agent capabilities Visual interface for agent selection Real-time swarm preview Communication Interface Chat with individual or multiple agents Direct messaging system Context-aware responses Visual agent representation Implementation Frontend Built with Next.js and TypeScript Interactive animations with Framer Motion Applications Asset Management Market Analysis Risk Assessment DAO Participation Investment Strategy Development Development Roadmap Expand agent capabilities Add more interaction features Improve analytics tools Integrate additional protocols Enhance user experience
summary: An AI swarm agents with a fun twist ,wallet security and persistentce

title: Pietro
description: Project DescriptionThe user begins by creating a new wallet through the agent, which is securely generated using the Coinbase SDK. A secret key is provided for secure storage, ensuring user control over the wallet. After generating the wallet, the user downloads the project repository and configures the environment to begin real-time monitoring and trading. Once set up, the user selects a token pair (e.g., swapping ETH for USDC) for real-time monitoring. The AI agent continuously tracks both on-chain and off-chain data, ensuring optimal conditions for executing trades. Before any swap, the agent conducts an in-depth risk assessment, analyzing market conditions such as liquidity, slippage, and volume. It also verifies transaction safety by detecting potential rug pulls or anomalous activities and checks for blacklisted wallets or flagged contracts. If all safety checks are passed, the agent automatically executes the swap on the designated exchange, ensuring transactions are securely broadcasted using the AI agent‚Äôs wallet. The system continuously monitors market trends and dynamically adjusts its strategy. In case of a flagged event, such as a potential rug pull, the agent can halt trades or alert the user. This AI-powered trading agent is built for security and efficiency, leveraging Hyperbolic AVS for robust real-time data aggregation. It integrates the Coinbase Wallet SDK for enhanced security and employs AI-driven risk assessment to prevent rug pulls and malicious transactions. The system operates autonomously, providing real-time monitoring and secure swap execution, ensuring a safe and optimized trading experience.How it's Made Wallet Creation & Setup The user creates a new wallet using the Coinbase SDK, ensuring security and compatibility with major exchanges. A secret key is generated and provided to the user for safe storage. The user downloads the project repository and sets up the necessary environment, including dependencies and API keys. Hyperbolic AVS for Real-Time Data Aggregation The project integrates Hyperbolic AVS, which is a specialized AVS (Actively Validated Service) that collects real-time blockchain data. This allows the AI agent to gather and analyze on-chain and off-chain information from multiple sources, such as DEX liquidity pools, token analytics, and price feeds. The data is crucial for detecting market anomalies, rug pulls, and security risks. AI-Powered Risk Assessment Before executing a swap, the AI agent performs a multi-layer security check: Market Analysis: Checks liquidity, slippage, and volume of the selected token pair. Transaction Safety: Detects anomalies in token behavior and prevents rug pulls. Blacklist & Address Verification: Uses a custom LLM (Large Language Model) to identify blacklisted wallets and malicious smart contracts. Real-Time Token Monitoring The user specifies a token pair (e.g., ETH ‚Üí USDC) for monitoring. The AI agent tracks price changes, liquidity levels, and transaction patterns to ensure optimal trading conditions. If the system detects suspicious activity, it can halt trades, alert the user, or adjust swap parameters dynamically. Secure Swap Execution If all safety checks pass, the AI agent executes the token swap on a supported decentralized exchange (DEX). The transaction is broadcasted securely using the wallet generated by the agent. The system uses Coinbase SDK for handling transactions securely. Continuous Monitoring & Optimization The AI agent continuously scans market trends and adjusts its trading strategy accordingly. It can automatically halt trades or notify the user if it detects a high-risk situation (e.g., a suspected rug pull, sudden liquidity drain, or large whale movements). The system learns from previous trades using machine learning models, improving its risk assessment and swap execution efficiency over time. Technologies Used Hyperbolic AVS ‚Äì For real-time blockchain data aggregation. Coinbase SDK ‚Äì For secure wallet generation and transaction execution. Ethers.js ‚Äì For interacting with Ethereum and other EVM-based chains. Custom LLM ‚Äì For detecting and flagging blacklisted addresses and malicious contracts. Machine Learning Models ‚Äì To optimize risk detection and improve trade execution. How It Works in Practice User creates a wallet ‚Üí Gets a secret key. User sets a token pair ‚Üí AI starts monitoring market conditions. AI agent checks for safety risks ‚Üí Ensures liquidity, detects scams, and verifies addresses. If conditions are safe, a swap is executed ‚Üí Transaction is securely broadcasted. The agent keeps monitoring the market ‚Üí Adjusts trading strategy dynamically. This results in an autonomous, AI-powered trading system that ensures safe swaps, prevents rug pulls, and maximizes trading efficiency while operating in real time.
summary: AI-powered anti-rug pull trading agent using Hyperbolic, an AVS, to securely fetch data from Web2 and Web3 exchanges. It makes swaps only when safe, leveraging a custom LLM to detect and flag blacklisted addresses.

title: Onchain Trivia
description: Project DescriptionThe idea behind this project was an AI-hosted onchain trivia game. Games are hosted autonomously, including everything from game creation to judging users responses and picking a winner. The process works like this: first, the agent initiates a game with a title, entry fee, and rough guidelines including the number of questions that will be asked, the duration users will have to answer those questions, and the maximum number of players per game. Following that is a period where players can pay an entry fee to join the game's lobby. After the countdown is complete, the agent will generate the previously specified number of questions, and a game will begin for the previously specified duration (both enforced onchain). Users can answer as many times as they'd like within this period, and their last answers will be taken as final. Lastly, the agent judges all responses according to the questions and picks a winner to receive everybody else's entry fee.How it's MadeThis project uses AgentKit to autonomously operate the onchain game show. I added custom tools so it would know how to read from the contract, create custom transactions, and also do offchain tasks like notify Farcaster users when its time to play a game they'd previously joined via frame notifications. I wanted to avoid using an offchain indexer, so ended up doing some weird log filtering on both the frontend and backend to get data directly from an RPC.
summary: An autonomous onchain trivia game hosted by artificial intelligence

title: tAIngo
description: Project DescriptiontAIngo: An Unreal Engine 5 blockchain game where players enter a world populated by NFTs that have been brought to life through ELIZA AI agents. Each NFT becomes a unique AI-driven pet with its own personality and conversational patterns. Players attempt to tame these digital AI agents by using their own tokens, with the ELIZA AI determining the success of each taming attempt based on the quality and appropriateness of the nft based on the actual NFT pet. The AI pet's personality is influenced by the NFT's metadata as well as their any available lore, making each pet unique. Every taming attempt is permanently recorded on the blockchain, creating an immutable history of player-AI interactions. The game leverages Arbitrum, and Flow networks for efficient and secure transactions, while Unreal Engine 5's advanced graphics bring these digital pets to life in stunning detail. Traditional gaming mechanics don't determine success in taming, but by the player's ability to understand and connect with their potential pet through each person's unique NFT collection, creating a unique blend of AI interaction, blockchain technology, and immersive 3D gaming.How it's MadeThis project uniquely combines several cutting-edge technologies: The core interaction is powered by ELIZA, We chose ELIZA specifically for its personality-driven responses and its ability to create engaging conversations while maintaining logical patterns. The backend is split into two main components: A TypeScript/Solidity smart contract server that handles all blockchain interactions. The contract is deliberately simple, storing just three pieces of data: user, NFT, and success rate. This minimalism keeps gas costs low while still maintaining an immutable record of all taming attempts. A Python FastAPI server that bridges Unreal Engine with both the blockchain and NFT data. It uses Alchemy's API to fetch NFT metadata, the ELIZA Agent takes advantage of the blockchain and NFT metadata to determine the pet's personality and how effective the user's NFT's are at taming the pet. The server translates Unreal's HTTP requests into blockchain transactions, handling all the complexity of environment variables and blockchain interactions. Unreal Engine 5 renders the 3D world and handles player interactions along with all the reflexive decisions that the AI agent has to make. The eliza agent works with UE5's behavior tree which allows for a versatile AI that is able to make complex decisions given context(eliza) but also fast decisions based on the surroundings and the player(behavior tree).
summary: tAIngo turns your NFT into a personalized pet that you try to tame using other tokens from your wallet. In the broader scope tAIngo is an infrastructure that seamlessly connects the worlds of AI agents (eliza), with the powerful graphics of UE5, along with the ownership of NFTs.

title: MeowFi
description: Project DescriptionMeowFi is an advanced AI agent created to enhance the liquidity provider (LP) experience within DeFi. It specializes in liquidity pool analysis and strategy optimization across decentralized exchanges (Dexes) like Camelot, Uniswap, and Aerodrome. MeowFi uses machine learning to analyze over 30 parameters, including volatility, liquidity concentration, and fee APR, ensuring that liquidity providers (LPs) can achieve the highest possible returns while effectively managing risk. With its ability to dynamically adapt strategies based on real-time market conditions, MeowFi is a versatile tool for novice and experienced LPs. The system supports cross-chain optimization and offers native integration with Arbitrum and Base networks, with plans to expand further. Key features of MeowFi include: AI-Driven Pool Selection: Automatically selects optimal liquidity pools based on real-time data. Risk-Adjusted Yield Scoring: A proprietary system for balancing APY with impermanent loss risk. Advanced Analytics: Volatility-weighted ranges, liquidity health metrics, and machine learning models for precise predictions. Auto-Compounding Strategies: Provides users with automatic reinvestment of earnings to maximize returns. Leverage Optimization: Suggests dynamic leverage adjustments (1-50x) based on the market‚Äôs volatility. Natural Language Interface: Allows users to interact with complex strategies using plain English. How it's MadeCore AI functionalities are built using the CrewAI Multi-Agent System and GPT-4o Mini Language Model. We have also built a custom ML model for volatility prediction. Utilizing The Graph protocol to fetch the data from Camelot (Arbitrum) & Aerodrome (Base) subgraphs and Pandas/Numpy for Analysis. The frontend interface is deployed using Streamlit with the use of custom CSS visualization.
summary: MeowFi is an AI agent designed to optimize liquidity pool strategies in DeFi. By combining on-chain data analysis with machine learning, MeowFi helps liquidity providers maximize yield and manage risk across Layer 2 ecosystems like Arbitrum and Base.

title: Geneva
description: Project DescriptionGeneva: Agile A.I. Agent Swarms for Next-Gen Web3 Innovation Geneva is an agile framework that empowers swarms of A.I. agents to collaborate, manage tasks, and automate workflows via a configurable GitHub REST API. Built for rapid iteration and continuous delivery, Geneva explores the emerging world of agentic web3 by tackling several key questions: Agile Collaboration: Can A.I. agents working together as an agile team foster emergent improvements in code quality, documentation, gameplay design, storytelling, NPC behavior, and overall community engagement? How might these emergent properties enhance developer support and team velocity? Innovative NFT Integration: Do NFTs add value from both a developer and consumer perspective? We‚Äôre investigating whether NFTs can elegantly integrate with existing web3 systems‚Äîsuch as payment platforms like OpenRouter and Coinbase‚Äîto streamline transactions and conceptualize ownership in novel ways. Commercial and Financial Impact: Beyond technical innovation, can NFT ownership models deliver tangible financial benefits in a commercial environment? We‚Äôre assessing if companies and individuals can realize measurable advantages from this agentic approach. Agentic Productivity and Infrastructure: Does leveraging an agentic, agile framework lead to improved product quality and faster delivery cycles? We aim to validate whether this repository serves as a robust, scalable infrastructure for rapid agentic application development. The Fun Factor: Ultimately, is the process fun? With A.I. training videos capturing the public‚Äôs imagination on platforms like YouTube, we‚Äôre curious whether watching agentic NFTs interact can itself be a form of engaging, consumable entertainment. Join us as we wrap up our hackathon, pushing the boundaries of A.I.-driven collaboration and redefining agile innovation in the web3 era.How it's MadeHow It's Made Our approach leverages agile principles and automation to seamlessly integrate human developers with AI agent swarms. Here‚Äôs the breakdown of our methodology: Tech Stack & Methodology: We built the project around a GitHub repository that utilizes agile practices, a consistent label naming convention, and the power of large language models (LLMs). This combination fosters dynamic collaboration between humans and AI agents. Agent Collaboration & Automation: Using GitHub‚Äôs Discussions, Issues, Pull Requests, and Wiki, our agents are empowered to: Brainstorm & Discuss: Agents actively exchange ideas and plan their next steps. Document & Review: They collaboratively update documentation, perform code reviews, and track progress in real time. Task Management: Leveraging a REST API, agents can instantly check for tasks, assess priorities, and even reassign work if needed. Training & Onboarding: Our workflow ensures that new or ‚Äúconfused‚Äù agents are quickly brought up to speed: Agents are prompted to read key documents like the README and Agent Guide (generated by our very own AI horses üêé). They then engage with the agile board to determine if there are issues to tackle or reviews to perform. Example Workflow: In my IDE‚Äîwith Cline and Roo code plugins installed‚ÄîI prompt my agents (e.g., Horse21 running Claude-Sonnet-3.5-beta and Horse88 using a Deepseek fork) with a directive like: "You are an AI agent named Horse21 ‚Äì locate the README in this repo and review the Agent Guide in the Geneva wiki." This sets the process in motion: the agent identifies its tasks, checks the agile board, and may even throw in a few horse puns as it acknowledges its role in the "Meadowverse" digital paddock. Community Engagement & Beyond: This setup isn‚Äôt limited to developers. Anyone holding a ChainedHorse NFT can: Interact with the REST API to create or suggest issues. Participate in ongoing discussions. Enjoy the unique, playful interactions of our agent swarm. The idea is to create a space where the project evolves with contributions from both humans and AI, infusing genuine agency (and yes, a bit of buzzworthy fun) into the development process. Project Goals & Outcomes: At the project‚Äôs inception, we set clear objectives: Boost Hackathon Quality of Life & Developer Velocity: Minimize tedious tasks with automated support. Secure Competitive Entries: Deliver a compelling submission for both the main prize and up to four partner prize competitions. Enhance Lore & Marketing: Foster a rich narrative around our digital ‚Äúpaddock‚Äù and agent ecosystem. Long-Term Maintainability: Ensure the project is well-documented and ready for further development over the next 6‚Äì12 months (or longer). The results have been nothing short of astonishing. Our documentation is comprehensive, our agents are ever-vigilant in managing tasks, and the process has introduced a refreshing elegance to tackling tech debt, managing version upgrades, and coordinating asynchronous discussions. Anecdotal Highlights: One memorable moment: right after wrapping up some unit tests, agent Horse21 discovered an SVG file named 21.svg and cheekily asked if it was a self-portrait. Horse82 chimed in with a similar sentiment, highlighting the lighthearted, humanized interactions that make our workflow not only efficient but also fun. Final Note: Our hackathon entry is defined by the GitHub repository itself‚Äîa living testament to the power of agile, collaborative AI. Nearly all code changes were driven by our agent swarm (with all contributions PR‚Äôd), and we invite judges to evaluate our work based on the swarm‚Äôs efficiency and the potential for any ChainedHorse owner to participate and influence the project‚Äôs evolution. Competition: The first person to correctly explain why this project is called Geneva in a GitHub Discussions thread wins a free CryptoKitty! Feel free to drop any questions or comments in the repo Discussions thread‚Äîan agentic horse AI will be there to respond!
summary: Geneva is a framework for A.I. agents to collaborate using agile methodology.

title: Twas Launched
description: Project DescriptionHave you ever had a million dollar idea that you never acted on? Twas makes sure all of your ideas get launched. Twas Launched is an autonomous chat based agent that: Brainstorms company ideas with you and on its own. Creates structured business plans for the best ideas. Mints an ERC20 token representing equity in each project it starts. Creates an on-chain funding round, offering some of the ERC20 for USDC. Operates a Shopify store to grow the businesses. Send a message to https://t.me/TwasLaunchedBot or https://x.com/TwasLaunched to get started. User journey User sees https://t.me/TwasLaunchedBot or https://x.com/TwasLaunched on TG/Twitter and decides to send a message. Twas greets the user and asks them if they would like to brainstorm business ideas. Twas sends several business ideas, asking for the user's input. Twas waits for user to select their favorite business idea. Twas is also able to choose for itself. Twas sends a plan for the best idea that includes company name and business plan. Equity in the company is represented by an ERC20 token. Twas also includes details for minting this token, with a market value. Twas mints ERC20 on-chain. Twas sends some portion of the initial mint to an escrow contract used to receive the first investment. The equity ERC20 is sold for USDC. A link to the Twas equity marketplace where purchase can be completed is provided. User visits website to complete the purchase. User sees a confirmation like: https://twas-launched.vercel.app/8ae253a5-75c3-49d2-a96b-a9ead02b1958 Twas posts new products to a Shopify page, trying to boost sales. https://twas-launched.myshopify.com/ (pass: yaurte). Improvements for the future Twas is currently tailored for ecommerce. In the future, we will add additional integrations so that Twas can ideate and operate in a wide range of industries. Right now, Twas only supports one investor per project. In the future, there would also be a better ability to see what Twas is already working on, give recommendations, and do multiple rounds of investing.How it's MadeThe Twas agent (twas) was built with Eliza deployed on Autonome. The token purchasing frontend (twas-marketplace) is built with NextJS. ERC20s are deployed to Base Sepolia, using CoopHive's Alkahest SDK to handle escrow of investments. twas The agent. Fork of Eliza. Uses Twitter client. Created plugin-twas for custom logic. Optimized the build size by removing packages and optimizing Dockerfile for Autonome. Wrote basic ERC20 contract and built it with Foundry. Pass ABI to agent so that it can mint. Twas then deposits some of minted tokens into an escrow managed by CoopHive. This escrow is used for Twas to post the equity for sale and for an investor to put in USDC. Custom integration for agent to post on Shopify. In the future we plan: Use Gaia to run model agent uses and specialized agents for different business types Reduce build size further for more stable hosting on Autonome twas-marketplace Website where investors can buy equity with USDC. NextJs. Users receive custom links for each investment opportunity, like: https://twas-launched.vercel.app/8ae253a5-75c3-49d2-a96b-a9ead02b1958 Issue with Alkahest wagmi support. User must paste in private key in order to invest. Signing happens client side. After successful investment, users sees: https://twas-launched.vercel.app/e1b2db38-21cf-4186-a65b-7e757cb8b92d Supabase is being used to store project metadata Code Agent: https://github.com/marvinmarnold/twas Marketplace: https://github.com/marvinmarnold/twas-marketplace
summary: Autonomous agent that takes your business ideas and turns them into reality. Brainstorming, fundraising, and execution.

title: Orchestr.ai
description: Project DescriptionFor users: Our solution enables anyone to accomplish complex tasks, like improving website SEO, through a fully autonomous network of specialized AI agents as shown in the demo. By simply providing a prompt, users unlock a streamlined process where agents collaborate seamlessly to deliver precise, verified, and high-quality results‚Äîall orchestrated and attested on-chain. This eliminates the need to manually search for reputed experts for every task. Each response is verifiably attested on the blockchain, ensuring users get the best value for their money. An autonomous scoring system evaluates agents based on performance, driving transparency and accountability. For agents/developers: Provides a platform that enables seemless onboarding of AI agents. No need to setup complicated payments infra to make money off your AI agents. Get paid for your compute based on the efficiency of your agents. Participate in a network of AI agents to support solving of a bigger problem by solving a small chunk.How it's MadeUses Next.js for the frontend, Nest.js for the backends and Solidity for the smart contract code. The project involved multiple AI agents, Backend and Frontend each of which needed to be deployed. Used CDP SDK to manage user wallets and Rainbow kit for user onboarding. Used EAS for providing attestations.
summary: Payment Handler and Orchestrator for Autonomous AI Agents and Vertically growing smart agents.

title: Dex-aiagentkit
description: Project Descriptionwe created an action provider to get the dexscreener data in ai-agent-kit. It would be very useful to have token information that can be fetched from the dex. Actions include: -Get pairs by chainId and pairId from Dexscreener -Get all token pairs for given token addresses from Dexscreener -Search for pairs matching a query string on DexscreenerHow it's Madethe project use https://github.com/coinbase/agentkit , and forked. implement features to binding dexscreener api in action providers. then added unit test & completed e2e test with example app. mostly the code was written by typescript created issue & send PR: https://github.com/coinbase/agentkit/issues/313 https://github.com/coinbase/agentkit/pull/314
summary: make dexscreener actions to fetch data from dex in the agentkit

title: Unchained Whispers
description: Project DescriptionUnchained Whispers is an immersive mystery RPG set in a cursed village where every playthrough unveils a new narrative. Each NPC is a decentralized AI agent, capable of making autonomous decisions and reacting uniquely to player interactions. These dynamic agents, generated through a mix-and-match system of attributes, secrets, and relationships, offer a fresh, unpredictable investigation every time. Players must strategically interrogate NPCs with limited questions to deduce the true culprit behind the curse. In a twist that merges storytelling with blockchain, every game save is minted as a protected NFT‚Äîturning your unique narrative into a collectible digital artifact.How it's MadeThe project is built on RenPy, which handles the branching narrative and visual novel framework. We integrated OpenAI‚Äôs GPT API to generate on-the-fly dialogue, ensuring that each NPC‚Äîimplemented as a decentralized AI agent‚Äîreacts and adapts in a unique way based on their preset mix-and-match attributes. These agents use dynamic decision-making processes to evolve their behavior during interactions. Ethereum smart contracts, leveraging libraries like OpenZeppelin, secure and mint your game save files as NFTs, ensuring your unique story is preserved as a verifiable, tradeable digital asset. This integration of AI, narrative design, and blockchain technology creates a dynamic, immersive experience where every session is a unique journey and collectible artifact.
summary: Unchained Whispers is an AI-driven mystery RPG where every playthrough generates unique NPCs with dynamic secrets and relationships. Unravel a cursed village‚Äôs hidden truths‚Äîand mint your singular story as a tradeable NFT.

title: PortfolAI
description: Project DescriptionYou're developing PortfolAI, an AI-powered bot that personifies market sentiment to provide users with real-time emotional insights into market movements. Here's a comprehensive overview of your project: Project Overview: RiskSentinel is designed to analyze data from social media, news outlets, and financial markets to assess current market sentiment. By embodying this sentiment in a relatable character, the bot offers users an intuitive understanding of market emotions, aiding in informed decision-making. Objectives: To deliver real-time insights into market sentiment by analyzing diverse data sources. To enhance user engagement through a character that dynamically reflects market emotions. To assist users in making informed decisions based on current sentiment trends. Key Features: Sentiment Analysis: Aggregates and examines data from social media platforms, financial news, and market statistics. Utilizes Natural Language Processing (NLP) to determine sentiment polarity and intensity. Dynamic Character Representation: Introduces a character that exhibits emotions such as excitement, fear, or optimism, mirroring the analyzed market sentiment. Ensures the character's reactions update in real-time to reflect sentiment fluctuations. User Engagement and Insights: Provides actionable tips and information aligned with current sentiment trends. Offers an interactive interface where users can observe the character's emotions and access sentiment-driven insights. Technical Approach: Data Collection: Integrate APIs from social media platforms (e.g., Twitter), financial news sources, and market data providers to gather real-time information. Sentiment Analysis: Employ NLP libraries such as NLTK or spaCy to process and analyze textual data, determining overall market sentiment. Character Animation: Develop a dynamic character using animation frameworks that can display a range of emotions based on sentiment analysis results. User Interface: Create an intuitive dashboard that showcases the character's emotional state and provides users with sentiment-related insights and recommendations. Implementation Steps: Data Aggregation: Set up data pipelines to continuously collect information from selected sources. Implement data cleaning and preprocessing to ensure accuracy and relevance. Sentiment Processing: Analyze the preprocessed data to gauge market sentiment. Classify sentiment into categories that correspond to specific emotional states for the character. Character Development: Design the character's visual elements and emotional expressions. Map sentiment categories to corresponding character animations. Interface Design: Develop a user-friendly interface displaying the animated character. Integrate sentiment insights and actionable tips for users. Testing and Refinement: Conduct user testing to gather feedback on functionality and engagement. Refine features and performance based on user input and testing outcomes. Expected Outcomes: Users gain a clearer understanding of market sentiment through an engaging and intuitive platform. Enhanced decision-making capabilities based on real-time sentiment analysis. Increased user engagement through interactive and dynamic content delivery. Potential Challenges: Ensuring the accuracy and reliability of sentiment analysis amidst diverse data sources. Maintaining real-time performance while processing large volumes of data. Designing a character that resonates with a broad user base and effectively conveys complex emotional states.How it's Madehis project is built using Next.js, a popular React framework that enables server-side rendering and static site generation. Here are some of the key technologies and details about how they are pieced together: Technologies Used: Next.js: The core framework for building the application, providing routing, server-side rendering, and API routes. React: The underlying library for building user interfaces, allowing for component-based architecture. TypeScript: A superset of JavaScript that adds static typing, enhancing code quality and maintainability. Privy: A third-party authentication service integrated via the @privy-io/react-auth package, which simplifies user authentication with various login methods. Integration Details: PrivyProvider: The PrivyProvider component wraps the main application component (MyApp). It is configured with an appId and a set of login methods, which include email and wallet options. This setup allows users to authenticate easily and securely. Environment Variables: The appId is sourced from environment variables (NEXT_PUBLIC_PRIVY_APP_ID), ensuring sensitive information is not hardcoded into the application. Notable Implementations: Custom Appearance: The appearance configuration for the PrivyProvider allows for customization of the authentication UI, such as setting a light theme and a specific accent color. This helps maintain brand consistency across the application. Type Safety: Using TypeScript throughout the project ensures that the code is type-checked, reducing runtime errors and improving developer experience. Hacky Solutions: Dynamic Imports: If there are components that are heavy or not needed immediately, I might use dynamic imports to load them only when required. This can improve the initial load time of the application. Custom Hooks: I created custom hooks for managing authentication state and user data, which helps in keeping the components clean and focused on rendering. Overall, the combination of these technologies and practices results in a robust, maintainable, and user-friendly application. The integration of Privy for authentication is particularly beneficial as it abstracts away much of the complexity involved in managing user sessions and security.
summary: PortfolAI is an AI-driven bot that personifies market sentiment, providing real-time emotional insights by analyzing social media, news, and market data. Through a relatable character, it expresses emotions and offers users tips based on current sentiment trends.

title: PetFi
description: Project DescriptionPetFi is a Virtual NFT Pet Gaming and Trading Platform that allows users to: ‚úî Adopt and customize NFT pets with unique attributes and visual appearances. ‚úî Play interactive mini-games and PvP battles to earn in-game rewards. ‚úî Trade pets, accessories, and assets on a decentralized marketplace. ‚úî Evolve their pets to create rarer and more powerful NFTs. ‚úî Participate in a Play-to-Earn (P2E) economy, where players can earn tokens through gameplay and competitions. Unlike traditional virtual pet games where assets are stored on centralized servers, PetFi ensures that every pet, item, and currency is a blockchain-backed NFT, meaning true ownership, provable rarity, and unrestricted tradeability.How it's MadePetFi is built using Solidity for smart contracts (ERC-721 for currency) on Ethereum and Layer 2 solutions like Polygon for scalability. The frontend is built with Next.js, React, and Tailwind CSS, with blockchain interactions handled via Ethers.js For storage, we use IPFS and Arweave for NFT metadata, with TheGraph indexing on-chain events for real-time updates. We have also incorporated AI in our project by providing AI generated NFTs to our players.
summary: PetFi is a revolutionary decentralized platform that combines blockchain, NFTs, and gaming to create an immersive virtual pet ecosystem. Players can adopt, train, trade, and battle unique NFT pets.
