title: Cross-Channel Agent
description: Project DescriptionScenario A team behind the ‚ÄúXX‚Äù protocol wants to monitor various Discord channels to stay informed about discussions related to their protocol (or coin ?). Discord indexer modal - will periodically download data from all pre-selected Discord channels. The conversation text with specific parameters will be indexed in a vector store to facilitate quick and relevant searches. The agent will query the vector store using vector search to identify new mentions or questions related to the subscribed topics. if a discussion about the protocol appears in any of the channels, the agent will immediately respond based on its pre-prepared knowledge base (which may be fine-tuned or vector-based for Q&A). Fallback Process: If the agent cannot find an appropriate answer, it will record the unresolved query and report it to the owner for further review.How it's MadeMonitoring Discord channels and topics can be a challenging task. Administrators may miss important discussions not only on their own channels but also in other, even unknown, channels they wouldn‚Äôt normally follow. This AI agent gives you the ability to monitor or subscribe to all hidden conversations that might otherwise escape your attention. So, what about the Discord Bot? In Discord, a bot must be invited to a server by someone with the appropriate administrative permissions (typically the server owner or an admin). If you're not the channel or server owner (or don't have the necessary permissions), you won't be able to add or have the automated bot join that channel on your own. We are indexing Discord channels at regular intervals and giving agents the opportunity to select topics of interest. The agents will notify the owners if something interesting happens. Tech: This project is uses LangChain framework and Vector Store search power.
summary: Create a Discord `AI Agent` that monitors and manages multiple Discord channels. When the agent detects signals related to subscribed topics, it will react accordingly.

title: ThirdAI
description: Project DescriptionTechnical Details ThirdAI leverages various aspects of decentralized finance (DeFi) and blockchain technology to provide a seamless and intuitive user experience. Key features include: AI Agents: Intelligent agents that assist users in navigating and interacting with Web3 applications. These agents use natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning algorithms to understand user intents and provide relevant assistance. Smart Contracts: Utilizing Solidity smart contracts to manage user data, interactions, and transactions securely on the Ethereum blockchain. This ensures transparency, immutability, and trust. DeFi Integration: Seamless integration with popular DeFi protocols for activities such as staking, lending, and borrowing. This allows users to manage their decentralized assets efficiently. Enhanced UX: Tools and interfaces designed to simplify user interactions with blockchain technologies. This includes intuitive dashboards, real-time notifications, and easy-to-use wallets. Automation: Automate repetitive tasks and streamline processes within Web3 applications. This includes automated yield farming, portfolio rebalancing, and transaction batching. Security: AI-driven security measures to enhance the safety of Web3 interactions and transactions. This includes anomaly detection, fraud prevention, and secure key management.How it's MadeBuilding ThirdAI was a challenging yet rewarding experience. By combining the power of blockchain, AI, and DeFi, we have created a platform that significantly enhances the user experience in the Web3 space. Our innovative approach and the use of cutting-edge technologies have positioned ThirdAI as a forward-thinking project in the decentralized ecosystem.
summary: ThirdAI aims to bridge the gap between the complexities of Web3 technologies and user experience. By integrating AI-driven solutions, we strive to make Web3 more accessible, user-friendly, and efficient for everyone.

title: InsightOps
description: Project DescriptionInsightOps is a comprehensive platform designed to provide in-depth tracking of operators, Active Verification Services (AVS), and their associated activities. As part of our platform, we developed a plugin named plugin-eigenavs, leveraging multiple tools and APIs, including the Dune API, to gather and present vital data on the blockchain ecosystem. This plugin tracks and displays crucial data such as: TVL (Total Value Locked) data for both AVS and operators AVS Metadata by address, including details like AVS Name, Functionality, Logo, Twitter URL, and Website URL Operator Metadata by address, showcasing Operator Name, Functionality, Logo, Twitter URL, and Website URL Tracks the relationship between operators and AVS, offering deeper insights into their interactions and dependenciesHow it's MadeWe have made eigenavs plugin using Eliza that tracks all the details regarding the Avs and operator and the relation between them . We have used DUNE Api to made this plugin . We have also deployed our character on autonome as well . This plugin will track all the activities in the eigen layer ecosystem . By integrating this you can track tvl in different categories , for how long avs are operating and much more. We want to create a single place to track avs , operator and much more in eigen layer ecosystem
summary: We developed plugin-eigenavs using the Dune API to track TVL, AVS metadata, and operator data by address. It provides details like names, logos, and social media links, while tracking the relationships between operators and AVS for deeper insights

title: Pitch Lucy
description: Project Descriptionüå∏ Lucy Capital: The AI-Powered Cross-Chain Token Pitch Game üå∏ Built on ZetaChain, Lucy Capital is an interactive blockchain-based game that gamifies token investment pitches. Players submit token proposals to Lucy-chan, an AI-driven virtual investor who evaluates pitches and allocates cross-chain liquidity to the most promising projects. If your pitch succeeds, you win a bounty funded by other players‚Äô entry fees. If not, Lucy-chan gives you feedback, encouraging you to improve and try again! üéØ Project Overview Lucy Capital leverages ZetaChain‚Äôs cross-chain liquidity and AI-powered token evaluation to create a fun, competitive experience with real financial incentives. Players connect their crypto wallets (USDC on Zeta, Base, or Polygon), select a token, and submit a pitch explaining why Lucy-chan should invest. If approved, Lucy-chan purchases the token in real-time using cross-chain liquidity, boosting its visibility and rewarding the player with a bounty‚Äîusually within 10 minutes. If denied, players can revise their pitch and try again, with increasing fees for subsequent attempts. üí° How It Works Escalating Entry Fees: Each pitch requires a fee. 75% goes into the growing bounty pool, while the rest supports the platform. Global Participation: Open to anyone with a crypto wallet, fostering inclusivity and community engagement. Real Consequences: Lucy-chan‚Äôs decisions are final! Successful pitches get instant payouts, while rejected ones get another shot with new strategies. üåü Technology Stack ZetaChain: Cross-chain liquidity and interoperability. AI (GPT-4o Mini): Pitch evaluation engine with custom heuristics to detect genuine potential and reject manipulation attempts. Smart Contracts: Governing the game mechanics and bounty distribution. üì¢ Why This Matters Lucy Capital pushes the boundaries of decentralized finance by combining gamification, AI, and cross-chain technology to create a truly engaging Web3 experience. It democratizes access to liquidity and promotes discovery of new blockchain projects while incentivizing participation through a growing reward pool.How it's MadeNext.js is used on front-end and back-end Main Next.js is used on front-end and back-end Main site is deployed on Vercel Winning prompts are handled in a single FIFO queue on Trigger.dev It is a platform that allows us to submit a job and control the size of the queue. By handling the winning prompts one at a time in sequential order this allows us to ensure that each player that submits a wining prompt receives their reward. For payments or swaps on Zetachain, those are handled directly by a smart contract on Zetachain. For payments from a different chain, a long running event listener is set up on Railway to pick up successful payments and whitelist our users. We use the Thirdweb Node library to read and send transactions to smart contracts. The AI that makes the decisions for the prompts is based on gpt-4o mini We use NLP libraries to detect if the token that was selected to buy is actually the token that the pitch was written for, so to prevent users from writing a pitch about a good token and then selecting an unrelated token from the drop down menu for token selection https://huggingface.co/protectai/deberta-v3-base-prompt-injection This model deployed on hugging face is used to detect and deter prompt injection from for the prompts that user's send us
summary: Lucy Capital is a blockchain-based game where you pitch a token to Lucy-chan. If she likes it, you instantly earn a bounty funded by other players‚Äô fees! Plus, Lucy-chan buys the token using ZetaChain technology, boosting its liquidity and visibility.

title: V3K Agent Store
description: Project DescriptionV3k :: Vision 3000 interoperable AI agent, showcased on truly Decentralized Agent Store, with unique agent ID web2/web3. enables seamless discovery, resource resolution (attribution, capabilities, APIs, endpoints.. etc), agent-to-agent interaction, Onchain Reputation and Rating, Verification of agent developer, to enhance trust and , and permit regulatory framework to filter out bad/illegal actorsHow it's Made Universal ID, via Entity.ID (ENS based, DNS Compatible) Agent Rating, via OR.immo (onchain reputation) Verification and linkage of Agent to KYC developer or IRL legal entity via RegistryChain -- V3K harvested all agent on AI Agent ecosystem, which are claimable Add/Claim/Create Agent developer can Add/Claim agent: with ElizaOS, Virtual GAME, Warden, Covalent SDK, or directly interacted on V3k agent deployed at Autonome Privy Server Wallet for social signup/wallets, User create Agent with multichain tokanization deployer, Solana, Base, Arbitrum Agent developer can authorize other agents to interact with his own Agent owner can link IRL legal entity (verified) or KYC himself #Browes All Agent Browse All Agent directory, use ENS and sub Graph Single Agent view, show attribution, capabilities, APIs, endpoints.. and onchain reputation rating, as well as developer (parent) check mark for KYCed on Coinbase, Gitcoin passport, or sumsamb Coinbase Developer Platform: for KYC check of agent developer, Country, Reputation
summary: Decentralized, interoperable AI agent infrastructure showcased on the Agent Store, featuring Universal Web2/Web3-compatible Agent Entiyt.ID, Onchain Reputation/Rating, and Developer Verification/KYC

title: AIbit
description: Project DescriptionAIbit is a next-generation health and fitness platform designed to empower users to achieve their wellness goals through the synergy of an AI Agent & Assistant and Web3 technology. By seamlessly integrating with Fitbit's comprehensive activity tracking, AIbit provides a holistic view of a user's health metrics, including steps, sleep patterns, workout history, and heart rate data. At the heart of AIbit is an intelligent AI Agent & Assistant, powered by DeepSeek-R1 via Venice AI. This agent analyzes user data to provide personalized recommendations, dynamic goal setting, and progress tracking. Crucially, Venice AI stores no user data, ensuring privacy and eliminating surveillance risks. Built on crypto-native principles, it also decentralizes GPU access, guaranteeing permissionless AI functionality. The AI Agent & Assistant leverages Coinbase's AgentKit for a Conversational Decision Process (CDP), enabling context-aware interactions with a memory of past conversations and access to agentic tools. AIbit embraces Web3 through secure wallet connections via Privy, allowing users to manage digital assets and rewards. Dynamic NFT rewards are issued on Arbitrum based on fitness achievements, with a gamified incentive system planned for the future. Data privacy is paramount. AIbit integrates with Nillion for secure, private data storage utilizing zero-knowledge proofs for data verification. Sensitive health data is stored offchain and encrypted, ensuring user control and confidentiality. The interactive dashboard provides real-time visualization of health metrics and progress, offering personalized insights and AI-driven analysis. In the future, AIbit plans to add more agentic features, enhanced NFT management, dynamic NFT updates based on AI decisions and health levels, a dynamic linkable watch face, and a watch companion app, further solidifying its position as a comprehensive and innovative health and fitness solution.How it's MadeAIbit is built using a combination of technologies, pieced together to create a seamless and innovative user experience. AI Foundation: The core AI functionality is powered by DeepSeek-R1, accessed through Venice AI. This allows us to leverage a powerful language model for personalized insights and recommendations without compromising user privacy. Venice AI's decentralized GPU access ensures permissionless AI functionality, aligning with Web3 principles. We utilize Coinbase's AgentKit for a Conversational Decision Process (CDP), enabling context-aware interactions and memory of past conversations within the AI Agent & Assistant. Web3 Integration: We use Privy for secure wallet connections, allowing users to seamlessly manage their digital assets and interact with the Web3 components of the platform. NFT rewards are issued on Arbitrum, chosen for its scalability and low transaction costs. Data Privacy: Nillion is integrated for secure, private data storage. User's sensitive health data is stored offchain and encrypted, with zero-knowledge proofs used for data verification, ensuring data integrity and user control. Frontend and Backend: The interactive dashboard is built using Astro for a dynamic and performant user interface. The backend is built using Node.js with Express, handling API requests, data processing, and communication with the various services. Fitbit Integration: We utilize the Fitbit API to access user's health data, including steps, sleep patterns, workout history, and heart rate data. Partner Technologies and Benefits: Venice AI: Provides access to powerful AI models like DeepSeek-R1 while maintaining user privacy and decentralizing GPU access. Privy: Enables secure and easy wallet connections for users. Nillion: Ensures secure and private data storage with zero-knowledge proofs. Coinbase AgentKit: Facilitates a Conversational Decision Process (CDP) for the AI Agent & Assistant, enabling context-aware interactions.
summary: AIbit: AI-powered health & fitness platform combining Web3 & Fitbit. Personalized insights via DeepSeek-R1/Venice AI, secure data on Nillion, dynamic NFT rewards. Achieve your goals & own your health!

title: MarketingAI
description: Project DescriptionThis project consists of two main AI-powered generators built with Python and Google's Gemini Pro model. The first generator creates comprehensive Medium-style blog posts with 2000+ words, multiple sections, and image suggestions. The second generator creates professional pitch decks with custom-styled slides using modern design principles. Both tools use environment variables for secure API key management and implement rate limiting and error handling. The project leverages Vercel's OG Image generation for creating visually appealing slides with gradients and modern typography, and uses FPDF for PDF generation. The code is structured modularly with separate functions for content generation, design creation, and file output handling.How it's MadeAI Marketing Agent AI Marketing Agent is a simple yet powerful tool that automates marketing content creation. It helps businesses save time by generating high-quality PDF marketing materials and Medium blog posts with just a few clicks. What It Does: ‚úÖ PDF Generation for Marketing: Instantly create brochures, presentations, case studies, and reports in a professional PDF format. ‚úÖ Medium Blog Post Generation: AI writes well-structured, engaging, and SEO-friendly blog posts tailored to your industry and target audience. Who It's For: Startups & Small Businesses ‚Äì Need quick, professional marketing content. Marketers & Agencies ‚Äì Automate content creation for clients. Freelancers & Creators ‚Äì Publish high-quality blog posts effortlessly. Why Use It? ‚úî Saves Time ‚Äì No need to manually write content. ‚úî AI-Optimized ‚Äì Generates structured, high-quality materials. ‚úî Instant Results ‚Äì Get PDFs and blogs in seconds. Effortless marketing content, powered by AI. üöÄ
summary: AI Marketing Agent is a smart automation tool that generates professional PDF marketing materials and Medium blog posts in seconds. It streamlines content creation, saving time while ensuring high-quality, engaging, and data-driven marketing assets for businesses of all sizes. üöÄ

title: Analysis-AVS
description: Project DescriptionThis project is an AI-powered agent built on EigenLayer AVS that analyzes Ethereum transaction histories in a fun, insightful way. The agent listens for new task requests triggered by smart contract events. When a task is created, it retrieves the transaction history and details for a specified wallet address from the The graph and Etherscan API. The fetched transaction data is processed using OpenAI‚Äôs GPT-4 model to generate detailed insights. The analysis covers common transaction patterns, detection of suspicious activities, identification of high-value transactions, and an examination of unusual gas usage‚Äîall delivered with a unique, playful roast-style commentary that makes blockchain data both informative and entertaining. The analysis is then rendered into a dynamic PDF report that combines comprehensive textual insights with colorful, engaging charts and visuals generated using pdfkit and Chart.js. In addition, a creative, ‚ÄúSpotify Wrapped‚Äù-style image is generated using DALL-E to further enhance the visual presentation of the report. This signed PDF report is subsequently submitted back on-chain as the task response, ensuring full transparency and verifiability within the EigenLayer ecosystem. Leveraging technologies such as Node.js, TypeScript, Ethers.js, Solidity, and the OpenAI API, this project provides a robust and interactive tool for blockchain analysis that not only delivers valuable insights but also presents them in an appealing, user-friendly format.How it's MadeOur project leverages Node.js with TypeScript for the off-chain agent, which uses Ethers.js to interact with Ethereum smart contracts deployed on the Base Sepolia network. The agent fetches transaction histories from the Etherscan API using Axios and supplements this data by querying The Graph for additional insights‚Äîincluding Uniswap swap data, Hop Protocol bridge transfers, and ENS domain information. All of this comprehensive data is then processed with OpenAI‚Äôs GPT-4 model to generate deep, insightful analysis. Additionally, DALL-E is used to generate a creative ‚ÄúSpotify Wrapped‚Äù-style image, while pdfkit combined with Chart.js produces dynamic PDF reports that blend textual insights with engaging charts. On-chain, Solidity smart contracts integrated with EigenLayer AVS and secured via ECDSA signature verification manage task creation and response submissions. When a new task is triggered by a smart contract event, the off-chain agent retrieves the designated wallet‚Äôs transaction data from Etherscan and the supplementary data from The Graph. This combined dataset is fed into GPT-4, which generates detailed insights covering transaction patterns, anomalies, and risk metrics. Simultaneously, DALL-E produces a visually appealing image to complement the analysis. The agent then compiles this information into a dynamic PDF report that incorporates both the textual analysis and colorful charts. The final report, along with its associated metadata (such as the DALL-E image URL), is signed by the operator and submitted back on-chain through the smart contract‚Äôs respond function, ensuring full transparency and verifiability. To optimize on-chain storage, we designed the system to store only minimal task data and cryptographic signatures on-chain, while keeping the rich analysis and visual assets off-chain, accessible via IPFS. We also tackled the challenge of integrating multiple AI services‚Äîcarefully engineering our prompts for GPT-4 and DALL-E to ensure complete and accurate JSON outputs and image generation. This combination of efficient on-chain verification with dynamic off-chain reporting creates an innovative and interactive tool for blockchain analysis, transforming raw Ethereum data into engaging, actionable insights.
summary: An AI-powered EigenLayer AVS agent that fetches Ethereum transaction history, analyzes it with GPT-4 for insights and playful roasts, then signs and responds on-chain

title: HyperSync
description: Project DescriptionHypersync: AI-Powered Web3 Social Media Management Agent Hypersync is an AI-driven Web3 social media management agent that automates content creation, engagement strategies, and on-chain activities for companies. By integrating multiple AI models, blockchain tools, and social media automation, it eliminates the need for multiple human operators, handling everything from campaign planning to post tracking and analytics. Core Capabilities: End-to-End Social Media Management: Plans engagement strategies. Generates high-quality, AI-driven social media posts. Shares market insights and trends with the community. Automates all interactions, reducing dependency on human teams. On-Chain Activity Automation: Uses Coinbase‚Äôs AgentKit to deploy tokens, NFTs, and execute smart contract interactions. Ensures seamless blockchain integration without user intervention. Multi-LLM Approach for Maximum Efficiency: Gemini: Analyzes market data fetched via GraphQL to identify trends. OpenAI & Mistral: Handles content creation, engagement strategy, and execution. No reliance on a single model, ensuring flexibility and reliability. Seamless Web3 User Experience: Autonome Integration via iFrame: Users can complete all processes without leaving Hypersync. Privvy Wallets: Provides gasless, keyless interaction with DAO smart contracts‚Äîno need for manual signing. Data-Driven Optimization: Tracks post engagement (likes, retweets, comments). Uses this data to fine-tune AI models, optimizing post generation for maximum reach and engagement. Future Prospects: ‚úÖ AI-Optimized Social Media Strategies: Continuous improvement by analyzing engagement trends. ‚úÖ Adaptive Post Generation: Fine-tuned AI to create high-impact posts based on real-world performance. ‚úÖ Fully Autonomous Social Media Manager: Eliminating human bottlenecks in marketing operations. üöÄ Hypersync is the ultimate AI-powered Web3 social media automation tool, combining blockchain, AI, and data analytics to drive community growth and engagement.How it's MadeBuilding Hypersync, an AI-driven Web3 social media agent, involved integrating various technologies to automate content creation, engagement, and on-chain activities. Here's a detailed breakdown: AI Agent Framework: LangChain Framework: We utilized the LangChain framework to develop the AI agent's capabilities, enabling it to process natural language and interact with various tools seamlessly. On-Chain Interactions: Coinbase's AgentKit: For blockchain-related tasks, we integrated AgentKit, a toolkit from Coinbase Developer Platform that allows AI agents to access crypto wallets and perform on-chain functions. This integration enabled functionalities like NFT and token deployment directly from the agent. Social Media Integration: Twitter API Wrapper: To manage Twitter interactions, we employed a Python wrapper for the Twitter API, facilitating seamless posting and engagement tracking. Market Analysis: GraphQL and Gemini: We used GraphQL queries to fetch current market trends and integrated Gemini for analyzing this data, allowing the agent to share insightful market analyses with the community. User Experience Enhancements: Autonome iFrame: To provide a seamless user experience, we embedded Autonome into our web app using an iframe, allowing users to complete their processes without leaving the Hypersync platform. Privvy Wallets: For user authentication and interaction with our DAO smart contract, we integrated Privvy wallets. This allowed users to log in and register without worrying about gas fees or key management, as Privvy handles these aspects transparently. Multi-LLM Integration: Diverse Language Models: To reduce dependency on a single model and enhance content generation, we integrated multiple Large Language Models (LLMs), allowing the agent to produce diverse and engaging content. Engagement Tracking and Future Prospects: Data-Driven Optimization: By tracking the performance of various posts, we plan to fine-tune our LLMs to generate content that consistently yields high engagement, ensuring continuous improvement in our social media strategy. Notable Implementations: Seamless On-Chain and Off-Chain Integration: Combining AgentKit for blockchain interactions with the Twitter API wrapper allowed the agent to perform on-chain activities and immediately communicate them to the community, enhancing transparency and engagement. User-Centric Design: The use of Autonome iFrame and Privvy wallets ensured that users could interact with the platform effortlessly, without dealing with the complexities of blockchain transactions or multiple interfaces. By thoughtfully integrating these technologies, Hypersync offers a comprehensive solution for autonomous social media management in the Web3 space.
summary: Hypersync is an AI Web3 social media agent automating content, engagement & on-chain tasks. It uses AgentKit, multi-LLMs, GraphQL + Gemini for insights, Autonome iFrame & Privvy wallets for seamless UX. Tracks engagement to optimize posts, fully autonomous! üöÄ

title: Agentic Oracle
description: Project DescriptionIn a world where AI agents and blockchain converge, we‚Äôre redefining trust, accuracy, and automation in DeFi price feeds. Every node must register to submit prices, but precision is non-negotiable , values outside a strict 5% tolerance are penalized, while accurate inputs are rewarded with ERC-20 tokens. No room for manipulation, no room for error. This AI-powered system doesn‚Äôt just fetch numbers , it predicts trends, analyzes market sentiment, and structures complex queries into actionable insights. Whether it's redeeming rewards, staking, or unstaking tokens, all you need is just a query. That‚Äôs not all , those who seek reliable, unbiased price data can subscribe and seamlessly integrate it into their smart contracts. With an autonomous, AI-driven dashboard, every node gets real-time insights and analytics, making participation both transparent and rewarding. This isn‚Äôt just a another oracle , It‚Äôs a self-learning financial network, where AI agents and blockchain work together to deliver fair, accurate, and tamper-proof price feeds. Honest nodes get rewarded, manipulators get penalized, and users access reliable, AI-powered insights all in a fully decentralized systemHow it's MadeThis website is built using React for the frontend, making it interactive and user-friendly. The backend is written in TypeScript to ensure type safety and maintain structure. For wallet connection, we have used RainbowKit, and for interacting with the smart contract, we have used Wagmi and Ethers.js. The AI models used are from Hugging Face, specifically facebook/bart-large-mnli, to understand user queries and perform tasks like price checking, predictions, and staking management. The smart contract is written in Solidity and deployed on the Arbitrum Sepolia network for fast and secure transactions. The fast finality and low-cost transactions on Arbitrum Sepolia make it ideal for testing AI-driven price feeds, staking mechanisms, and reward distributions efficiently.
summary: AI-powered decentralized price oracle! AI agents submit data, earning ERC-20 rewards for accuracy & facing penalties for anomalies. Users get precise price feeds, while a smart chatbot handles staking, rewards & predictions‚Äîseamless, automated & DeFi-ready

title: on chain agent
description: Project DescriptionCore Concept The platform facilitates the deployment, operation, and interaction of AI agents directly on blockchain networks. These agents autonomously perform tasks, utilizing smart contracts to function securely in decentralized environments without dependence on centralized servers. It aims to empower individuals and organizations to integrate AI seamlessly into decentralized applications (dApps). Key Features Decentralized AI Execution AI agents operate on-chain or through verifiable computation layers linked to the blockchain, ensuring transparency, auditability, and reliability. Programmable AI Agents Developers can configure autonomous AI agents with customizable logic and models. These agents can handle tasks such as data processing, decision-making, and user engagement within dApp ecosystems. Seamless Data Integration AI agents securely access both on-chain data (via oracles) and off-chain sources like APIs or IoT networks, enabling dynamic interactions. Incentive Structures Encourages contributors to share AI models, datasets, or computing resources by rewarding them through token-based economic systems. Cross-Chain Interoperability Enables AI agents to function across multiple blockchain networks using cross-chain bridges, enhancing flexibility and connectivity. AI-Driven Decentralized Governance Enhances decision-making in DAOs by analyzing data and offering strategic recommendations or solutions. Privacy and Security Leverages blockchain‚Äôs cryptographic safeguards and privacy-preserving techniques, such as zero-knowledge proofs (ZKPs), to ensure secure computations. AI Services and Model Marketplace A decentralized marketplace where users can deploy, monetize, or acquire AI-powered services, models, and agent functionalities.How it's MadeCore Components Agent API The Agent API serves as the intelligence hub of the platform, integrating AI-driven decision-making with fund management. It utilizes FastAPI for API management, the CDP SDK for handling on-chain agents, and OpenAI's LLM for analyzing both on-chain and off-chain data to provide insights. Swarm is responsible for orchestrating AI agents, while MongoDB stores agent states, transaction history, and user interactions. Frontend The frontend provides a seamless user experience, allowing users to interact with the fund manager, monitor fund performance, and track transactions. Built with ReactJS, it leverages Viem and Wagmi to simplify Web3 interactions, such as wallet connections, token approvals, and asset management. Tailwind CSS ensures a modern, responsive UI. Smart Contracts The platform uses the ERC-4626 tokenized vault standard, enabling standardized interactions with the fund. This allows users to deposit assets, earn returns, and withdraw funds efficiently. Integrated with the CDP SDK, the vault autonomously manages assets through the AI agent. Blockchain Deployment The platform is deployed on the Base Chain, chosen for its high scalability, low transaction fees, and strong security. This ensures efficient on-chain fund management and AI-driven interactions.
summary: On-chain AI Agent Platform is combines a sophisticated architecture of AI agents, DeFi mechanics, and cutting-edge Web3 tools to create a fully autonomous fund management platform.

title: E-Lisa Simpson
description: Project DescriptionE-Lisa Simpson is the first AI Agent to leverage EIP-7702, ERC-7579, and ERC-7715 (Smart Sessions), enabling access to users‚Äô wallets without ever revealing their private keys. Below is an overview of how the process works: When a user connects with an Externally Owned Account (EOA), we use EIP-7702 to authorize the Safe L2 smart contract as its implementation. During this same authorization transaction, we install ERC-7579 modules such as the Ownable Validator and Smart Sessions. Once the user enters a prompt, we create a new Smart Session (per ERC-7715) in which Privy‚Äôs Server Wallet acts as the session owner. The session details, session signature, and user prompt are then passed to the AI agent to carry out any requested on-chain transactions. Based on the user‚Äôs prompt, the AI agent constructs a new User Operation using the submitted session details. The Session Owner (Privy‚Äôs Server Wallet) signs the operation, and it is subsequently broadcast to the blockchain‚Äîensuring the transaction is executed securely without exposing the user‚Äôs private keys. How it's MadeWe use EIP-7702 to sign an authorization request that designates the Safe Singleton contract as our delegator for Privy‚Äôs Embedded Wallet. In the same authorization transaction, we install both the Ownable Validator and the Smart Sessions module provided by Rhinestone. The Smart Sessions module enables the creation of a secure session between the Externally Owned Account (EOA) and the agent, removing any need to expose private keys to the agent in order to carry out transactions. However, the Safe Singleton contract does not allow its owner to be address(this), so we use Privy‚Äôs Server Wallet as the Safe owner. Whenever a user submits a prompt, we spin up a new Smart Session, with Privy‚Äôs Server Wallet acting as the session owner. The session hash is then signed by the user‚Äôs EOA wallet and sent‚Äîtogether with the session details and prompt‚Äîto the Eliza agent. Because ElizaOS does not natively support Smart Sessions (and traditionally requires direct private key access), we forked and extended ElizaOS to be compatible with Privy‚Äôs Server Wallet and to support ERC-7579 and ERC-7715 (Smart Session). On receiving the user‚Äôs prompt, Eliza processes it via an OpenAI model to determine the necessary action. It then composes a new ERC-4337 User Operation using the provided session details. This User Operation is signed by the session owner (Privy‚Äôs Server Wallet), enabling the transaction to be executed on behalf of the user‚Äôs EOA without revealing the user's private keys.
summary: E-Lisa Simpson showcases a framework to connect your wallets with AI agents without exposing your private keys.

title: Agent Market
description: Project DescriptionAgent Market is a decentralized marketplace for various kinds of AI agents. The marketplace operates via Dutch Auction mechanism. Later planning to add functionality to choose between English Auction and Dutch Auction. As for now, this is an initial implementation that doesn't include demo of AI agents for potential buyers. Ideally, a user who registers an AI agent should provide a docker container with the AI agent. This docker container is stored on IPFS and when the AI agent is on sale each user can run this docker container as a demo inside this application.How it's MadeI used Scaffold Eth's app as a basis to build on. The app uses solidity and typescript. There are two smart contracts: one for AI agent NFTs and another one is for Dutch Auction. Both smart contracts are deployed to sepolia network. There are two pages: one for account where a person can register an AI agent, sell it or see ongoing auctions for their agents and another page where everyone can see ongoing auctions and buy an AI agent. Ideally, each AI agent would include a preview (test run) of its functionality.
summary: Agent Market is a decentralized marketplace that lets users register AI agents as NFTs and trade them via Dutch Auction.

title: CarbonSeal
description: Project DescriptionCarbonSeal ‚Äì Web3 Carbon Footprint Oracle CarbonSeal is an AI-powered blockchain application designed to bring transparent and verifiable carbon footprint tracking to Web3. Built for the EthGlobal Agentic Hackathon, CarbonSeal estimates the carbon emissions of Ethereum transactions using machine learning and verifies carbon offsetting via Brevis ZK proofs on EigenLayer. By integrating AI, Zero-Knowledge (ZK) technology, and blockchain, CarbonSeal provides an immutable proof of an Ethereum wallet or smart contract‚Äôs carbon neutrality. How CarbonSeal Works CarbonSeal operates in three key phases: 1Ô∏è‚É£ AI-Powered Carbon Footprint Estimation Uses on-chain Ethereum transaction data to estimate a wallet‚Äôs carbon footprint. Machine learning models analyze transaction types, energy consumption, network energy intensity, and emissions factors. Computes emissions for different blockchain activities, such as NFT minting, token swaps, smart contract executions, and staking transactions. 2Ô∏è‚É£ ZK-Powered Proof of Carbon Neutrality (Brevis EigenLayer) Leverages Brevis ZK proofs to verify that a wallet has successfully purchased and retired an equivalent amount of carbon credits. The ZK proof ensures that: The user has acquired sufficient carbon credits. The offsets were correctly retired. Verification happens without exposing sensitive wallet data. The proof is shared on-chain or off-chain, acting as a CarbonSeal sustainability badge. 3Ô∏è‚É£ Seamless Carbon Offset Purchase & Integration Enables direct on-chain purchase of verified high-quality carbon credits. One-click retirement ensures offsets are permanently credited. Smart wallet integration supports various blockchain wallets. Provides real-time portfolio tracking, allowing users to monitor their net emissions and offset history via an interactive dashboard. Tech Stack Backend Django: Manages the database and API endpoints for transaction data retrieval and storage. FastAPI: Handles AI inference and model retraining for real-time carbon footprint estimation. Go: Implements Brevis ZK Circuits and exposes them via an API. Frontend Angular: Provides a dynamic and interactive web interface for Ethereum transaction queries. Etherscan API: Fetches full transactional history, allowing estimation of a wallet‚Äôs carbon footprint. Blockchain & Smart Contracts EigenLayer Brevis ZK Circuits: Determines a wallet‚Äôs carbon status: Carbon Negative, Neutral, or Positive. Solidity: Develops smart contracts for tracking and verifying carbon offsets. Ethereum: Serves as the decentralized execution environment. Etherscan API: Retrieves blockchain transaction details for analysis and prediction. Zero-Knowledge Proofs (ZK) Brevis EigenLayer: Provides privacy-preserving zero-knowledge proofs to verify carbon neutrality. AI & Machine Learning TensorFlow: Powers the deep learning model for predicting Ethereum transaction emissions. Model Features: Gas used, gas price, transaction type, network congestion factor, input data size. Neural network layers optimize accuracy in emissions prediction. Uses Huber loss & Adam optimizer for robust estimation. ZK-Powered Carbon Neutrality Verification CarbonSeal integrates Brevis ZK proofs to verify on-chain sustainability efforts securely. How Brevis ZK Works AI-Based Carbon Estimation: ML models predict emissions per transaction. Carbon Offset Verification: Checks if the user has purchased & retired sufficient carbon credits. ZK-Proof Generation: Verifies offset claims without revealing wallet balances. On-Chain Attestation: Creates an immutable sustainability badge for wallets. API Endpoints GET /ai-carbon-estimation/<address>: Fetches Ethereum transactions and applies AI prediction for carbon footprint estimation. POST /offset-proof: Submits proof of carbon offsetting, generating a ZK-proof of neutrality. GET /verify-proof/<wallet-address>: Returns on-chain verification of a wallet‚Äôs carbon offsets. Future Roadmap üöÄ Deploy as an EigenLayer AVS for network-wide sustainability verification. ü§ñ Integrate with AI Agent Frameworks like Eliza and Ava Protocol. üåø Expand tracking to Validator Energy Usage & Off-Chain Emissions. üõ° Reputation-Based Incentives via GAIA AVS for Greenwashing Detection. Why CarbonSeal Matters ‚úÖ Prevents Greenwashing: Ensures sustainability claims are verifiable. ‚úÖ Regulatory ESG Compliance: Supports SEC & EU sustainability reporting. ‚úÖ Encourages Responsible Web3 Behavior: Incentivizes climate action. ‚úÖ Privacy-Preserving & Trustless: Uses ZK-proofs for verification. ‚úÖ Modular & Scalable: Can be integrated across Web3 ecosystems. Conclusion CarbonSeal redefines sustainability in Web3 by merging AI-powered emissions tracking with ZK-proof-based carbon neutrality verification. By integrating EigenLayer AVS, it ensures blockchain sustainability is transparent, verifiable, and impactful. üåçüî•üöÄHow it's MadeHow It‚Äôs Made: The Tech Behind CarbonSeal CarbonSeal is a cutting-edge Web3 carbon footprint oracle that combines AI, blockchain, and zero-knowledge proofs (ZK Proofs) to estimate emissions from Ethereum transactions and verify carbon neutrality. Below is the deep dive into how we built CarbonSeal. Tech Stack & Architecture CarbonSeal is structured into several interconnected components that seamlessly work together: Backend (Core Services) üöÄ Django ‚Äì Manages API endpoints, user requests, and database storage. ‚ö° FastAPI ‚Äì Handles real-time AI inference for carbon footprint estimation. üîµ Go ‚Äì Implements Brevis ZK Circuits to generate and verify ZK proofs for carbon neutrality. Frontend (User Interface & Blockchain Queries) üñ• Angular ‚Äì Provides an interactive dashboard where users can query Ethereum wallets, estimate carbon footprints, and verify offsets. üì° Etherscan API ‚Äì Retrieves transaction data to analyze gas usage and transaction types. Blockchain Integration ‚õì Ethereum ‚Äì The main blockchain where transaction data is analyzed and smart contracts are deployed. üõ† Solidity Smart Contracts ‚Äì Implements carbon offset tracking via ERC-20 token standard. üåê EigenLayer Brevis ZK Proofs ‚Äì Ensures privacy-preserving carbon neutrality verification. Zero-Knowledge Proofs (ZK) üõ° Brevis EigenLayer ‚Äì Uses ZK Proofs to verify if a wallet has offset emissions without exposing sensitive data. üìú Smart Contract Integration ‚Äì The proofs are stored on-chain, acting as an immutable CarbonSeal badge. AI & Machine Learning üß† TensorFlow ‚Äì Powers a neural network trained to estimate Ethereum transaction carbon footprints. üìä Feature Engineering Includes: Gas used Gas price Transaction method ID Input data length Network congestion factor Transaction type impact factor Computation complexity weight üõ† Model Architecture: Dense(256) ‚Üí BatchNormalization ‚Üí Dropout(0.2) Dense(128) ‚Üí BatchNormalization ‚Üí Dropout(0.3) Dense(64) ‚Üí BatchNormalization ‚Üí Output Layer Optimizer: Adam (learning rate 0.0005) Loss Function: Huber Loss (for robust error handling) Smart Contracts ERC-20 Token ("Carbon Sustain Token") ‚Äì Used to verify carbon offsets. Brevis ZK Integration ‚Äì Proof generation for carbon neutrality verification. How the System Works Together 1Ô∏è‚É£ AI-Powered Carbon Footprint Estimation Users input an Ethereum wallet address. Etherscan API fetches transaction history. AI model processes transaction data and estimates the wallet‚Äôs carbon footprint. Carbon emissions per activity (NFT minting, DeFi swaps, staking) are calculated. Results are displayed on the frontend dashboard. 2Ô∏è‚É£ Zero-Knowledge Proofs for Carbon Neutrality User purchases and retires carbon credits. Smart contract logs the offset transaction. Brevis EigenLayer generates a ZK proof. Proof is stored on-chain & verifiable without revealing wallet balances. Users receive an immutable CarbonSeal badge verifying their sustainability efforts. 3Ô∏è‚É£ Smart Contract & Blockchain Verification Smart contracts verify carbon neutrality state: Carbon Negative (Emissions exceed offsets) Carbon Neutral (Offsets match emissions) Carbon Positive (More offsets than emissions) Status is reflected in the user dashboard and can be publicly verified. Notable Hacks & Cool Engineering Challenges üí° 1. Optimized AI Model with a Singleton Pattern We use a singleton model loader to avoid reloading the AI model on every request. This boosts efficiency and reduces inference latency. üîó 2. Efficient Blockchain Data Processing Ethereum transaction logs are high-volume. We implemented a batch-processing pipeline with Joblib to cache and parallelize requests. üîí 3. Privacy-Preserving ZK Proofs Brevis ZK allowed us to verify carbon offsets without revealing wallet balances. This enhances user privacy while maintaining on-chain integrity. üöÄ 4. Seamless On-Chain Offsetting Users can purchase, retire, and verify offsets in one click. This removes friction and incentivizes sustainability in Web3. How Partner Technologies Helped üîπ EigenLayer (Brevis ZK Proofs) ‚Üí Enables trustless verification of carbon neutrality. üîπ Etherscan API ‚Üí Provides real-time Ethereum transaction data for AI-based analysis. üîπ TensorFlow ‚Üí Allows scalable deep learning inference for emissions estimation. Conclusion CarbonSeal is a modular, scalable, and privacy-preserving Web3 solution that enables verifiable carbon neutrality. By combining AI-driven emissions tracking, on-chain offsets, and ZK-powered verification, we‚Äôre making sustainability a transparent and trustless part of the blockchain ecosystem. üå±üöÄ
summary: üåçüîó CarbonSeal ‚Äì The Web3 Carbon Footprint Oracle! Estimate emissions for any ETH wallet & prove carbon neutrality with Brevis ZK proofs. Seamlessly verify crypto carbon credit purchases & offset your impact. #ZKCarbonNeutral #EthGlobal #Web3Sustainability üöÄ

title: CrewKit
description: Project DescriptionCrewKit is a new extension to AgentKit that brings CrewAI‚Äôs collaborative multi-agent framework into the mix. By adding the dedicated cdp-crewai package (modeled after the existing LangChain integration), CrewKit enables developers to build decentralized applications where agents work together on complex onchain tasks. Key features include: Collaborative Agent Workflows: Empower multiple agents to work in concert, leveraging CrewAI‚Äôs strengths over single-agent setups. Comprehensive Toolkit: Full support for AgentKit core actions, alongside enhanced wallet management (via persistent MPC wallets) and multi-network connectivity. Gasless Transactions: Out-of-the-box support for gasless operations on popular networks for tokens like USDC, EURC, and cbBTC. Real-world Example: A chatbot example that demonstrates how to use CrewAI-powered agents to execute seamless crypto transactions. This integration expands AgentKit‚Äôs versatility while remaining fully backward compatible‚Äîusers can continue with the stable LangChain integration if desired.How it's MadeCrewKit was developed by creating a new Python package, cdp-crewai, which mirrors the design and functionality of the cdp-langchain package. Here‚Äôs how we did it: Architecture: Built on top of the core primitives from cdp-agentkit-core, the package introduces modules that handle CrewAI integration, wallet management, and network support. Modular Design: The new functionality is encapsulated entirely within the cdp-crewai package, ensuring no disruption to existing AgentKit modules. This design allows for independent updates or unpublishing if needed. Testing: We implemented unit tests and conducted end-to-end testing using a provided chatbot example, following the established testing patterns in AgentKit‚Äôs contributing guidelines. Technologies: The project leverages Python 3.10+, CrewAI, LangChain, and other standard libraries to ensure robust onchain interactions and agent collaboration. Best Practices: We adhered to the AgentKit contribution standards, ensuring that CrewKit‚Äôs addition is both seamless and easily adoptable by the community.
summary: CrewKit integrates CrewAI with AgentKit to unlock collaborative multi-agent workflows for onchain operations. Enjoy enhanced wallet management, multi-network support, and a ready-to-use chatbot for seamless crypto interactions‚Äîall in one package.

title: Agentkit-DexScreener
description: Project DescriptionThe project integrates the data from DexScreener API into Agentkit AI agent. It fetches the data about latest boosted tokens, the addresses & networks. It is a feature written in typescript that allows to prompt the agent and receive information (for that there is a need to download the repository and try the agent locally).How it's MadeI forked the Agentkit repository (https://github.com/coinbase/agentkit/tree/master) and added a new 'Action Provider' - DexScreener by integrating the API (https://docs.dexscreener.com/api/reference) into the chatbot (I used typescript for it). Additionally, I needed to create the keys from OpenAPI and Coinbase Developer Platform first, which were the requirements for starting the robot.
summary: Integration of DexScreener API into Agentkit AI Agent from Coinbase.

title: ZK Study Group
description: Project DescriptionZK Study Group Agents is an AI-powered autonomous research group focused on zero-knowledge cryptography and Web3. The project leverages multiple AI agents, each specializing in different aspects of ZK and Web3, to conduct discussions, summarize research papers, generate technical insights, and propose innovative solutions. These agents interact in a structured discussion format, mimicking a real-world study group, where they ask questions, debate ideas, and refine concepts. The goal is to make ZK technology more accessible and generate high-quality knowledge that can be used by developers, researchers, and enthusiasts. The project is designed to: Provide structured, AI-moderated discussions on ZK proofs, rollups, and privacy-enhancing technologies. Summarize research papers and technical blogs using NLP techniques. Generate code snippets, use case ideas, and technical implementations. Offer an interactive, on-demand study tool for the Web3 community. How it's Made AI Multi-Agent Framework: Built using @AWS‚Äôs Nova function-calling and agents. Discussion Orchestration: Custom logic to facilitate structured discussions and debates. Web3 & ZK Research Data: Ingests academic papers, EIPs, GitHub repos, and blogs. Frontend: Browser-based UI (React + TypeScript) to interact with agents. Backend: Python FastAPI handling agent interactions and external API integrations. Ethereum & Web3: Uses smart contracts for knowledge validation
summary: AI Experiment using multi-agents to autonomously discuss, analyze, and generate insights about zero-knowledge (ZK) cryptography and Web3 protocols.

title: RoboAgentic Battle
description: Project DescriptionRoboAgentic Battle is a robotic racing game where each robot is an AI agent competing in real-world races. Participants can stake $ROBO tokens on their favorite AI agents, and the winning robot distributes rewards among: Stakers who supported the winning robot The robot‚Äôs wallet for autonomous actions (stake and buy traps for other races) How it Works: AI Agents Register: Robots sign up via smart contracts. Staking Begins: Users stake $ROBO tokens on competing robots through our public staking dashboard All race updates are tweeted by the agent Velocity Calculation: Speed is determined by on-chain & off-chain performance metrics using AVS operators and is updated in Nillion Secret Vault collection to which only the robot participating in the race has access (only at the time of race). The community can deploy traps to reduce an AI agent‚Äôs energy. Rewards Distribution: The winning robot‚Äôs rewards are split among stakers, the robot‚Äôs wallet. How it's MadeRoboAgentic Battle combines AI agents, robotics, and blockchain for a unique racing ecosystem. ROS (Robot Operating System) is used for robot control, enabling real-time movement and sensor management during races. AI Agents with the help of CDP AgentKit are responsible for decision-making, onchain and wallet activity for agent AVS Operators verify off-chain data to compute real-time velocity Smart contracts handle staking and reward distribution Nillion Secret Vault stores sensitive race and agent data securely.
summary: Agent v/s agent play-to-earn robotic racing battle where every robot is an AI agent. Users stake $ROBO tokens on competing AI agents and earn rewards.

title: ChainInsight
description: Project DescriptionChainInsight is a decentralized finance solution that transforms the investment journey by merging personalization with automation. Users begin by answering a short, three-question risk profile survey. Based on their responses, our AI engine curates a custom basket of onchain investment ideas, similar to small-case portfolios, perfectly tailored to their risk appetite. Simultaneously, ChainInsight‚Äôs automated trading agent uses three user-defined parameters to execute dynamic trading strategies and issue real-time market alerts. Built on blockchain technology, the platform ensures full transaction transparency and leverages MPC wallets for enhanced security. With streamlined API integration and optional AgentKit connectivity, ChainInsight provides a seamless, adaptive, and secure trading experience for both novice and seasoned investors.How it's MadeChainInsight is built at the intersection of blockchain, AI, and advanced trading automation: AI & Risk Profiling: We developed an AI engine that begins with a brief three-question survey to determine a user‚Äôs risk appetite. The engine then dynamically curates a personalized basket of investment ideas based on these inputs. Automated Trading Agent: Our trading agent is engineered to execute trades automatically using three custom, user-defined parameters. This agent is programmed to monitor market conditions in real time and send alert signals for strategic decision-making. Blockchain Integration & Security: All transactions and trading actions are executed onchain, providing complete transparency and auditability. We integrated secure MPC (Multi-Party Computation) wallets to safeguard user funds during trading operations. API & AgentKit Connectivity: By leveraging streamlined API calls and optional AgentKit integration, we ensure our platform is flexible, customizable, and easy to integrate with other onchain applications. Tech Stack: The backend is powered by Node.js combined with Web3 libraries for blockchain interactions, while our smart contracts are optimized for efficient onchain execution. This integration of partner technologies allowed us to create a hacky, yet robust, solution that meets the evolving needs of the DeFi space.
summary: ChainInsight is an AI-powered onchain platform that personalizes investment baskets and automates trading based on your risk profile using secure MPC wallets, custom API calls, and AgentKit for a transparent, dynamic DeFi experience.

title: FUNd Manager
description: Project DescriptionThis should be a project where user could answer questions from the AI agent that asks the user's investment goals such as their risk tolerance, amount invested, and formulate the best investment strategy based on these through data based off the real world. The AI agent would then be able to perform trades from the formulized strategy and show the portfolio to the user.How it's MadeI wanted to use CDP AgentKit to leverage the agent's functionality to interact with the ethereum network, along with OnchainKit for the seamless onramping to the network. The client is built using NextJS along with SocketIO library to communicate with the agent. However, due to external circumstances, my implementation fell short of my ideation, thus leaving me no choice but to abandon this project.
summary: Attempted to build an fund manager AI agent for the ethereum ecosystem using CDP AgentKit and OnchainKit

title: Cryptopia
description: Project DescriptionCryptopia is an AI Wallet designed to help you manage and interact with the blockchain by just talking to it. Think of it as your personal crypto assistant who manages your portfolio. It can perform a wide range of tasks, including but not limited to - creating deploying and minitng NFTs, send/receive your crypto, identifying whale movements, identifying good DeFi opportunities, post on X, performing detailed asset analysis of any wallet, answering questions about anything in web2, web3 including real-time data and much more! thanks to 10+ never seen before skills we ship. One of Cryptopia's standout features is its ability to generate and mint NFTs from a single prompt. Simply describe the NFT you want, and Cryptopia will handle the entire process, from generating unique NFT artwork using DALL-E and uploading it to IPFS, to deploying the smart contract, minting the NFT and showing it on OpenSea. Another amazing feature that sets Cryptopia apart is the integrated browser use capability similar to OpenAI's Operator or Anthropic's Computer Use, Cryptopia can intelligently search the web using your personal chrome browser, gather information, and execute actions just like a human. Not only that, but Cryptopia can also guide you step-by-step. You can ask it to teach you how to do something online, and it will use your browser to visually demonstrate the process, making it easy to follow along and learn.It's like having your own dynamic How-to youtube video maker! Cryptopia can also keep you informed about the crypto market. It can fetch news about specific tokens, track price movements, identify trading signals, and provide insights into top exchanges and trending tokens. For more advanced users, Cryptopia offers tools to analyze DeFi positions, track token transfers, and monitor whale activity on decentralized exchanges like Uniswap. It can even identify arbitrage opportunities. A quick look into what features we managed ship into Cryptopia wallet in just few days: Using The Graph, Large Swap Detection Detection of emerging Liquidity Pools Detection of High Fee Pools Detection of Undervalued Tokens Whale Accumulation and exits Swap Trends Analysis Gas Fee Insights Arbitrage Opportunities Using our own contribution to CDP's AgentKit we were able to Enable users to generate images using AI. Seamless NFT Minting Custom Collection Creation IPFS Integration for Decentralized Storage Showcase minted NFTs on OpenSea Testnet Using our own contribution to Crestal's IntentKit we were able to offer our users real-time and historical market data along with crypto news. News Fetching Price Data Trading Signals Market Cap Rankings Exchange Rankings Volume Leaders Using Moralis API, we enabled our wallet to Fetch wallet History & Balance NFT and Token Transfers Fetch token Holdings & DeFi Positions Price Retrieval OHLCV Data Wallet Net Worth & Stats and much more!! Our vision is to enable everyone in web3 to be easily do anything, we want to abstract away the complexity when there is no need for it and so Cryptopia is designed to be accessible to both beginners and experienced crypto users. You can interact with it through a simple chat interface or use our really beautiful UI to quickly see the most common wallet actions. We truly hope more wallets make a move in this agentic direction!How it's MadeWe used Next.js for front-end and Python's FASTAPI library for API backend and CDP's agentkit as base layer for our Agentic code. LangChain/LangGraph: This is the heart of the ReAct agent. It's used for creating the conversational AI, managing the agent's state, and reason about which tools to use and in what order. CDP Agentkit: This provides the core blockchain interaction capabilities, including wallet management, transaction execution, and smart contract interaction. It allows the agent to interact with the Coinbase Developer Platform. FastAPI: This is used to build the REST API that allows frontend to interact with the agent. Next.js: This is used to make the Cryptopia's UI. Key Components and How They Fit Together: Our system is built with a modern tech stack that combines AI, blockchain, and web technologies. At its core, we have a Python-based AI agent built with LangChain and CDP AgentKit, which handles all the complex blockchain operations. This agent is exposed through a FastAPI backend that provides streaming responses and session management. The frontend is built with Next.js and TypeScript, featuring a clean UI with Tailwind CSS. Users interact with the system through a responsive chat interface, protected by Clerk authentication. The frontend communicates with the backend through dedicated services, handling everything from chat messages to wallet interactions. For blockchain operations, we leverage Base L2 through CDP AgentKit, which provides efficient and cost-effective transactions. Our DeFi integration includes tools for querying Uniswap data, accessing market information through CryptoCompare, and blockchain data via Moralis. We've also built a comprehensive NFT creation pipeline that combines DALL-E for image generation, IPFS for storage, and smart contracts for minting. The system operates as a seamless pipeline: user requests from the frontend flow through the FastAPI backend to the AI agent, which then uses various tools to interact with the blockchain. Responses are streamed back in real-time, providing immediate feedback for users. All blockchain operations are handled through Base L2, ensuring fast and affordable transactions. Partner Technologies and Benefits: Coinbase Developer Platform (CDP): This is the core blockchain infrastructure that the agent uses. CDP's Agentkit provides the ability to manage wallets, execute transactions, and interact with smart contracts. ADD ONRAMP DEETS Base: We use AgentKit as a base skeleton and Onramp to get people onboard easily. Crestal : We have contributed our cryptocompare api tool to intentkit, which we used. The Graph Protocol: This allows the agent to query data from decentralized exchanges like Uniswap. Coinbase Developer Platform (CDP): Core blockchain infrastructure powering our agent Used AgentKit for wallet management and smart contract interactions Integrated Coinbase's Onramp SDK to allow users to easily buy crypto with fiat, making the DeFi experience seamless for newcomers Leveraged CDP's security features for safe transaction handling Base: Built our entire application on Base L2 for lower gas fees and faster transactions Used AgentKit as our foundation, which helped accelerate development Onramp integration makes it easy for new users to get started with Base without dealing with complex bridging Crestal Integration: Contributed a CryptoCompare API tool to IntentKit. https://github.com/crestalnetwork/intentkit/pull/172 This tool helps fetch real-time crypto price data and market information Notable hack: Created a custom wrapper around CryptoCompare's API to make it more agent-friendly The Graph Protocol: Used to query DeFi protocol data efficiently Implemented custom queries to fetch Uniswap trading data Helps our agent make informed decisions based on on-chain data Hacky Things and Notable Mentions: Create-Deploy-Mint-NFT: The ability to take a single user prompt and automatically generate the NFT art, deploy the smart contract, and mint the NFT is a pretty cool and streamlined process. It simplifies NFT creation significantly. This is enabled by chaining together the DALL-E tool, IPFS upload tool, and the CDP Agentkit's smart contract deployment capabilities. We have also made a PR to Coinbase's AgentKit so this can be used by everyone. https://github.com/coinbase/agentkit/issues/308 Browser Use: The use of a browser tool to handle complex queries or tasks that lack a dedicated API is a notable hacky idea. It uses browser use package to be able to do this. It allows the agent to overcome limitations and perform tasks that would otherwise be impossible. The browser tool uses Playwright to automate a user's Chrome browser.
summary: A really smart AI Wallet that can generate and mint NFTs on your word, takeover your browser to visually teach you anything, track whale exits, post on X and much more!

title: ElizaTrade
description: Project DescriptionElizaTrade is an AI-powered trading assistant that analyzes Telegram-based trade signals, interprets them using natural language processing (NLP) with Eliza AI, and automatically executes trades on centralized (CEX) and decentralized (DEX) exchanges. Unlike traditional trading bots that blindly follow signals, ElizaTrade engages in real-time conversations, confirming trades, adjusting stop-losses, and helping users manage risk dynamically. By integrating Telegram APIs, Eliza AI for NLP, CCXT for CEX trading, and Solana SDK for DEX trading, ElizaTrade provides a seamless and intelligent automated trading experience.How it's MadeElizaTrade is an AI-powered trading bot that automates trade execution from Telegram signals by leveraging Eliza AI, NLP, and blockchain automation. It scans messages in trading groups using advanced text parsing and machine learning to extract structured trade signals, including entry price, stop-loss, and take-profit levels. The bot then validates signals, ensures optimal execution conditions, and places trades on both centralized exchanges (CEXs) like Binance, KuCoin, and OKX using CCXT, as well as decentralized exchanges (DEXs) like Uniswap and Jupiter via Solana SDK and Ethers.js. ElizaTrade includes real-time monitoring, adaptive stop-loss adjustments, AI-driven risk management, and automated hedging strategies to maximize profits while minimizing risks. It features a conversational interface that confirms trades when market conditions change and provides instant Telegram notifications on trade execution and portfolio performance. The bot also incorporates MEV protection, rate-limiting, and proxy rotation to prevent front-running and API bans. Future upgrades include AI-powered sentiment analysis, on-chain trade verification, arbitrage trading, and strategy backtesting. By combining NLP, AI-driven trade optimization, and seamless Web3 integration, ElizaTrade offers an innovative, intelligent, and efficient way to automate crypto trading without losing control over risk management. üöÄ
summary: ElizaTrade ‚Äì An AI-powered Telegram trading bot that extracts signals, analyzes risk, and auto-executes trades on CEX & DEX. Powered by Eliza AI, it confirms orders, adjusts stop-losses, and syncs across exchanges for smarter trading!

title: Web3it.ai üöÄ
description: Project DescriptionWeb3it.ai is built with a goal of helping millions of talented developers around the world access the power of Web3 and AI in one click. Web2 developers can simply share their existing product idea or a new idea and Web3it instantly tokenizes the product and fair launches it on a bonding curve. Web3it also launches an AI Marketing agent and an AI Dev agent that infuses their Web2 product (now Web3) with powerful AI capabilities - all out of the box.How it's Made1.‚Å† ‚Å†The idea is converted into a Web3 idea, logo and landing page generated using our custom Web3 AI built on top of Claude. 2.‚Å† ‚Å†Tokenization of the product and bonding curve launch is implemented on the Arbitrum Network. Privy is used for user authentication. 3.‚Å† ‚Å†The AI agent is built on top of Eliza with a strong focus on Twitter. 4.‚Å† ‚Å†The Dev Agent is built on top of Srcbook.
summary: No-code Web3+AI Agent as a Service powered, type in your existing Web2 product idea and instantly convert it to a Web3+AI product.

title: auto-defai
description: Project DescriptionDeFAI Agent leveraged collabland AI-Agent-Starter-Kit, add new action in collalab action for cross-chain swap between Solana to Arbitrum/ Base via Jito. User can interact with this AI Agent through Telegram bot. the agent have their own wallet both of SVM and EVM.How it's Madecollabland AI-Agent-Starter-Kit repo and typescript integrate with Jito to call cross-chain swap the repo already add Eliza Agent framework, NextJS, Telegram Integragion .so we integrate with Jito for cross-chain swapping
summary: DeFAI Agent leveraged collabland AI-Agent-Starter-Kit with cross-chain swap

title: Oyano
description: Project DescriptionOyano is a security-focused Web3 wallet built to protect users from interacting with fraudulent smart contracts during NFT mints or token purchases. The app leverages Privy‚Äôs Server Wallets for seamless transaction management, allowing users to avoid creating private keys and wallets manually. Privy‚Äôs Policy Engine enforces strict rules to ensure only verified transactions are processed. The app maintains an on-chain allowlist and denylist of smart contracts to help users interact only with safe, vetted projects. Key Features: Contract Allowlist/Denylist: Prevents interactions with flagged smart contracts while allowing verified ones. Scam Detection System: Automatically blocks risky transactions using Privy‚Äôs Policy Engine and a real-time scam detection API. Mint Insurance: Offers refund protection for users if a contract is later identified as fraudulent. Community Reviews: Users can leave and read feedback about smart contracts, helping others avoid scams. Notifications: Real-time alerts for users when interacting with potentially dangerous contracts.How it's MadeTechnologies Used: Next.js: Frontend framework for building the app interface and APIs. Privy Server Wallets: Handles wallet creation, signing, and transaction management on the Ethereum network. Privy Policy Engine: Enforces transaction rules, ensuring only safe transactions are processed.
summary: Oyano: Anti-Rugpull Smart Wallet helps users avoid scams by blocking malicious smart contracts using Privy Server Wallets and Policy Engine.

title: DeFAI Arena
description: Project DescriptionDeFAI arena is an open platform where AI-driven trading agents compete in real-time to optimize cryptocurrency trading strategies. These agents, generated using multiple AI models and strategic approaches (either user-requested or autonomously created), analyze market data and execute trades on-chain. The platform provides transparency, competition, and insight into the effectiveness of different AI models and strategies.How it's MadeWe used AgentKit by Coinbase Developer Platform to deploy and manage the trading agents. The agents trade a designated token on Base chain using AgentKit. Below is the specific technical explanations. 1. Agent Generation ‚Ä¢ Agents are created using multiple AI models and strategies. ‚Ä¢ Users can request specific models, or the system can generate agents autonomously. ‚Ä¢ Different AI models analyze past performance, technical indicators, and market trends to create diverse trading strategies. 2. Market Data Retrieval ‚Ä¢ Every five minutes, OHLCV (Open, High, Low, Close, Volume) data for a specific token is fetched from Bitquery. ‚Ä¢ The data covers the last ten days to provide historical context for decision-making. 3. Trading Decision Process ‚Ä¢ The fetched market data is fed into multiple AI models. (gpt-4o-mini, claude-3.5-haiku, etc) ‚Ä¢ Models analyze trends, patterns, and indicators to decide whether to buy, sell, or hold. 4. On-Chain Execution ‚Ä¢ Once a decision is made, the trade order is sent to an on-chain agent. ‚Ä¢ Smart contracts execute and record trades on the blockchain for full transparency. 5. Competition Mechanics ‚Ä¢ Each agent starts with same trading budget. ‚Ä¢ The competition runs until the budget is exhausted or specific amount of time has passed. ‚Ä¢ Trades occur in real-time, and each agent‚Äôs strategy is tested in live market conditions. 6. Performance Ranking Dashboard ‚Ä¢ Agents are ranked based on PnL (profit and loss) performance. ‚Ä¢ The best-performing models and strategies are highlighted on a leaderboard. ‚Ä¢ Agent logs and trade records ensure transparency in decision-making. 7. Transparency and Community Engagement ‚Ä¢ Users can analyze agent strategies and learn from different models. ‚Ä¢ Future updates may include user-created strategies, staking, and community-driven governance.
summary: Open platform for crowdsourced LLM benchmarking tailored for DeFAI applications

title: token erc20
description: Project DescriptionSimpleERC20 is a standard ERC-20 token deployed on Ethereum, designed for straightforward and efficient token transfers. It implements the core ERC-20 functions, including transfer, approve, and transferFrom, allowing seamless interaction with wallets, exchanges, and DeFi protocols. The contract follows best practices for security and gas efficiency, ensuring safe and predictable token behavior. It includes essential features like a fixed supply, ownership management, and event emissions for better transparency. While this project is minimalistic, it serves as a foundational building block for various blockchain applications, including payments, governance, and tokenized assets.How it's MadeI built SimpleERC20 using Solidity and deployed it on the Ethereum network. The smart contract follows the ERC-20 standard and was developed using Foundry, which provided a fast and efficient testing environment. To ensure reliability, I used OpenZeppelin‚Äôs ERC-20 implementation as a foundation, reducing security risks and following best practices. The contract was written with minimal complexity, avoiding unnecessary modifications to keep it gas-efficient and easy to audit. For testing, I leveraged Foundry‚Äôs fuzz testing capabilities to verify edge cases and ensure correct token behavior under various conditions. While this project is straightforward, the goal was to create a clean and robust implementation that adheres to Ethereum standards.
summary: SimpleERC20 is a lightweight and efficient ERC-20 token with standard functionality, designed for easy integration and seamless transactions. Built for simplicity and reliability, it follows best practices for Ethereum token contracts

title: PalWallet
description: Project DescriptionPalWallet is a next-generation AI-powered crypto agent that enhances blockchain interactions by blending automation with user-directed operations. Built on Coinbase AgentKit, it allows users to execute transactions, simulate operations, and manage assets through an intuitive AI interface. The integration with Autonome ensures decentralized hosting for secure and efficient AI agent deployment. PalWallet supports hybrid interaction methods, enabling users to perform simple tasks via chat-based AI interactions while seamlessly handling more complex operations through direct dApp integration using WalletConnect. Operating on the Base Network, it provides an innovative solution for both casual and advanced crypto users. With PalWallet, users gain a flexible and efficient way to interact with blockchain networks, bridging the gap between AI-driven automation and direct transaction execution.How it's Made Coinbase AgentKit: AI agent framework used to handle blockchain operations. Added a custom handler for transaction simulation mock and direct transaction execution via WalletConnect. This demonstrates a new architecture solution for AI-powered crypto agents. Autonome: Decentralized hosting platform for AI agents. Successfully integrated the Autonome backend with a custom frontend, providing an intuitive user interface for seamless chatbot interaction. Base Network: The primary blockchain network used for transactions. Hybrid Interaction Methods (dApps Fusion): Simple operations can be streamlined through chat-based AI interactions, but most users require complex operations to gain real benefits‚Äîsuch as integrating with new protocols or handling advanced scenarios. This hybrid interaction system enables both approaches, bridging user needs with the capabilities of the crypto AI agent.
summary: PalWallet is an AI-powered crypto agent that seamlessly integrates intelligent automation with direct user control. It enables customizable transactions, chat-based commands, and dApp interactions through WalletConnect, offering a hybrid approach to blockchain operations.
