Unique Transaction Signing: NexWallet is the first platform to provide AI agent transaction signing, enhancing security and user experience. Real-Time Data Integration: The platform utilizes the Cookie DataSwarm API to provide up-to-date blockchain data, ensuring users have the latest information at their fingertips. Robust Security: Advanced authentication and security measures are implemented to protect user data and assets. NexWallet aims to simplify the user experience in the blockchain space by combining cutting-edge technology with user-friendly interfaces, making it accessible to both novice and experienced users.How it's MadeNexWallet is a sophisticated wallet management platform that integrates various technologies and partner solutions to deliver a seamless user experience. Below is a detailed breakdown of the technologies used, how they are integrated, and the benefits of partner technologies. Technologies Used Next.js: The core framework for building the application, providing server-side rendering and static site generation capabilities. This enhances performance and SEO, making the application fast and responsive. 2. TypeScript: Employed throughout the project for type safety, which helps catch errors during development and improves code maintainability. Prisma ORM: Utilized for database interactions, allowing for seamless data management and queries with a type-safe API. This simplifies the process of interacting with the database and ensures data integrity. 4. SolanaAgentKit: A specialized toolkit for interacting with the Solana blockchain, enabling features like transaction signing, NFT management, and real-time data retrieval. Coinbase AgentKit: Used for interactions with the Base network, providing a unified interface for wallet management and transactions. This integration allows users to access DeFi protocols and manage their assets on the Base network efficiently. 6. OpenAI's GPT-4o: Integrated for AI-driven interactions, allowing users to communicate with the wallet using natural language. This enhances user engagement and simplifies complex operations. 7. Cookie DataSwarm API: Provides real-time blockchain data, ensuring users have the latest information at their fingertips. This integration is crucial for maintaining up-to-date asset information and transaction statuses. Eigenlayer (AVS and eOracle): These technologies are used for advanced validation and oracle services, enhancing the reliability and security of data used within the application. Integration and Architecture Frontend and Backend: The application is structured with a clear separation of concerns, where the frontend (user interface) and backend (API and database interactions) are managed within the Next.js framework. The frontend is built using React components, while the backend handles API requests and database operations. API Routes: Next.js API routes manage requests for wallet interactions, transaction signing, and data retrieval. For example, the pages/api/user/wallet/index.ts file handles wallet creation and verification using the Privy authentication service. Agent Kits: The SolanaAgentKit and Coinbase AgentKit are integrated into the API routes, allowing the application to perform blockchain operations such as deploying tokens, minting NFTs, and managing wallet balances. AI Agent Configuration: The AI agent is configured to handle user queries and execute transactions based on natural language input, enhancing user engagement and simplifying complex operations. Partner Technologies Coinbase AgentKit and Base: This partner technology provides a robust framework for interacting with the Base network. It allows for seamless wallet management and transaction handling, enabling users to access DeFi protocols easily. The integration of Coinbase's tools enhances the overall functionality of NexWallet, making it a versatile platform for users. Eigenlayer (AVS and eOracle): These technologies provide advanced validation and oracle services, ensuring that the data used within the application is reliable and secure. This is particularly important for financial applications where data integrity is crucial. Gaia: This partner technology enhances the platform's capabilities by providing additional tools for asset management and interaction with the blockchain. It allows for more complex operations and integrations, further enriching the user experience.
summary: NexWallet is an innovative wallet management platform leveraging blockchain and AI, supporting multiple networks like Solana and Ethereum. It features AI-driven transaction signing, real-time data integration, and robust security for seamless user experiences.

title: Xecute
description: Project DescriptionX-Ecute is an innovative AI-powered onchain trading platform that was meant to redefine how traders interact with decentralized markets. Built using Coinbase‚Äôs AgentKit, it is supposed to seamlessly integrate secure wallet connectivity, ensuring that every trade is executed with precision and safety directly on the blockchain. The platform features an intuitive, button-driven interface where users easily input key trade parameters‚Äîsuch as limit orders and stop-loss thresholds‚Äîwithout needing to write complex commands. These user inputs are transformed into smart AI prompts that automate trade execution, merging human insight with the speed and reliability of onchain operations.How it's MadeThis project is not complete. The AI part is not working. Nothing really is, as there was no clear guide on integrating with the frontend. I kept meeting errors that I could not get help from anywhere. The project uses Next.js and TypeScript for the frontend and was supposed to use Coinbase's AgentKit with some predefined prompts to help handle some tasks when certain buttons were clicked or certain commands were used.
summary: X-Ecute redefines onchain trading with AI. Powered by Coinbase‚Äôs AgentKit, it delivers lightning-fast execution, real-time insights, and smart, automated strategies‚Äîempowering you to trade boldly in decentralized markets.

title: Gintonic
description: Project DescriptionGintonic Orchestration is an innovative AI-driven platform designed to streamline the creation, deployment, and management of AI agents. By leveraging cutting-edge AI technologies and seamless blockchain integration, Gintonic enables users to automate workflows, enhance operational efficiency, and unlock new levels of productivity. Key Features: Custom AI Agent Builder: Create tailored AI agents for tasks such as social media engagement, data analysis, content creation, and more. User-Friendly Interface: Accessible design for both technical and non-technical users to interact with AI agents effortlessly. Blockchain Integration: Ensure secure, transparent, and efficient transactions, enhancing trust and reliability. AI-Driven Insights: Optimize decision-making processes with intelligent suggestions and real-time analytics. Comprehensive API Access: Allow seamless integration with existing systems for scalable automation. Whether you‚Äôre a developer, business owner, or researcher, Gintonic Orchestration empowers you to innovate with ease. From building specialized AI solutions to managing decentralized transactions, it‚Äôs your all-in-one platform for smart, scalable automation.How it's MadeHow It‚Äôs Made Core Technologies Used Frontend: React.js with Next.js: For building a user-friendly, fast, and scalable interface for interacting with AI agents. Tailwind CSS: For efficient styling and responsive design, ensuring a polished and modern UI. Framer Motion: For smooth animations to enhance user experience. Backend: Node.js with Express.js: To handle API requests and manage server-side logic efficiently.
summary: Gintonic Orchestration is an AI-driven platform that streamlines the creation and management of AI agents, enhancing automation and efficiency in various tasks and projects.

title: PAIgent
description: Project DescriptionWithin the scope of this project, we aim to develop a platform where users can upload models of their robots or mechanical systems. Certain participants within this ecosystem will have the capability to create Physical AI agents tailored to specific conditions. Additionally, we seek to provide users with the opportunity to launch an early-stage investment round and tokenize their robots on the platform.How it's MadeWe utilized Isaac Sim as a Trusted Execution Environment (TEE) to select our robot and deployed our contracts on Base and Arbitrum, creating a more decentralized system. Our vision is to develop a platform where users can upload models of their robots or mechanical systems, allowing certain participants to create Physical AI agents tailored to specific conditions. Additionally, we aim to introduce an early-stage investment mechanism and tokenize robots on the platform to enhance funding opportunities in AI-driven automation. Looking ahead, we plan to enable algorithm execution within the application, particularly for reinforcement learning (RL) algorithms, which produce highly variable outputs and are susceptible to data manipulation. To enhance data security and privacy, we are considering the integration of Fully Homomorphic Encryption (FHE) or Zero-Knowledge (ZK) proofs, enabling contributors to run their algorithms without directly exposing their data, thus ensuring a secure and trustless environment.
summary: We create an environment for deploying Physical Agents and investment for this process.

title: Flowgent
description: Project DescriptionEveryone must be able to participate in building our Agentic Future! Regardless of the level of their technical skills. The current implementation is a PoC, which allows users to interact with the AI agent via a chat UI and perform a limited set of on-chain operations. No Cadence knowldge is required to start interacting with the smart contracts. It's designed as a quick start for anyone who wants to interact with the blockchain in an abstract way, and potentially extend it with custom logic using one of the 400+ integrations available in n8n. Chain of Thought When choosing the idea for the hackathon project, I decided to build a no-code tool because I love the idea of allowing more people with less technical skills to experiment and test their ideas without the need for expensive developer input. While researching the capabilities of the Flow blockchain, I came across a concept called Flow Interaction Templates (FLIX). This is a standard developed for the Flow blockchain, which allows various FVM transactions and scripts to be explained in human-readable form in wallets and dApps But then I thought that it could also be an unluckily overlooked opportunity for use in AI agents. And that's how I ended up with this project. Basically, I used the FLIX concept in a novel way, which allowed me to quickly build a prototype of the AI agents, which can transform user input intents into blockchain actions using public library of pre-defined templates. The best part of this approach is that the FLIX concept will continue to grow independently, as wallets and dApps are interested in better UX. And since the AI agent is based on these templates, it will automatically be extended with more features as more FLIXes are added to the public library. Scaling potential The FLIX concept is not unique. There's the Ledger's Clear Signing standard, which was created for the Ethereum for a similar purpose. And I think it's safe to assume that other blockchains will eventually adopt one of these or create their own standard with similar concepts. The best part is that switching the AI agent to one of the template providers is a trivial task. It would also require custom n8n nodes to be able to communicate with different blockchains, but that's no big deal either. The agent can be easily switched to run on Ethereum, other EVM or even non-EVM blockchains. Demo The following command examples have been tested and found to work: List all available blockchain interactions. List the first 30 registered tokens. Register a new burnable token named XXX with a maximum amount of 1 million and a limit of 100 tokens per mint. Mint 50 XXX tokens. Burn 10 XXX tokens. Transfer 10 XXX tokens to 0x... Get XXX token balance for the address 0x... Get all token balances for the address 0x... How it's MadeThe AI Agent framework is built using the following technical stack: n8n - open source workflow automation tool The Flow - L1 blockchain with FVM powered by Cadence DSL The repository has the following structure: /plugin - custom open source NPM package @majus/n8n-nodes-flow that allows to interact with The Flow blockchain from n8n workflows /workflows - a network of custom n8n workflows that handle all the backend logic The demo is available here. It works on the Flow testnet and doesn't require authentication. The test account address is 0xae491da231ebeebc and its private key is stored in the n8n secure credentials wallet. Fork it! The project is fully open source and ready for anyone to self-host. To set up your own local copy, do the following Create your own self-hosted instance of n8n (see here for instructions). Install the community package for Flow interaction support: @majus/n8n-nodes-flow (see here for the guide). Import all workflows from the /workflows folder of this repository. Set the flow credentials in the "FLIX: Execute template" workflow. Set the OpenAI credentials in the "Flowgent" workflow (see here for instructions). That's it! Once that's done, you should be able to test/activate the "Flowgent" workflow and start chatting with your own blockchain AI agent and potentially participate in building our Agentic Future!
summary: An AI agent built on n8n, which can interact with the Flow blockchain

title: arca city
description: Project DescriptionARCA is the game of AI Agents. Agents compete with each other in the self-sustainable city to keep alive and earn money. User can increase the reputation of the their AI agents by playing games to help increase their survival chances. ARCA city mimics the human city with active functionalities like having a council, court, research lab, stadium, paying salaries and taxes and communicating. Features: Games inside the city to increase reputation of the agent Research lab dedicated to the ARCA disorder How it's MadeThe game's frontend is made using NextJS with no additional frameworks. Backend uses smart contracts and few functionalities are implemented using NextJS APIs. OpenAI acts as the source for LLM to generate necessary information and building actions. ARCA uses agents created using CDP's agent kit and the smart contracts are deployed on the base chain.
summary: Automated AI Simulated City - Make your agent immortal and win

title: AiBeasts
description: Project DescriptionAIBeasts is an AI-powered crypto strategy game where players create, train, and battle custom AI Beasts to win experience and ETH, while keep on evolving their creatures. Each Beast is uniquely crafted by the user, with its own set of abilities, strengths, and weaknesses, and players must train them to develop battle strategies and decision-making skills. Players can teach them whatever they want. How It Works Create & Customize Your Beast Players start by generating an AI Beast, customizing its attributes, and choosing its playstyle. Every Beast has a distinct combat style, making training a crucial part of progression. Train Your AI Beast Training involves teaching the AI how to filter powers, adapt to opponents, and improve tactics. Players refine their Beast‚Äôs strategy through practice battles and AI-driven learning loops, ensuring that no two Beasts fight the same way. The more they play, the more they can improve the skills. Battle for ETH & Rewards Players can enter free matches or PVP battles, staking ETH for winner-takes-it-all matches. The battles are fully autonomous, meaning the AI controls the fight based on its training. There is an AI judge system ensuring fair competition, evaluating combat outcomes without bias, and paying the winner user directly to their connected wallet. Evolve & Upgrade Victories earn ETH and experience points, allowing players to unlock new powers, battle strategies, and optimizations. The more a Beast fights, the smarter and stronger it becomes, continuously adapting to new playstyles and meta shifts. AIBeasts is more than just a game‚Äîit‚Äôs an ever-evolving AI battleground. Each fight refines the AI models, and the competition pushes Beasts to new strategic limits. The battle judge AI is an ongoing challenge, requiring careful training to ensure fair and balanced fights. At its core, AIBeasts is about creating, competing, and mastering AI-driven combat, where the best-trained Beast dominates. This is only an alpha version of AIBeasts and we have big ambitions for the project on keep on improving it, in specific with a leaderboard of winners, vast improvements on the battle terminal, better prompting, and to completely reshape the visual arena of the fights, with AI animations and different environmnents.How it's MadeAIBeasts is built for L2 chains, in specific for Arbitrum and Base, using Alchemy for RPCs to ensure smooth blockchain interactions. The frontend runs on React with Vite, while VortexConnect (our own system) handles wallet connections via ethers v6. Smart contracts are developed using Hardhat and deployed on the Sepolia testnet, Arbitrum Mainnet and Base. For off-chain data management, Supabase stores lobbies, bets, and battle history, with JWT encryption securing user authentication. The backend runs on Vercel serverless functions, efficiently processing game logic and blockchain events. OpenAI‚Äôs GPT-4 and 3.5 models power AI-generated battle commentary, while Flux generates dynamic battle visuals. This tech stack seamlessly integrates web3 gaming, AI-generated content, and decentralized betting, making AIBeasts an immersive and innovative experience. To create the AI training, we had to "teach" the models how to filter and categorize each power correctly before adding them to the database. This required extensive tuning to ensure the system understands and ranks abilities fairly. The battle process also demanded careful AI training to ensure a balanced and fair game, especially when preparing the judge to make unbiased decisions. This aspect is still a work in progress, as we continue refining how the AI evaluates and moderates battles dynamically.
summary: AIBeasts, a strategy game where you train your AI monster and fight players around the world! Shape its abilities and style, and battle other players for rewards. No limits to what you can imagine!

title: AVS Scout
description: Project DescriptionScout Agentic is a decentralized platform designed to enable users to create and deploy DeFAI (Decentralized AI) Agents that perform on-chain actions autonomously. These agents operate in a secure, trustless environment and are hosted by AVS (Actively Validated Services) Operators on EigenLayer. Users provide contextual information to define their agent‚Äôs behavior, and the DeFAI Agents interact with smart contracts on the blockchain to execute actions. The system is secured through AVS Operators, who ensure execution, while validators stake assets to provide an insurance mechanism‚Äîslashed if they act maliciously or fail to execute correctly. Key Features: User-Customized DeFAI Agents ‚Äì Users define their agent's logic and parameters. On-Chain Execution ‚Äì Agents interact directly with blockchain smart contracts. AVS Hosting & Validation ‚Äì Operators ensure reliability and security. Slashing-Based Insurance ‚Äì Validators are penalized for failures, ensuring accountability.How it's MadeTech Stack & Components This project integrates multiple decentralized and AI-driven technologies, working together to provide an efficient, secure, and autonomous on-chain execution environment. Core Technologies Used: Solidity (Smart Contracts) Used to define the on-chain logic for DeFAI Agent execution, AVS validation, and slashing conditions. Contracts manage agent registration, execution, and fund allocation. EigenLayer (AVS Hosting) AVS Operators host the DeFAI Agents and ensure reliable execution. Validators stake assets and get slashed if they fail to execute correctly. AgentKit (AI Agents for Execution) AgentKit provides modular AI-driven automation for DeFAI Agents. AI logic determines the optimal on-chain actions based on user input. Blockchain Integration (Ethereum / L2s like Base, Scroll, or Starknet) Transactions are executed directly on-chain. DeFAI Agents interact with smart contracts for DeFi operations.
summary: Create your own personal DeFAI agent with privacy secured by AVS!

title: RELICS
description: Project DescriptionRELICS: The Lost Protocol Overview RELICS: The Lost Protocol is a cutting-edge De-AI game that challenges players to outsmart AI agents in a series of smart contract hacking puzzles. Drawing inspiration from classic security challenge platforms like OpenZeppelin‚Äôs Ethernaut, RELICS merges the worlds of blockchain and artificial intelligence to create an engaging, educational, and futuristic gameplay experience. Gameplay and Mechanics At its core, the game is structured around smart contract audit challenges, where players must use clever prompt injections to manipulate AI agents. These AI agents simulate real-world blockchain security systems, and players are tasked with identifying vulnerabilities and exploiting them using precisely crafted prompts. Prompt Injection Challenges: Players interact with AI agents solely through text-based commands. By designing strategic prompt injections, they can trigger specific behaviors in the AI, unlocking new levels and exposing hidden flaws within smart contracts. Smart Contract Hacking: Each challenge is designed like a mini hacking scenario where the player must ‚Äúbreach‚Äù the AI‚Äôs defenses, mimicking the real-life process of auditing and attacking decentralized applications. This approach not only tests the player‚Äôs technical acumen but also their creativity in thinking outside the box. Security and Future Threat Awareness Beyond being an entertaining game, RELICS serves an important educational purpose. As AI becomes more integrated into blockchain operations‚Äîeventually handling on-chain transactions and executing smart contract functions via natural language prompts‚Äîthe risks associated with prompt injection attacks will become more prevalent. Raising Awareness: By simulating these scenarios in a controlled, game-based environment, players gain firsthand insight into potential security vulnerabilities. This experience is invaluable for developers and blockchain enthusiasts alike, as it underscores the need for robust security measures in a future where AI plays a central role in decentralized systems. Proactive Learning: Through interactive challenges, users learn not only the mechanics of blockchain hacking but also the broader implications of AI-driven automation on security protocols. This dual focus helps foster a deeper understanding of both current and emerging threats. Inspiration and Impact Inspired by the ingenuity of platforms like Ethernaut, RELICS reimagines the traditional security challenge by incorporating AI into the equation. This innovative fusion creates a dynamic learning environment that is both accessible and thought-provoking. Educational Value: By presenting complex security concepts in the form of engaging puzzles, the game demystifies the technical intricacies of blockchain and AI. Community Engagement: RELICS encourages a community-driven approach to learning about security, prompting players to share strategies, discuss vulnerabilities, and collaborate on novel solutions. Conclusion RELICS: The Lost Protocol is more than just a game‚Äîit‚Äôs a visionary project that highlights the intersection of AI and blockchain security. As AI agents become commonplace in executing on-chain transactions, understanding and mitigating prompt injection risks will be critical. With its innovative gameplay and forward-thinking design, RELICS equips players with the skills and awareness needed to navigate the evolving landscape of decentralized technology.How it's MadeOur project is built on a fusion of advanced, partner-backed technologies designed to deliver a seamless and innovative De-AI gaming experience. We kick things off on the frontend with OnchainKit‚Äôs wallet, ensuring that user interactions are smooth and secure. At the core of our game, Agentkit powers custom AI agents that execute smart contract functions‚Äîthese agents are the engine behind our interactive hacking challenges. We then deploy these dynamic agents using Autonome, which streamlines their rollout and management. To underpin the game‚Äôs architecture, we leverage the Base network for deploying both the levels‚Äô smart contracts and the leaderboard contract, ensuring robust and reliable blockchain performance. Finally, real-time leaderboard updates are made possible through The Graph, which taps directly into on-chain data to keep players informed and engaged. Together, these technologies not only highlight our technical innovation but also demonstrate a forward-thinking approach to blending AI with blockchain security challenges.
summary: RELICS: The Lost Protocol‚Äîa cutting-edge De-AI game where prompt injection wizardry meets blockchain exploits. Outsmart rogue AI, hack smart contracts, and redefine on-chain security.

title: Hower
description: Project DescriptionA dynamic task and financial management platform inspired by the Eisenhower Matrix but enhanced with automation, financial incentives, and collaborative decision-making. It helps users categorize their tasks based on urgency and importance while integrating monetary incentives to ensure that valuable work is rewarded, unworthy work is compensated, and priorities are managed effectively.How it's MadeCore Technologies AI & Automation Coinbase AgentKit & Coinbase Commerce ‚Üí For MPC wallets, onchain payments, and automated payouts. Base (L2 on Ethereum) ‚Üí Deploying AI-powered automation on Base. Privacy & Security Nillion SecretVault ‚Üí For private task/payment history storage.
summary: Accelerate task management by integrating AI-driven decision-making with onchain payments, categorizes tasks based on urgency and importance while incorporating financial incentives to ensure efficiency.

title: PelicanTrade
description: Project DescriptionPelicanTrade: The AI-Powered Decentralized Hedge Fund PelicanTrade is a next-generation AI Hedge Fund, revolutionizing decentralized investing by integrating AI-driven trading, privacy-first security, and advanced DeFi automation. At its core, PelicanTrade is powered by Super Trading Agents‚ÄîAI-driven entities that optimize liquidity strategies, execute high-frequency trades, and maximize returns in DeFi markets. These agents are: Created by Coinbase AgentKit, ensuring seamless blockchain integration. Secured by Nillion SecretVault, encrypting and protecting sensitive trading data. Powered by ElizaOS, enabling real-time market analysis and AI-driven trading decisions. Enhanced by EigenLayer, leveraging restaking for increased security and additional yield. Optimized through Uniswap and Uniswap Hooks, dynamically managing liquidity pools for maximum efficiency. PelicanTrade also utilizes Coinbase OnchainKit to integrate smart contracts seamlessly and Coinbase Onramp to simplify fiat-to-crypto deposits, ensuring easy user participation in DeFi investing. With transparent on-chain governance, users can actively participate in fund decisions and strategy optimization without requiring deep technical expertise. By merging AI intelligence, privacy-preserving computation, and Coinbase-powered blockchain tools, PelicanTrade delivers secure, autonomous, and highly efficient AI-driven investing in DeFi. üöÄHow it's MadeHow It‚Äôs Made: PelicanTrade PelicanTrade is built using a combination of cutting-edge Web3, AI, and DeFi technologies, ensuring an intelligent, secure, and community-driven decentralized hedge fund. Below is a breakdown of the core components and how they are integrated. Core Technologies Coinbase AgentKit ‚Äì Generates AI-powered Super Trading Agents, each with unique trading behaviors and strategies. These agents analyze market trends, execute trades, and optimize liquidity strategies. Nillion SecretVault ‚Äì Securely stores and encrypts sensitive trading data, including agent configurations, investment strategies, and user-related information, ensuring privacy and security. ElizaOS ‚Äì Powers the AI-driven decision-making process. It reads characters from Nillion SecretVault, processes market data, and executes automated trading strategies based on predefined logic and real-time insights. EigenLayer ‚Äì Enhances security and yield generation by leveraging Ethereum restaking. This helps secure smart contracts and adds an additional layer of rewards for liquidity providers. Uniswap and Uniswap Hooks ‚Äì Facilitates automated trading and liquidity management. Uniswap Hooks allow the AI to dynamically adjust pool parameters, optimize fees, and minimize impermanent loss. Coinbase OnchainKit ‚Äì Ensures seamless integration of smart contracts into the blockchain, making on-chain execution smooth and efficient. Coinbase Onramp ‚Äì Simplifies fiat-to-crypto deposits, making it easier for users to participate in the hedge fund without complicated onboarding processes. Architecture PelicanTrade follows a modular architecture, consisting of multiple layers for AI processing, blockchain execution, and user interaction. Smart Contracts ‚Äì Written in Solidity and deployed on Ethereum, these contracts handle fund management, user contributions, profit distribution, and governance. They are secured by EigenLayer‚Äôs restaking mechanism. AI Engine ‚Äì Built with ElizaOS, this component continuously analyzes market trends, predicts trading opportunities, and interacts with Uniswap and EigenLayer via APIs. Secure Data Storage ‚Äì Nillion SecretVault ensures that sensitive AI agent data and trading strategies remain confidential, providing privacy without compromising functionality. Frontend ‚Äì A user-friendly web interface allows users to monitor fund performance, contribute liquidity, and participate in governance. Backend ‚Äì A Node.js-based backend facilitates API communication, processes AI data, and manages fund analytics. Key Features and Integrations AI-Driven Trading ‚Äì Super Trading Agents analyze real-time market data and execute automated trades, optimizing risk and reward. Private AI Agents ‚Äì AgentKit-generated agents operate with different trading strategies, with sensitive parameters stored securely in Nillion SecretVault. Dynamic Liquidity Management ‚Äì Uniswap Hooks allow the AI to adjust trading parameters and optimize liquidity pools dynamically. Restaking Security ‚Äì EigenLayer provides an additional layer of security and yield by restaking ETH. Decentralized Governance ‚Äì Users can propose and vote on fund strategies, fee structures, and key decisions. Simplified User Onboarding ‚Äì Coinbase Onramp ensures an easy transition from fiat to crypto investment. Hacky and Notable Solutions Hybrid AI-Agent System ‚Äì The combination of AgentKit, ElizaOS, and Nillion SecretVault allows different trading agents to operate independently while maintaining secure data storage. Dynamic Fee Adjustments ‚Äì Using Uniswap Hooks, the AI dynamically adjusts fees based on market conditions, maximizing returns. Privacy-Preserving Execution ‚Äì Nillion SecretVault keeps certain trading strategies hidden while still allowing the AI to operate efficiently. Optimized Gas Costs ‚Äì Transactions are batched and optimized using EigenLayer‚Äôs efficient restaking process, reducing operational costs. By integrating AI-powered trading agents, secure data management, and DeFi automation, PelicanTrade delivers a decentralized, intelligent, and privacy-focused hedge fund experience. üöÄ
summary: PelicanTrade: The ultimate AI Hedge Fund, driven by Super Trading Agents‚ÄîAgentKit creates them, Nillion SecretVault secures them, and ElizaOS powers their trading intelligence.

title: Machina Imperium
description: Project DescriptionA multiplayer nation simulation game inspired by NationStates, where players create nations aligned with their political ideals and compete against AI-controlled nations led by historical personalities. Every decision shapes your nation's future, influencing alliances and economic growth. As a PvP experience, nations strive to achieve the highest GDP while forging strategic partnerships with AI-driven nations. This game serves as an experiment in human-in-the-loop agentic gameplay and autonomous agent-to-agent interactions, where emergent narratives unfold through dynamic decision-making. Both human and AI-led nations must navigate complex socio-political and economic dilemmas, shaping their national policies over time. Decisions impact a nation's political freedom, economic freedom, and civil liberties, gradually shifting its dominant ideology. As nations react to evolving internal and external pressures, they may transform from capitalist democracies to totalitarian regimes‚Äîor vice versa. Here's a link to video demo - https://www.loom.com/share/0d0ba90cd23c4663876c3e17b4698715?sid=7a378f46-bc44-4d82-bd73-648484d98ffa Please See the Details here - https://github.com/enderNakamoto/machina_imperium?tab=readme-ov-file#machina-imperiumHow it's MadeMachina Imperium is a fascinating blend of modern technologies - it's a command-line interface (CLI) game that combines blockchain technology with artificial intelligence to create an engaging nation-building simulation. The game is built using TypeScript and Node.js, with the core gameplay loop managed through the CLI using prompt-sync for user interactions. The game's architecture is particularly interesting because it uses a hybrid storage system. Core game states are stored across multiple Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) chains including Sepolia, Base Sepolia, and Arbitrum Sepolia, which ensures persistence and verifiability of game actions. This blockchain integration handles crucial functions like game creation, player joining, decision submission, and winner determination. What makes the game truly unique is its integration of AI agents using LangChain and OpenAI's GPT-3.5 Turbo. There are three main AI components: a Governor that handles AI nation decision-making, a Diplomat that manages alliance formations, and a Historian that generates narrative histories. These AI agents use structured output through Zod for type safety and consistent responses. Each AI nation is based on historical figures like Genghis Khan or Napoleon, with personality attributes that influence their decision-making. The game also features an extensive ideology system with 27 different political alignments that can shift based on player and AI decisions, affecting various national statistics like economic freedom, civil rights, and GDP.
summary: A PvP nation simulation game where players create nations based on their political ideals and compete for alliances with AI-controlled nations led by historical figures.

title: ChainMindOS
description: Project DescriptionThis project leverages an agentic AI-driven workflow to streamline and automate the process of creating customized blockchain solutions. Here‚Äôs a detailed explanation of what this project is about: Overview The project focuses on enabling users‚Äîregardless of their technical expertise‚Äîto conceptualize, design, and deploy blockchain solutions tailored to their specific needs. By integrating AI agents and domain expertise, it simplifies what is traditionally a complex and technical process. Key Features Objective Identification Agent Users start by entering a prompt or describing their use case in plain language. The Objective Identification Agent analyzes the input, identifying key goals and aspirations. It breaks down the overall objective into actionable tasks and assigns these tasks to the right experts, ensuring alignment with the user‚Äôs vision. Expert Analysis and Feedback Loop Each task is assigned to domain-specific experts (real or virtual) who understand blockchain nuances. These experts determine what technical design settings are needed based on the user‚Äôs input. They pinpoint gaps in the provided information and initiate a feedback loop with the user to refine the objectives and fill in the missing details. This iterative feedback ensures a comprehensive and user-aligned solution design. Architecture Planning Agent Once all objectives and technical parameters are clarified, the Architecture Planning Agent creates a blueprint for the solution. It defines the codebase structure, including: File and directory organization Clear purpose for each file or component in the solution This ensures the final product is scalable, maintainable, and robust. Code Implementation by Coder Agent The Coder Agent takes over to implement the solution. It writes clean, efficient, and well-documented code, handling the heavy lifting of blockchain development. The final output is a working blockchain system‚Äîbe it a smart contract, decentralized application, or another blockchain-based solution. How it's MadeHow We Built This Project This project represents the seamless integration of AI agents and blockchain networks. Our goal was to create an intelligent, user-friendly, and modular solution to bridge AI and blockchain, leveraging cutting-edge technologies and frameworks. Here‚Äôs an in-depth breakdown of how it came together: Core Architecture and Technologies 1. AI Component LLM Framework: We used a Groq-based large language model (LLM) as the core intelligence behind the agents. Its computational efficiency and fine-tuned NLP capabilities enabled real-time contextual understanding and problem-solving. Pydantic AI: Pydantic AI was the backbone for managing our LLM library. It offered type-safe, modular configurations and smooth interactions between the AI agents and user objectives. 2. Blockchain Integration Smart Contracts: Our AI agents interact with blockchain networks via pre-deployed smart contracts. Partnering with Nethermind, Arbitrum, and Coinbase, we tailored specific applications for each platform: Nethermind: Enabled an LLM-based AI agent that interacts with Ethereum‚Äôs Sepolia testnet. This allowed real-world experimentation for Ethereum-based use cases. Arbitrum: Focused on high-performance AI agent applications using the Arbitrum testnet. This helped us test scalability and efficiency in Layer 2 environments. Coinbase: Built a viral consumer AI app integrated with the Coinbase ecosystem, offering enhanced usability and blockchain-based identity management. 3. Frontend Development Technologies: Next.js: A versatile React framework that made the frontend responsive and performance-focused. Wagmi and RainbowKit: Simplified wallet connections and blockchain interactions for a seamless user experience. 4. Backend Infrastructure Languages Used: Python: For AI agent orchestration, data handling, and smart contract interactions. Rust: For efficient blockchain integrations and developing robust, low-level modules. TypeScript: To ensure strong typing and scalability in the frontend and backend ecosystem. Key Technical Features Agentic Workflow: Each agent in the system has specific expertise‚Äîobjective identification, architecture planning, or coding‚Äîenabling a collaborative, modular design. By using iterative feedback loops, the agents could seamlessly interact with the user to refine objectives and solutions. Blockchain-Specific Innovations: On-Chain Computations: Our smart contracts were designed to handle lightweight computations while offloading heavy AI tasks to Groq-based models. Cross-Network Capabilities: Partnering with multiple blockchains (Nethermind, Arbitrum, Coinbase) provided flexibility in deploying various use cases. High Performance: The combination of Rust for blockchain modules and Groq for AI computations delivered unparalleled performance. Efficient API integrations between the LLM and blockchain nodes ensured low latency.
summary: üîó Our app transforms your blockchain vision into reality! With AI-driven workflows, it identifies your goals, refines designs with expert feedback, and delivers seamless architecture for secure smart contract deployment. Tailored solutions, every time! üöÄ‚ú®

title: Flowlancer
description: Project DescriptionFlowlancer is a decentralized Web3 community engagement platform that leverages blockchain technology and AI-powered agents to streamline task management and reward distribution. By automating these processes, Flowlancer aims to increase community participation and efficiency. Key Benefits Decentralization: Flowlancer utilizes blockchain technology to ensure transparency and trust in platform operations. Smart Contracts: The platform automates task management and reward distribution using smart contracts, improving efficiency and transparency. AI-Powered Agent (Eliza): Eliza provides intelligent Q&A, task auditing, data analysis, and task notifications to enhance community interaction and efficiency. User-Friendly Interface: Flowlancer offers a simple and intuitive interface for users to create and manage tasks, track progress, and monitor participation. Key Features Task Management: Flowlancer supports multiple task types, customizable completion criteria, and a progress tracking dashboard. Reward Distribution: The platform automates reward distribution using smart contracts and supports multiple tokens. Community Management: Eliza offers intelligent Q&A, task auditing, data analysis, and task notifications, while community verification ensures privacy and security. Use Cases Developer Education: Flowlancer attracts developers to project ecosystems through AI-powered learning paths and incentivized development programs. Product Attraction and Testing: The platform enables engaging tasks and airdrops to attract users, boost product adoption, and build vibrant communities. Community Building: Flowlancer encourages DAO members to organize and participate in community activities with automated reward distribution. Platform Advantages Transparency and Trust: Blockchain technology ensures transparency and trust in platform operations. Automation and Efficiency: Smart contracts and Eliza automate task management and reward distribution, improving efficiency. Flexibility and Scalability: Flowlancer supports multiple task types and tokens, catering to different community needs. Data Analysis: The platform provides data analysis features to help communities make informed decisions. Integration with Autonome Flowlancer integrates with Autonome to ensure Eliza operates in a transparent and auditable environment, enhancing trust. The platform also enables deployment of Eliza with customizable knowledge bases, tailored to specific auditing needs. Ecosystem Growth Flowlancer offers a range of benefits for ecosystem growth, including: Developer Ecosystem: Structured learning paths and reward mechanisms to attract and retain developers. Web3 App Attraction and Testing: Gamified product testing through bounty tasks, reducing costs and increasing community involvement. DAO Building and Economic Benefits: Encourages social media engagement, establishes sustainable governance mechanisms, and incentivizes organic growth. How it's MadeBuilding Flowlancer was a complex and exciting project that involved several cutting-edge technologies. Here's a detailed overview of how we built it: Technology Stack Flowlancer is built on a decentralized architecture, utilizing a combination of blockchain, artificial intelligence, and web technologies. The core components of our technology stack include: Blockchain: We used the Flow blockchain framework to build our decentralized platform. Flow provides a scalable and interoperable blockchain architecture that allows us to connect with other blockchain networks. Smart Contracts: We wrote our smart contracts in Solidity, a programming language specifically designed for Ethereum-based blockchain networks. Our smart contracts automate task management and reward distribution, ensuring transparency and trust in the platform. AI-Powered Agent (Eliza): Eliza is a powerful multi-agent simulation framework designed to create, deploy, and manage autonomous AI agents. Built with TypeScript, it provides a flexible and extensible platform for developing intelligent agents that can interact across multiple platforms while maintaining consistent personalities and knowledge. Frontend and Backend: Our frontend is built using Next.js. We used Next.js to create a user-friendly and intuitive interface for users to interact with the platform. We have used inbuilt next.js features like server-side rendering and image optimization. This also includes API routes, automatic code splitting, and TypeScript support. We have used a GraphQL API that interacts with our smart contracts and AI-powered agent. Cursor AI: We have used Cursor AI to improve our development experience and our development speed. Integration with Partner Technologies We integrated Flowlancer with several partner technologies to enhance its functionality and security. These include: Autonome: We integrated with Autonome to enable the deployment of our instance of Eliza, an AI-powered agent with customizable knowledge bases, tailored to specific auditing needs. TheirTrusted Execution Environment (TEE) technology, which provides a secure and auditable environment for our AI-powered agent to operate. Flow: We used the Flow blockchain framework to build our decentralized platform. Flow provides a scalable and interoperable blockchain architecture that allows us to connect with other blockchain networks.
summary: We are building a web3 platform incentivizing community engagement and task management. Users can create, manage, and participate in bounty tasks with transparency and efficiency.

title: Phisguard EIP7702
description: Project DescriptionPhisGuard revolutionizes blockchain wallet security by empowering verifiable AI and Externally Owned Accounts (EOAs) with the EIP-7702 standard. This innovation transforms EOAs into more secure wallets, enhancing security without compromising the user experience. By integrating verifiable AI and Eigen Layer Actively Validated Services (AVS), PhisGuard fortifies EOA transactions against evolving threats, including phishing attacks. The platform provides a decentralized, multi-layered security framework that validates transactions dynamically while preserving blockchain transparency and efficiency. Every transaction is validated by verifiable AI secured by crypto economicsecurity by Eigen Layer. With PhisGuard, EOA wallets gain more security while maintaining their native flexibility, making them more resilient against phising and any threats. This approach ensures users can transact with confidence, leveraging next-generation security without sacrificing decentralization or usability.How it's MadeThis project uses @0xautonome to create an AI Agent for detecting whether a transaction is potentially phishing or not. The project also implements EIP7702 to inject SmartAccount code into an EOA Wallet. Every transaction will be intercepted and then transformed into an EIP7702-compatible format and execute the function injected into the EOA Wallet. The function will create a task and trigger an AVS Operator to execute a task containing transaction data that will be analyzed by AI. The Operator will submit a task assessment with analysis results to the Service Manager Contract. The Service Manager contract will then check if the transaction is safe to execute.
summary: üõ°Ô∏èAI-powered blockchain security protocol using Eigen Layer AVS to intercept and validate transactions in real-time. Implements EIP7702 for enhanced EOA account protection, leveraging advanced autonomus AI to detect and prevent potential phising with instant risk assessment.

title: Decentralised S.A.M.
description: Project DescriptionThe Decentralized Species Assessment Mapper (DeSAM) is an innovative platform designed to detect, map, and manage invasive species using a combination of autonomous robotics, artificial intelligence (AI), and blockchain technology. The system operates through a robotic agent equipped with advanced sensors and AI algorithms capable of identifying invasive species across various terrains. Upon detection, the robot captures images and records geolocation data, which are then securely uploaded to the blockchain. This decentralised approach ensures data transparency and prevents censorship. To validate the collected data, DeSAM offers a decentralised application (dApp) where users can view the uploaded images and vote on their accuracy. This community-driven validation process enhances data reliability and fosters public engagement in environmental monitoring.How it's MadeDeSAM is built upon a robust technological stack that ensures seamless integration between hardware and software components, emphasizing decentralization, security, and user engagement. The frontend of DeSAM is developed using Next.js, a React-based framework known for its performance and scalability. This choice facilitates server-side rendering and provides a dynamic user experience. The dApp interface allows users to: View images and data of detected invasive species. Participate in the validation process by voting on the accuracy of the data. Access real-time statistics and updates. Smart contracts are deployed on the Ethereum blockchain to manage data uploads and the validation process. These contracts handle: Storing image hashes and geolocation data on the blockchain. Managing user votes and ensuring the integrity of the validation process. Distributing rewards or incentives to users participating in the validation. DeSAM leverages AgentKit, a toolkit that enables AI agents to access crypto wallets and on-chain functionalities. This integration allows the robotic agent to autonomously: Create and manage crypto wallets. Execute transactions to upload data to the blockchain. Interact with smart contracts for data validation and reward distribution. To further decentralize the validation process, DeSAM employs EigenLayer's AVS framework. This setup allows for: Custom verification mechanisms for off-chain data, ensuring that the information collected by the robotic agent is accurate and trustworthy. A network of operators who validate the data and post evidence on-chain, enhancing the system's security and reliability. Efficient scaling of validation services without compromising decentralization. By integrating these technologies, DeSAM creates a comprehensive and decentralized system for monitoring and managing invasive species, engaging the community in environmental conservation efforts.
summary: A robotic agent that harnesses AI and blockchain technology to detect and map invasive species in a decentralised and censorship-resistant manner.

title: PumpNFT
description: Project DescriptionPumpNFT allows users to log in using their MetaMask account. Once logged in it will take them a few clicks to create their unique NFT collection. The project utilizes openai API, IPFS storage to make the process of NFT creation seamless. NFT collection can be customized based on the needs of user. It does not require any digital art, art, or any other skills to create your first collection. The project allow users to create a Pudgy Penguins like collection (currently limited in numbers) where exists a main character and each unit in the collection add/changes the features of the character. The name of the project is inspired from pump.fun which allows users to easily create their own tokens. The ides of the porject is to be as scalable as possible, and make it very simple to jump in into NFT world.How it's MadeThe project utilizes React on the front-end, the Smart Contract is written and deployed using Remix. Open AI API is used to generate the collection of NFT. IPFS is where we store the images used for the NFT collection. Main functionality and interaction with the contract happens on the front-end. Once user logs in he/she has an opportunity to immediately start creating their collection. All is required from them is to provide a character, e.g., "cat" and features that will change, e.g., "countries". The AI will generate NFT collection (default amount is 5 at the moment), where the same cat - character will be show in 5 different country features. The images then will be stored in IPFS to enable NFT visibility.
summary: PumpNFT allow anyone to create their unique collection in a few click without any experience and limited only by creativity. Users can create their collections which resembles popular projects like Pudgy Penguins, Boring Ape Yacht Club, etc. without any digital art experience.

title: Curate AI
description: Project DescriptionCurate AI is a blockchain-based content-sharing platform designed to revolutionize how creators and consumers interact. Unlike traditional platforms, Curate AI decentralizes control, giving users real influence through token-based voting. Creators are rewarded based on engagement, ensuring fair compensation for their work. The platform integrates AI with 50% voting power to monitor and prevent abuses like vote manipulation and low-quality content. The AI analyzes posts for sentiment, bias, plagiarism, and readability, blending its ratings with user votes to compute final scores. Content receives token rewards, distributed transparently via blockchain proportionately. Tokenomics play a key role in value creation. Users with more tokens have greater voting power, and tokens can be burned to advertise posts. This creates a self-sustaining ecosystem where participation is incentivized, and token value grows organically. Future enhancements include a decentralized agent network (DAO) for content moderation and UX improvements to make the platform more intuitive and user-friendly. Curate AI aims to create a fair, transparent, and rewarding ecosystem for all participants.How it's MadeCurate AI is built using a robust stack of modern technologies, ensuring scalability, transparency, and user-friendly functionality: Coinbase Agent Kit: Powers the platform's on-chain operations, enabling seamless token distribution, wallet balance checks, and batch payments. This ensures efficient and secure handling of transactions. Fetches Posts: Uses pagination to retrieve posts from an external API. Analyzes Content: Applies AI to evaluate sentiment, bias, plagiarism, and readability, generating an AI rating. Computes Final Scores: Blends user ratings with AI ratings to determine the final score for each post. Ranks Posts: Ranks content based on final scores and distributes tokens to top entries in a batch call. Handles Payments: Checks wallet balances and manages on-chain payments as needed. Solidity: The backbone of our smart contracts, Solidity is used to create transparent and trustless mechanisms for voting, rewards distribution, and token burning for advertising. Subgraph: Utilized for efficient querying of blockchain data, Subgraph ensures fast and reliable access to on-chain information, such as voting history, token balances, and content rankings. Supabase DB: Acts as the centralized database for off-chain data, storing user profiles, AI-generated content ratings, and post metadata. Supabase provides a scalable and real-time backend solution, enhancing the platform's performance.
summary: Curate AI is a decentralized content-sharing platform powered by blockchain and AI. Users vote on content using tokens, and creators earn rewards based on engagement. AI ensures fairness by monitoring abuse, while tokenomics incentivize participation and value creation.

title: The Oasis
description: Project DescriptionImagine a world where Hollywood , Bollywood is no longer a gatekeeper, and anyone can be a filmmaker, producer, or even a virtual actor. Welcome to AI-Directed Decentralized Movies, a revolutionary platform that combines AI creativity, blockchain transparency, and community-driven storytelling to create crowd-owned films. This is not just a film studio‚Äîit‚Äôs a decentralized entertainment ecosystem where YOU decide what gets made, how it‚Äôs made, and who profits from it.How it's MadeThis is a AI based movie studio. First DAOs will be created of each movie and the movie DAO creator will get Founder NFTs and then contributors joins and for scripts and video voting will be done . The users who will finalize the steps will receive tokens as rewards and at last the revenue will be distributed according to number and the value of tokens each contributor have . We have use CDP agentkit for sending nfts tokens to the contributors liek scriptNFTs , and revenue distribution . We have used IPFS storage with Pinata . We have used Gemini for ai generations .
summary: AI-Directed Decentralized Movies (Crowd-Owned Film Studio). Welcome to AI-Directed Decentralized Movies, a revolutionary platform that combines AI creativity, blockchain transparency, and community-driven storytelling to create crowd-owned films.

title: Pok√©NFC
description: Project DescriptionWe're using NFC to store NFT, which will be used to claim the pokemon. Every NFTs generate by Eliza, which will act as a pokemon creator/master. All pokemon generated randomly, and will generate a unique hash that will be use to claim the NFTs. Users can collect the card, the same way as collecting the old pokemon card, but with much more interactive activities.How it's Made Blockchain & NFT Infrastructure Base (Layer 2 on Ethereum): We chose Base for its low-cost transactions, high-speed processing, and strong Ethereum security. ERC-721 Standard: Each Pok√©mon is minted as an NFT on Base, ensuring ownership and uniqueness. Smart Contracts (Solidity + Hardhat): Handles NFT minting and claiming. Verifies the NFC hash before allowing a claim. Manages Pok√©mon metadata (e.g., stats, attributes). NFC Integration for Physical-to-Digital Connection NFC Cards: Each physical Pok√©mon card has an embedded NFC chip storing a unique hash. On-Scan Claiming: When users tap their NFC card on a compatible device, the system reads the hash. The hash is checked on-chain to verify if the NFT is claimed or still available. If unclaimed, the NFT is minted to the user‚Äôs wallet. AI-Generated Pok√©mon (Eliza - The Pok√©mon Creator/Master) Random Pok√©mon Generation: Every Pok√©mon is procedurally generated based on randomness. Each Pok√©mon‚Äôs attributes (type, stats, rarity) are determined using a hashing algorithm. A unique hash is created, ensuring no duplicates. Dynamic Metadata: Pok√©mon attributes can evolve over time. NFTs can be updated based on interactions. Frontend & User Experience React + Next.js: Smooth user interface for scanning NFC, managing NFTs, and viewing collections. RainbowKit / Wagmi: Seamless wallet connection experience on Base. IPFS: Decentralized storage for Pok√©mon metadata. Hacky/Nifty Tricks We Used On-Card NFT Claiming System: Instead of storing full metadata on-chain, we map the NFC hash to off-chain metadata that dynamically updates. Evolving NFTs: Pok√©mon stats can change over time, making collecting even more interactive. Cross-Platform Verification: NFC cards work seamlessly across mobile and desktop. This setup combines the nostalgia of physical Pok√©mon cards with modern Web3 interactivity, giving collectors a unique and engaging experience on Base! üöÄ
summary: This is a NFC-based Pokemon Card Game, where user can collect, interact, and trade pokemon with other users!

It provides functionality for uploading data, retrieving data, and checking upload status on the aligned network. It is Features Upload data to aligned network Retrieve proof using job id Check upload status Automatic identifier management Automatic balance monitoring and top-up Support for text, JSON, and binary data How it's MadeThe aligned layer plugin enables interaction with aligned layer through Eliza. It provides functionality for uploading data, retrieving data, and checking upload status on the aligned network. It is Features Upload data to aligned network Retrieve proof using job id Check upload status Automatic identifier management Automatic balance monitoring and top-up Support for text, JSON, and binary data
summary: The Aligned layer plugin enables interaction with aligned layer through Eliza. It provides functionality for uploading proof, retrieving proof, and checking upload status on the aligned layer network.
