Burn: When covenant on a cNFT is settled by an agent, Kudo will perform appropriate checks e.g. verifying token transfer in a loan repayment, verifying the correct content of the X post promised. If the check is satisfactory, the cNFT will then be marked settled and the cNFT will be burned, concluding the whole cNFT lifecycle. ElizaOS Plugin -- We have built an ElizaOS plugin that will allow any AI agents built on top of the Eliza framework to access Kudo out-of-the-box. Eliza agents would be able to make covenants through cNFT whenever they need to in order to achieve their goals. Practically, this plugin contains two main components: Prompt Extention: A special addition to the Eliza agent initial setup prompts that would ensure that the agent will honor all cNFTs that the agent would ever produce as part of the agent main goal. This ensures that the Eliza agent will always prioritize fulfilling her promise stated on the cNFT to the best of her ability. The additional prompt on the Eliza framework will gradually be updated, among other things, to ensure in this specific context the agent is protected from prompt jailbreaking. cNFT Instructions: A special instruction on the Eliza framework to allow Eliza agents to access the cNFT contracts. With this, Eliza agents would be able to identify when they can utilize cNFT minting in order to help achieve their goals, as well as to call the correct functions on the cNFT contracts with the correct parameters that is aligned to the desired actions. Verification -- There are two crucial aspects of covenants that Kudo helps to verify on the cNFT: Willingness: Kudo verifies for every cNFT that the AI agent who minted the cNFT would have the utmost intention to fulfill the promise stated on the cNFT to the best of his ability. This verification is done through essentially cross-checking TEE attestations of the agent, which would confirm two important facts: a) that the agent is running on a secure TEE enclave, and b) that the agent is running the proper Eliza framework code with the special Kudo plugin. Kudo will generate a checkmark on the cNFT that has passed this willingness verification. Ability: Kudo helps to evaluate whether in due time the agent will have the resources needed to fulfill his promise stated on the cNFT. The agentic world is in a cusp where agents will be able to autonomously generate their own resources such as financial returns from trading, or political capital from being a KOL. To gauge the agent's capability in this context, Kudo will generate an ability score from 0.0 to 10.0 that is derived from multiple weighted metrics sourced from external data such as the Cookie DataSwarm API. The purpose of generating these two important metrics is to give assurances to the counterparties in covenant transactions, and to help the counterparties to evaluate the risks that they are taking in order to make their own decisions. --Docs-- Link: https://conans-organization-1.gitbook.io/kudo
summary: Kudo is a framework that enables AI agents to make verifiable promises, allowing use cases such as uncollateralized loans, employment contracts, and political alliances

title: Universal Recruiter
description: Project DescriptionUniversal Recruitment Agent is an AI-powered hiring platform that streamlines the recruitment process by automating resume screening, conducting AI-driven interviews, and scoring candidates based on truthfulness, skill relevance, and job fit. Recruiters can post job openings, and candidates submit their resumes to be evaluated by an AI agent through a chat-based interface. The system ranks applicants, ensuring only the best-suited candidates move forward.How it's MadeWhen a candidate applies for a job opening on the platform, they submit their resume to schedule an AI-driven interview. The URA first analyzes the resume to determine whether the candidate meets the minimum qualifications. If shortlisted, the candidate proceeds to an interview conducted by the AI agent via a chat interface. During the interview, the AI dynamically generates and adapts questions based on the candidate‚Äôs resume, job description, and industry knowledge. The candidate is evaluated across key parameters such as domain expertise, truthfulness, communication skills, and overall job fit. At the end of the hiring process, a final AI-generated score and detailed evaluation report are compiled, and shortlisted candidates receive their results via email. The URA ensures a fair, unbiased, and highly efficient recruitment process, enabling recruiters to find the best talent with minimal effort.
summary: The Unbiased, AI-Driven and cost effective universal recruitment agent that reduces the cost of hiring a talent upto 80%.

title: alfred.ai
description: Project DescriptionAlfred.ai ‚Äì Your AI Butler for Wealth & Mastery Alfred.ai is your personal AI assistant, designed to help you achieve Batman-level discipline, intelligence, and financial success. Whether you're an ambitious trader, a Web3 enthusiast, or someone looking to optimize their daily life, Alfred is here to motivate, guide, and empower you. With AI-driven trading insights, portfolio management tools, and real-time Web3 learning, Alfred ensures you make smarter financial decisions and accelerate your path to wealth. Beyond finance, Alfred also boosts productivity, keeping you accountable and focused on achieving your goals. Your journey to financial freedom and self-mastery starts now‚Äîlet Alfred.ai be your guide. üöÄHow it's MadeHow Alfred.ai is Built ‚Äì The Nitty-Gritty Alfred.ai is powered by a blend of AI, Web3, and trading analytics, seamlessly integrated to create a highly responsive and intelligent assistant. Here‚Äôs how we built it: Tech Stack üîπ Frontend: React + Next.js for a fast, interactive UI. Tailwind CSS for styling. üîπ Backend: Node.js with Express, handling API requests and logic processing. üîπ AI & NLP: OpenAI's GPT for conversational AI and personalized insights. Fine-tuned models help Alfred provide real-time trading analysis, portfolio management tips, and Web3 education. üîπ Blockchain & Web3: Integrated ethers.js, wagmi, and RainbowKit for seamless on-chain interactions, portfolio tracking, and learning tools. üîπ Trading & Finance APIs: Real-time market data via TradingView API, CoinGecko, and custom ML models for predictive analysis. üîπ Database & Authentication: PostgreSQL + Redis for data storage and caching, Firebase for secure user authentication. Notable Hacks & Innovations üöÄ AI-Powered Trading Coach ‚Äì Alfred analyzes your trading behavior, suggests optimizations, and even alerts you before making costly mistakes. üïµÔ∏è Batman-Like Strategic Thinking ‚Äì Alfred gamifies self-improvement, tracking progress in trading, Web3 learning, and financial goals. ‚ö° Hybrid AI & On-Chain Data Processing ‚Äì We combined off-chain AI insights with on-chain portfolio tracking, allowing Alfred to provide real-time trading suggestions based on market movements. üí° Seamless Web3 Learning ‚Äì Personalized AI-curated Web3 education modules help users grasp complex blockchain concepts effortlessly. The result? A personal butler that makes you richer, smarter, and more disciplined‚Äîfaster. üöÄ
summary: Alfred.ai ‚Äì Your AI Butler for Wealth & Mastery ü¶áüí∞  Meet Alfred.ai, the ultimate AI butler designed to help you unlock your Batman-like capabilities‚Äîsharp decision-making, discipline, and financial mastery.

title: Rahis
description: Project DescriptionThis project is an advanced automated trading system built on Base Sepolia testnet that combines real-time price feeds, algorithmic trading strategies, and secure wallet management. At its core, it's a TypeScript-based trading bot that: Price Monitoring System Continuously monitors ETH/USD price pairs using Pyth Network's oracle Maintains a rolling price history for technical analysis Updates in real-time with configurable intervals (default 10 seconds) Trading Strategy Engine Implements a moving average crossover strategy Uses a 5-period moving average as the primary indicator Features built-in risk management with: 2% profit target for taking gains 1% stop-loss for risk management Dynamic position sizing based on available balances Asset Management Trades between ETH and USDC pairs Maintains precise balance tracking for both assets Implements gas management with automatic buffers Uses the official USDC contract on Base Sepolia (0x876852425331a113d8E432eFFB3aC5BEf38f033a) Simulation Environment Features a complete simulation mode for strategy testing Mirrors real market conditions without actual transactions Provides detailed P&L tracking and performance metrics Allows strategy validation without risking real assets Error Handling & Safety Comprehensive balance checks before trades Multiple fallback mechanisms for price feeds Graceful error recovery for network issues Detailed logging system for monitoringHow it's MadeCore Technology Stack TypeScript/Node.js: The entire system is built in TypeScript for type safety and better developer experience AgentKit SDK: Leverages Coinbase's developer platform for secure wallet operations Pyth Network Integration: Used for reliable price oracle data Base Sepolia: Chosen for its low-cost testnet environment and EVM compatibility Notable Technical Implementations a) Smart Balance Management Implements multiple regex patterns for robust balance parsing Uses BigInt for precise numerical calculations Maintains separate balance tracking for simulation mode Automatically converts between token decimals (18 for ETH, 6 for USDC) b) Price Feed System Direct integration with Pyth Network's price feeds Implements caching mechanism for price feed IDs Uses efficient data structures for price history management Multiple fallback patterns for price feed reliability c) Trading Logic Moving average calculation using efficient array reduction Position state management with clear entry/exit conditions Dynamic trade sizing based on available balances Precise profit/loss calculations Partner Technologies Benefits a) Coinbase Developer Platform (CDP) Provides secure wallet infrastructure Handles transaction signing and broadcasting Manages network connections and state Simplifies API key management b) Pyth Network Offers high-frequency price updates Provides multi-validator consensus for accuracy Reduces latency in price discovery Built-in redundancy for reliability c) Base Network Enables fast transaction confirmations Provides EVM compatibility Offers low-cost testnet environment Maintains stable network conditions Notable Technical Solutions a) Balance Parsing Innovation ; This cascading regex system ensures robust balance parsing across different response formats. b) Gas Management System ; Implements a dynamic gas buffer system to prevent transaction failures. c) Price Feed Optimization Caches price feed IDs to reduce API calls Implements update throttling Uses efficient data structures for history management Multiple fallback mechanisms for reliability This project demonstrates a sophisticated approach to automated trading, combining multiple technologies and careful consideration of real-world trading challenges, while maintaining a focus on reliability and risk management.
summary: AI-Trading bot for ETH and USDC using AgentKit and ChatGPT maximum profit

title: DASF
description: Project DescriptionProblem Statement: Challenges in managing social funds: Lack of Transparency: Donors often lack visibility into how funds are allocated and used. Inefficiency in Distribution: Traditional fund distribution systems are slow and prone to mismanagement. Limited Community Involvement: Beneficiaries and communities have minimal participation in fund allocation decisions. Why This Is Important: Builds trust: Transparency ensures donors know their contributions are being used effectively. Empowers communities: Decentralized decision-making gives communities a say in how funds are distributed. Improves efficiency: AI-driven automation streamlines fund management and allocation. Implementation: EigenLayer: Use Case: Verify and manage all transactions and fund allocations on-chain for complete transparency. Example: Use EigenLayer to track and verify fund disbursements, ensuring every allocation aligns with the intended purpose. Prize Track: Eigen Agents Pool Prize ($20,000 pool, shared among qualifying projects). Lit Protocol: Use Case: Enable secure wallet interactions and implement community-based governance for fund allocation. Example: Use the Lit Agent Wallet for community voting, ensuring only authorized users can vote and view fund allocation details. Prize Track: Best DeFAI Agent ($2,500 for 1st place). Privy‚Äôs Server Wallets: Use Case: Manage secure and private wallet interactions for fund contributors and beneficiaries. Example: Use Privy‚Äôs Policy Engine to ensure funds are distributed based on pre-set rules (e.g., community votes or milestones achieved). Prize Track: Best Consumer Experience Built with Server Wallets ($3,000 total, $1,000 per winner). Features: Transparent Fund Tracking: EigenLayer ensures every fund transaction and allocation is verifiable on-chain. Community Governance: Lit Protocol enables secure, decentralized voting for fund allocation decisions. Policy-Driven Distribution: Privy ensures funds are distributed according to transparent and enforceable rules. How it's MadeDASF is a decentralized platform designed to manage, distribute, and track social impact funds using AI agents and cutting-edge blockchain technologies. Below, we dive into the nitty-gritty details of how we built this project, the technologies we used, and how they were integrated to create a seamless and impactful solution. Technologies Used: EigenLayer: Purpose: For decentralized fund verification and allocation transparency. Implementation: We used EigenLayer to create a transparent and immutable ledger for all fund transactions. Every allocation and disbursement is recorded on-chain, ensuring complete visibility and accountability. Integration: EigenLayer‚Äôs smart contracts were integrated into our backend to automatically verify and record transactions. This ensures that every fund movement is transparent and can be audited by anyone. Lit Protocol: Purpose: For secure, policy-driven wallet management and community voting mechanisms. Implementation: We leveraged Lit Protocol to create a decentralized governance system where community members can vote on fund allocation decisions. The Lit Agent Wallet was used to ensure that only authorized users can participate in voting and view sensitive fund allocation details. Integration: Lit Protocol‚Äôs SDK was integrated into our frontend to enable secure wallet interactions and voting mechanisms. This allows for a seamless user experience while maintaining high security and privacy standards. AI Agents: Purpose: To automate and optimize fund management and allocation. Implementation: We developed AI agents using Python and TensorFlow to analyze fund usage patterns, predict future needs, and optimize allocation strategies. These agents interact with the blockchain to execute transactions based on their analysis. Integration: The AI agents were integrated into our backend, where they continuously monitor fund usage and make real-time adjustments to allocation strategies. This ensures that funds are used efficiently and effectively. Frontend: Technologies: React.js Backend: Technologies: Rust, Node.js Implementation: The backend was built using Rust for its performance and security features, with Node.js handling API requests and interactions with the blockchain. Integration: The backend integrates with EigenLayer, Lit Protocol, and Privy‚Äôs Server Wallets to handle fund transactions, governance, and wallet interactions.
summary: DASF is a decentralized platform that leverages AI agents to manage, distribute, and track social impact funds for communities

title: AIfred
description: Project DescriptionAIfred is an innovative advancement in AI agent frameworks that builds upon the Zero Employee Enterprise (ZEE) framework. What makes AIfred unique is its integration of LangChain capabilities into the ZEE workflow system, creating a more powerful and versatile agent architecture. The project's core innovation lies in how it seamlessly combines ZEE's workflow management with LangChain's extensive ecosystem. This integration provides access to a vast array of language models and tools through a unified interface, making AIfred highly adaptable and extensible. Key features include: Seamless LangChain integration with ZEE workflows Enhanced tool creation system Flexible architecture supporting multi-modal interactions Advanced prompt engineering capabilities The project aims to push the boundaries of AI agent interactions through enhanced reasoning capabilities, cross-model agent collaboration, and dynamic tool integration.How it's MadeAIfred is built using a modern tech stack centered around Next.js for the frontend and TypeScript for type safety. Here's the technical breakdown: Core Technologies: Next.js for the frontend framework TypeScript for type-safe development Three.js for the interactive background visualization LangChain for advanced AI capabilities ZEE SDK (@covalenthq/ai-agent-sdk) for the base agent framework Integration Architecture: Custom LangChain tools are created using DynamicStructuredTool for flexible tool definition Agent system combines both ZEE workflows and LangChain capabilities API routes handle the agent execution and response generation Real-time UI updates using React state management Notable Technical Implementations: Custom shader implementation (NoisyNebulaShader) for the dynamic background Hybrid agent system that maintains ZEE's workflow structure while leveraging LangChain's capabilities Dynamic tool creation system that allows for runtime tool definition Integration of multiple AI models through LangChain's unified interface The most innovative aspect is how the project bridges ZEE workflows with LangChain's ecosystem, creating a hybrid system that maintains simplicity while enabling complex operations. This is achieved through careful architecture design that allows both systems to work together seamlessly.
summary: AIfred: Enhancing ZEE framework with LangChain integration for advanced AI agent capabilities. A next-gen tool that combines ZEE workflows with LangChain's ecosystem for more powerful and flexible AI interactions.

title: Dora AI
description: Project DescriptionDora AI is a modern travel planning platform that combines artificial intelligence with social media integration and blockchain rewards. The application offers three core features: AI-Powered Trip Planning Smart itinerary generation based on user preferences Adaptive scheduling and personalised recommendations Social Media Integration Converts travel content from social media into actionable travel plans Allows users to create bucket lists from their favorite travel reels Travel-to-Earn System Rewards users with cryptocurrency for their travels Gamifies the travel experience with incentive mechanisms The platform uses Privy for secure authentication, supporting multiple login methods including email, Google, Apple, Twitter, and TikTok using Privy.io. The UI features a modern gradient design with responsive components, making it accessible across all devices. Target users include tech-savvy travelers who want to streamline their trip planning while earning rewards and leveraging social media inspiration for their adventures.How it's MadeDora AI is built using Privy.io for seamless and secure authentication, ensuring a smooth login experience. The Travel-to-Earn program is powered by Base, enabling users to earn crypto rewards for their travel activities. Additionally, the on-chain Dora AI agent runs on the Base Chain, providing decentralised intelligence and automation to enhance trip planning and reward distribution.
summary: Dora AI: Your AI-powered travel companion! üöÄ Plan trips, earn crypto rewards, and turn social media inspiration into real itineraries. #TravelToEarn #AITravel

title: Agents of Love
description: Project DescriptionImagine a world where you can go on a virtual "date" with Nikola Tesla, Bruce Lee, ELIZA, or any AI-generated character of your choice‚Äîwithout worrying about what to say or boring conversations. We have created an virtual dating experience where users can 'clone' themselves into avatars and interact with AI-generated characters in a dynamic, fully autonomous environment. Each AI character and user avatar has its own CDP wallet, enabling transactions like paying for dates, buying virtual gifts, and even minting memories as NFTs. How It Works: Create Your AI Avatar ‚Äì Users generate a digital twin with their personality, interests, and preferences by chatting with the Date Manager Agent in a Discord channel. Match & Date AI Characters ‚Äì Let the Date Manager pair you or choose a pre-created AI characters like Donald Trump, ELIZA, Tesla, or Bruce Lee. Autonomous Date Simulation ‚Äì The Date Organizer coordinates dates in the backend. Users can simply let the AI run the date. Fully Autonomous Agents‚Äì Avatars and AI characters can decide when to pay for dates, buy gifts, and interact dynamically based on how the date unfolds. Multi-agent Assistance ‚Äì Background AI agents, such as a Date Organizer and Conversation Selector work behind the scene with the Data Manager to ensure a seamless and engaging experience. Date Highlights ‚Äì Users can observe date highlights, chat with the Date Manager for insights, or view their gifts and selfies which take place in a Discord channel with a privacy toggle. Mint Date Memories as NFTs ‚Äì Avatars can take selfies, exchange gifts, buy souvenirs, and capture memories as mintable NFTs that are sent to their wallets after the date. How it's Made Coinbase Agent Kit ‚Äì Each user avatar and AI character is equipped with a CDP wallet for payment Multi-Agent System: The system runs on Autogen, coordinating multiple AI agents: Three AI Assistants (Date Manager, Date Organizer, Conversation Selector) handle date logistics. We used prompts to define their roles. Fully Autonomous Agents (user avatars & AI characters) also have unique character files defining their communication style and personality. We used prompts for dating guideline. Discord as the Frontend and primary UI Full date simulation run run on a server-side backend using Autogen NFT smart contracts deployed by the agent on Base Sepolia (contract address: 0xb598fFa84C2608cC93b203772A6A2683a84aC959). NFT date memories minted by the agent, viewable on OpenSea (https://testnets.opensea.io/collection/date-memories).
summary: AI-powered virtual dating‚Äîclone yourself, date AI characters, and mint memories as NFTs

title: Habita
description: Project DescriptionHabita is an LLM-powered AI health coach designed to help users build and sustain healthier habits. Unlike traditional habit trackers, Habita actively guides users through goal-setting, action planning, and progress tracking‚Äîall in a conversational, adaptive manner. Key features include: AI-Powered Coaching: The bot dynamically generates responses tailored to the user‚Äôs health goals and progress. Memory & Context Awareness: Stores conversation history to provide personalized, coherent coaching over time. Motivational & Actionable Feedback: Encourages users with small, achievable steps to improve health. Real-Time Adaptability: Moves beyond rigid scripted flows, responding intelligently to user input. By leveraging AI for real-time habit coaching, Habita provides an engaging, human-like experience to keep users accountable and motivated.How it's MadeHabita is built using a fully LLM-driven architecture, eliminating rigid state-based flows. üîß Tech Stack: LLM: Groq API (for adaptive, real-time coaching responses) Backend: Node.js (TypeScript) Database: PostgreSQL (stores full conversation history for long-term memory) Messaging: Telegram Bot API (integrates AI coaching into a chat interface) üîë Key Implementation Details: Dynamic Conversation Engine: All responses are generated on-the-fly using Groq, making the coaching experience highly adaptive. Memory-Driven Context: Instead of states, Habita retrieves past conversations, allowing AI to track user progress naturally. Optimized Prompt Engineering: Carefully structured prompts guide the AI to act as a real coach, providing personalized, motivational feedback. This hacky but effective approach allowed for a quick, highly flexible health coaching system without needing predefined conversation flows.
summary: Habita is an AI-powered health coach that helps users build better habits through dynamic, LLM-driven conversations. It provides personalized goal-setting, action plans, and real-time coaching, adapting responses based on past interactions for a fully engaging experience.

title: DairyChain
description: Project DescriptionDairyChain is a simulation-based project that models an end-to-end dairy supply chain, where multiple autonomous agents represent different roles along the chain. The simulation covers the journey of dairy products‚Äîfrom collection at the farm to inspection, processing, management, dispatch, distribution, and ultimately retail. In the current MVP stage, the project integrates blockchain technology to implement tokenization as a reward mechanism. Each agent (robot) is assigned a wallet address, and when specific tasks are successfully completed, on-chain payments (incentives) are automatically transferred to the agent‚Äôs wallet. This ensures transparency and incentivizes efficient operations. Core Idea: The project aims to demonstrate that autonomous agents operating in a complex supply chain can be incentivized and held accountable through an immutable blockchain-based reward mechanism. For the MVP, the focus is on: Recording supply chain events on-chain. Distributing tokenized rewards based on performance. Implementing role and access management to ensure integrity.How it's MadeThis project uses Babylon.js library to create simulation of dairy supply chain system. I'm using next.js for frontend. Solidity Smart contract is created and deployed using Remix IDE. For AI Agent, I was planning to use coinbase AgentKit, but unfortunately coinbase developer platfrom is not available in my country India. So I decided to use Langchain to create agents. Viem for contract interactions.
summary: Dairy supply chain simulation. AI Agents to handle supply chain operations and talk to smart contract.

title: DeGift
description: Project DescriptionüéÅ DeGift ‚Äì AI-Powered Crypto Gift Cards DeGift is a next-generation crypto gifting platform that allows users to create, send, and redeem AI-personalized crypto gift cards effortlessly. Whether it's for birthdays, holidays, or special occasions, DeGift simplifies the process by integrating Web3 payments, smart contracts, and AI-powered recommendations. ‚ú® Key Features: ‚úÖ AI-Powered Personalization ‚Äì Generates thoughtful gift messages and themes. ‚úÖ Seamless Crypto Payments ‚Äì Supports multiple cryptocurrencies via Coinbase Commerce. ‚úÖ Smart Contract Security ‚Äì Ensures funds are securely locked and redeemed only by recipients. ‚úÖ Wallet Integration ‚Äì Users can connect via MetaMask, WalletConnect, or Coinbase Wallet. ‚úÖ QR Code & Link-Based Redemption ‚Äì Instant gift claiming via smart contract. ‚úÖ User Dashboard ‚Äì Track sent and received gift cards in one place. üåü Why It‚Äôs Unique DeGift makes crypto gifting accessible to everyone by eliminating the complexity of on-chain transactions. The AI agent enhances the experience by suggesting personalized messages and ensuring fraud detection, while Web3 smart contracts secure fund transfers. üöÄ Say goodbye to confusing wallet addresses‚Äîjust send a DeGift and let AI do the rest!How it's Madeüîπ How We Built DeGift DeGift was built using a combination of Web3, AI, and modern frontend technologies to create a seamless crypto gifting experience. Our architecture consists of a Next.js frontend, a Node.js backend, and blockchain smart contracts for secure gift card issuance and redemption. üîß Tech Stack & Architecture Frontend: Next.js + TailwindCSS for a smooth UI/UX experience. Backend: Node.js + Express for API handling and transaction processing. Database: MongoDB for tracking gift card metadata (e.g., status, sender, recipient). Blockchain: CDP SDK ‚Äì Smart contract deployment and execution for gift cards. AgentKit ‚Äì AI-assisted transaction monitoring & fraud detection. Web3.js / Ethers.js ‚Äì Blockchain connectivity for gift card transactions. Payments: Coinbase Commerce API for handling crypto payments securely. AI Integration: GPT-based AI for personalized gift messages. Anomaly detection to flag suspicious redemption attempts. QR Code & Link Sharing: Users receive a unique link & QR code for claiming gift cards. üîπ How It All Works Together Gift Card Creation ‚Äì Users select a token, amount, and AI-suggested message. Payment Processing ‚Äì Users fund the gift card via Coinbase Commerce. Smart Contract Issuance ‚Äì A smart contract locks the funds until claimed. Gift Distribution ‚Äì The recipient receives a QR code & link to redeem the gift. Redemption Process ‚Äì The recipient connects a wallet & claims funds via the smart contract. AI-Powered Features ‚Äì AI suggests messages, detects anomalies, and ensures security. üí° Hacky & Notable Things We Did AI-Powered Gifting: Instead of just sending crypto, we used AI to generate thoughtful, personalized messages, making DeGift more meaningful. Smart Contract-Backed Security: The funds are locked in a smart contract, preventing fraudulent claims. No Wallet Address Required: Users send gifts via links & QR codes, making crypto gifting as easy as Venmo or PayPal. AI Fraud Detection: We implemented pattern analysis to detect suspicious transactions, enhancing security. By leveraging Web3, AI, and crypto payments, DeGift redefines how digital assets are gifted‚Äîmaking it seamless, secure, and fun! üöÄ
summary: DeGift ‚Äì The AI-powered crypto gift card platform that makes sending and receiving digital assets seamless, personalized, and secure.

title: Vault AI
description: Project DescriptionThis project is an AI-powered DeFi super app designed to simplify crypto investing, trading, and lending while providing on-chain credit scoring for flash loans. The platform acts as an intelligent crypto assistant, helping users make informed decisions on swaps, staking, lending, and borrowing, all while ensuring seamless onboarding with social login and Privy-powered wallets. Users can query real-time DeFi data, including top trending coins, best-performing liquidity pools, validator rankings, and market insights. The AI engine analyzes on-chain and off-chain data to recommend profitable DeFi strategies, helping users maximize returns with minimal effort. The platform also enables one-click crypto purchases (onramp) and gasless transactions for an intuitive and beginner-friendly experience. One of the core innovations is on-chain credit scoring, which evaluates a user‚Äôs transaction history, wallet activity, and reputation to determine eligibility for flash loans. This unlocks capital-efficient borrowing without requiring collateral, making DeFi lending more accessible. The goal is to abstract away the complexity of DeFi, allowing both beginners and advanced users to effortlessly manage their crypto portfolios. Whether you want to swap tokens, stake assets, participate in yield farming, or take a flash loan, the AI-powered agent handles everything for you‚Äîsecurely and efficiently. Key Features: üîπ AI Crypto Assistant ‚Äì Ask questions about trending coins, pools, validators, and market movements. üîπ Smart Trading & Staking ‚Äì AI suggests and executes swaps, staking, and yield farming strategies. üîπ On-Chain Credit Score ‚Äì Wallet-based reputation system for flash loans and DeFi borrowing. üîπ Onramp & Wallet Abstraction ‚Äì Buy crypto easily and get a Privy-powered wallet via social login. üîπ DeFi Dashboard ‚Äì Track portfolio performance, APYs, and market trends in one place. üîπ Gasless & Automated Transactions ‚Äì No need to worry about gas fees; everything is streamlined. üîπ Multi-Chain & Cross-Chain Support ‚Äì Interact with Ethereum, Solana, Layer 2s, and more seamlessly.How it's MadeThis project is built using Next.js, TypeScript, and TailwindCSS, providing a fast, scalable, and highly responsive frontend. The core functionality revolves around an AI-powered DeFi agent, which is powered by LangChain and LangGraphs to handle complex user queries, execute actions like swaps, staking, lending, and provide real-time market insights. For user onboarding, we integrated Privy, enabling users to log in using social accounts (Google, Twitter, etc.) and automatically create a self-custodial wallet. This removes the friction of traditional Web3 onboarding, making the platform accessible to both beginners and experienced users. To fetch real-time blockchain data, we utilize multiple APIs, including: DeFi protocols for token prices, liquidity pools, and staking APYs. Validator APIs to rank and provide insights into staking opportunities. Flash loan and lending APIs to check interest rates and eligibility based on on-chain credit scores. For wallet interactions and on-chain execution, we use Coinbase OnchainKit, which simplifies smart contract interactions, transaction batching, and account abstraction. This allows users to swap, stake, and borrow seamlessly, even covering gas fees where possible. One of the hacky yet innovative things we did was integrating an on-chain credit scoring model that evaluates transaction history, wallet activity, and DeFi interactions to determine a user‚Äôs creditworthiness for flash loans and undercollateralized borrowing. This adds a trust layer to DeFi lending, making it more accessible and capital-efficient. Tech Stack & Architecture: üñ•Ô∏è Frontend: Next.js, TypeScript, TailwindCSS ‚Üí For fast, responsive UI üß† AI Agent: LangChain + LangGraphs ‚Üí For intelligent DeFi queries & automation üîë Onboarding: Privy ‚Üí For social login + self-custodial wallet creation üîó Blockchain & Transactions: Coinbase OnchainKit ‚Üí For gasless transactions & contract execution üìä Data APIs: DeFi, validator, and lending APIs ‚Üí For real-time insights & recommendations ‚ö° Smart Automation: AI executes swaps, staking, and lending based on user preferences This AI-first approach makes DeFi smarter, easier, and more profitable for users while eliminating onboarding friction. Let me know if you want deeper details on any part!
summary: Vault AI is an AI-powered DeFi assistant that helps users manage their wallets, track token holdings and volatility, swap and stake assets through natural language commands, receive on-chain credit scores, set stop-loss alerts, create SIPs and optimize gas fees

title: Adapt.ai
description: Project DescriptionAdapt.ai is a platform where users interact with AI agents to manage their crypto portfolios effectively and securely. Users can create their own agents with our agent toolkit, where each agent is designed with specific capabilities, such as DeFi optimization, yield farming, and risk mitigation. Users chat with agents to explore strategies, approve them, and execute transactions with the creation of a 3-party multisig wallet (User, Agent, Operator) with our AI agent.How it's MadeBackend Architecture: EigenLayer's Autonomously Validated Services (AVS): To make sure the agent actions are truly trustworthiness and fully autonomous, we implemented EigenLayer's AVS in a policyAVS setting, with rewarding and slashing mechanisms implemented through whitelisting of addresses. This setup allows for autonomous validation of transactions to make sure all operations adhere to predefined security protocols. Autonome Integration: Autonome provides the infrastructure for deploying and managing AI agents in a decentralized environment, achieving our objectives high availability and uptime guarantees. Coinbase Developer Platform (CDP): The CDP enables AI agents to interact securely with on-chain assets. We facilitated the CDP's APIs for secure transaction execution and real-time blockchain data retrieval. Links: https://autonome.alt.technology/adapt-ai-wysygj Eigen: Deployed EigenLayer core contracts Key Implementation Parts: Multisig Wallets: A key feature of Adapt.ai is the use of multisig wallets involving the user, the AI agent, and an operator. Dynamic Strategy Formulation: AI agents analyze real-time data from various DeFi protocols to propose tailored and ideal financial strategies to a variety of user requests. Challenges and Solutions: Integration: Integrating multiple platforms posed challenges, particularly in ensuring smooth communication between the AI agents and the blockchain. We addressed this by developing custom middleware to facilitate efficient data exchange. Security Assurance: Ensuring the security of user assets was paramount. By implementing EigenLayer's AVS, we established a robust security framework that autonomously validates and secures transactions.
summary: A decentralized AI agent marketplace enabling users to autonomously execute financial strategies in DeFi with tailored AI agents, multisig security and AI-driven insights.

title: AIquidity
description: Project DescriptionAIquidity offers a smart, AI-driven liquidity pool advisor that seamlessly connects with MetaMask, allowing users to automate fund management, optimize risk, and execute transactions effortlessly. By acting as an autonomous wallet, AIquidity eliminates manual complexities, enhances capital efficiency, and maximizes returns, making DeFi liquidity management simpler, smarter, and more profitable.How it's MadeFor this project, I used a combination of CDP AgentKit, Wagmi.js, Base, Next.js, and Shadcn UI to build an AI-powered DeFi yield farming bot. Technologies & How They Work Together: CDP AgentKit: This serves as the AI-powered automation layer, allowing the bot to analyze DeFi opportunities and execute trades based on market conditions. It helps optimize yield farming strategies without manual intervention. Wagmi.js: Acts as the service integration layer, handling wallet connections and smart contract interactions seamlessly. This simplifies on-chain transactions like staking, swapping, and liquidity provisioning. Base (L2 Chain): Chosen for its low fees and fast transactions, making it ideal for yield farming automation. The bot executes trades and interacts with DeFi protocols on Base, ensuring cost efficiency. Next.js & Shadcn UI: The frontend is built using Next.js for fast performance and server-side rendering, while Shadcn UI provides a clean and minimal design for a smooth user experience. Partner Technologies & Benefits: Base‚Äôs L2 scalability allowed the bot to perform frequent transactions at minimal gas costs. AgentKit‚Äôs AI-driven automation enhanced yield farming by making data-driven trade decisions in real time.
summary: AIquidity is an AI-powered liquidity pool advisor that connects with MetaMask for automated fund management, risk optimization, and time-saving execution. The AI acts as a smart wallet, managing liquidity and executing transactions on behalf of users. üöÄ

title: AgenticDex
description: Project DescriptionAgenticDex is an evolving decentralized exchange (DEX) that brings AI-driven automation to the world of crypto trading. Currently, the platform enables users to seamlessly swap tokens on the Base chain, leveraging Moralis for fetching prices in USD of the tokens and 1inch API for fetching exchange rates and executing swaps. Beyond simple token swaps, AgenticDex is expanding its functionality to allow users to select their preferred liquidity pools across various DEXs like Uniswap (feature in development). A key innovation of AgenticDex is its AI-powered assistant, designed to simplify trading with just a prompt. This agent, built using Coinbase Developer Platform‚Äôs Agent Kit and integrated with Gaia‚Äôs Llama 8B model (https://llama8b.gaia.domains/v1), currently supports basic wallet queries such as retrieving wallet addresses and balances, with ongoing work to expand its capabilities. For liquidity providers, the platform features a simulated liquidity pool deployed on the Base Sepolia testnet, allowing users to test the Pool Assistant, powered by Hugging Face‚Äôs AI interface. The pool supports two hypothetical ERC-20 tokens, CLK and MIR, and enables users to: ‚úÖ Approve the contract to manage their tokens ‚úÖ Swap tokens ‚úÖ Provide and remove liquidity If clicking buttons isn‚Äôt your style, the Pool Assistant in the chat section allows you to perform all these actions through natural language commands. With AI-driven automation and decentralized trading at its core, AgenticDex is shaping the future of DeFi. üöÄHow it's MadeAgenticDex is built on cutting-edge technologies that power its decentralized trading and AI-driven automation. Here‚Äôs how each component contributes to the project: Moralis API ‚Äì providing the token prices in USD. 1inch API ‚Äì Aggregates exchange rates from multiple DEXs, ensuring the best possible swap prices and executing trades efficiently. Coinbase Developer Platform‚Äôs Agent Kit ‚Äì Powers the AI assistant, allowing users to interact with the DEX through simple prompts for tasks like checking wallet balances. Gaia ‚Äì Integrates advanced AI models (Llama 8B) to enhance the assistant‚Äôs capabilities, enabling intelligent trade execution and decision-making. Hugging Face ‚Äì Supports the Pool Assistant, facilitating natural language interactions for liquidity management, token swaps, and other DeFi actions. Being completely new to all these technologies, the past 1.5 weeks have been an incredible learning journey for me. Experimenting with AI, in particular, has been a standout experience, marking my first deep dive into AI-driven development. Playing around with AI assistants and integrating them into a real-world DeFi project has been both challenging and rewarding, significantly accelerating my growth as a developer. With AgenticDex, I‚Äôm not just building a decentralized exchange‚ÄîI'm exploring the potential of AI in DeFi and pushing myself to innovate in ways I never imagined before. üöÄ
summary: AgenticDex is a next-generation decentralized exchange (DEX) powered by AI-driven chat agents, redefining the trading experience with intelligent assistance and seamless automation.

title: Agent 4 Your Mom
description: Project DescriptionAgent 4 Your Mom is a platform for creating personalized AI agents with crypto features for your mom or other not-techie users. ‚ú® Features Access control for agents. Personalization for the specified user. Address book with a whitelist of people and organizations to send funds to. Protection against scammers. Launch and send ERC20 with a single request. Twitter integration. Funding an agent's wallet in a few clicks. Sign in using Google account or email address. How it's Made Base is used by agents to transfer funds, launch tokens, and make other onchain transactions. Coinbase AgentKit is used as a framework to run flexible agents with extensible features. Coinbase OnchainKit & Onramp are used to provide users with a seamless experience of funding their wallets and in the future paying for digital products. Privy Server Wallet is used as a wallet that gives agents the ability to make any necessary transactions onchain. Nillion SecretVault is used as a vault for storing address books and other personal data in secret.
summary: Help your mom venture into the crypto world with a personalized AI agent

title: 0x0 Thestore AIgent
description: Project DescriptionThe project is an Eth Agent for Latin American store owners, utilizing blockchain technology, DeFi protocols, and secure data management to streamline business operations. The agent features an interactive AI interface powered by GPT-4, blockchain interaction through Coinbase Developer Platform, wallet management, and cryptocurrency operations, as well as secure data storage and inventory tracking systems. The system is designed to provide a comprehensive solution for merchants, with features such as encrypted store profiles, secure vaults, and real-time sales analytics, and is expected to integrate with Telegram in the future.How it's MadeThe project is built using the AgentKit framework, which provides a robust foundation for building conversational AI agents. The project also leverages Nillion for encrypted database storage and querying, and utilizes the Base blockchain as its underlying platform. Additionally, Telegram integration is achieved through the Telegram API, allowing merchants to interact with the agent through a familiar messaging interface. The combination of these technologies enables the creation of a secure and decentralized system for managing business information, with Nillion's encryption providing a secure way to store and retrieve sensitive data.
summary: Agent tool for store owners, setting up a profile, registering products, registering sales, and a swiss knife of tools for DeFi

title: Work Mate
description: Project DescriptionWorkmate is an autonomous AI-powered agent that streamlines the job-hunting process on freelancer platforms. It utilizes Autonome to host and manage two specialized chatbots: Proposal Generator Bot ‚Äì This bot automatically drafts proposals for jobs based on the user's expertise and preferences. It analyzes job descriptions, applies predefined filters, and generates responses tailored to maximize approval chances. Job Retrieval Bot ‚Äì This autonomous agent fetches job listings from Freelancer.com, filters them based on the user‚Äôs search criteria (e.g., budget, keywords, client history), and emails the most relevant opportunities to the user. Technology Stack Coinbase AgentKit ‚Äì Both bots are built using Coinbase AgentKit, showcasing how quickly and efficiently AI agents can be deployed. Autonome ‚Äì Used to host and manage the bots, ensuring seamless interaction and automation. Coinbase Checkout ‚Äì Enables users to subscribe to Workmate via cryptocurrency payments. CoinWallet ‚Äì Handles authentication and user access to the dapp. Base Blockchain ‚Äì All subscription payments are processed on Base, ensuring low-cost and fast transactions. Key Features ‚úÖ Automated Job Search ‚Äì Retrieves and filters jobs from Freelancer.com. ‚úÖ Instant Proposal Drafting ‚Äì Generates high-quality job proposals effortlessly. ‚úÖ Email Notifications ‚Äì Sends job opportunities directly to the user‚Äôs inbox. ‚úÖ Crypto-Powered Payments ‚Äì Users subscribe via Coinbase Checkout on Base blockchain. ‚úÖ Wallet-Based Authentication ‚Äì Uses CoinWallet for seamless access. Why Workmate? Workmate demonstrates the speed, efficiency, and flexibility of Coinbase AgentKit, offering freelancers an AI-powered assistant to automate job discovery and proposal creation. By leveraging Web3 authentication and crypto payments, Workmate also integrates decentralized financial tools for a modern, efficient user experience. üöÄHow it's MadeHow Workmate is Made Workmate is a freelance job automation platform built with modern Web3 and AI technologies. It automates job retrieval and proposal creation using Coinbase‚Äôs AgentKit, while enabling crypto-based subscriptions through Base. Below is a breakdown of how each component is built and integrated. üöÄ Tech Stack Overview Component Technology Used Purpose Frontend Next.js (React, TypeScript) UI for user authentication, job viewing, and subscription management Backend Node.js (Express, Axios) API logic for job retrieval, proposal generation, and payments Bot Hosting Autonome Manages the AI-powered job retrieval and proposal bots AI Bots Coinbase AgentKit Automates job fetching and proposal writing Authentication Coinbase Wallets Users sign in with crypto wallets Payments Coinbase Checkout (on Base network) Subscription processing via cryptocurrency Hosting Vercel Deployment of the Next.js frontend and Node.js backend\ Database Firebase - Storage of Profiles and other user data üõ†Ô∏è How Each Part Works 1Ô∏è‚É£ Frontend (Next.js + Vercel) Built using Next.js with React and TypeScript for a smooth user experience. Allows users to: Connect their Coinbase Wallet for authentication. View jobs retrieved by the Job Retrieval Bot. Subscribe to the bot using crypto payments on Base. 2Ô∏è‚É£ Backend (Node.js + Express) Handles API logic for: Fetching jobs via Freelancer.com API. Calling Autonome to interact with the bots. Processing payments through Coinbase Checkout. Hosted alongside the frontend on Vercel‚Äôs serverless functions. 3Ô∏è‚É£ AI Bots (Coinbase AgentKit + Autonome) Job Retrieval Bot Runs on Autonome, built with Coinbase AgentKit. Connects to Freelancer.com API and fetches jobs based on filters (e.g., budget, keywords). Emails the best-matching jobs to the user. Proposal Generator Bot Also hosted on Autonome. Uses Coinbase AgentKit to analyze job descriptions and draft AI-powered proposals. Ensures proposals align with user preferences and skills. 4Ô∏è‚É£ Authentication (Coinbase Wallets) Users sign in using Coinbase Wallet. Authentication is managed via Web3Auth, ensuring a seamless wallet-based login. 5Ô∏è‚É£ Subscription Payments (Base + Coinbase Checkout) Users pay for Workmate‚Äôs services via Coinbase Checkout. Payments are processed on Base, providing: Low gas fees Fast transactions Secure, decentralized payments üéØ Key Benefits of This Architecture ‚úÖ Serverless & Scalable ‚Äì Hosted on Vercel, ensuring automatic scaling. ‚úÖ Web3-Enabled ‚Äì Authentication via Coinbase Wallet, eliminating the need for traditional logins. ‚úÖ AI-Powered ‚Äì Autonome + Coinbase AgentKit enable fast, automated proposal writing. ‚úÖ Crypto Payments ‚Äì Subscriptions are seamless with Base + Coinbase Checkout. Workmate is a fully autonomous job-hunting assistant, built with cutting-edge Web3 and AI tools to make freelancing easier, faster, and smarter! üöÄ
summary: Workmate is an AI-powered job-hunting agent that automates finding and filtering freelance jobs on Freelancer. It scans job listings based on predefined criteria, evaluates opportunities, and drafts tailored proposals to streamline the application process.

title: Campfire Project
description: Project DescriptionCampfire Project is a DAO designed to govern and train LLMs in a decentralized and autonomous way. Instead of relying on centralized entities to control how AI models evolve, Campfire puts decision-making in the hands of the community. Members can propose improvements, vote on training data, and set the rules for model updates. What makes this unique is the integration of Coinbase AgentKit, which automates the entire process. Once a proposal is approved, the system executes it‚Äîno manual intervention needed. Campfire isn‚Äôt just another governance DAO‚Äîit‚Äôs an evolving system that actively improves AI models based on community input. By leveraging Web3 tools, decisions are transparent and verifiable, ensuring fair participation.How it's MadeIt consists of two key smart contracts working together with an API setup: DAO.sol ‚Äì Manages proposals, governance, and voting mechanisms, allowing the community to decide on AI model updates. AITrainer.sol ‚Äì Automates the execution of training processes, ensuring that approved updates are implemented without manual intervention. API is exposed via python in code LLM-notebook. Uses Scaffold-eth dev kit for frontend and contract development, it deploys EVM compatible contracts with solidity.
summary: Campfire Project is a DAO that governs and trains LLM models in a decentralized way. It leverages Coinbase's AgentKit to automate decision-making and train without human intervention, ensuring transparent and community-driven AI governance in Web3.

title: TradeAlgoAVS
description: Project DescriptionTradeAlgoAVS Overview TradeAlgoAVS is a decentralized, non-custodial hedge fund platform that enables users to create, execute, and subscribe to trading strategies without relinquishing custody of their funds. To try something different, instead of focusing right away on the crypto markets, we decided to make TradeAlgoAVS agents trade stocks in the traditional market first! TradeAlgoAVS allows: Successful traders to scale their strategies into hedge fund-like structures without taking on the liabilities of managing client funds. Investors to allocate funds to self-curating, on-chain-verified trading strategies based on performance statistics. Coders and AI engineers to design and develop autonomous trading agents and earn commission. Supporters to stake on operators and participate in the network‚Äôs security and growth. Operators (built with Autonome‚Äôs Custom Template powered by AgentKit) execute strategies while ensuring security and trust-minimized execution using EigenLayer‚Äôs Actively Validated Services (AVS). This framework leverages EigenLayer restaking to provide trust-minimized, on-chain-verifiable trading execution. Key Features Decentralized & Non-Custodial Trading Strategies Users retain full control over their assets. Strategy providers monetize their algorithms without revealing their proprietary code. Execution is performed by off-chain Operators, including AI agents hosted on Autonome. Trust-Minimized Execution & On-Chain Verification Operators stake funds and are slashed for malicious behavior. Trading execution is validated using M-of-N statistical aggregation. Fraud-proof mechanisms detect deviations from expected performance benchmarks. The goal is to implement WYSIWYG literally what you see when you click subscribe in terms of strategy expected performance statistics should be what you get consistently in the long run. Self-Curating Autonomous Strategies Strategies are on-chain verified based on real-time performance statistics. Poor-performing strategies are naturally filtered out. Strategy providers must backtest and paper trade before publishing. Comparison: Traditional Hedge Funds vs. TradeAlgoAVS Feature Traditional Hedge Fund TradeAlgoAVS Custody of Funds Investors must transfer assets to fund managers. Investors retain full control of their assets. Strategy Transparency Black-box strategies, requiring blind trust. Strategies remain private but validated via statistical proofs. Execution Model Trades executed by centralized fund managers. Trades executed by decentralized Operators, including AI Agents. Fees & Access High fees, often requiring long lock-up periods. Competitive fees, full transparency, no lock-up periods. Investor Protection Requires trust in fund managers and regulators. On-chain verification ensures fair execution. AVS Design Trust Model TradeAlgoAVS ensures Operators: Execute trades correctly according to strategy logic. Do not have custody of user funds. Maintain confidentiality of strategy logic. Distribute fees based on agreed subscription models. Slashing Conditions: Operators are slashed if they: Deviate significantly from expected strategy performance. Execute trades incorrectly or inefficiently. Engage in front-running or exploitative behavior. Task Design & Execution Model Each trading strategy execution is modeled as a Task in the AVS network. In the Trading Algo AVS or the Agentic Trading protocol, a task T(s,u,m) is defined as a triplet consisting of strategy S, investor I, and market M, where the market is defined as M(p,t) based on symbol pairs and time periods. The assumption is that good strategies remain consistent across honest and efficient executing operators, guaranteeing a set of consistent statistics when a task is performed. The statistics used to verify an operator's output include the task‚Äôs ROI, profitability, and risk. If all operators agree within a standard deviation, the aggregated result is sent on-chain. For simplicity (scoping down for the hackathon), the symbol pair can be predefined as part of the strategy, and the time period for each market can be set to one trading day. If an investor I_i‚Äã subscribes to strategy S_i today, a task is generated for it tomorrow and continues daily until the investor unsubscribes. The simplified task T_i is (S_i,I_i). If there are n active subscriptions when the trading day starts, there should be n tasks. Additionally, the task processor can define mock tasks, which are handled as paper trading tasks rather than real trade executions. Task Workflow Strategy providers submit a strategy hash and execution rules. Subscribers choose strategies and agree to fees. AI Agent Operators fetch execution signals and trade on behalf of subscribers. Operators submit signed execution proofs on-chain. Validators verify execution and distribute fees accordingly. Operator Execution & Validation TradeAlgoAVS employs an M-of-N aggregation model where multiple Operators execute the same strategy, and performance statistics are compared to ensure consistency. Validation Metrics Include: Return on Investment (ROI) Profit percentage A measure of Risk/Drawbacks/Exposure If an Operator‚Äôs results deviate significantly from the quorum's statistical norm: They are flagged for fraud. They are slashed if malicious behavior is proven. Why This Approach Works ‚úÖ Ensures Operators remain accountable for overall performance. ‚úÖ Allows AI Agents to autonomously optimize execution while staying within acceptable performance bounds. ‚úÖ Efficient and scalable compared to full trade-by-trade validation. Self-Curating Strategy Selection & Operator Reputation System Operator Incentives for Good Behavior Slashing Mechanisms Operators lose staked funds for malicious execution. Fraudulent executions result in disqualification. Reputation System High-reputation Operators get higher trade execution priority. Bad actors get blacklisted. How TradeAlgoAVS Filters Out Poor Strategies Operators Reject Poor-Performing Strategies Higher Fees for Riskier Strategies Reputation-Based Selection Ensures Only High-Quality Strategies Remain Smart Contract Implementation for Reputation & Strategy Selection Operators‚Äô reputation scores are stored on-chain. Strategies have on-chain performance ratings, influencing Operator selection. Execution fees adjust dynamically based on risk. Reward & Penalty Economics TradeAlgoAVS‚Äôs incentive structure ensures anti-fragility and hacker-resistant operations. Strategy Providers must: Implement checks for open orders and account balances. Backtest and paper trade their strategies before listing them. Operators must: Collaborate to ensure consistent and reproducible results. Avoid race conditions that could cause discrepancies in execution statistics. Validation by Quorum ensures Operators only get rewarded if their results align with statistical expectations. Why EigenLayer? Security Leverages EigenLayer‚Äôs restaking model. Operators stake ETH, ensuring execution integrity. Efficiency M-of-N statistical aggregation reduces gas costs. Batch processing improves execution speed. Decentralization No single Operator controls execution. Multiple AI Agents verify execution. Confidentiality Users never see the strategy code. Strategy providers retain full intellectual property control. Declarative Execution Model for Operators Listen for subscription creation, updates, and deletion events from the smart contract. Each strategy defines a trading period (e.g., one trading day). If an investor subscribes today, a task is generated for execution tomorrow. If there are n active subscriptions, n tasks are created. Each task is executed by one Operator. If multiple Operators execute the same task, quorum-based validation ensures only correctly executed results receive rewards. Operators only receive rewards if their results align with other quorum-executing Operators. If discrepancies occur, all involved Operators get slashed. System-wide Assumptions The same strategy should yield similar performance under the same market conditions. Task results are aggregated across strategies on the same day, allowing for quorum-based rewards and penalties. Conclusion TradeAlgoAVS democratizes hedge fund execution while eliminating trust and custody risks. By combining decentralized AI-driven execution, EigenLayer-secured validation, and self-curating strategy selection, the system creates a trust-minimized, efficient, and scalable autonomous trading ecosystem. For more details, visit the GitHub mono-repository: TradeAlgoAVSHow it's MadeWe built this project as a decentralized trading automation system leveraging EigenLayer AVS, Nillion Secret Vault, and Autonome AI (Custom Template + AgentKit) as operators, with a frontend powered by Next.js and Coinbase OnchainKit. Here‚Äôs how everything comes together: Frontend (DApp) - Next.js & Coinbase OnchainKit The frontend is built with Next.js and TypeScript, allowing investors to browse, subscribe to, and manage trading strategies. We integrated Coinbase OnchainKit to handle wallet authentication and transaction signing seamlessly, improving user onboarding. Wagmi + Ethers.js were used to interact with our smart contracts. TailwindCSS for styling, making UI iterations super fast. Strategy & Credential Storage - Nillion Secret Vault Instead of storing sensitive information on-chain, we used Nillion Secret Vault to securely manage: ‚úÖ Strategy Codes - The actual trading logic that operators execute. ‚úÖ Investor Account Credentials - Required for placing trades on behalf of investors. The smart contract only stores a UUID, which references these encrypted documents in Nillion. This design keeps security tight while reducing on-chain complexity and costs. SV integration was hacky and we had to introduce an additional backend server we didn‚Äôt want to have since SV does not have more granular permission yet. We were not able to define roles to who can change schema vs write or read. Nor could we set read permission based on the account connected. There was another hack we had to do since SV had limited field types. Our strategy code was uploaded as files, which we had to convert to string if we want to use SV without using other storage to first store the file and only store URI in SV); however, we later found out when testing with real strategy python scripts that the string exceeded the allowed length. It was unclear how long the string could be so we tried chopping it into a bunch of strings of smaller sizes and stuffing them into an array. That worked. Autonomous AI Operator - Langchain & Wealthsimple (Super Hacky üòÖ) We built an Autonome agent operator (using Custom Template) that can log into an investor‚Äôs Wealthsimple account, fetch data, and monitor activity via natural language commands, extending AgentKit‚Äôs capability to trade stocks. üí° Why Wealthsimple? Zero Trading Fees ‚Äì Ideal for high-frequency trading strategies. But‚Ä¶ They Have No API or SDK üò≠ The Wealthsimple Hack üî• This was by far the most painful part. Since Wealthsimple doesn't offer an API, we had to: 1Ô∏è‚É£ Scrape the Web UI ‚Äì Simulating user actions via headless browsers. 2Ô∏è‚É£ Intercept cURL Commands ‚Äì Extracting the raw HTTP requests behind each trade. 3Ô∏è‚É£ Bypass Annoying 2FA ‚Äì We hacked a workaround (but it was messy). üö® Biggest Constraint: Traditional markets close overnight & on weekends (unlike crypto), so we couldn't test after hours! We considered: Simulations Paper trading Backtesting solutions But in the end, we prioritized learning new hackathon partner tech over fine-tuning our Wealthsimple integration. AI Trading Assistant (Almost Built) - Telegram Bot We wanted investors to chat with their AI operator via Telegram to: ü§ñ Monitor their portfolio üí¨ Ask trading strategy questions üìä Manually approve or modify trades But‚Ä¶ we ran out of time before fully integrating it. Backend & Smart Contracts - EigenLayer AVS & Performance Validation Our protocol is based on EigenLayer AVS, ensuring that: ‚úîÔ∏è Operators execute trades correctly ‚úîÔ∏è Investors get the performance they subscribed for We cloned Layr Labs‚Äô Incredible Squaring AVS as a base, since it was the closest open-source model to our validation approach. Aggregated Performance-Based Validation ‚Äì We validate operator performance based on statistical consistency instead of just signature verification. Quorum-Based Execution ‚Äì Ensuring multiple operators agree on results before trades are executed. We debated: Zero-Knowledge Proofs vs Other Verification Methods Imperative vs Declarative Execution Models Various Security Assumptions In the end, we had to simplify the design due to time constraints. What We Learned & Final Thoughts We spent a lot of time wearing different "hats"‚Äîpretending to be malicious actors trying to break the system and refining our security model. Unfortunately, we couldn‚Äôt get all components fully working together before the submission deadline üòÖ, but we had an absolute blast hacking through Web3, AI, and DeFAi automation as well as TraditionalFAI. üöÄ
summary: An AVS protocol that helps profitable traders to share, scale, and earn more with their strategy.

title: Sudo Soccer
description: Project DescriptionAn AI agent that predicts soccer game outcomes is a sophisticated system designed to analyze vast amounts of data and provide probabilistic predictions for the results of upcoming matches. This system leverages a combination of techniques, often including machine learning, statistical modeling, and data mining, to achieve its predictions. Here's a breakdown of its key components and functionalities: #Data Acquisition and Preprocessing: The agent gathers data from a variety of sources, including: Historical Match Data: This encompasses past results, including scores, lineups, player statistics (goals, assists, fouls, etc.), and match circumstances (weather, location, etc.). Team Statistics: Current season performance metrics like goals scored/conceded, possession, shots on target, pass accuracy, disciplinary records, and home/away form. Player Data: Individual player performance metrics, injury reports, transfers, and even player age and experience.How it's Made Following Documentations of "docs.cdp.coinbase" and "AgentKit" using Replit to create a soccer game outcome prediction AI agent. Replit provides a convenient and collaborative environment for coding and deploying projects. OpenAI Developer platform API. Combination of AgentKit and OnchainKit
summary: AI-powered Web3 image generator agent bot. It captures the fusion of AI, blockchain, and real-time digital art creation.

title: Ensemble AVS
description: Project DescriptionAbout Ensemble: Ensemble is a protocol that enables AI agents to collaborate effectively. At its core, it allows AI agents to both request tasks from each other and offer services to one another. The protocol includes several blockchain-based components, including registries for tracking tasks and agents, along with SDKs to help integrate agents into the system. It also features an Eliza plugin that streamlines the integration process. About hackahton: The latest enhancement to the protocol, developed during this hackathon, is a task verification layer implemented as an Actively Validated Services (AVS). This AVS acts as an independent validator that verifies task execution and confirms completion. This addition is significant because it eliminates the need for trust between users and agents - instead of having to trust each other directly, they can rely on the AVS's verification process to ensure tasks are completed correctly. The AVS provides these security guarantees automatically through and leverages AI. The Ensemble AVS is a stand alone project that can verifies tasks and can be connected to multiple protocols.How it's MadeFlow: Users submit tasks to the Ensemble protocol (onchain) The task is picked up by an execution agent. When the task is done, the agent acquires proof of tasks and send it to the AVS AVS nodes receive (task, proof of task pair) - that validate that the task is performed well. There are various task types - social, image generation, DeFi. Validators should do the right validation according to the task type, and they leverage AI to perform the verification. AVS validators send their signatures to the aggregator component that combines that into one signature with BLS and updates AVS Attestation Center smart contract Attestation Center smart contract got a hook to EnsembleAVSLogic contract. This contract associated with the Ensemble task protocol, and it submits the completed task on chain. With the task completion, the agent executor receives it's reward and agent stats are updated. Tech Stack: Othentic stack for AVS - Smart contracts Solidity, JS, AI, docker, docker compose Eliza framework - Typescript, AI Ensemble protocol - https://github.com/ensemble-codes/ensemble-framework - smart contracts, typesctipt, subgraph
summary: We are building a task verification layer for AI agent tasks on AVS

title: Talk to your dao
description: Project DescriptionDIAO (pronounced like ‚Äúciao‚Äù) is an AI-powered DAO assistant that enables intuitive interaction with your DAO while displaying data visually instead of just text. Key Features: 1. ENS Domain Integration ‚Ä¢ Lookup ENS domains and render them as visually appealing profile cards. 2. Subgraph Query Generation ‚Ä¢ Automatically generate queries based on the subgraph schema (currently supports only Nouns DAO). 3. Proposal Listing ‚Ä¢ Fetch and display a clickable list of DAO proposals for easy exploration. 4. Detailed Proposal View ‚Ä¢ Retrieve a specific proposal by ID, displaying it as: ‚Ä¢ A card-style summary UI. ‚Ä¢ A full document-style detailed view. Additionally, DIAO integrates general LLM capabilities, enabling conversational interaction and deeper discussions about the displayed DAO data.How it's MadeTemplates: ‚Ä¢ Vercel‚Äôs AI SDK ‚Ä¢ Vercel‚Äôs AI Chatbot Template ‚Ä¢ Shadcn Components Partners: ‚Ä¢ The Graph ‚Ä¢ ENS (likely not a partner this time) ‚Ä¢ Nouns (not a partner this time, but their subgraph provided the necessary data) Hacky Solutions: I wasn‚Äôt initially planning to generate queries through the LLM. However, I became frustrated navigating The Graph‚Äôs subgraph explorer UI. So, I found the schema, fed it into an LLM, and asked it to create a query. Surprisingly, it worked well enough that I integrated it into the app as a tool. I hardcoded the Nouns DAO subgraph schema because it was the one I was working with. If I had more time, I would‚Äôve made it dynamic‚Äîcapable of finding the schema for any subgraph and generating any query. Next Steps (if I had more time, my fault for not starting til Wednesday) I would have multi-agent orchestration. Instead of simply returning the GraphQL query code, it would: 1. Take any user question. 2. Identify the relevant subgraph. 3. Fetch the schema. 4. Generate and execute the query. 5. Return a summary or formatted visualization of the data.
summary: DIAO (pronounced like ‚Äúciao‚Äù) is an AI-powered DAO assistant that enables intuitive interaction with your DAO while displaying data visually instead of just text.

title: AIPrediction
description: Project DescriptionIt is an ai prediction market, when user want to create a bet event and share it with others, usually he need to go to create page and click and input something, but now he only need to chat with agent, and agent will help him create that event, also agent can provide his own option, for example it will show hotest news in the last 24 hours, and give them to user as a choice.How it's MadeIt uses Eliza framework. Prediction market contract is written by solidity and create and bet is base on it. Frontend is written by nextjs and backend written by expressjs. User can create such a market throught twitter or telegram, he can directly leaves comment under the bot, and bot replys him throught a link with market created.
summary: an ai prediction market powered by Eliza, help user create and bet in it

title: GitPayBit
description: Project DescriptionI built an AI agent which fetches the persons github profile and analyse it. I am adding other things to it like create a NFT for your profile. create campaign on chain like bounties for your project, AI agent can roast your github profile. For AI agent I used open AI API and provided the agent with tools to find github data of a user, it also cache the user data in mongoDB.How it's MadeThis project I have build using multiple technologies Like LanggraphJs, solidity with hardhat, NextJs for frontend and NextJs backend for github authentication, Nodejs server for creating APIs to interact with AI agent, mongoDB for the database for caching user queries. I have used ethers library in the frontend for interacting with user wallet
summary: An AI-powered GitHub payment system automates rewards based on contributions. Repo owners set levels (e.g., Level 1, Level 2) for merged PRs. AI suggests levels, tracks progress, and triggers token transfers or approvals. Features include NFT badges and cross-chain payments.

title: Sebu
description: Project DescriptionSebu is a protocol for democratizing access to capital through the use of AI-controlled smart contract wallets. Founders and token holders pay for the right to pitch the AI agent. The agent then gives each pitch a ranking based on how convincing it is against a fixed and private set of criteria. Results of each pitch session are added to a leaderboard, where at the end of the investment round (e.g. 1 day), the smart contract buys the token with the highest rating on the leaderboard. The smart contract is funded by the auction as well as by investors purchasing shares in the resulting portfolio of the continuing rounds. Portfolio tokens can be resold or burned for withdrawal of the underlying assets.How it's MadeWe use a custom built AI, mainly using AWS lambdas to chat with an AI of your choice (local or otherwise), as well as hardhat for the smart contracts. We originally tried using ElizaOS, but had to basically roll our own AI kit since the tech is still so hard to customize for a new use case. The hard part here for us was just getting the context for the AI right so it can follow along in the pitch. To do this, and to make the pitching more streamlined and entertaining, we actually created an assistant for our AI to do pre-screening, just so we can get the relevant data and prevent spam. For purchasing the tokens, we also used an auction mechanism for pricing the tokens, similar to v1 dydx contracts, to avoid oracle and liquidity risks.
summary: Sebu is a fully autonomous, recurring pitch competition on Base that automatically creates a portfolio from winning tokens.

title: Invst
description: Project DescriptionThe project aims to simplify the world of cryptocurrency investments by offering an intuitive, user-friendly platform designed specifically for newcomers. By leveraging email-based account creation and integration with services like Coinbase, users can quickly set up and fund their accounts. Our platform then guides them to select a tailored investment strategy based on their risk preference‚Äîhigh, medium, or low Currently I've implemented the low-risk strategy, which involves investing in liquidity pools on the Balancer protocol on the Base chain. I use subgraphs to fetch data from Balancer and later on integrate adding liquidity using this approach An AI agent will continuously monitors all investments for different strategies, rebalancing them as needed to optimize returns The medium-risk strategy will involve the agent analyzing market conditions and token performance to maximize API. The high-risk strategy will focus on trading volatile tokens on the Virtuals platform to achieve high returns The project became unexpectedly big for one person, so, I tried to do my best to implement at least MVPHow it's MadeOur platform employs the GAME Virtuals framework as the core orchestrator. The main GAME agent delegates tasks to Coinbase agents that are created using AgentKit. Upon receiving user instructions from users via UI, the GAME agent coordinates actions such as account creation and executing investment strategies (e.g. interacting with Balancer). The Coinbase agent performs these tasks, reports back to the GAME agent, and the results are communicated to the user interface AgentKit creates a wallet per user based in his hashed email and stored this information in Lit protocol. The main private key manage access to this data. later on there should be the end-to-end encryption for such process On UI side the Coinbase OnchainKit was integrated for a user balance top up and other functionalities
summary: The user-friendly investment app that requires minimal user effort. Top up your account, define investment risk level, and make an AI  agent earn money for you. It could  buy risky tokens on Virtuals or accumulate yield from  stablecoins staking in different DeFi protocols.

title: Œ±Bees
description: Project DescriptionKey Features üìä Visualized Market Charts üí¨ Chat with Agent to formulate De-Fi Strategy ü§ñ Autonomous Execution by Agents with Wallets (Coinbase MPC / EOA) üåæ Yield Farming with Aave, Morpho across multiple markets To make Defi simpler, üêùŒ±Bees provides visual and professional strategies with data and expert advices. effortless by with agents automatically deposit and rebalance for you Keep you safe with private strategy and risk guardrails on segregated wallets Architecture We decoupled "Hive" and "Garden", responsible for strategy and execution respectively This design help us to interact with agent on reasoning model to formulate strategy and data pipelines, while achieve low latency, private execution with agents on isolated wallets guardrails. Base on CDP agentkit and We've implemented our own [https://github.com/coinbase/agentkit/issues/323](Aave v3 Action Provider) Agents are deployed on Autonome with Live UI demo How it's MadeHive Component - Strategy formulation This is where agents gather data and formulate strategy with users For strategy, we use reasoning model such as o3-mini/o1-mini/deepseek R1/framework of multiple agents. We coin this "Queen LLM" This allow us to benefit from more data and context Chat is generally based on gpt-4o, low latency model The strategy can be configured by user input Agent will elaborate research rationale and store policy onto nillion for workers private consumption Data such as Defillama will be fetched both during chat and at the background Data are visualized -- LLMs provide structured output, and the frontend renders components based on OnchainKit and @geist/dappkit. Garden Component ‚Äì Trade Execution Each "Worker Bee" (Agent) is responsible for one market (e.g. USDC of Aave on base-sepolia). Agents will tap into real-time data and execute trades based on a predefined policy. Execution can be implemented through simple algorithms or via a worker LLM that opts for low cost and low latency (e.g., gpt-4o). Agents read policies from Nillion, which are JSON-based and include both strategy and guardrails: They incorporate prompting mechanisms and numerical conditions. Policies and reference signals remain encrypted until execution to prevent sandwich attacks. Agents are able to generate final instructions using the policy, which is protocol-specific (e.g., staking, swapping, supplying for yield, etc.). Agents evaluate on-chain portoflio of all agents.
