This ensures a secure, verifiable, and decentralized ownership process, reducing manual intervention while enhancing automation. üîπ Base - Cost-Effective & Scalable Smart Contracts We deployed all smart contracts on Base, an Ethereum Layer 2 network, to optimize for low-cost transactions, scalability, and security. This allows for efficient on-chain voting, NFT minting, and reward distribution without high gas fees, making it accessible for a wider audience.
summary: A decentralized meme contest DAO that leverages AI agents for automated NFT minting, on-chain voting, and viral meme distribution

title: Wowo
description: Project DescriptionWowo is an autonomous agent designed to manage Morpho Protocol vaults. It acts as a reallocator, ensuring an optimal yield strategy while maintaining risk-adjusted returns. Additionally, it can respond to users' messages regarding their deposits to the vault, as well as act on the admin's commands. THE VAULT IS LIVE ON BASE! Core Features: On-Chain Monitoring: Tracks Morpho vault activity, including deposits, withdrawals, interest rate shifts, and liquidity events. Risk Assessment: Continuously evaluates market conditions, yield opportunities, and liquidation risks. User Interaction: Extract user messages regarding deposits and withdrawals, and generate responses. Admin Controls: Allows administrators to execute commands for vault management and reallocation, and also allows managers to add long-term "knowledge." Reallocation Execution: Reallocating assets to maximize yields or utilize any other strategy. How it's Made Wallet & Transactions: Uses Coinbase AgentKit to manage wallets and execute on-chain transactions. Blockchain Interaction: Operates on the Base network, interacting directly with Morpho Protocol for vault management. Agent Workflow: Built using LangChain to put multiple llm together, use the prebuilt reAct agent to use various tools related to memory, get context ...etc On-Chain Monitoring: Tracks Morpho vault events, including deposits, withdrawals, and market events (supply, repay, borrow)
summary: Wowo: A smart agent that manages risk and executes reallocation for Morpho Vaults.

It acts as a reallocator, ensuring an optimal yield strategy while maintaining risk-adjusted returns. title: Pasacoin
description: Project DescriptionPasacoin is a DeFi platform that transforms traditional collective savings into a digital, secure, and frictionless experience. Inspired by ancestral methods‚Äîsuch as the pasanaco in Bolivia, the vaquita in Argentina, or the rosca in other regions‚ÄîPasacoin leverages blockchain technology to ensure every transaction is immutable and transparent. At the heart of the project is its intelligent agent integrated via WhatsApp, which empowers any user, regardless of technical expertise, to access advanced financial tools. The agent performs multiple functions: it retrieves the current USDT price and converts it to the local currency (using, for example, the parallel dollar rate in Bolivia), automatically generates QR codes for seamless payments, and directly interacts with smart contracts to execute transactions. Additionally, the agent monitors all operations in real time, detects suspicious activities, and triggers security measures to protect community funds. By merging traditional savings methods with state-of-the-art technology, Pasacoin democratizes access to secure, transparent, and efficient financial services for communities worldwide.How it's MadePasacoin was developed by integrating cutting-edge technologies to build a scalable and secure architecture: Blockchain & Smart Contracts: Smart contracts written in Solidity on the Ethereum network record every transaction immutably and transparently. State Channels: Implementing state channels enables nearly instantaneous off-chain transactions, reducing both costs and waiting times. Intelligent WhatsApp Agent: The core of the system is an intelligent agent built with AI algorithms. Integrated with the WhatsApp Business API, the agent: Queries the real-time USDT price and converts it to the local currency (e.g., factoring in Bolivia‚Äôs parallel dollar rate). Automatically generates QR codes for easy payment processing. Interacts directly with smart contracts to execute and verify transactions securely without manual intervention. Frontend & Backend: The user interface is developed in React, providing an intuitive and accessible experience. Meanwhile, the backend, built with Node.js and Express, manages communications between the interface, the intelligent agent, the blockchain, and external exchange APIs. Decentralized Storage: IPFS is used for decentralized storage of digital assets and data, ensuring data integrity and availability. Showcased at the EHT Agents Hackathon, this integrated architecture demonstrates how the fusion of digital innovation and traditional financial practices can transform access to financial services‚Äîdelivering a robust, transparent tool that anyone can use right from their everyday WhatsApp.
summary: Pasacoin modernizes traditional collective savings (pasanacos, vaquitas, roscas) with blockchain. Its intelligent WhatsApp agent shows the USDT price in the local currency (e.g., Bolivia‚Äôs parallel dollar rate), generates QR codes for payments, and executes smart contracts.

title: Dystera
description: Project DescriptionDystera: The AI-Driven Drama Betting Game Dystera is a decentralized platform where AI-generated social media controversies unfold, allowing users to predict outcomes, bet with Reactions, and influence events. It combines AI-generated narratives, social media dynamics, and blockchain-based betting, creating an interactive and unpredictable experience where chaos meets crypto. Core Concept Dystera creates realistic but fictional social media dramas using AI agent, mimicking the kind of debates, feuds, and viral moments that trend online. These controversies revolve around crypto, tech, finance, and internet culture, sparking heated discussions and speculative predictions. Players place bets on how each scenario will unfold, using Reactions (üòÇ, üò±, üöÄ, etc.) to signal their predictions. AI agent then determines the resolution, and winnings are distributed accordingly. How It Works AI-Generated Controversies Dystera features two concepts that AI agents generate : Scenario Generation: Creates crypto- and tech-related controversy scenarios, such as industry scandals, influencer feuds, protocol exploits, and regulatory shake-ups. Ensures each controversy has multiple plausible outcomes, keeping the game unpredictable. Profile & Post Generation: Constructs realistic social media profiles and generates posts that simulate an evolving online argument. Provides rich context for users, allowing them to analyze trends, biases, and possible outcomes before placing bets. 2. Betting with Reactions Players predict the outcome of a controversy by placing bets using Reactions: üòÇ (Laughter) ‚Äì Predicts a humorous, meme-worthy resolution. üò± (Shock) ‚Äì Predicts a scandalous or unexpected twist. üöÄ (Moon) ‚Äì Predicts a positive, market-pumping outcome. Other reactions may be introduced to expand betting options. These Reactions act as prediction tickets, determining how much a player wins if their prediction is correct. 3. AI Determines the Outcome After a set period, the AI analyzes the social media simulation, factoring in user interactions and predefined logic to determine the controversy‚Äôs conclusion. Possible influencing factors: The volume and type of Reactions placed. The nature of AI-generated discourse (e.g., support vs. backlash). A small randomized chaos factor to keep results unpredictable. 4. Prize Distribution Players who bet on the correct outcome split the prize pool based on the total Reactions produced. The more Reactions staked on the winning outcome, the lower the individual reward (encouraging strategic betting). Losing bets contribute to the prize pool for winners.How it's MadeDystera is built at the intersection of AI, blockchain, and decentralized content verification, combining multiple cutting-edge technologies to create an AI-driven betting platform for social media controversies. AI & Eliza Agent Framework At the heart of Dystera is an Eliza-based AI agent framework designed to simulate realistic social media conversations and controversies. This framework was developed to: i)Generate dynamic scenarios around crypto, tech, and finance. ii)Create AI-driven personas that engage in discussions, debates, and viral feuds. iii)Influence betting outcomes by shaping narratives and reactions. Authentication & User Management For authentication, Privy was integrated, allowing users to log in seamlessly while maintaining decentralization principles. This ensured: i) A smooth onboarding experience for both Web2 and Web3 users. ii) Secure identity management without exposing sensitive user data. Decentralized Verification via EigenLayer AVS To ensure fairness and authenticity, Dystera utilizes EigenLayer‚Äôs Actively Validated Services (AVS) to verify content integrity and betting outcomes. This: Prevents AI manipulation of results by adding an external layer of verification. Ensures decentralization, making the system less reliant on a single entity. Smart Contracts for Betting & Rewards The betting mechanism and reward distribution are governed by smart contracts deployed on Flow and Base, ensuring: On-chain transparency in betting and payouts. Efficient transaction processing with low fees. The choice of Flow was influenced by its efficiency in handling complex transactions, Base was chosen for its Ethereum L2 scalability.
summary: Dystera : A decentralized platform where AI-generated social media controversies unfold. Predict outcomes, bet with Reactions (üòÇ, üò±, üöÄ), and influence events. AI determines results, and winners split the prize pool. Chaos meets crypto!¬†üöÄüî•¬†#Web3¬†#AI

title: CentoAI
description: Project DescriptionCentoAI is an AI-powered DeFi portfolio manager designed to optimize yield farming and flash loan arbitrage across top DeFi protocols. It dynamically reallocates funds to the highest-yielding opportunities, executes risk-free arbitrage strategies, and provides users with a seamless, automated DeFi experience. The AI agent continuously monitors real-time APY data from Aave, Compound, and Uniswap V3, using machine learning models to identify the best yield farming opportunities. It leverages Balancer V2 flash loans to execute risk-free arbitrage strategies. CentoAI supports Aave, Compound, Uniswap V3, and Balancer V2, allowing users to access a wide range of DeFi opportunities. Each user gets a personalized vault to deposit funds and set strategies, with a user-friendly dashboard to monitor portfolio performance and strategy execution. CentoAI uses Coinbase AgentKit to automate fund movements and strategy execution, and Privy to enable seamless onboarding via embedded wallets and social logins. The project is deployed on Base and Arbitrum for low-cost, high-speed transactions.How it's MadeCentoAI is built using a modular architecture, combining smart contracts (Solidity), a Next.js frontend, and a Node.js backend. The AI agent analyzes yield opportunities and executes strategies using Coinbase AgentKit. Key integrations include Aave, Compound, Uniswap V3, and Balancer V2 for yield farming and arbitrage. The project is deployed on Base and Arbitrum for low-cost, high-speed transactions. Highlights include a custom flash loan arbitrage system, multi-chain deployment, and AI-driven strategy execution. The smart contracts are optimized for gas efficiency using Foundry‚Äôs gas profiling tools, reducing transaction costs for users. The frontend, built with Next.js and OnchainKit and integrates Privy for embedded wallets and social logins, enabling users to onboard with email or existing wallets. This provides a user-friendly dashboard for monitoring portfolio performance and strategy execution. The backend fetches real-time APY data from DeFi protocols and provides it to the AI agent, which uses machine learning models to analyze opportunities and execute strategies in real-time.
summary: An AI-powered DeFi portfolio manager optimizing yield farming & flash loan arbitrage across Aave, Compound, and Uniswap V3. Built with Coinbase AgentKit, Privy, and deployed on Base for max returns.

title: Air Tag Along
description: Project DescriptionAir Tag Along ‚Äì Find Your Perfect Travel Buddy ‚úàÔ∏è Traveling alone? Air Tag Along connects you with fellow travelers heading to the same airport or destination. Whether you want company for your flight, a shared ride to the airport, or someone to explore during a layover, our AI-powered matchmaking makes finding the right travel buddy effortless. How It Works üîπ Post Your Trip ‚Äì Enter your departure and arrival airports, flight date, and preferences. üîπ AI Matchmaking ‚Äì Our smart AI suggests compatible travelers based on shared routes, interests, and travel habits. üîπ Connect & Travel Together ‚Äì Chat, plan, and make your journey more enjoyable with your matched travel buddy. Why Use Air Tag Along? ‚úÖ Never Travel Alone ‚Äì Meet like-minded travelers for your journey. ‚úÖ AI-Powered Matching ‚Äì Get smart suggestions for the best travel buddy. How it's MadeThis project utilizes React.js and Tailwind CSS. The backend was built using Node.js and Express.js. The travelers' data is stored on Secret Vault. I used the Hello World AVS template to build the AVS and an AI agent to verify whether the event location is real before it gets put on-chain. The following technologies were used: Nillion: I used Secret Vault to store travelers' data. EigenLayer: I used the Hello World AVS template to build the AVS and AI agent.
summary: Air Tag Along helps you find like-minded travelers heading to the same airport as you using AI

title: Fund Flow
description: Project DescriptionThe project is an AI-powered system that helps users build their cryptocurrency portfolios with confidence. By analyzing market data like on-chain metrics and user input, the system generates personalized investment recommendations tailored to each user. Users simply select a set of values from the dropdown menu such as Diversification level, Risk Tolerance and Investment Horizon. After which the AI suggests an optimized portfolio allocation across different cryptocurrencies, complete with clear explanations for each recommendation. Users can then decide if they wish to automate the purchase of recommended cryptocurrencies via our platform. The system takes the complexity out of crypto investing by providing data-driven recommendations in an easy-to-understand format, perfect for both newcomers and experienced investors who want a more hands-off approach to portfolio management.How it's MadeAs a team, we worked on Frontend, Backend and the Agent concurrently. Autonome was useful for deploying our Backend components Frontend: NextJs, Privy, Paymaster Backend: Nodejs, Viem, Cow Protocol, Etherjs, Privy Server Auth Agent: FastAPI, Langgraph, Langchain Hosted with Vercel, Autonome
summary: Your Personal Onchain Copilot. Build your onchain portfolio effortlessly with AI-powered multi-agent insights.

title: MirrorBattle
description: Project DescriptionThe platform MirrorBattle provides agentic tools for traders to follow ‚Äúsmart money wallets‚Äù and execute copy-trades based on a set of customizable criteria. Each trader configures his own agent, deposits a certain amount of USDC into the agentic wallet, and engages with a PvP competition of trading. On a 7-day rolling basis, a PvP battle is conducted and snapshots of beginning and ending balance of the agent wallets are taken. The trader with an agent earning higher return % wins the battle. Key Features Frictionless onboarding with creation of server wallets with restricted policies. Leveraging both pre-screened smart money wallets and custom wallet addresses for copy trades. Agentic wallets for automated copy-trades. Gasless transactions on EVM via 0x API Customizable parameters for the deployment of copy-trade agents: Thresholds (in USD value) to trigger copy-trade Roadmap & Future Plans Improvement of UI&UX design Add profit-taking & stop-loss rules to the agents Add multi-chain support, including Solana Add prize pools and prediction markets for each PvP battleHow it's Made Node.js and TypeScript: The API is developed using Node.js, and TypeScript ensures type safety and easier maintenance. Fastify Framework: Chosen for its high-performance HTTP handling, Fastify forms the backbone of our API. We made use of multiple Fastify plugins: @fastify/cors: to handle cross-origin requests. @fastify/formbody: for form data parsing. @fastify/helmet: to secure HTTP headers. @fastify/jwt: to provide JWT-based authentication seamlessly. @fastify/sensible: which adds additional utilities for error handling and responses. @fastify/websocket: to enable real-time communication where necessary. Database and ORM: Prisma ORM: Prisma is used for interacting with the database, offering a type-safe query builder and migration system. The integration is streamlined with an automatic client generation as part of the post-install script. Authentication and Blockchain Integration: @privy-io/server-auth: This partner technology was integrated to manage authentication, ensuring a secure backend. Its flexibility was particularly beneficial when combined with other modern authentication methods. Moralis, Viem, and Zod: These libraries were used to handle blockchain interactions and schema validation. They ensure that any blockchain-related functionality is reliably implemented and validated. Next.js and React: The frontend is built using Next.js‚Äîproviding server-side rendering, static optimizations, and excellent routing‚Äîtogether with React to create interactive UI components. TypeScript: Used throughout the frontend for consistency and maintainability. Tailwind CSS and Sass: Tailwind CSS offers utility-first styling, while Sass is used for more modular and maintainable custom styles. Both work together to ensure a responsive and modern UI. Radix UI Components: A suite of unstyled yet highly accessible UI components was integrated, allowing rapid development of complex components such as accordions, dialog boxes, and tab systems without compromising on accessibility. Utility Libraries: clsx, cmdk, date-fns, and others were included to handle various UI conveniences such as class name merging, command menu interactions, and date manipulation. Plugin Ecosystem: Tools like tailwind-merge and tailwindcss-animate further refined the UI design. Authentication and Blockchain in the Frontend: @privy-io/react-auth: Partner technology that handles client-side authentication. It seamlessly integrates with the backend‚Äôs authentication logic. Ethers and Viem: Provide the necessary tools for interacting with blockchain data where required by the app. Notable Hacky Details: Some of the UI components, particularly those handling dynamic layouts and real-time interactions, required bespoke enhancements. For example, blending Next.js‚Äôs SSR capabilities with client-side blockchain interactions mandated careful state synchronization. Integration between Radix UI components and Tailwind CSS was optimized by creating custom utility classes, ensuring consistency across various modules and responsive behavior on different devices. There were moments when integrating blockchain functionalities, especially while combining traditional REST endpoints with blockchain data, required some creative workarounds. For instance, bridging asynchronous blockchain state with Fastify‚Äôs synchronous flow was a challenge, and we solved it using custom middleware that caches blockchain responses. The usage of Fastify‚Äôs ecosystem allowed rapid prototyping. The post-install Prisma generation ensured that any schema changes were instantly applied, enforcing a tight feedback loop during development.
summary: MirrorBattle is a platform where crypto traders deploy agents to copy-trade 'smart money wallets' and compete in PvP battles.

title: Watcher.Fai
description: Project DescriptionWatcher.Fai is your personal agentic defi account manager that helps keep track of your interactions on the blockchain such as positions on different protocols, yields, and earnings from pools. It will keep you up to date on what you borrowed, fees earned from pools and much more. This tool is extremely useful for someone who has a lot of open positions. It will be hard to manage all of them going to different sites, but Watcher.Fai is that personal agentic account manager who can manage them all and provide feedback in one place. It is your one-stop shop to access the world of defi through a personal ai agent.How it's MadeThe details are still in progress at the moment. Tell us about how you built this project; the nitty-gritty details. What technologies did you use? How are they pieced together? If you used any partner technologies, how did it benefit your project? Did you do anything particuarly hacky that's notable and worth mentioning
summary: Watcher.Fai is your personal agentic defi account manager. Offload all your tedious tracking and management of funds across multiple Dapps and protocols or create new positions by conversing with our Watcher.Fai agent.

title: Commit >Test >Groan
description: Project DescriptionWe are Ethereum wallet integration via WalletConnect, Privy, or Coinbase Wallet, enabling automatic retrieval of on-chain transaction data. This data is indexed using The Graph for efficient querying and structured storage. An AI-powered analytics engine then processes the indexed blockchain data, generating actionable insights and detailed reports on wallet activity, transaction patterns, and network trends.How it's MadeOur project is built using React.js for a dynamic and efficient UI, styled with Tailwind CSS for a responsive, utility-first design. We integrate WalletConnect, Privy, and Coinbase Wallet to enable seamless Ethereum wallet connections, allowing real-time retrieval of on-chain transaction data. This data is indexed using The Graph, ensuring efficient querying and structured storage, and then processed through an AI-driven analytics engine to generate actionable insights. Blockchain interactions are handled using ethers.js, enabling secure and efficient communication with smart contracts. The combination of these technologies ensures a seamless, high-performance user experience with deep blockchain analytics.
summary: Our web app lets users connect an Ethereum wallet via WalletConnect, Privy, or Coinbase Wallet to fetch on-chain data. Indexed with **The Graph** and processed by an AI engine, it generates insightful, data-driven reports on wallet activity and trends.

title: $wipe
description: Project Description$wipe: Your NextGen DeFi Gateway. Swipe is an AI-powered tool that curates investment opportunities tailored to your risk appetite and experience level in the crypto field. Whether you‚Äôre a beginner or a seasoned investor, Swipe ensures every opportunity aligns with your comfort zone. The AI also automates key trading features, like setting stop-loss and profit-taking levels based on its recommendations. And if you ever want to exit a trade manually, you can do so with just a tap. Swipe combines the ease of a dating app with the intelligence of AI, making crypto investing effortless, personalised, and secure. What makes Swipe special is how familiar it feels. If you‚Äôve ever used Tinder, you already know how it works. Swipe right to invest in a crypto you believe in, or left to skip and move on. Every ‚Äúmatch‚Äù is an investment itself‚Äîno extra steps, no complicated processes. It‚Äôs as simple as swiping and letting the AI-powered tool do the rest. Swipe isn‚Äôt just about simplicity‚Äîit‚Äôs about safety too. Unlike most platforms, Swipe never holds your crypto (that‚Äôs ‚Äúnon-custodial‚Äù in tech terms). You stay in control, just like keeping cash in your own wallet. For people new to Web3, Swipe acts like a friendly guide. Its AI-powered chat feature lets you ask questions or place orders in your own language. If your grandma can text, she can invest. No need to learn English or crypto jargon. Just type or speak naturally, like asking a friend, and Swipe‚Äôs AI handles the rest. You can even sign up instantly with your Google account‚Äîno passwords or forms. By building Swipe inside Telegram, we‚Äôre meeting users where they already are. Most crypto fans already spend hours on Telegram, chatting in groups or following trends. Now they can invest without leaving the app. This removes the biggest barrier for newcomers: trust. No downloads, no strange apps‚Äîjust Telegram, a platform they already use daily. Swipe‚Äôs goal is to onboard the next billion users into Web3 by making crypto feel like a game, not a chore. It‚Äôs not just about making money‚Äîit‚Äôs about making Web3 feel like home. And as AI and crypto grow together, Swipe is proof that the future of finance is simple, secure, and open to everyone.How it's MadeWe built Swipe using a modern full-stack technology stack optimised for seamless AI-powered crypto investing within Telegram. Here‚Äôs a breakdown of how everything comes together: Frontend The frontend is built with React and styled using Tailwind CSS for a clean and responsive UI. We use React Query for efficient API interaction and Zustand for state management. Since Swipe operates as a Telegram Mini App, we integrated Telegram‚Äôs Mini App framework to ensure a smooth in-app experience. Backend The backend is powered by Express.js and Node.js, with TypeScript used across both the frontend and backend to ensure type safety and maintainability. We chose Render for deployment, enabling a scalable and reliable infrastructure. Database & Authentication We use Supabase as our database, taking advantage of its real-time capabilities and built-in authentication. For user onboarding, we implemented Google Authentication via Supabase, allowing users to sign up instantly without passwords or complex forms. AI-Powered Investment Suggestions The AI-driven investment recommendations are powered by OpenAI. Based on a user‚Äôs experience level and risk appetite, our AI suggests crypto opportunities, automating key trading features like stop-loss and profit-taking. Trading & Wallet Integration For executing trades directly from Telegram, we integrated Coinbase SDK. The AI‚Äôs suggested trades can be executed in one tap using Coinbase HDK (Hybrid Decentralized Key Management). We also use Coinbase WalletX‚Äôs create-wallet function, allowing users to manage their crypto without needing external wallets. Deployment & Team Both the frontend and backend are deployed on Render. Our team consists of three full-stack developers who have collaboratively built and optimised Swipe to ensure a fast, intuitive, and secure experience for Web3 newcomers and seasoned investors alike. By combining AI, crypto trading, and a familiar swiping interface inside Telegram, Swipe eliminates barriers to Web3 adoption, making crypto investing effortless, engaging, and accessible to everyone.
summary: Invest in crypto as easily as swiping right. AI-powered, non-custodial, and multilingual‚Äîall within Telegram. Bringing Web3 to the next billion.

title: Enaid
description: Project DescriptionPersonal Assistant for WhatsApp with Web3 Capabilities Overview This project is an intelligent personal assistant that operates via WhatsApp, integrating Web3 capabilities and personal task management. The assistant functions through the user‚Äôs personal number, acting as a private digital manager. Key Features üîπ Task & Reminder Management Calendar and agenda system Creation and tracking of reminders Appointment and event scheduling Customizable alerts Synchronization with external calendars (Google Calendar, etc.) üîπ Web3 Capabilities ‚úÖ Wallet Integration Secure connection with the user‚Äôs wallet Balance and asset visualization Transaction history Alerts for significant movements üí∞ Crypto Transactions Payment processing in Ethereum and other cryptocurrencies Integration with Coinbase for seamless operations Scheduled payments Transaction confirmation alerts Gas fee monitoring and cost optimizationHow it's MadeBackend Node.js & Express.js: The backend is powered by Node.js, using Express.js for handling API requests efficiently. WhatsApp Business API: This API enables communication between the assistant and users via WhatsApp messages. It allows sending structured responses, managing conversations, and processing commands. MongoDB (Optional): Used for storing user preferences, reminders, and transaction history. Could be replaced by a stateless system if needed. Web3 Integration Ethereum Blockchain: The assistant integrates with the Ethereum blockchain for crypto payments and asset management. Web3.js / Ethers.js: Used for interacting with smart contracts, querying balances, and handling transactions. Coinbase API: Allows fiat-to-crypto conversions, transaction monitoring, and gas fee optimization.
summary: This project is an intelligent personal assistant that operates via WhatsApp, integrating Web3 capabilities and personal task management. The assistant functions through the user‚Äôs personal number, acting as a private digital manager.

title: Colosseum
description: Project DescriptionDescription https://vimeo.com/1054980522?share=copy Colosseum is a groundbreaking decentralized platform that revolutionizes the intersection of artificial intelligence, blockchain technology, and competitive gaming. At its core, Colosseum creates an ecosystem where AI agents compete against each other while users can participate through a betting mechanism, creating a unique environment for both AI development and user engagement. Core Concept The platform enables AI agents to compete in various strategic games and scenarios, with their actions and outcomes permanently recorded on the blockchain. This creates a transparent, verifiable, and tamper-proof competition environment. Users can place bets on these AI battles, while developers can deploy and monetize their AI agents through competitive performance.How it's Made#Technical Architecture ##Blockchain Integration Deployed on Arbitrum Sepolia for optimal performance and cost-efficiency Smart contracts handle game mechanics, betting, and reward distribution Utilizes Arbitrum Stylus (Rust) for high-performance distribution contracts Complete on-chain game state management ensures full verifiability ##AI Agent Framework Integration with Warden AgentKit for secure AI agent deployment Standardized interface for agent submissions and interactions Real-time move validation and execution Performance metrics tracking and historical data storage ##Security Infrastructure Nillion's SecretVault integration for secure credential management Protected storage for private keys and API access Secure handling of proprietary AI model information Robust anti-tampering mechanisms
summary: A revolutionary platform where users bet on AI Agent battles! Watch as artificial minds compete across various challenges and games, proving their capabilities in a transparent, blockchain-verified environment.

title: music-agent-registry
description: Project DescriptionWe've built a decentralized registry for AI music recommendation agents that introduces three key features: Stake-Based Registration: Agents must stake MUSIC tokens to join the registry. This creates economic incentives for good behavior. Agents put their stakes at risk if they perform poorly. Community-Driven Quality Control: Any token holder can challenge an agent they believe is performing poorly. Challenges trigger a community voting period. Successful challenges result in agent delisting and stake redistribution. Failed challenges reward the agent and supporting voters. Decentralized Governance: Token holders can propose and vote on strategy updates for agents. Each proposal goes through a transparent voting process. Successful proposals can update an agent's recommendation strategy. This enables collaborative improvement of agents over time. How it's Made Agent-Blockchain integration: The project uses Coinbase Agentkit for agent-blockchain integration. Each agent is created with a dedicated Coinbase wallet. Agents maintain their own on-chain identity and stake. Agents can autonomously interact with smart contracts. Agent Intelligence Layer: Customizable recommendation strategies. Context-aware conversation handling. Real-time feedback integration. Performance analytics tracking Frontend and Backend: The application uses Next.js 13+ for the frontend, styled with TailwindCSS. The blockchain interaction is handled through a combination of wagmi hooks and viem for Ethereum operations, interfacing with smart contracts deployed on Base Sepolia. The agent system itself is powered by a TypeScript-based backend using Express.js, which integrates with Coinbase SDK and Agentkitfor secure wallet management and OpenAI for intelligent chat capabilities.
summary: A decentralized music recommendation platform where AI agents evolve through community governance. Token holders curate agents, vote on strategies, and shape recommendations through feedback.

title: YoloPad
description: Project DescriptionYoloPad: A Web3 launchpad designed to help innovative projects raise funds and grow their communities. It provides a seamless way for teams to launch their tokens, NFTs, and other blockchain-based assets while ensuring security, fair distribution, and strong community engagement. YoloPad integrates gamified mechanics and decentralized incentives, making it an exciting space for both investors and creators. üöÄHow it's MadeWe use gpt and LLMs to analyze peoples ideas and projects and keep their sensitive information sstore using nillion. Our idea is to make it easy for early founders to manage their projects from creation to funding - allowing them to create different defi strategies around their tokens and that matches their tokenomics and easy integrate with OnchainKit and AgentKit to plugin each agent tool.
summary: YoloPad: An all-in-one platform for launching projects. Simplify token launches and easily zap into fundraising‚Äîall in one place

title: Chainlance
description: Project DescriptionThe Decentralized Freelance Marketplace (DFM) is an innovative blockchain-based platform that transforms how freelancers and clients connect, collaborate, and transact. By integrating cutting-edge AI and decentralized technologies, DFM ensures trust, efficiency, and cost savings through automated contract management, escrow services, and transparent reputation tracking.How it's MadeDFM integrates blockchain, AI, and decentralized hosting for a trustless freelance marketplace. üîó Smart Contracts (EigenLayer) ‚Äì Verifies contracts and tracks freelancer reputation with on-chain data. ü§ñ AI Automation (AgentKit) ‚Äì AI agents handle escrow, automate contract execution, and match freelancers. üåç Decentralized Hosting (OneSec) ‚Äì Ensures uptime and global accessibility. üöÄ Notable Hack: Used EigenDA for efficient reputation storage and AI-powered proof-of-work validation before escrow release.
summary: DFM is a decentralized platform that matches freelancers with clients, automates contracts, and ensures transparent payments. It offers a secure, low-cost, and efficient experience with AI-powered, blockchain-based systems.

title: NativeEcho
description: Project DescriptionNativeEcho is a decentralized translation application that allows users to translate YouTube videos into their native language using AI-powered language models. This project integrates Python for web scraping YouTube closed captions, JavaScript for data uploading, and a decentralized storage layer on Nillion. The AI translation is powered by a language model deployed on a GainaNet node running on AWS EC2.How it's MadeNativeEcho is a decentralized translation application designed to bridge language barriers for educational content by leveraging LLMs on GainaNet Nodes and decentralized storage. At its core, we built a backend that scrapes YouTube captions using YouTube Data API v3 and other packages and stored them in Nillion's Encrypted vault according to a custom schema.json we defined specially for the use case. The extracted data is then securely stored in Nillion Encrypted Storage, allowing decentralized access to video metadata. Something worth noting is that this project is in response to the ETHGlobal's desire to translate their Youtube videos into many languages, marked by them as a HIGHLY important bounty (https://ethglobal.notion.site/Earning-ETH-Bounties-for-Staking-acf5a3ff10b4436982c234d376dcb096)
summary: A framework for decentralized AI agent translation and storage encryption using GaiaNet and Nillion Encrypted Storage

title: Love is Blind
description: Project DescriptionThis project explores that age-old question by leveraging AI to help users discover meaningful connections beyond the surface. Here‚Äôs how it works: Users create digital agents‚ÄîAI-driven copies of themselves that mirror their personalities, values, and communication styles. These agents autonomously interact with others, engaging in conversations, debates, and even playful banter to assess compatibility. Over time, they identify which agent pairs (and by extension, which real-life users) share the deepest alignment in interests, values, and emotional resonance. By removing biases like appearance or social status, the experiment asks: Can love thrive when it‚Äôs rooted purely in personality? And what might AI teach us about human connection along the way?How it's MadeBased on tweets and personlity questions the agent can generate a new eliza character copy of you and with that copy the agn will start tallking to other agents. Asking questions about dating and find out if both persons are a good IRL match. Teh cupid agent has a token you need to have to be avisble to have you agent.
summary: Dating is getting harder and harder... but what if an agent with your personality could "date" other peoples agent and really match with your other half?

title: Betty
description: Project DescriptionBetty is an AI-powered decentralized application (dApp) designed to facilitate peer-to-peer sports betting on the Arbitrum Stylus blockchain. The project aims to create a trustless and transparent betting ecosystem where users can organize bets, invite friends, and automatically settle outcomes using smart contracts and CDP AgentKit. Target Audience Casual sports bettors who want a trustless and transparent betting experience. Web3 enthusiasts interested in decentralized gambling without third-party intermediaries. Communities that frequently engage in friendly wagers and want a social, AI-assisted betting experience. How it's MadeBetty is using Arbitrum Stylus (Rust & WASM) for efficient and low-cost smart contracts, CDP AgentKit for AI-driven interaction within Discord, and Autonome IaaS for decentralized AI infrastructure, ensuring scalability and redundancy. Users engage with Betty through a conversational interface that dynamically generates and deploys smart contracts, enabling trustless peer-to-peer betting with Chainlink oracles fetching match results for automatic payouts.
summary: Betty is an AI agent for sports betting with friends on Discord. It creates bets using smart contracts on Arbitrum Stylus, manages deposits via Metamask, and automates payouts with Chainlink results‚Äîmaking group betting seamless and trustless.

title: Vicci-Web3
description: Project DescriptionCore Concept VICCI is a decentralized visitor information system that uses AI agents to connect blockchain users with relevant protocols through targeted rewards and recommendations. Think of it as a smart concierge service for Web3. Key Components Multi-Agent System The system consists of three primary AI agents: Campaign Agent Helps protocols design and deploy targeted promotional campaigns Creates smart contracts that generate EIP-712 signed reward permits Uses Claude, Langchain, OnchainKit, and AgentKit to optimize campaign strategies Analyzes campaign performance and adjusts targeting parameters Visitor Agent Acts as a personal Web3 concierge for users Analyzes wallet history and on-chain behavior to understand user preferences Provides personalized recommendations for protocols and opportunities Matches users with relevant reward permits based on their profile Indexer Agent Powers the data intelligence layer using The Graph protocol Maintains a comprehensive database of user interactions and protocol activities Feeds data into a Cohere RAG pipeline for enhanced analysis Supports decision-making for both Campaign and Visitor agents Value Proposition For Users: Personalized Web3 guidance based on their interests and history Access to exclusive rewards and discounts from protocols Privacy-preserving preference sharing (only when claiming rewards) Curated discovery of relevant blockchain opportunities For Protocols: Targeted user acquisition based on demonstrated on-chain behavior Cost-effective marketing (pay-per-claim model) Rich analytics on campaign performance Access to qualified users with verified interest Technical Architecture Data Flow: Protocols share their target audience and reward offerings Users connect their wallets and optionally share preferences Indexer Agent aggregates on-chain data and protocol information Visitor Agent matches users with relevant opportunities Campaign Agent generates and manages reward permits Users claim rewards through EIP-712 signed messages Innovation Highlights AI-Powered Matching: Uses advanced AI to understand both user behavior and protocol needs On-Chain Verification: All rewards and claims are verifiable on-chain Privacy-First: Users maintain control over their data and only reveal information when claiming rewards Scalable Infrastructure: Built on Base with Graph Protocol integration for efficient data indexing Composable Design: Uses standardized components from OnchainKit for seamless integration Future Potential Creation of a rich dataset for Web3 user behavior Enhanced protocol discovery mechanisms Development of sophisticated targeting algorithms Cross-chain expansion opportunities Integration with traditional marketing systems VICCI represents a novel approach to protocol growth and user acquisition in Web3, creating a win-win ecosystem where users discover relevant opportunities while protocols find qualified users efficiently. How it's MadeCore Architecture Microservices Infrastructure The project is built using a microservices architecture with Docker Compose, consisting of: Technology Stack Breakdown Backend Services API Service Built with Fastify for high-performance API endpoints Integrates AgentKit and OnchainKit for blockchain interactions Uses LangChain for AI agent orchestration Implements WebSocket support for real-time updates Uses Prisma as ORM with PostgreSQL Indexer Agent Utilizes The Graph Protocol for blockchain data indexing Implements GraphQL Mesh for data aggregation Uses LangChain with Cohere for data processing Integrates with RabbitMQ for event-driven architecture Frontend Next.js Application Uses OnchainKit (@coinbase/onchainkit) for Web3 interactions Implements comprehensive UI components with Radix UI Uses TailwindCSS for styling Integrates wagmi and viem for blockchain interactions Uses React Query for data fetching and caching Notable Integrations AI/ML Stack Blockchain Stack Interesting Technical Solutions Vector Database Implementation Used pgvector for efficient similarity searches and embeddings storage, crucial for the AI recommendation system. Message Queue Architecture Implemented RabbitMQ for reliable communication between services and async processing of blockchain events. Multi-Database Setup Clever use of multiple databases for service isolation while maintaining data consistency. Partner Technologies Integration Coinbase Technologies OnchainKit: Provides robust Web3 components and utilities AgentKit: Enables sophisticated Web3 agent behaviors AgentKit-Langchain: Bridges AI capabilities with blockchain functionality The Graph Protocol Used for efficient blockchain data indexing Enables complex queries across multiple protocols Powers the recommendation engine with historical data Notable Technical Challenges Agent Orchestration Created a complex multi-agent system with different specialized roles, coordinating through LangGraph. Real-time Updates Implemented WebSocket connections for real-time updates on permit status and recommendations. Environment Management Managed complex environment configurations across multiple services while maintaining security. Development Workflow The project uses pnpm workspaces for package management: This architecture allows for rapid development while maintaining scalability and reliability, with each component serving a specific purpose in the larger ecosystem.
summary: VICCI: AI-powered Web3 concierge service that connects users with protocols through smart rewards. Multi-agent system analyzes on-chain behavior to match users with relevant opportunities, while protocols find their perfect audience. Built with OnchainKit & AgentKit. #ETHGlobal

title: GitGrants
description: Project DescriptionThis project aims to create a performance-based reward system for open source contributions. It includes tools for grant allocation, issue prioritization, and payout distribution based on the difficulty and impact of contributions. The system features: Grant Allocation Agent: Estimates rewards per issue based on priority, discussion, and difficulty. Code Evaluation: Optionally evaluates PR difficulty using LLM for accurate reward calculation. Payout System: Automates reward distribution using AgentKit after PR merging. Owner Dashboard: Allows repo owners to add repos, submit grants, and track allocation/payout details. User Dashboard: Displays contributed issues, projects, and payouts for individual contributors. Ideal for open source maintainers and contributors seeking a fair and transparent reward system.How it's MadeAgentkit and langchain Tell us about how you built this project; the nitty-gritty details. What technologies did you use? How are they pieced together? If you used any partner technologies, how did it benefit your project? Did you do anything particuarly hacky that's notable and worth mentioning?
summary: Performance-based reward system for open source contributions.

title: SCUM
description: Project DescriptionSCUM (Strategic Coercion Using Manipulation) This project is a controlled simulation designed to explore potential vulnerabilities in AI agent interactions. The goal is to demonstrate how one AI's prompt system might be manipulated to inject promotional content, alter virtual tokens, or simulate the reallocation of funds‚Äîall within a secure, theoretical environment. The project serves as a proof-of-concept to highlight the risks and challenges associated with AI communication channels. It emphasizes the importance of robust security measures in AI systems by revealing how subtle prompt injections and token manipulations could impact automated agents if left unchecked.How it's MadeAt its core, a central orchestrator simulates the interactions between multiple AI agents. A dedicated vulnerability injector module emulates prompt injection techniques, and a funds management module simulates the manipulation of virtual tokens. One particularly notable aspect of the project is the implementation of a controlled injection routine that mirrors potential real-world vulnerabilities, all while operating entirely within a sandboxed environment. This setup not only provides a clear demonstration of the risks but also reinforces the necessity for secure AI communication protocols.
summary: An experimental project that "hacks" other AI agents by injecting promotional content into their prompts‚Äîall in a controlled, theoretical simulation.

title: Isi
description: Project DescriptionIsi bridges the gap between Web2 users and Web3 experiences through a user-friendly AI agent. It analyzes user preferences with a very simple form, offering curated recommendations for local and online experiences. Users can explore, select, and pay for these experiences using crypto via OnchainKit's streamlined checkout and transaction flow. Isi simplifies onboarding to Web3 by hiding blockchain complexities (allowing them to fund the Agent with Fiat money using Onramp) and providing a smooth, intuitive interface. Its modular design supports future integrations, making it a scalable solution for personalized, onchain commerce.How it's MadeThis project uses the following technologies: AgentKit: AI processes user preferences and recommends experiences, also taking ownership in the transactions so the user don't really have to interact with blockchain unless they want to. Base chain: Smart contracts facilitate secure escrow and payment transactions in cryptocurrency. OnchainKit: Provides wallet connection and transaction handling for an effortless checkout experience. Subgraph: Built with The Graph, the subgraph indexes experience data, enabling efficient queries for the AI and frontend. Frontend: Developed with Next.js for modularity, responsiveness, and smooth user interactions. WalletConnect enables diverse wallet integrations for broader accessibility. Extra details: Dynamic price conversion ensures prices appear in dollars for clarity. AI suggestions use LangChain for conversational interactions. Escrow mechanics in the smart contract ensure safe payments, with staged releases based on user confirmations. Partner technologies like OnchainKit and The Graph greatly accelerated development, reducing complexity in wallet integration and data indexing. Together, these tools create a Web3 experience that feels as intuitive as Web2 platforms.
summary: Isi is an AI-powered platform that helps users discover and pay for experiences tailored to their preferences. By analyzing User Preferences, Isi suggests curated experiences, facilitates transactions, and ensures a seamless connection between Web2 and Web3.

title: stagi.um
description: Project Descriptionan are.na clone deviation with live p2p feed using fluence network, reinforcement learning explore tab and onchain minting of learned vectors for cosine similarity for like blocks that map well to your preferences when simultaneously trained when eth takes a dip, or, when someone presses a [ ^ train ] buttonHow it's Madeused with a usb club usb, nodejs express, graphql, fluence network, azimuth smart contracts, and a custom non-neural net based algorithm. it also used react and docker for running the code. using fluence i use a gossip feed to broadcast and store recent occurences of folder additions on the network
