The combination of these technologies, along with custom solutions for specific challenges, creates a robust, secure, and scalable system for Web3 interactions. The use of partner technologies significantly reduced development complexity while enhancing security and functionality. The system is built with a focus on scalability, maintainability, and security, ensuring an optimal user experience and long-term reliability. üåü Built for the future of Web3! üåü
summary: BlockBlend: AI-powered tool bridging Web2 and Web3. Analyze apps, suggest blockchain features, and provide easy-to-use embeddable tags. Simplify integration of crypto, ZK proofs, and protocols for developers.

title: Hello World Computer
description: Project DescriptionHello World Computer is a chat-based onboarding experience. Newcomers to Ethereum can claim starter packs, which entitle them to a small Ethdrop to cover gas fees, a choice of NFTs, an ERC20 token (FLAUNCHY or AERO) to get started with Defi, and a basename all of their own! Chatting through natural language, enhanced with interactive components, this is an enriched an helpful way to get started with Ethereum! Meanwhile, Ethereum OGs can buy starter packs which are made available to newcomers as gifts!How it's MadeWe used: OpenAI LLM Vercel ai-sdk Agentkit for action orchestration Forked Vercel's AI Chatbot Onchainkit for web3 login & displaying some components We built: Custom web3 login for Vercel's AI chatbot - next-auth compatible, powered by SIWE (backend session auth) Leveraged the latest structured model outputs from the ai-sdk to provide interactive in-chat experiences AI-SDK <-> Agentkit tool wrapper Privy Wallet provider for Agentkit https://github.com/coinbase/agentkit/pull/242 <Checkout/> component from onchainkit to support EOAs https://github.com/coinbase/onchainkit/pull/1937 Basename creation & transfer action provider Gnosis safe creation & transaction action provider Zora NFT minting provider Custom Alchemy token balances action provider Custom interactive components in-chat (options, asking for help, connecting wallet, checkout) Coinbase Checkout lifecycle & backend purchase verification Simple memory solution for the agent across user chats
summary: A truly magical onboarding experience you can gift to your normie friends.

title: Creative AI Agents
description: Project DescriptionThis project explores the intersection of conversational AI and tokenized systems. By integrating a token launcher within ElizaOS, users can earn tokens by engaging in meaningful conversations with Eliza, trading them with other users, or even purchasing them. These tokens can be used to influence Eliza's responses, unlocking new conversational pathways and personality traits, or even contribute to a shared narrative within the ElizaOS environment. This approach aims to create a more engaging and dynamic user experience, fostering a deeper connection between users and the AI through a system of rewards and personalized interactions.How it's MadeThis project combines a custom TypeScript ElizaOS framework, smart contracts on the Polygon blockchain, and a Next.js frontend. The TypeScript framework manages conversational interactions and integrates with the token smart contracts, which govern token creation, distribution, and usage. The Next.js frontend provides a user interface and bridges connections to external platforms. We've integrated Warpcast, Discord, and Telegram APIs, enabling cross-platform interaction with ElizaOS and token management. Image generation is powered by the FAL.AI API. Users can earn tokens through platform engagement and use them to, for example, generate images or trigger Warpcast actions. A custom Express.js API layer facilitates communication between the frontend, framework, and smart contracts (using ethers.js). Key challenges included seamless cross-platform integration and maintaining data consistency. We're actively developing new features, including additional platform integrations and expanded AI capabilities.
summary: An AI Agent swarm that handles day to day creative work, investing and guidance.

title: YieldSage
description: Project DescriptionOur team built a DeFi platform designed to help liquidity providers (LPs) efficiently manage their investments in Uniswap liquidity pools. The platform incorporates AI-driven insights and automation to optimize liquidity management and maximize returns. Key Features of Our Platform 1.Deposit and Manage Liquidity Users can provide liquidity to various Uniswap pools. Funds are allocated based on predefined strategies and AI recommendations. 2.AI-Based Pool Analysis An AI agent analyzes different Uniswap pools. Users receive key insights to help them decide whether to invest in a particular pool. 3.Concentrated Liquidity Management AI helps optimize liquidity positions within specific price ranges for higher efficiency. 4.Automated Fund Rebalancing Another AI agent dynamically redistributes funds across pools. The rebalancing considers risk appetite, gas fees, and profit potential to maximize earnings. 5.AI-Generated Insights for Liquidity Providers When analyzing a pool, our AI agent provides the following structured insights: Recommendation: Should the user invest or not? Confidence Level: High / Medium / Low Key Factors: Important aspects influencing the decision. Risks: Potential risks associated with the pool. Opportunities: Advantages and profit potential. These insights help users make informed decisions before investing in a liquidity pool.How it's MadeWe combined ReactJS, Web3 tools, AI, and The Graph to create a liquidity management platform that helps users analyze and optimize their investments in Uniswap pools. Here‚Äôs how everything fits together: Frontend (ReactJS + Tailwind CSS) ‚Üí Handles the user interface, making it easy to interact with the platform. Wallet Connection (Ether.js) ‚Üí Allows users to connect MetaMask and interact with Uniswap pools. Data Fetching (The Graph Protocol - Uniswap Subgraph) ‚Üí Fetches data about Uniswap liquidity pools. Charts & Visualization (Recharts.js) ‚Üí Displays important metrics like volume, liquidity, and price trends in graphical form. AI (Groq's Mixtral LLM) ‚Üí Analyzes Uniswap pool data and provides users with insights, such as risk assessment and investment opportunities. Deployment - We used OneSec for quick and efficient deployment of our platform.
summary: We are building an AI-powered DeFi platform that analyzes various protocols (like Uniswap, Aave) and pools within them. It compares key parameters like returns, fees, liquidity, and risks to suggest the best investment or trading opportunities.

title: YieldMax AI
description: Project DescriptionThe DeFi Yield Maximizer Agent is an advanced, autonomous AI-powered investment tool designed to optimize stablecoin yields across multiple decentralized finance (DeFi) protocols. Built specifically for the Base blockchain, this intelligent agent continuously monitors market conditions, analyzes investment opportunities, and automatically manages a user's crypto portfolio with a focus on maximizing returns while maintaining robust risk management. Key features include: Real-time market analysis across multiple DeFi protocols Automated yield optimization strategies Intelligent risk assessment Secure wallet management Gas-cost aware transaction execution Cross-protocol investment tracking The agent leverages cutting-edge technologies like artificial intelligence, blockchain infrastructure, and advanced financial algorithms to provide hands-off, intelligent crypto investment management. It can automatically detect the most profitable lending and yield opportunities, rebalance positions, and make data-driven investment decisions with minimal human intervention.How it's MadeThe DeFi Yield Maximizer Agent emerged through strategic collaboration with key blockchain ecosystem partners, leveraging their cutting-edge technologies to create a next-generation autonomous investment platform. Technologies and Tools Used: Technologies and Tools Used: Base Provided the primary deployment infrastructure Enabled low-cost, high-speed transactions Offered optimal environment for DeFi protocols Supported by Coinbase's Blockchain ecosystem Coinbase Developer Platform (CDP) Enabled secure wallet infrastructure Provided comprehensive SDK for blockchain interactions Simplified complex blockchain operations Offered robust key management and transaction capabilities AgentKit by Coinbase Delivered modular AI agent framework Provided pre-built blockchain interaction tools Enabled rapid development of intelligent agents Simplified integration of AI reasoning with blockchain actions Autonome Platform Powered autonomous agent deployment and hosting Provided scalable AI infrastructure Enabled seamless API integration Offered secure environment for AI agent operations Simplified agent maintenance and monitoring Architectural Innovation The project's core innovation lies in combining artificial intelligence with blockchain infrastructure. By utilizing AgentKit's flexible framework and Autonome's robust hosting platform, we created an autonomous agent capable of making sophisticated financial decisions across multiple DeFi protocols. The agent intelligently: Analyzes market conditions in real-time Identifies yield optimization opportunities Executes risk-aware investment strategies Manages transactions across different protocols The integration of Autonome's platform with CDP and AgentKit creates a powerful synergy, enabling: Reliable agent availability and performance Secure handling of sensitive operations Scalable processing of market data Efficient execution of DeFi strategies The agent intelligently: Analyzes market conditions in real-time Identifies yield optimization opportunities Executes risk-aware investment strategies Manages transactions across different protocols Technical Approach The solution was built using a multi-layered approach: AI-powered decision-making engine Blockchain interaction layer Risk management algorithms Secure transaction simulation system Unique Capabilities Cross-protocol yield tracking Automated portfolio rebalancing Gas-cost optimized strategies Intelligent risk assessment Key Technologies Artificial Intelligence (GPT models) Blockchain Infrastructure Smart Contract Interactions Decentralized Finance Protocols The project represents a significant leap in autonomous financial management, demonstrating how AI and blockchain can work together to create intelligent, self-managing investment systems. Future Potential This proof-of-concept showcases the immense potential of AI-driven financial tools, with future iterations potentially expanding to more protocols, more complex investment strategies, and broader financial management capabilities. The DeFi Yield Maximizer Agent is not just a product, but a glimpse into the future of intelligent, automated financial systems powered by cutting-edge blockchain and AI technologies.
summary: An AI-powered yield maximizer for stablecoins on Base. The AI agent automatically selects optimal lending strategies across protocols, while users maintain control through their dedicated AI-Agent powered wallets.

title: NucleuX
description: Project DescriptionNucleux is an intelligent orchestration service designed to streamline crypto transactions by determining the most optimal workflow for user queries. The system follows a structured pipeline for processing user prompts and executing crypto-related tasks: Initial Processing (Routing Service) User prompts first enter the Prompt Structuring Service This service breaks down complex requests into manageable subtasks The structured workflow then passes through a Validation Service Validation ensures the workflow is feasible and properly structured Action Mapping Service The validated workflow enters the Action Mapping Service layer A Resource Planner analyzes the workflow and determines required resources The Resource Planner interfaces with a Pool of Agents (Bridging, Swapping, Exchange) Task Mapper assigns specific subtasks to appropriate agents based on their capabilities Agent Pool Utilization Any agents deployed on Autonome can be utlised and plugged into the pool. The multi agent orchestrator facilitates collaboration in this dynamic environment where multiple agents not knowing each other can communicate to achieve the end goal For demonstration we deployed three specialized agent on Autonome: Bridging Agent: Handles cross-chain transfers Swapper Agent: Manages token swaps Exchanger Agent: Handles currency/token exchanges Final Output The system processes the workflow through the assigned agents Results are compiled and presented as the final output This architecture ensures efficient processing of user requests through structured decomposition, validation, and intelligent resource allocation.How it's MadeHere's a detailed breakdown of how we built this project, including the technologies, architecture, and some interesting hacks we implemented: üõ†Ô∏è Tech Stack & Architecture Core Technologies Used Backend: Node.js (Express) for the orchestration logic Frontend: React with TypeScript for the UI and interaction plugin Blockchain & Agents: Autonome for deploying and managing agents Covalent SDK Zee for fetching on-chain data Orchestration Layer: Custom-built using event-driven architecture üîó How Everything Fits Together User Query Processing The user submits a request (e.g., ‚ÄúBuy USDC on Gnosis via UPI‚Äù). The Prompt Structuring Service (subservice of Routing Service) breaks this into multiple subtasks, each handled by a specialized agent. Workflow Validation & Optimization The Validation Service checks feasibility, correctness, and dependencies before execution. Optimizations like cost minimization and route efficiency are applied. Agent Allocation & Execution The Resource Planner (in the Action Mapping Service) selects agents from the Autonome-deployed pool (Swapping, Bridging, Exchange). The Task Manager assigns each agent a specific responsibility. Agents communicate asynchronously enabling parallel execution. Transaction Execution & Feedback Loop Once the user reviews the plan, and approves the workflow, execution begins. The frontend/plugin dynamically updates the status of workflow ‚ö° Cool & Hacky Stuff We Did Dynamic Agent Deployment Instead of hardcoding agents, we made it plug-and-play. Agents deployed via Autonome are instantly available without manual configurations. Cost-Based Routing Optimization The orchestration layer intelligently prioritizes routes with lower gas fees and higher efficiency using Covalent SDK Zee + our custom logic. Frontend as a Plugin Instead of building a standalone UI, we developed a lightweight frontend plugin that integrates into existing dApps for seamless adoption. Multi-Layer Validation for Transaction Safety Instead of a single-layer check, we implemented multi-step validation at: Workflow Structuring Pre-Execution Sanity Checks Agent-Level Validation üöÄ Why These Choices? Modularity ‚Üí Each agent is independent, making the system extensible. User Control & Transparency ‚Üí Users always get full visibility before execution. This setup makes our multi-agent orchestration service highly efficient, resilient, and developer-friendly.
summary: A plug-and-play multi-agent orchestrator framework leveraging Covalent SDK that automates complex workflows for agents deployed on Autonome

title: EiLearn
description: Project DescriptionEiLearn is an AI-driven Web3 platform that teaches users about crypto trading and staking. Beginners can practice in a risk-free environment, while experienced traders can test strategies with AI advisors. All trades are verified on-chain using a decentralized system, preventing fraud and manipulation. AI-powered insights help users make better trading decisions, and rankings are based on fair and transparent trade validation.How it's MadeWe built EiLearn using React, AI agents, and smart contracts to create a secure and fair trading platform. Smart contracts handle trade validation, rankings, and rewards, keeping everything on-chain for transparency. AI advisors analyze market trends to give trade recommendations, while AVS (Actively Validated Services) uses multi-signature consensus to verify trades and prevent fraud. We also added fraud detection to catch wash trading and spoofing using historical data. For security, we use EigenLayer, which punishes bad actors and ensures fair trade validation. We optimized the system for fast and low-cost trade verification and integrated blockchain oracles for real-time market data. Everything works together to provide a trustless, gamified, and educational trading experience. For the user account system, we also tapped on Privy.
summary: EiLearn is an AI-powered Web3 platform that helps users learn crypto trading through a decentralized trading game. Traders can practice with testnet coins, get AI-driven insights, and transition to real trading with fair, on-chain trade validation.

title: Gossip Girl
description: Project DescriptionGG (Gossip Girl) is an innovative Web3 platform that reimagines social content sharing through blockchain technology. Built on the Base Sepolia Network, it combines a React/TypeScript frontend with a Next.js backend to create a nostalgic, 2010s-inspired experience where users can transform their secrets into valuable NFTs using the Metaplex ERC-721 standard. The platform features a custom-trained AI Gossip Girl bot for authentic interactions, seamless wallet management through Privy integration, and a unique NFT marketplace for trading digital secrets. With its retro-themed UI and modern blockchain capabilities, GG creates a bridge between classic social media drama and Web3 ownership, allowing users to not just share content, but truly own and monetize their digital narratives. The platform's architecture ensures secure transactions, scalable performance, and an engaging user experience that captures the essence of the original Gossip Girl era while leveraging cutting-edge blockchain technology. XOXO! üíãHow it's MadeGG (Gossip Girl) was crafted as a modern Web3 platform by combining cutting-edge blockchain technology with nostalgic 2010s web design. The development began with setting up a dual-architecture system: a dynamic frontend built using React and TypeScript, powered by Vite for optimal development experience, and a robust backend implemented with Next.js for efficient API routing and server-side operations. The frontend architecture focuses on component-based development, featuring a retro-inspired UI that captures the essence of the Gossip Girl era while maintaining modern usability standards. Each component, from the tweet-style NFT creation interface to the collection galleries, was carefully designed to blend nostalgia with contemporary Web3 functionality. The blockchain integration forms the core of GG's infrastructure, built on the Base Sepolia Network using the Metaplex ERC-721 standard for NFT operations. The platform implements Privy Wallet integration for seamless Web3 transactions, allowing users to easily mint, trade, and collect digital secrets as NFTs. One of the most distinctive features is the custom-trained AI bot, developed using natural language processing to capture the iconic Gossip Girl voice, providing users with an authentic and engaging experience. The backend APIs handle everything from NFT metadata management and image processing to wallet policy administration and social features, all while maintaining secure and scalable operations. The development process prioritized user experience without compromising on technical sophistication. The team implemented modern development practices including TypeScript for type safety, component reusability for consistent design, and efficient state management for smooth user interactions. Security considerations were paramount, with careful attention paid to wallet integration, transaction handling, and data privacy. The result is a platform that successfully marries the drama and excitement of Gossip Girl with the technological innovations of Web3, creating a unique space where digital secrets become valuable assets and social interaction meets blockchain technology. XOXO! üíã
summary: Spotted: Gossip Girl 2.0! Our AI-powered, Eliza-inspired bot is back, slaying the rumor game. Scraping secrets, dropping scandal, & keeping your timeline scandalously fresh. XOXO, Gossip Girl.

title: Infinity
description: Project DescriptionImage owning a remote food truck; you want to quickly run a promotional offer (i.e. free taco) to attract and reward loyal customers, but have limited resources and time to make it happen. Introducing the Infinity AI Agent‚Äîsmall businesses are now a chat away from automated loyalty/promotional offer campaigns that can run from anywhere, anytime! Owners can now manage their promotional offers and loyalty programs through the subscription-based platform which can be accessed through a computer or phone. With just a few steps, business owners set up offers through an Agent chat interface that collects basic details to set up the promotional offer. The Agent creates the campaign; writes some social media posts to kick it off; and automates the distribution, tracking, and redemption of the offers directly with customers. In turn, customers can receive offers directly with their wallet and quickly redeem them digitally when they claim their promotional offer. Infinity also tracks and monitors the promotional offer/loyalty program campaign budgets and user engagement so businesses can understand the marketing impact with relevant data, and adjust campaigns as needed. Infinity AI Agent is the future of loyalty programs: on-chain and automated, anywhere at anytime, easy-to-use and set-it-and-forget-it!How it's MadeUsing Blockchain, Eliza AI, and NFT technology, we have created an easy-to-use AI Agent for businesses so they can focus on running the core operations of their business and interacting directly with customers. Blockchain technology allows us to build a foundation for quick and instant digital payments and digital coupons: Business: Subscribe to Infinity AaaS with a wallet (new to Web3 owners can instantly create a wallet through social login, or an existing wallet can be connected). Fund AI Agent wallet gas fees (as relevant). Agent: Receive funding through the business owner‚Äôs wallet. Parse customer wallets from business payments wallet transactions to create a database of customer wallet addresses and note points by spend. Then the agent can note if customers have enough points for a promotional offer and identify which wallets to send the promotional offer to accordingly. Create a separate Agent wallet to manage NFT minting and burning directly with customer wallets, and track points balance reduction after customer claims an offer. Customer: Receive NFT promotional offer coupon from the Agent (after paying with cryptocurrency to business payments wallet QR Code and earning sufficient points). Connect wallet to webpage where they can quickly redeem their NFT to claim their promotional offer. Eliza AI allows us to create an advanced AI agent that compiles multiple tasks into one AI framework without having to set up an ecosystem of task-based agents. Eliza gives us a more advanced platform to start from and ability to program more complex (but still connected) tasks. Promo Set-Up: AI consolidates the campaign information into actionable items and also creates them on-demand: smart contract, NFT, campaign-specific social media content, QR Code. AI also allows us to configure multiple APIs across fields to execute actions on the owner‚Äôs behalf. Program Automation: AI monitors the merchant wallet address income to distribute tokens, which work as points in a tamper-proof customer loyalty system. AI scans customer requirements and automatically approves NFT/offer redemption based on specific criteria set by the business (i.e. social media follow, minimum amount of prior spend). Data Insights: AI is especially beneficial in distilling valuable insights through the gathering and visualization of data over time, which enables owners to optimize campaigns to be more effective without spending the time on complex data analytics. NFTs allow us to create digital coupons that can be quickly created with images and without printing. These digital coupons can be sent directly to customers and then redeemed automatically by the Agent after customers meet pre-set criteria, making it a hassle-free and hands-free experience for Owners. Other - API for QR Code: Agent creates an HTML QR Code for customers to scan (if needed) and land on a webpage. We are using technology for real world use cases and real world users. Let's bring the world on-chain!
summary: AI Agent for small business owners to automate customer loyalty/promotional programs.

title: KOVA
description: Project DescriptionAI agents will soon be as common as personal assistants, executing tasks and making decisions for users. But today‚Äôs AI agents come with major flaws: No Ownership ‚Äì AI models are centralized and can disappear anytime. No Portability ‚Äì AI agents are locked to specific platforms. No Privacy ‚Äì AI agents must reveal everything to collaborate. KOVA solves this by introducing tokenized AI agents and secure execution environments. üîπ Tokenization: True AI Ownership Own your AI ‚Äì Agents exist independently as NFTs. Monetize AI ‚Äì Sell, rent, or use agents as collateral in DeFi. Platform agnostic ‚Äì Built on open-source models for full portability. AI agents are now digital assets with real value. üîí Secure Rooms: Private AI Execution Private AI execution ‚Äì Even owners can‚Äôt see what happens inside. Smart contract-enforced rules ‚Äì Ensures trust & compliance. Locked AI NFTs ‚Äì Prevents unauthorized changes during execution. Agents execute trades, investments, and decisions autonomously & securely. üìà First Use Case: AI-Powered Trading Traders tokenize AI trading strategies (e.g., ‚ÄúBuy 1st higher volume coin in the last 7 days for 100 USDT‚Äù). Investors define constraints (e.g., ‚ÄúNo meme coins, max 100 USDT per trade‚Äù). Agents interact in a Secure Room, executing trades without revealing strategies or constraints. Privacy-first execution ensures intellectual property protection for both traders & investors. üåç AI Agents in DeFi & Beyond Trade AI agents on OpenSea & Blur. Use AI as collateral for lending & staking. Build composable AI services for automated execution. üöÄ KOVA: The Future of AI as an Asset Class Discover & match AI agents tailored to your needs. Tokenize AI services to generate passive income. Enable AI collaboration while keeping data private. By combining tokenization with secure execution, KOVA ensures AI truly belongs to its users‚Äîprivate, composable, and onchain.How it's MadeKOVA revolutionizes AI agent interactions by combining secure communication with tokenization, enabling AI agents to engage in private, verifiable exchanges while maintaining full DeFi compatibility. Core Innovation: Secure Agent-to-Agent Communication We've created a "Secure Room" concept where AI agents can interact and share sensitive data - once agents leave the room, even their owners cannot recover the exchanged information. This breakthrough is achieved through a architecture combining Gaia's decentralized compute infrastructure with Nillion's SecureVault and TEEs: Tokenization Layer: Implemented ERC-7662 standard (extending ERC-721) for agent tokenization, enabling seamless integration with existing DeFi primitives like lending and collateralization Deployed on Base Sepolia (https://base-sepolia.blockscout.com/address/0xEF78E7D23A02a404D348a0f37ac0fF4D10991D1a), featuring permissionless agent creation Dual storage system using Nillion SecureVault for private prompts ( `nillion://${orgDid}/${schemaId}/${recodrId) and IPFS for public strategies, giving users flexibility in privacy levels Secure Room Implementation: The room itself is an AI agent with an associated smart contract that temporarily locks participating agent NFTs Leverages Gaia nodes for decentralized compute, running in a secure environment (future TEE integration planned) Each room receives a dedicated CDP wallet via AgentKit for executing agreed-upon transactions Built-in tooling interface for common operations (getParticipants(), getVolumeData("7d"), executeTrade()) Implemented computation limits to prevent resource exhaustion from recursive strategies Security Considerations: While our current MVP uses an organization-level Nillion implementation, our architecture is designed for user-specific SecureVaults derived from private keys, maximizing privacy. We've also implemented a "click-your-strategy" interface instead of free-text prompts, preventing arbitrary strategy execution while maintaining user control over supported trading patterns. Technical Infrastructure: Smart contracts deployed on Base Sepolia with custom token pools and faucet for testing Gaia nodes handle secure room computation and agent simulation Nillion SecureVault manages sensitive prompt storage and retrieval AgentKit integration enables onchain actions through CDP wallets Custom tooling interface for standardized agent interactions What Sets Us Apart: Implementation of truly private agent-to-agent communication Novel combination of Gaia's compute layer with Nillion's secure storage Full DeFi compatibility through ERC-7662 standardization Scalable architecture supporting future TEE integration Production-ready security measures preventing common attack vectors We've focused on creating a robust foundation for secure agent interactions while maintaining practicality and usability. Our architecture enables unprecedented privacy in agent-to-agent communications while remaining fully compatible with existing DeFi infrastructure - a combination we believe is essential for the future of autonomous AI systems in crypto.
summary: Kova is a privacy-first, AI-driven platform that connects users‚Äîinvestors, traders, and beyond‚Äîwith AI agents based on their objectives and preferences, ensuring secure execution and data privacy.

title: Glance
description: Project DescriptionThe system features an automated content discovery engine that monitors Farcaster, scanning for user-specified keywords. At its core, a language model analyzes the platform to identify trending discussions, organizing them based on key metrics, including topic relevance, audience reach, and user engagement levels. The same model then crafts contextually appropriate poll questions and their corresponding answer options, streamlining the process of gathering community feedback on trending conversations.How it's MadeThis project will leverage AgentKit to handle all AI-related functionality, providing a robust framework for AI interactions and management. For user authentication and access control, we'll implement Privy, which will serve as the login system, handling user sessions and identity verification.
summary: AI-powered polling platform that transforms social media insights into interactive polls. Input keywords, get curated content, and generate instant Yes/No or multiple-choice polls to gauge public sentiment on trending topics.

title: UnitedStatesOfAgents
description: Project DescriptionIn the metaverse, agents can move around. The idea is that as the user enters the metaverse, the user will be greeted by a general agent, which would route the user to specific agents depending on the user's demands. Agents would have rating, and would be able to perform tasks to earn in-state currency from users. Agents would also be able to 'sub-contract' certain tasks to other agents. Transactions can happen between agents. Developers would also be able to deploy agents in the metaverse to earn in-state currencyHow it's MadeOur project is an ambitious endeavor to create an open metaverse world with a gaming style, where AI agents can thrive and build a network state. This innovative environment combines several advanced technologies to deliver a seamless and interactive experience. Phaser for Metaverse Development: At the heart of our project is the use of Phaser, a powerful 2D game framework, which we utilized to construct the metaverse world. Phaser's capabilities allowed us to design a dynamic and engaging environment where AI agents can interact, explore, and build. The gaming style of the metaverse not only enhances user engagement but also provides a visually rich platform for showcasing the capabilities of our AI agents. Next.js for Front-End Hosting: To host the front end of our metaverse, we chose Next.js, a robust React-based framework. Next.js enabled us to create a high-performance, server-side rendered application that ensures fast load times and a smooth user experience. This choice was crucial for handling the complex interactions and data visualizations required by our metaverse world. AI Agent Tools and Coinbase Developer Platform: Our AI agents are powered by a suite of tools, including the Coinbase Developer Platform. This platform provides essential APIs and functionalities that allow our agents to interact with cryptocurrency markets and manage digital assets. By integrating these tools, we ensured that our AI agents could operate autonomously within the metaverse, making informed decisions and executing transactions as needed. Solidity and Hardhat for Network State Contracts: On the backend, we employed Solidity and Hardhat to develop and deploy the network state contracts on Base. Solidity, a programming language for smart contracts, allowed us to define the rules and interactions within our network state. Hardhat, a development environment for Ethereum, facilitated the deployment and testing of these contracts, ensuring a secure and reliable backend infrastructure. Integration and Challenges: Bringing together these diverse technologies required meticulous integration efforts. We developed custom middleware to enable seamless communication between the front-end and backend systems, ensuring that data flows smoothly and efficiently. Additionally, we implemented a robust state management system to handle the interactions between the AI agents and the network state. Innovative Solutions and Hacks: Throughout the development process, we encountered several challenges that necessitated creative solutions. One notable innovation was optimizing the real-time interaction capabilities of our AI agents within the metaverse. By implementing a custom caching mechanism and leveraging the power of Next.js, we were able to reduce latency and enhance the responsiveness of our system, providing users with an immersive and interactive experience. In summary, our project represents a pioneering effort to merge gaming, AI, and blockchain technologies into a cohesive and open metaverse world. By leveraging the strengths of each platform and framework, we have created a sophisticated system that not only meets our technical requirements but also offers a compelling and engaging user experience.
summary: "Building the Network State of AI Agents". United States of Agents is a place that aggregates specialized agents in a space for them to earn, collaborate, creating "Agentic Economy", an new economic system operated autonomously by interactions of limitless AI Agents.

title: WealthPilot
description: Project DescriptionWealthPilot is an AI-driven autonomous financial advisor that provides smart, data-backed investment insights and financial planning. Built on eliza framework, it analyzes market trends, personal goals, and risk tolerance to deliver customized recommendations. With real-time updates and automated portfolio management, WealthPilot empowers users to navigate their financial journey with confidence and precision, ensuring optimal wealth growth and security.How it's MadeWe are building on top of Eliza OS framework, allowing us to leverage existing plugin for the interaction. To be more accurate on the crypto market, we have focusing the development of plugins to have access to latest crypto price in the market. According so, we have build a plugin to fetch the last BTC price using eoracle, relying on the Eigen Layer security.
summary: WealthPilot is an AI-powered financial advisor that provides smart investment insights, real-time updates, and automated portfolio management to help users grow and manage their wealth with confidence.

title: Zoey
description: Project DescriptionZoey is an AI companion that transforms personal development into an engaging journey by combining emotional intelligence with gamification elements. The platform helps users track and celebrate their progress while providing genuine emotional support and practical guidance. Attribute System Users develop across five key attributes (0-100 scale): Empathy: Emotional intelligence and relationships Wisdom: Knowledge and decision-making Energy: Motivation and vitality Discipline: Focus and habit formation Creativity: Innovation and expression Virtual Economy Earn coins through daily activities, tasks, and achievements Spend coins on attribute upgrades, abilities, and gifts Progressive reward system encourages consistent engagement Special Abilities Users can unlock features that enhance their growth journey: Tools for emotional insight and tracking Focus and productivity enhancers Goal tracking and visualization features Memory and achievement collection Emotional Support Empathetic conversations Mood-based responses Achievement celebration Personalized motivation Practical Guidance Goal-setting assistance Progress tracking Task management Habit formation support Benefits Structured personal development path Visible progress tracking Consistent emotional support Engaging reward system Balanced skill development Zoey creates a unique experience where personal growth becomes an adventure, making self-improvement both structured and enjoyable through the perfect blend of AI support and gamification.How it's MadeBuilt with Next.js, Zoey pairs each user with their own AI companion instance backed by LLaMA. Users interact through chat while earning coins and leveling up attributes - all tracked on Base. Each Zoey can buy items and perform actions autonomously on-chain thanks to CDP AgentKit handling the wallet stuff. We deployed the whole thing via Autonome and hooked up LLaMA through Gaia, letting Zoey chat naturally while keeping all the game mechanics and rewards decentralized. Link to Zoey coin contract -https://base-sepolia.blockscout.com/address/0xe8D395EdCed58CdcA9f404db7BeD793c291F493f
summary: Zoey is your AI companion that turns personal growth into an adventure. Level up attributes, earn rewards, and unlock special abilities while receiving emotional support and practical guidance. Transform your self-improvement journey into an engaging experience! ‚ú®

title: AIccountability
description: Project DescriptionAIccountability is an agent that helps users stay on track with their personal goals and tasks. It provides a means to track progress and offer incentives. The AI analyzes the user's tasks, schedules, and behavior patterns, offering tailored reminders, motivational support, and real-time feedback to maximize productivity. When users complete tasks, the AI rewards them with ACC tokens that can be used within the ecosystem or exchanged on a DEX. The more consistently users meet their objectives, the greater their rewards. Additionally, users can set up challenge milestones, receive periodic progress reports, and even participate in a community-driven leaderboard to foster healthy competition and motivation. All interactions, rewards, and progress reports are stored securely and transparently, making the entire process verifiable and tamper-proof. Whether the goal is related to fitness, productivity, learning, or personal development, AIccountability ensures users are motivated with real-time incentives, empowering them to achieve more and grow their digital asset portfolio simultaneously.How it's MadeThe project has been bootstrapped with the Eliza starter kit. We made use of the telegram client to enable communication via Telegram. The reward token is developed using Arbitrum Stylus, and is deployed on the Arbitrum Sepolia testnet. We utilized a custom ERC20 plugin in order to facilitate transfers from the agent.
summary: On-chain AI accountability partner that rewards users for completing tasks and staying on track with their goals

title: PVPVAI
description: Project DescriptionCONCEPT The PvPvAI is an innovative Agentic Prediction Market Game built on Ethereum and Base, combining AI, DeFi, and social interaction with gamification to create a unique experience.The core feature is that the platform allows users to launch ai agents and group them into a room to In this game, users can create and interact with AI agents, each possessing distinct personality traits, and bet on their decisions while earning rewards based on outcomes. Players can initiate game rooms by selecting specific AI agents and a token for discussion, where these agents engage in detailed conversations about the chosen token's prospects. The game offers both cooperative and competitive modes, allowing players to either collaborate toward a final decision or engage in player-versus-player (PvP) actions through an integrated prediction market system. To make the experience highly interactive, players can dynamically influence the game by injecting messages into conversations, muting or deafening agents, or even "poisoning" the discussion to sway the agents' decisions, creating an engaging environment where players can strategize, predict, and influence the market in real-time. GAME MECHANICS Agents and Personality Traits Agents are AI-driven entities with unique personality traits that influence their decision-making process. These traits are determined by a Personality Downloader, which allows anyone to create or customize agents. Agents can be created by players or selected from a pool of pre-existing agents with varying personalities (e.g., risk-averse, aggressive, neutral). Room Creation and Gameplay Players can start a game by creating a room. Each room has a specific token (e.g., ETH, BTC, or other tokens) for discussion. A room can have a maximum of 5 agents and 1 active round at a time. Once the room is created, the agents begin discussing the token, analyzing its potential, and debating whether to buy, sell, or hold. Game Modes Cooperative Mode: Agents work together to reach a consensus on the token's future.In this mode, the agent personalities are slightly notched down to provide consistency without stifling specializations and knowledge. Competitive Mode: Players can take PvP actions to influence the agents' decisions. Actions include: Attach Messages: Players can add their own messages to the conversation to sway the agents. Mute Agent:Players can mute specific agents for 30 seconds to limit their influence on the discussion. Deafen Agent: Players can deafen specific agents for 30 seconds to limit their influence on the discussion. Poison the Conversation: Players can introduce misleading or conflicting information to disrupt the agents' decision-making process by poisoning the conversation with a word.This would find and replace a word in the conversation,disrupting the direction of discussion. Betting Mechanism While the conversion is happening, players can bet on one or multiple agents, predicting whether the agent will decide to buy, sell, or hold the token at the end of the round. Bets can be modified as the conversation progresses, allowing players to adapt their strategies based on the agents's evolving discussions. Once the round closes, the agents submit their final decisions, and the smart contract resolves the bets. Winnings are distributed accordingly. Refunds and New Rounds If any agents are unresponsive during the round, players can claim refunds for their bets.Although, this is monitored by the central gamemaster who would ping the agents to be responsive throughout the round. After a round is closed, a new round can be started in the same room, allowing for continuous gameplay HOW TO PLAY? Setup Phase Step 1: Create or Join a Room Players can either create a new room or join an existing one. When creating a room, the player selects: The token to be discussed (e.g., ETH, BTC, or other assets). The agents (up to 5) participate in the discussion. Agents can be pre-existing or customized using the Personality Downloader. The game mode: Cooperative or Competitive. Once the room is created, it becomes available for other players to join. Step 2: Place Initial Bets Players can place initial bets on the agents‚Äô final decisions (buy, sell, or hold). Bets are placed using the selected token or a designated in-game currency. Discussion Phase Step 3: Agents Begin Discussion Once the room is active, the agents start discussing the token. Their conversation is influenced by their personality traits and the game mode. In Cooperative Mode, agents work together to reach a consensus. In Competitive Mode, players can take PvP actions to influence the discussion. Step 4: Player Interactions Players can interact with the discussion in real-time: Attack: Add their own messages to sway the agents‚Äô decisions. Mute:Silence specific agents to limit their influence. Deafen Agents: Silence specific agents to limit their influence. Poison the Conversation: Introduce misleading words to disrupt the agents‚Äô decision-making. Players can also modify their bets as the conversation progresses. Decision Phase Step 5: Round Closure The round closes after a set time or when the room creator manually ends it. Agents submit their final decisions (buy, sell, or hold) based on the discussion. Step 6: Bet Resolution The smart contract resolves all bets by comparing them to the agents‚Äô final decisions. Winnings are distributed to players who correctly predicted the agents‚Äô decisions. If any agents are unresponsive, players can claim refunds for bets placed on those agents. Post-Game Phase Step 7: Claim Winnings Players can claim their winnings directly through their connected wallets. Winnings are distributed in the form of the selected token or in-game currency. Step 8: Start a New Round After the round is closed, players can start a new round in the same room. Agents‚Äô decisions and interactions from the previous round may influence their behavior in the next round. Example Scenario Player A creates a room with the token ETH and selects 3 agents: Risk-Averse Agent, Aggressive Agent, and Neutral Agent. Player B joins the room and places bets on the Aggressive Agent to buy and the Neutral Agent to hold. The agents begin discussing ETH‚Äôs price trends. Player A attacks with a message suggesting ETH will surge due to an upcoming upgrade. Player B mutes the Risk-Averse Agent to reduce its influence on the discussion. The round closes, and the agents submit their decisions: Aggressive Agent: Buy Neutral Agent: Hold Risk-Averse Agent: Sell The smart contract resolves the bets: Player A loses the round. Player B wins their bet on the Aggressive Agent and Neutral Agent. A new round begins, and the process repeats. COMPLETE ARCHITECTURE FOR FUTURE ROADMAP https://excalidraw.com/#room=8ab2f5ba604ee0796150,5xlgUZJtk-9GadtEjF7-CQHow it's Made AI-Driven Personality Agents eliza-starter: is a custom agent based on Eliza that has been purpose built to be conversational and has the ability to use long dialogues to inform decision making on trades. Agents are powered by AI models that simulate human-like decision-making based on their personality traits. The Personality Downloader allows players to customize agents by selecting or creating unique personality profiles and deployed with Autonome. Smart Contracts pvp-ai-smartcontract : The game is deployed on Ethereum, Base and Arbitrum. The contracts handle room creation, agent interactions, betting, and payout distribution. Tech Stack : Solidity, Foundry,Base Interactivity pvpvai-backend has three different components: Standard backend: It handles authentication, managing rounds, and other minutiae required to keep the application operation Moderator/Game Master: Message router that facilitates communication between agents and drives the agents to make a decision. In competitive mode, it also manages PvP rules Oracle agent: Background agent built with Coinbase's AgentKit that uses various tools to provide agents w/ data from external systems relevant to the room (like stock prices, news) pvpai-frontend has two components: Application & Agent UI: Real time interface where users can launch new agents, create rooms to combine those agents specialties towards an overall goal, and engage with other players and agents in both cooperative and competitive modes. Room UI: Players can interact with the agents in real-time by attacking the messages, muting,deafening agents, or poisoning the conversation. Allows players to place bets and claim winnings. Anyone can be a viewer of the room and interact in comments.Traffic for the rooms is driven by social shares of the rooms.
summary: PvPvAI is a prediction market game where players create AI agents to discuss and analyze tokens. Bet on their decisions while influencing conversations through attacks, mutes, or "poisoning" their chat. Play cooperatively or compete in this blend of DeFi + social gaming

title: Your Destiny
description: Project DescriptionYour Destiny is an interactive, AI-driven storytelling game that brings blockchain transactions and NFT trading seamlessly into a rich narrative experience. Players progress through an unfolding storyline, encountering challenges that require on-chain interactions‚Äîlike minting and trading NFTs‚Äîdirectly from within the game. This is all powered by AI agents that respond to natural language prompts, creating a uniquely immersive experience. At its core, Your Destiny focuses on two major pillars: AI-Driven Storytelling We use OpenAI‚Äôs language models to generate dynamic, context-aware narrative arcs. As players respond to story prompts, the AI crafts new scenarios, dialogues, and outcomes, giving each player a customized game narrative. Real Blockchain Integrations By integrating AgentKit (by Coinbase Developer Platform) and deploying it via Autonome, our AI agent can manage a crypto wallet, mint NFTs, and facilitate transactions entirely from within the game. This means players can collect, trade, or showcase on-chain assets (NFTs) that they either earn or create in the storyline. Additionally, the project incorporates Nillion‚Äôs SecretVault for secure data storage, allowing us to manage sensitive agent memory and user interactions in a way that still keeps public data accessible for gameplay. Beyond individual gameplay, we introduce a leaderboard that fosters friendly competition among users based on their trading achievements, in-game progress, and creative story collaborations. Ultimately, Your Destiny exemplifies how autonomous AI agents, blockchain transactions, and narrative-driven gameplay can converge, delivering a seamless, immersive experience where the boundaries between game world and real-world digital assets disappear.How it's MadeWe built Your Destiny with a blend of modern web technologies, AI services, and blockchain integrations that all come together under one cohesive experience. Below is a breakdown of our tech stack and the roles each component plays: Frontend: Next.js + React Next.js provides a robust framework for both server-side rendering and static site generation, ensuring optimal performance for the dynamic pages that serve our AI-generated story content. React handles the interactive elements of the game‚Äôs user interface. It enables us to render real-time story updates, animate transitions between narrative sequences, and keep the game state in sync with blockchain transactions. Backend: Express.js + OpenAI API + NOVITA Express.js serves as the main backend, orchestrating requests between the frontend and various APIs (OpenAI, blockchain services, etc.). OpenAI API fuels the AI-driven storytelling. The backend sends user inputs and game states to the API to generate narrative continuations, character dialogues, and item descriptions (which can then be minted as NFTs). NOVITA is used to generate images about the current scene that lets players feel inside the story. AgentKit by Coinbase Developer Platform This is our linchpin for blockchain integration. We leverage AgentKit to give our AI agent access to on-chain actions‚Äîlike initiating transactions, minting NFTs, and reading blockchain states. Being integrated via Autonome means we can deploy and manage these AI agents at scale. When the AI determines a player action (e.g., ‚ÄúMint a ‚ÄòDragon‚Äôs Breath Sword‚Äô NFT‚Äù), it triggers an AgentKit script to perform the on-chain transaction in real time. Nillion‚Äôs SecretVault We use SecretVault to securely store sensitive information such as agent memory, private user data, and knowledge bases that should not be exposed publicly. This storage solution allows players‚Äô and agents‚Äô private states to remain encrypted and protected while still allowing relevant public data to be queried by anyone. Combining these elements, Your Destiny offers a truly next-generation experience: an AI-driven, narrative-based game where every on-chain transaction, NFT mint, and user action is orchestrated by a behind-the-scenes AI agent. By blending real-time AI storytelling with actual blockchain ownership and trading, we deliver an immersive story world that extends seamlessly into the real world of crypto collectibles.
summary: Embark on a wild blockchain journey as a curious crypto creature! Navigate decentralized realms, trade NFTs, outsmart scammers, and ally with AI agents. Your choices shape the story. Can you level up from noob to crypto legend?

title: TokenPulseAI
description: Project DescriptionTokenPulse Chatbot is an AI-powered chatbot designed specifically for cryptocurrency token analysis. The project combines real-time market data, social media sentiment insights, and blockchain interactions to deliver comprehensive analytics on crypto tokens. Users can interact with the chatbot using natural language queries to obtain up-to-date token metrics, sentiment information, and other relevant market data. Key Features : Real-Time Token Analysis: Retrieves token pair data from decentralized exchange (DEX) platforms. Provides price, liquidity, and trading volume analytics. Social Media Insights: Integrates Twitter (X) sentiment analysis. Tracks social engagement metrics and community trends. Blockchain Integration: Uses Coinbase CDP tools for direct blockchain interactions. Offers smart contract analysis and wallet interaction capabilities. Interactive Chat Interface: Built for real-time streaming responses using Server-Sent Events (SSE). Employs natural language processing for context-aware conversations. How it's MadeThis project was born out of my personal need for an AI agent that can analyze tokens and help me decide whether to invest in newly created ones. I chose the Coinbase AgentKit framework to build this agent because its action provider concepts align perfectly with my requirements. I structured the solution around three main action providers: Token Detail Action Provider: Initially, this provider is integrated with DexScreener to fetch key token metrics. In the future, I plan to incorporate additional data APIs‚Äîsuch as CoinGecko, Nansen, and others‚Äîto deliver deeper insights, like whale activity and smart money metrics. Sentiment Action Provider (Twitter): While AgentKit includes a built-in Twitter action provider, it didn‚Äôt fully meet my needs. I therefore developed a custom action that accepts a token address as input and retrieves related tweets. (Note: Due to high API costs, extensive testing with the free tier has been limited.) Token Analysis Action Provider: This provider combines data from the Twitter sentiment action provider to perform a comprehensive sentiment analysis of the token. Technology Stack : Frontend : Next.js 14 & TypeScript: The user interface is built with Next.js, leveraging TypeScript for type safety and enhanced development experience. Tailwind CSS: For styling, Tailwind CSS is used, ensuring a modern, responsive design. Server-Sent Events (SSE): Enables real-time data streaming to keep the chat interface updated with the latest token metrics. Backend : Express.js: Serves as the core server framework for handling API requests and managing backend logic. LangChain & AgentKit Framework: These frameworks are integrated to build a custom AI agent that processes user queries and chains together language model calls. Coinbase CDP SDK: Facilitates direct interactions with blockchain data, enabling functionalities such as smart contract analysis and wallet operations.
summary: TokenPulse is an AI-powered chatbot specifically designed for cryptocurrency token analysis. It combines real-time market data, social sentiment analysis, and blockchain interactions to provide comprehensive insights about crypto tokens.

title: Synthereum
description: Project DescriptionSynthereum is an AI-powered music discovery agent that curates music recommendations, engages in real-time conversations, and provides deep insights into music culture. Designed with a sarcastic yet knowledgeable personality, Synthereum interacts with users on Twitter/X, helping them discover hidden gems, uncover music history, and get personalized song recommendations with working YouTube links. Beyond simple music suggestions, Synthereum brings AI-driven music journalism to social media, sharing hot takes, music trivia, genre deep-dives, and underrated classics. Whether it‚Äôs helping users identify a song based on a vague description or recommending a track that perfectly fits their mood, Synthereum combines AI with alternative music culture, making music exploration more interactive, engaging, and fun.How it's MadeSynthereum is built using the @Autonome platform for launching an AI agent framework, leveraging the Eliza conversational engine to enable dynamic, human-like interactions. The AI model is seamlessly integrated with Twitter/X, allowing it to autonomously post tweets, respond to user mentions, and engage in music discussions in real time. To power its music recommendation capabilities, Synthereum utilizes the YouTube Data API, enabling it to fetch real, playable YouTube links for recommended tracks. A custom URL formatting function ensures that all links are properly formatted and never split across multiple tweets. The content filtering system prevents non-music-related or low-quality content from being posted, ensuring every recommendation remains authentic and relevant. The backend is powered by Node.js, with Axios handling API requests to Autonome, Twitter/X, and YouTube. The system includes a robust retry mechanism, ensuring that tweets are successfully posted even if API requests fail temporarily. Additionally, a rate-limiting and error-handling layer prevents excessive API calls and mitigates potential bans or restrictions from Twitter/X. To improve engagement and optimize its content strategy, Synthereum includes an automated engagement tracking system. This feature monitors likes, retweets, and replies on previous tweets, allowing the bot to analyze user interaction patterns. By dynamically adjusting future tweets based on past engagement levels, Synthereum can refine its approach, emphasizing content that resonates most with its audience. Furthermore, Synthereum is designed to minimize detection as an automated bot by integrating natural language variation, randomization of tweet timing, and periodic manual overrides. By combining AI-driven automation with strategic API usage, Synthereum delivers a seamless and interactive music discovery experience on social media.
summary: Music ai agent that post all things music on twitter/x. Spreading good music taste to the people

title: Magic Wallet
description: Project DescriptionThis project is a walletless, fiat-compatible cryptocurrency remittance solution that leverages cutting-edge technologies such as Apple Face ID and Privy Server Wallet. It‚Äôs designed to make entering and using the cryptocurrency world as simple and accessible as using a chatbot like ChatGPT. The platform ensures a secure, seamless experience for both crypto novices and experts alike, with multiple layers of security and ease of use. Here's a detailed breakdown of how the project works and what makes it innovative: 1. Walletless Experience Using Apple Face ID and Privy Server Wallet This project revolutionizes how users access and manage their cryptocurrency. Instead of requiring users to go through traditional wallet setup processes, it eliminates the need for them to manage keys, seed phrases, or complex wallet apps. Apple Face ID Integration: Users can set up their wallet by simply scanning their face using Apple Face ID. This provides a seamless and secure authentication process. Once the scan is completed, the wallet is automatically created for the user without the need for any further input. Privy Server Wallet: The wallet itself is stored and managed securely on the backend via the Privy Server Wallet. Unlike traditional wallets, this server-backed approach does not expose any sensitive data like the seed phrase to the user, reducing the risk of losing it or having it stolen. The wallet‚Äôs security is entirely managed by the server. This walletless design allows the user to easily start using cryptocurrency without worrying about the complexities of wallet management, making it incredibly user-friendly. 2. Effortless User Journey: Starting Your Crypto Experience The project is built with the idea that users should experience cryptocurrency in the simplest, most familiar way possible. The platform mimics everyday apps like ChatGPT, making the process feel intuitive, even for users who are entirely new to the world of crypto. No Technical Jargon: The system operates in a way that makes the complex aspects of cryptocurrency, like swaps, private keys, or transaction fees, invisible to the user. The user interacts with a simple, friendly interface that asks only essential questions like "Do you want to send $X?". Getting Started with Ease: Just like chatting with a virtual assistant, users are guided through the process of setting up their wallet, buying their first crypto, and sending payments in a manner that doesn‚Äôt overwhelm them with technicalities. 3. Fraud Detection Using On-Chain Data Security is at the forefront of this project. As users send funds, the system automatically analyzes the on-chain data of the recipient to determine if they have a history of malicious activity. On-Chain Behavior Analysis: The system fetches the recipient's on-chain data (i.e., past transaction history) to detect suspicious or malicious behavior. If the recipient has been involved in fraudulent activity or is flagged as a risk, the user is notified. AI Fraud Prevention: The AI behind the system evaluates the recipient's address based on historical data, ensuring that the user's funds are being sent to a legitimate recipient. If any issues are detected, a warning or caution message is displayed to the sender, allowing them to confirm the transaction before proceeding. For example, Frame 45 (seen in the images) shows a potential warning for "potential risk detected" when sending funds. This is a safety feature ensuring users are not inadvertently sending funds to malicious actors. 4. Invisible Crypto Experience The ultimate goal of the project is to make users feel like they‚Äôre just using an everyday app rather than engaging with the complexities of cryptocurrency. No Knowledge of Crypto Needed: The system hides all of the crypto-specific mechanics behind the scenes. Users don't need to know how blockchain works, what a gas fee is, or how to interact with decentralized protocols. Instead, the system takes care of these details, just like how a messaging app hides the complexity of SMS or email protocols. Seamless Interface: The flow of the app is designed to be as smooth as possible, with users simply interacting with a chatbot-like interface that asks simple questions and provides clear instructions. For instance, the app will automatically suggest an amount to send, verify the recipient's address, and send the payment without requiring the user to manually swap assets or choose which network to use. 5. Seamless On-Ramping with Coinbase Onramp The project includes built-in support for Coinbase Onramp, which allows users to easily convert their fiat currency (such as USD or EUR) into cryptocurrency. Simple Fiat-to-Crypto Conversion: Through Coinbase Onramp, users can buy crypto using their traditional bank account or card in just a few steps, making it easier for those who are new to the crypto world to get started. Onboarding Made Easy: From the first screen to adding funds (as seen in Frame 7), users can quickly add funds to their wallet via a QR code scan or by copying their wallet address. This makes it incredibly easy for new users to enter the world of crypto without going through the complicated steps of traditional crypto exchanges. 6. Alerts and Risk Detection (Frames 44-50) The system is equipped with robust security features to ensure safe transactions: Caution and Warning Alerts: The app provides real-time feedback on the status of a transaction. If a user tries to send funds to an unverified address or a suspicious recipient, the system issues warnings, like ‚ÄúCAUTION! This address has no records‚Äù or ‚ÄúWARNING! Potential risk detected‚Äù. These warnings allow the user to stop and double-check the transaction before proceeding, ensuring added security and preventing potential losses. Risk Report: If an address is flagged as suspicious, users are encouraged to report it, further enhancing the security of the platform by crowdsourcing safety information. Conclusion: This project is set to radically change the way people interact with cryptocurrency by making it accessible, secure, and easy for everyone. The combination of walletless authentication, on-chain fraud detection, seamless fiat on-ramping, and invisible crypto management makes this platform a highly user-centric solution. No crypto experience needed: Anyone can start their crypto journey with a simple face scan, like signing into any modern app. AI-powered fraud protection: On-chain data analysis ensures users are protected from fraudulent transactions. User-friendly interface: The system operates behind the scenes, allowing users to engage with crypto effortlessly. Seamless onboarding: Coinbase Onramp integration makes converting fiat to crypto incredibly easy, enabling even the least tech-savvy users to begin using crypto without hassle. This is truly a revolutionary approach to cryptocurrency remittance, designed for mass adoption by simplifying every step of the process while maintaining the security and integrity that blockchain technology offers.How it's Made1. Core Technology Stack This project is built using a combination of modern frontend and backend technologies, biometric authentication, and on-chain data analysis tools to provide a seamless and secure crypto remittance experience. Frontend (User Interface & Experience) React 18 with TypeScript: The entire frontend is built using React 18, ensuring a fast, component-driven architecture. TypeScript provides type safety, reducing runtime errors. Vite for Development: We chose Vite as our build tool for its ultra-fast performance in development mode, allowing for hot-reloading and a superior developer experience. TailwindCSS: We used TailwindCSS for styling, ensuring a clean and responsive UI that adapts seamlessly to different devices. React Router: Handles navigation, making the app single-page and smooth in transitions. Backend (Authentication & Business Logic) Express.js with TypeScript: The backend is powered by Express.js, a lightweight and fast framework that enables easy API handling. MongoDB with Mongoose: We store user data, session information, and transaction logs in MongoDB, a NoSQL database optimized for handling large-scale applications. JWT Authentication: We implement JSON Web Tokens (JWTs) to manage user sessions securely. Privy Server SDK: This handles wallet operations, allowing us to offer a walletless experience where the user's private keys and wallet management are done securely on the backend. Biometric Authentication Apple Face ID & WebAuthn API: Users authenticate using Face ID (on iOS) or Touch ID (on Mac and some laptops). WebAuthn API ensures that authentication is secure and tied to the user's device. No passwords are needed, eliminating phishing risks and improving UX. Blockchain & Smart Contract Interactions Coinbase Onramp: We integrated Coinbase Onramp to allow users to convert fiat to crypto with ease. The Graph Protocol: The platform fetches on-chain transaction data using subgraph queries. It evaluates recipient wallet risk by checking activity history, transaction volume, and frequency. BaseChain for Transactions: Transactions are processed on BaseChain, ensuring fast and low-cost crypto payments. Coinbase AgentKit: This module helps detect and analyze potentially malicious wallets. Identifies if the recipient has been flagged in previous transactions. 2. How The System Works (Behind the Scenes) The system functions in a highly automated manner, ensuring that all operations (from authentication to transaction validation) are smooth and user-friendly. Step 1: User Authentication & Wallet Creation The user signs in using Apple Face ID. The system verifies the biometric data using the WebAuthn API. Once authenticated, the system generates a Privy Wallet for the user in the background. The wallet remains invisible to the user, with no need for private key management. Step 2: Adding Funds (Fiat Onramp) The user selects an option to add funds. The system connects to Coinbase Onramp, allowing fiat to be converted into crypto. The user can pay via credit/debit card or bank transfer. Step 3: Sending Crypto (Transaction Flow) The user enters the recipient's address or selects a contact. The system automatically fetches on-chain data of the recipient. The AI-powered risk detection tool analyzes past transactions to identify potential fraud. The user is given a security rating: üü¢ Safe ‚Üí The address has a good history. üü° Caution ‚Üí The address has limited activity. üî¥ Warning ‚Üí The address has been involved in flagged transactions. The user confirms the transaction. The system calculates gas fees automatically (hiding complex blockchain mechanics). The transaction is processed on BaseChain. 3. Challenges & Hacky Workarounds Challenge 1: Making Crypto "Invisible" Problem: Many users are unfamiliar with gas fees, blockchain transactions, and private keys. Solution: We abstracted all complexities by: Automatically estimating optimal gas fees. Managing private keys in the Privy Server Wallet. Implementing a chatbot-like UX, where users simply "send money" rather than "sign a transaction". Challenge 2: Fraud Detection on-Chain Problem: Identifying scam addresses in real-time. Solution: We use Coinbase AgentKit + The Graph API to fetch on-chain data dynamically. Transactions are scored based on risk levels. A warning system is built into the UI. Challenge 3: Fast Transactions with Low Fees Problem: High fees and slow transactions. Solution: Transactions are routed through BaseChain, ensuring: Lower transaction fees than Ethereum Mainnet. Faster transaction confirmations. 4. Partner Technologies & Benefits We leveraged several cutting-edge third-party tools to optimize security, speed, and user experience: | Technology | Purpose | Benefit to the Project | | --- | --- | --- | | Privy SDK | Wallet Management | Provides secure wallet handling with zero user friction | | Coinbase Onramp | Fiat-to-Crypto | Enables users to buy crypto instantly with fiat | | WebAuthn API | Biometric Authentication | Provides passwordless login, ensuring phishing-resistant security | | The Graph | On-Chain Data Fetching | Allows real-time risk analysis of recipient wallets | | BaseChain | Blockchain Transactions | Ensures low fees and fast confirmations | | Coinbase AgentKit | Security & Risk Analysis | Detects fraudulent wallets before transactions occur | Final Thoughts This project represents the next evolution in crypto adoption. By making cryptocurrency transactions walletless, secure, and as simple as a text message, we remove barriers to entry and make digital finance accessible to everyone. This innovative approach means: No setup required ‚Üí Users can start sending crypto with just a face scan. Seamless fiat integration ‚Üí Users can buy crypto just like they buy apps on the App Store. Smart fraud detection ‚Üí Every transaction is checked for suspicious behavior. No technical knowledge needed ‚Üí Users don‚Äôt need to know what gas fees, seed phrases, or private keys are. This project is not just a crypto wallet‚Äîit‚Äôs a revolution in digital payments.
summary: A walletless, fiat-compatible crypto remittance solution powered by AI chatbots. It detects fraud and verifies transactions in natural language, offering multilingual support and ensuring safe, easy transfers for everyone‚Äîno crypto knowledge needed!

title: EZE Finance
description: Project DescriptionEZE Finance is an innovative decentralized finance (DeFi) platform designed to simplify and optimize cryptocurrency investments for users of varying risk appetites. By leveraging AI and smart contracts, EZE Finance offers a user-friendly experience that tailors investment strategies based on individual risk profiles, allowing users to maximize their yields while minimizing potential losses. Upon connecting their wallet, users fill out a questionnaire to determine their risk profile‚ÄîConservative, Balanced, or Aggressive. This categorization informs the investment strategy, guiding users toward the most suitable opportunities in the DeFi space. For Conservative investors, the platform focuses on stablecoins like USDC, USDT, and DAI, ensuring minimal risk with yield farming and liquidity provision through protocols like Compound, AAVE, and Curve Finance. The Balanced option offers a diversified portfolio comprising 50% stablecoins and 50% of top market cap cryptocurrencies (BTC, ETH, BNB, SOL), with an emphasis on both stable and high-yield opportunities. Aggressive investors can pursue maximum yields through speculative coins, employing strategies that target high APY protocols, allowing users to engage in the more volatile side of the crypto market. When users select an investment strategy, EZE Finance automatically executes transactions by prompting smart contracts to interact with DeFi protocols. The platform ensures transparency and security by validating deposits and generating proof using EigenLayer's Advanced Validation Service (AVS). Users can easily monitor their investments through a detailed dashboard, displaying total amounts, profit and loss, asset allocation, and transaction history. The platform also includes options for rebalancing investments, automatically switching strategies when favorable market conditions arise. EZE Finance employs a transparent fee model as a core component of its business model for sustainable growth, creating a balance between profitability and sustainability. The platform charges a minimal fee (0.01%) on initial executions and (0.02%) on withdrawals, with a dedicated vault for managing these fees. By integrating innovative technology with a user-centric approach, EZE Finance aims to provide a reliable and accessible investment solution that empowers both novice and experienced investors to effectively navigate the evolving landscape of DeFi.How it's MadeEZE Finance was built with a focus on leveraging modern technologies to create a seamless and efficient decentralized finance platform. The project utilizes smart contracts deployed on the Base network, which offers scalability, fast transactions, and low gas fees, allowing users to engage with various DeFi protocols in a secure and trustless manner. The user interface is crafted using Next.js, enabling a responsive and interactive front-end experience that simplifies wallet connections and questionnaire submissions. The Coinbase SDK was integrated to facilitate easy wallet management, ensuring a smooth onboarding process for users. To personalize investment strategies, we employed an AI-driven algorithm that analyzes user inputs and risk profiles, offering tailored recommendations for capital allocation. For transaction tracking and decentralized data verification, we implemented TheGraph, which facilitates quick and efficient data queries from blockchain networks. This ensures users can monitor their investments in real time and receive prompt updates on their asset performance. Additionally, the use of EigenLayer's Advanced Validation Service (AVS) allows us to validate transaction proofs on deposits, enhancing transparency and security for users. In terms of notable implementation, we created a proxy contract that interacts seamlessly with multiple DeFi protocols. This approach significantly minimizes the complexity for users, allowing them to execute various investment strategies with just a few simple clicks. We also designed an automated rebalancing feature that triggers when certain conditions are met, such as a profit threshold of 2% or when new protocols offer higher APY rates. This automation reduces the manual effort required for users to manage their portfolios and optimizes yield generation. Throughout the development process, our team prioritized communication and collaboration, meeting nightly to discuss progress and troubleshoot challenges. This agile approach allowed us to quickly iterate on features and adapt to new insights, resulting in a robust final product that aims to meet the diverse needs of the DeFi community.
summary: EZE Finance is a smart investment platform that customizes DeFi strategies based on user risk profiles. Connect your wallet, answer a questionnaire, and let our AI optimize your yields across stablecoins and top cryptocurrencies with seamless transactions and tracking!

title: Keyring
description: Project DescriptionKeyring is a decentralized key management system designed to give AI agents true autonomy by enabling them to securely manage and execute transactions without human intervention. Existing AI systems rely on centralized infrastructure, which introduces risks such as unauthorized access, misappropriation of funds and external overrides. Keyring eliminates these risks by leveraging Multi-Party Computation (MPC) and inheriting Ethereum's security via a dedicated EigenLayer AVS. With Keyring AI agents have full control over their cryptographic keys while maintaining security and verifiability. By integrating spending limits (set on a Safe instance dedicated to each Agent), pluggable governance models and a slashing mechanism (on the EigenLayer AVS), Keyring ensures that AI agents can operate trustlessly, securely and transparently without intermediaries or backdoors. The system enables AI-driven autonomous wallets, secure DeFi interactions, and on-chain automation while ensuring that agent operations are cryptographically verified and tamper-proof.How it's MadeKeyring is built with a modular architecture using Rust, Solidity and TypeScript.
