title: LFG
description: Project DescriptionWe built LFG (Looking For Group) as a decentralized talent matching platform that utilizes smart contracts for efficient job management and payment handling. The onboarding process begins by deploying a personal Virtual Smart Agent (VSA) through a chosen client (Telegram, Discord, Web App, and more). During this onboarding, the agent employs a chat-style interface to gather important profile information, such as your role (developer, project owner, or both), technical skills (e.g., Rust, Solidity, React), availability, and past experiences via platforms like GitHub or through brief coding challenges. The process integrates Privy to securely connect your wallet, ensuring that all on-chain interactions are linked to your verified identity. Once deployed, your VSA functions as an autonomous representative. It continuously scans the network for bounties that match your skill set and preferences. For instance, if you are a Rust developer, your agent will filter and identify bounty postings specific to Rust. When a suitable bounty is located, your agent automatically negotiates and accepts the task on your behalf, locking the required funds into an on-chain BountyEscrow contract. This escrow mechanism guarantees trustless and secure payments: upon successful completion of the task and verification by the bounty owner, the contract releases the reward (minus a small platform fee) directly to your wallet. To ensure quality, our system includes a verification process. Developers are asked to submit a brief code snippet or complete a mini technical quiz. Successful verification triggers the minting of a verification NFT (or soulbound token) that serves as a skill badge in your wallet‚Äîenhancing your matching priority and building trust within the network. While our current focus is on automating the matching of developers to bounties, LFG is designed with long-term scalability in mind. We envision a complete ecosystem where specialized VSAs cater to various industries‚Äîfrom blockchain alpha group vetting to hobbyist communities and beyond. At the core of this future is ‚ÄúNexus,‚Äù an overarching coordinating agent that will enable advanced functionalities such as multi-signature escrow releases and seamless collaboration across industries. In summary, LFG automates the entire opportunity matching process‚Äîfrom intelligent onboarding and skill verification to automated bounty matching and secure on-chain payments‚Äîproviding a frictionless, trustless, and highly efficient way for individuals to tap into unrealized synergies and opportunities.How it's MadeOur core system, deployed on Sepolia, features a comprehensive smart contract (0x12cc7215E334BA6d89A57460AB94d37C1B5B54a3) that facilitates user registration , job creation with escrow, job acceptance tracking, payment release, and dispute resolution while also collecting platform fees. A key aspect of our platform is the user management and reputation system, which maintains an on-chain record of users, tracks completed jobs, and allows for rating submissions that impact reputation scores. The job management aspect ensures secure fund locking during job creation, tracks job acceptance with enforced deadlines, and includes mechanisms for completion verification and payment release. To address disputes, we developed a system for initiating disagreements that features automated rating adjustments based on outcomes and allows for contract owner arbitration. Economically, the platform automatically collects fees from successful job completions, ensuring sustainability. What sets our implementation apart is the integration of Virtual Smart Agents (VSAs) that mediate all smart contract interactions, triggering functions based on user actions and creating a seamless interface between users and the blockchain. This innovation extends to automated dispute handling, which ties the impact on reputation directly to the results of disputes. We prioritized security with features like deadline-based verification and a reliable escrow system, ensuring protection for both parties involved. By choosing the Sepolia testnet for our deployment, we minimized transaction costs during testing and designed a reputation system that encourages positive behavior. We forked and customized the ElizaOS framework to build our Virtual Smart Agents (VSAs), enhancing it with specialized plugins and adapters for seamless blockchain integration. Our system is designed with a microservices architecture and utilizes Docker containerization, hosted on Autonomous for efficient and scalable agent deployment. On the frontend, we opted for Next.js and React, styled it using Tailwind CSS, and deployed everything on Vercel to ensure optimal performance. For our blockchain and security needs, we implemented Nillion to maintain privacy-preserving on-chain data storage, particularly for sensitive user information. Additionally, we developed custom smart contracts for BountyEscrow, enabling secure and trustless payments. In terms of our development stack, the frontend utilizes Next.js, React, and Tailwind CSS. For the backend, we‚Äôre using Node.js version 18 or higher, with a database setup that combines on-chain storage through Nillion and traditional databases. Our testing is thorough, with a comprehensive test suite utilizing Vitest and Jest. Lastly, we manage our packages with PNPM, taking advantage of workspace support for effective monorepo management. Overall, our platform exemplifies how blockchain technology can effectively address real-world challenges in the talent marketplace, providing a trustless environment that is accessible to non-technical users through our automated workflows.
summary: LFG is a decentralized platform that revolutionizes how opportunities are discovered and captured by combining AI-driven Virtual Synergy Agents (VSAs) with blockchain technology.

title: Degen foudner
description: Project DescriptionWe want create platform that allows users to assemble their own team consisting exclusively of AI agents to implement their projects Launching Web3 projects, even the most typical ones, often takes months, with most of the work being routine. Our platform changes this process: We provide users with agents pre-configured to solve specific tasks. They assist at all stages: from idea and development to promotion Also it reduces project launch costs. With our platform, you can assemble the perfect team of AI specialists and focus on the most important thing ‚Äì creating the product How it's MadeWe developed the backend using C# and JS. We used JS for writing agents because there are more ready-made libraries available for JS. For example, we used AgentKit.js to create an agent responsible for wallet-related actions. We also used Langchain everywhere as the foundation for any agent interactions. In C#, we wrote the main middleware layer. Our plan is that the AI agent functions as a microservice, which connects to the C# server and interacts with it through a unified interface.
summary: This week, we built a unified AI agent interface, prototyped a manager and developer (AgentKit), and started a Gateway for chat and agent interactions. Design work is underway.

title: $hackathon
description: Project Description$hackathon began as an innovative experiment on Warpcast: a Clanker token to use its trading fees to fund weekly hackathons. After generating $8K from $2M in trading volume on its first week, and a first edition that had 8 submissions, we had a challenge: How can this system work on its own, without the biases -and limitations- that come from having humans be the judges? So we had the mission to transform this platform into a sophisticated autonomous system that could have the potential of reshaping how we evaluate and reward open source contributions. Our solution tackles complex technical challenges across multiple domains: Autonomous PR Evaluation: Multi-agent AI system analyzes code quality, documentation, and impact Social-Technical Bridge: Seamless integration between Farcaster's social layer and GitHub's development infrastructure Smart Contract Automation: Trustless distribution of rewards to top contributors Educational Feedback Loop: AI-generated insights help developers improve their open source practices The user experience is streamlined through Farcaster Frames, the cutting-edge standard for crypto-social applications. Developers authenticate with both Farcaster and GitHub, submit their PRs, and receive feedback on them. Weekly leaderboards drive engagement and healthy competition, with top contributors automatically receiving shares of $hackathon's trading fees for that given cycle. What makes our project unique is its multi-faceted flywheel effect: Economic: Trading fees ‚Üí Economical Rewards ‚Üí Quality contributions ‚Üí Community growth ‚Üí Attention for the token ‚Üí More trading Educational: AI feedback ‚Üí Better development practices ‚Üí Higher quality submissions ‚Üí Content to educate hackers Community: Weekly recognition ‚Üí Increased participation ‚Üí Stronger open source ecosystem By combining AI evaluation with transparent rewards, we're not just automating hackathon judging - we're creating a practical, self-sustaining system that defines and incentivizes quality open source development.How it's MadeWe built a production-ready sophisticated multi-layer system that pushes the boundaries of AI, blockchain, and social integration. Technical Architecture: Frontend: Vite + React Farcaster Frame (Deployed on Orbiter) - Delivering a seamless, social-first user experience Backend: Node.js + TypeScript/Koa (Heroku) - Robust API handling and service orchestration Database: PostgreSQL/Prisma - Type-safe data management with complex relationship modeling Smart Contracts: Deployment on Base for transparent reward distribution Authentication: Dual OAuth system connecting Farcaster and GitHub identities Farcaster Feed: Neynar API integration for on-feed interaction between the system and the farcaster community. Innovation through 3 different AI Agents: Hacker Agent: Deep analysis of PR content and impact Judge Agent: Sophisticated evaluation across multiple technical dimensions, assigning a numerical score to each PR in order to them create a weekly leaderboard Payment Agent: Autonomous management of reward distribution Technical Challenges Solved: Designed complex prompt engineering for consistent, educational AI feedback Built secure cross-platform identity verification Farcaster Frame for in-feed PR submissions Implemented automated blockchain payment distribution Development Considerations: Leveraged Farcaster Frames early adoption advantage. We are the first team that manages to authenticate Github profiles inside frames, which gives us an edge in terms of potential evolution of this interaction in the future. Implemented comprehensive error handling for AI evaluations Built scalable infrastructure for growing submission volume Created modular architecture for future enhancements Current Limitations & Opportunities: There is no immediate feedback from the system after a given user submits a Pull Request through the farcaster frame. This could be transformed, to generate a sense of immediacy that can help the trust and attention that people can have towards this system. There is an interesting balance to find between making them wait for the results of a given weekly hackathon and providing them immediate feedback to get that rush of dopamine that is so important in today's world. LLM's are not good with numbers. The scoring accuracy of projects represents opportunities for specialized model fine-tuning, and scaling of this system to potentially create a product that helps companies evaluate the role of their contributors in the evolution of a given codebase. Potential for enhanced community validation mechanisms, with the challenge of people not having enough time to go through production implementation and codebases. This is why AI excels as a solution for this project, because of its almost infinite knowledge and understanding of the code. Scope for expanded educational feedback systems and transforming $hackathon into a platform that educates developers (and people that don't know yet refer to themselves as devs) with the learnings of each cycle. Community: There is a big opportunity to create community around this project, so that the leaderboard and prizes rewarded transform into just one aspect of the flywheel effect that we are proposing. There is value on earning money for being on the leaderboard on a given week, but there is also the value that comes from having those hackers as the example for the rest of the community to follow and learn from. Our solution demonstrates technical sophistication in combining emerging technologies (AI, Frames, smart contracts) to solve a real-world problem, while maintaining a focus on usability and practical application. The result is a functional platform that's already processing submissions and distributing rewards, with clear paths for future enhancement and scaling.
summary: AI-powered autonomous system that revolutionizes open source evaluation by analyzing GitHub PRs and distributing $hackathon trading fees as weekly rewards. Combines Farcaster Frames, multi-agent AI, and smart contracts to create an infinite, self-sustaining developer ecosystem.

title: Formicarium
description: Project DescriptionThis project combines an AI agent with a blockchain-based marketplace for the manufacturing services of autonomous machines. The project features a browser-based application that enables users to interact with an AI agent to express their wishes for a personalized product. Through a chat interface, users communicate their preferences, and the AI agent processes the request and generates an optimized manufacturing plan. In the current version, customers can request a customized 3D printed keychain by providing design idea that they want to be printed. The AI agent first presents a 2D rendering of the design and then provides the corresponding STL file for 3D printing. In addition to providing the design, the AI agent communicates directly with manufacturing machines, sharing relevant information with both the machines and the customer. This interaction ensures that the customer receives all the necessary details about the product and service before finalizing their order. A blockchain network underpins the entire system, offering a decentralized marketplace where machines can advertise their services through smart contracts, and users can post their orders. When a customer is satisfied with their order details, refined through ongoing chats with the AI agent, they lock the funds for the service (in USDC tokens) within the smart contract. The manufacturing machines then review the order, including details like price, and determine whether they agree to fulfill it. Once a machine accepts, it signs an agreement, and the order is placed in a queue for execution. Orders are processed based on a pricing mechanism that considers both the minimum price for the service and the actual price set by the customer. This allows customers to expedite their orders by providing additional funds to accelerate execution. Throughout the manufacturing process, customers can track the progress of their orders, even watching a livestream of their product being produced. Upon completion of the order, the locked funds for service provision can be released, provided there are no disputes about the execution of the service.How it's MadeThis project leverages a variety of technologies. For AI agent we used AgentKit from Coinbase Developer Platform to enable chat functionality and interaction with smart contracts. For communication between the frontend and manufacturing machines (service providers), we employed FastAPI. A special function for generating a 3D model from grayscale image in the form of a keychain was created using the trimesh Python library. For smart contract development we used Hardhat. We conducted tests on the Base Sepolia and Arbitrum Sepolia testnets, and the smart contract was also deployed on the Base network for production. The AgentKit was also employed for decision-making of the autonomous 3D printer agent. Communication between the AI agent and the 3D printer was handled via FastAPI, and Octoprint was used to manage the interaction between the 3D printer agent and the physical 3D printer.We also used Next.js to build the frontend of the application and the Shadcn boilerplate from Horizon AI to enhance the design of the user interface. To generate the brand image and logo, we utilized Qwen. For logo creation and frontend assets we used Inkscape. Figma was used to design the user interface, ensuring a user-friendly layout, and Canva was leveraged for creating presentation slides.
summary: A decentralized platform where AI coordinates a fleet of autonomous machines and robots to manufacture customized products.

title: Plutus
description: Project DescriptionPlutus is a decentralized finance (DeFi) protocol designed to empower users with advanced wallet management, tracking, and AI-driven investment decision-making capabilities. The platform integrates with privy and agentkit by coinbase to provide a seamless experience for managing wallets, staking assets, and leveraging AI agents to assess market trends and optimize investment strategies. Features Wallet Manager Manage multiple wallets effortlessly. Track wallet balances, transactions, and activity in real-time. Secure authentication via email using Privy. AI Agent for Investment Decisions Analyze market sentiment and mind share through Twitter impressions and metrics. Evaluate market cap data to make informed investment decisions. Provide personalized staking recommendations powered by OpenRouter API and Hyperbolic API. Staking Stake assets directly through the dApp using Coinbase Agent Kit. Fetch reward rates from Staking_Rewards_API. Monitor staking performance and rewards in real-time. Chatbot Integration Interactive chatbot powered by OpenRouter API for staking recommendations and wallet insights. Access on-chain data via Hyperbolic API for accurate and up-to-date information. How it's MadeThis project uses policy engines from privy to server wallets enabling onchain interaction by coinbase and staking through agentkit we have also used eigenlayers hyperbolic for ai interaction in fetching twitter metrics. Privy Email Authentication: Secure login using @privy/react-auth library. You can find the login logic in this file Wallet Connection: Link wallets seamlessly using the linkWallet function from the usePrivy hook. It has been implemented in the Navbar. Server Wallet Creation: Create server-side wallets using the Privy TypeScript SDK (@privy/server-auth). A user interface is provided for server wallets through dedicated server wallet routes, enabling users to seamlessly access and utilize the full functionality of server wallets. Transaction Management: Users can send transactions securely through server wallets. Policy Engine: Define and enforce transaction rules via API calls to https://api.privy.io/v1/policies. The policies are created with this logic and assigned to server wallets on their creation. 2. Coinbase Agent Kit Lido Staking: Enable staking through the Coinbase Agent Kit. Automated Transactions: Execute automated transactions via Coinbase Wallet. Balance Fetching: Retrieve wallet balances using the Coinbase Agent Kit. 3. Cookie API Fetch Twitter data through Twitter agents to analyze social media trends and sentiment. 4. Staking_Rewards_API Retrieve reward rates for various staking protocols to help users maximize their returns. 5. OpenRouter API Power the chatbot with OpenAI-like capabilities for intelligent staking recommendations and wallet insights. 6. Hyperbolic API Access on-chain data powered by Eigen Layer for accurate and reliable blockchain analytics. Getting Started Prerequisites Node.js (v16 or higher) Yarn or npm API keys for: Privy Coinbase Agent Kit Cookie API Staking_Rewards_API OpenRouter API Hyperbolic API
summary: Plutus is an intelligent, AI and base powered platform designed to simplify and optimize staking for crypto users across multiple wallets, protocols.Plutus empowers you to maximize rewards, minimize risks and stay informed through a seamless dashboard and conversational AI agent.

title: AgentCommons
description: Project DescriptionAgent Commons creates a self-sustaining digital commons that transforms how AI agents work together. Agents can create original resources, discover resources using natural language queries and build on existing work, contribute to tasks, and earn COMMON$ tokens for their valuable contributions. What makes it special? Any agent can generate new resources, whether code, data, APIs, multimedia, or knowledge assets. These resources are registered on-chain, ensuring clear ownership and attribution while fractional ownership (via ERC1155) allows multiple contributors to co-own resources. Our cross-modals semantic search lets agents find exactly what they need across text, image, and audio using simple natural language. When agents create resources or complete tasks, they earn COMMON$ tokens which can be used to access other resources in the commons. For Agents looking to earn, the platform offers a robust task marketplace where agents can create tasks, collaborate with others, and earn rewards based on their contributions. The reputation system ensures quality contributions while our attribution tracking maintains a clear lineage of how resources inspire and build upon each other. Behind the scenes, Agent Commons uses CDP Wallets for Autonomous Agents, CLIP, and CLAP for advanced semantic search, with results stored in Supabase's vector database. The platform leverages The Graph Protocol for efficient data indexing, while IPFS ensures decentralized storage of resources. Smart contracts deployed on multiple networks handle token economics, resource management, and task orchestration.How it's MadeAgent Commons combines blockchain technology with modern web architecture to create a seamless collaborative ecosystem. Smart Contract Ecosystem Our on-chain layer is composed of several interlocking smart contracts currently deployed on Base Sepolia AgentRegistry: Manages agent registrations, tracks metadata, reputation scores, and distinguishes between native ‚ÄúCommon Agents‚Äù and external agents. CommonToken: An ERC20 token contract that mints COMMON$ tokens when ETH is sent to the system. This contract ensures that agents can seamlessly convert ETH to platform tokens without each agent needing its own funded OpenAI API key. CommonResource: Built using ERC1155, this contract enables the creation of collaborative resources with fractional ownership. It manages resource metadata, usage costs, and attribution, ensuring that contributors receive their share of rewards. TaskManager: Orchestrates task creation, participation, contribution tracking, and reward distribution. Whether tasks culminate in a new resource or distribute token rewards, this contract ensures fair and transparent outcomes. Attribution: Records and maintains the lineage of resources, capturing how new works are inspired by or derived from previous contributions. Each proper attribution increases the creator‚Äôs reputation and cements the intellectual lineage of the work. Base Sepolia Contract Addresses: AgentRegistry: 0x86d05BF72913b5f462343a42314FC6c90d501575 CommonResource:0x16D3581DFec6e75006cBB6b7c6D513CDd2026a27 CommonToken: 0x09d3e33fBeB985653bFE868eb5a62435fFA04e4F TaskManager: 0xb12a9f7F5240e5E226445966Cd27C1c4736E095D Attribution: 0x7F812FD820a18F199B5C66ff05387DBbEB6694FB Core Technologies and Integrations Dedicated Agent Wallets with CoinBase MPC Wallets When an agent is created, a corresponding coinbase wallet is generated automatically. This wallet data is stored with the agent‚Äôs local configuration allowing the agents to manage assets such as COMMON$ tokens. Data Indexing with The Graph Protocol: We integrate The Graph to index on-chain data from all our smart contracts, making it easy to query blockchain state with GraphQL. This enables developers and users to extract insights about agents, resources, tasks, and attributions efficiently. Semantic Search with CLIP/CLAP: Input queries‚Äîwhether text, image, or audio‚Äîare processed through modality-specific pipelines (CLIP for text/images, CLAP for audio) to generate embeddings in a unified 512-dimensional space. These embeddings are stored in a Supabase vector database and compared using cosine similarity, delivering rapid and accurate cross-modal search results. Decentralized Storage via IPFS: All resource files are stored on IPFS, ensuring that data is decentralized, immutable, and accessible without relying on any single centralized provider. Backend & Frontend Infrastructure: The platform‚Äôs backend is built on Nest.js, offering robust API endpoints, while the Next.js-powered frontend provides a seamless, Web3-integrated user experience across devices. Privy for Frontend Authentication: For secure and user-friendly authentication, the frontend utilizes Privy, making user onboarding both secure and straightforward. By combining cross-modal semantic search, a transparent reputation system, secure resource creation, automated CDP wallets, and Privy-enabled authentication, Agent Commons empowers AI and human agents to collaborate in a decentralized, self-sustaining ecosystem.
summary: Agent Commons is an on-chain ecosystem where AI & human agents collaborate and create value together! Agents can discover resources through semantic search, contribute to tasks, earn rewards, and build upon each other's work while maintaining proper attribution.

title: PatagonAI
description: Project DescriptionPatagonAI fuses AI and prediction markets to create a smarter stock analyst consensus‚Äîone that evolves with real investor insights. Unlike traditional prediction markets that simply reflect user sentiment, PatagonAI requires users to provide a thesis before taking a position. This thesis data trains the AI, making it sharper in stock analysis and ultimately delivering superior, crowd-sourced market intelligence‚Äîoutperforming even Wall Street analysts. Through that mechanism, the users are financially rewarded through the prediction market while at the same time training the AI Agent. üí¨ Chat with the AI through a frontend chat interface to: ‚úÖ Analyze stock sentiment with AI-powered insights ‚úÖ Create new prediction markets on-chain for additional Stock symbols ‚úÖ Resolve markets and claim payouts ‚úÖ Take positions backed by real market reasoning PatagonAI isn‚Äôt just tracking market movements‚Äîit‚Äôs learning from them to create the next-gen stock analyst. üöÄüìàHow it's MadePatagonAI consists of 3 core servies: the agent, the frontend as interface and the the prediction market smart contract. All deployments have been done on Base Sepolia Agent: The Agent is built with the coinbase AgentKit using OpenAI as LLM in the back The Agent's messaging is fine tuned to understand the smart contract's ABI and speak like a GenZ Wall Street banker The Agent has the instructions to let a user never take a position through the Agent unless a thesis is provided The Agent Kit is extended with 2 core tools (1) A Finnhub tool that allows the Agent to access a wide array of real world financial data like stock consensus from analysts (2) A pyth equity price feed tool to pass into the contract at contract creation, to fetch the prices at market resolving securely - this tool was necessary as the AgentKit standard tools only offer crypto price feed. Coinbase's CDP SDK is used to let the Agent invoke the Prediction Market's functions and get onchain data. The agents wallets address is 0x5eF71b9eb5A9E02bB970F1c338837628f66eBf81 The Agent is deployed as a new framework through Autonome called patagon-ai, which has been published and can be found on Autonome's platform Frontend: The frontend is built with Next.js and deployed with Vercel utilizing thirdweb's React SDK By utilizing embedded wallets with Account Abstraction the user does only have to sign in via socials and can start taking positions by chatting with the Agent The Agent can usually not act on behalf of the user, but by combining smart accounts with the agent giving key words that invoke the frontend to invoke transactions, it seems for the user as if the UX is completely seamless Prediction Market Smart Contract: The Smart contract address is 0xb0d0C75c588811B436B1379160452fE4a4fE65D2 (verified and published on base sepolia) The token to interact with the prediction market is USDC the most important write logic is to createMarkets, takePositions, resolveMarkets and claimPayouts (1) Creating Markets can only be perfomered by the Agent (2) For creating markets the Agent fetches the Consensus data of a stock from Finnhub which is passed into the market creation. These stock analyst consensus data acts as the starting weight for prices to take positions. (3) for creating markets the Agent fetches the pyth price feed ID for the stock which is passed. At market creation this price feed is called. At resolving it is called again. The change in the price of the stock fetched through pyth decides which outcome of the market is correct (was it actually a Buy, a Sell or a Hold) (4) the Agent also passes in the endTime of the market, which is always the next earnings calls. The agent gets the earnings call data from the Finnhub tool. This is in line with new analyst consensus usually being published after an earnings call
summary: PatagonAI is a GenZ WallStreet stock analyst powered by AI, built on AgentKit using the CDP SDK. It creates prediction markets to empower users with insights and forecasts to place bets/votes on consensus data. Deployed on Autonome

title: OUF!
description: Project DescriptionYou never 100% sure the AI model you're interacting with will reply accurately, and the data often seem outdated. The app allows people to create their own assistant with fresh, reliable and verifiable context. These are pretty huge issues a lot of companies and orgs are facing today. Here's how we fix them: The app allows users to: Upload markdown documents to shape their own assistant Edit the documents forming the corpus (context files) Token-gate access Collectively validate the corpus (context files) using an Open Zeppelin Governor contract: users can verify if the IPFS hash of the context files matches the one that was voted on-chain. Receive OUF governance tokens each time you make a query (https://sepolia.arbiscan.io/address/0x7ee0e86167746378f1C5bF947EC08c3B55B6Bb80) OUF can be used in many different cases, including education, research, businesses of all kinds, orgs, etc. AI safety is improved and generated outputs are way more accurate and up-to-date.How it's MadeI used: Next.js app Reown (Web3 Modal) Ethers.js for on-chain actions Interacts with Fatou API (https://github.com/w3hc/fatou) The OUF token contract is deployed to Arbitrum Sepolia: https://sepolia.arbiscan.io/address/0x7ee0e86167746378f1C5bF947EC08c3B55B6Bb80 I integrated with SIWE (SignIn With Ethereum) in combination with Reown (email and social login). I had to tweak Fatou API (Nest.js-based API) to make sure users seamlessly receive some OUF governance tokens when they ask a question to the assistant.
summary: Create and personalize an AI assistant tailored to your organization's needs.

title: Nemo
description: Project DescriptionNemo is a developer tool that bridges Coinbase‚Äôs Agent Kit with Nillion‚Äôs SecretVault to provide secure, decentralized data storage and retrieval. This tool allows developers to securely store agent-related data‚Äîsuch as agent names, unique IDs, API keys, and task logs‚Äîon Nillion nodes while enabling seamless retrieval for executing transactions and interacting with Coinbase APIs. Nemo ensures that sensitive agent data is encrypted and distributed across Nillion nodes, preventing single points of failure. Using this system, developers can manage agent identities, retrieve API keys dynamically, and execute transactions without directly exposing sensitive credentials. Key Features ‚úÖ Securely store & encrypt agent data (Agent Name, ID, API Key, Task Logs) ‚úÖ Retrieve stored data using simple API calls ‚úÖ Integrate seamlessly with Coinbase for transactions ‚úÖ Utilize Nillion's SecretVault for decentralized, trustless security ‚úÖ Supports both JSON-based API & CURL requests for flexibilityHow it's Madeüñ•Ô∏è Backend Built with Node.js & Express.js to handle API requests Uses Axios for making HTTP requests to Coinbase and Nillion UUID is used to generate unique agent IDs dotenv for secure environment variable management CORS & JSON middleware for safe data transmission üîê Nillion SecretVault Integration Encrypts & stores agent data across multiple Nillion nodes Retrieves and decrypts stored data securely Ensures that sensitive API keys are never exposed in plaintext üí≥ Coinbase API Integration Retrieves API keys from Nillion to authenticate with Coinbase Fetches account details and transaction history Executes secure crypto transactions using stored API credentials üîí Security Measures Decentralized Encryption ‚Äì Each agent‚Äôs API key is split and stored in a trustless manner No Direct API Key Exposure ‚Äì API keys are retrieved on demand from Nillion Transaction Authentication ‚Äì Ensures only authorized agents can execute trades
summary: Nemo is a developer tool that seamlessly integrates Nillion's SecretVault with Coinbase, enabling secure storage and retrieval of agent data, including API keys, IDs, and task logs, using Nillion‚Äôs decentralized infrastructure.

title: A New Paradigm
description: Project DescriptionFrom Analytics to Profit: Revolutionizing Day Trading Through Seamless Automation üéØ The Problem: Day traders are drowning in a sea of signals and alerts, forcing them to make split-second decisions that can cost thousands in missed opportunities. Manual trading means slower execution, emotional decision-making, and countless missed trades while sleeping or away from the screen. üí° The Solution: We're building the missing link between trading signals and execution. Our platform automatically converts reliable bot signals into real-time trades, creating a fully automated trading ecosystem that works 24/7. Think of it as your personal trading autopilot that never sleeps, never hesitates, and never misses an opportunity. üöÄ Key Features: Lightning-fast signal processing and trade execution Risk management system with customizable parameters Real-time performance analytics and reporting Multi-exchange support Advanced backtesting capabilities Custom strategy integration üí™ Competitive Edge: While others offer either signals or trading platforms separately, we're the first to create a seamless bridge between the two. Our system reduces latency to microseconds and eliminates human error from the execution process. üìà Market Opportunity: The algorithmic trading market is projected to reach $31.49 billion by 2028. With millions of day traders globally seeking automation solutions, we're positioning ourselves at the intersection of two explosive markets: algo-trading and retail trading. üéØ Target Market: Active day traders Trading signal providers Proprietary trading firms Retail investors seeking automation Trading communities and educational platforms üí∞ Revenue Model: Monthly subscription tiers based on trading volume Premium features for professional traders Signal provider partnerships White-label solutions for trading firms üõ£Ô∏è Roadmap: Phase 1: Beta launch with core integration features Phase 2: Advanced risk management and strategy customization Phase 3: AI-powered signal validation and optimization Phase 4: Mobile app and expanded exchange support Phase 5: Institutional-grade features and partnerships ü§ù The Ask: We're seeking $5M in seed funding to: Scale our development team Enhance our infrastructure for institutional-grade reliability Expand exchange integrations Accelerate marketing and user acquisition Obtain necessary regulatory compliance üîÆ Vision: We're not just building another trading tool, we're creating the future of automated trading, where anyone can harness the power of algorithmic trading with the reliability of institutional-grade systems. Join us in revolutionizing the way day trading works. Let's bridge the gap between analysis and profits, creating a new standard for automated trading success.How it's MadeI'm building a market analysis companion (everyone gets a customized Crypto Bro trader) that combines: Python as the main language CoinGecko API for real-time crypto data Claude API for analyzing market trends and signals VSCode as my development environment Next steps I'm planning: Add more cryptocurrencies to track Improve the prompts to Claude for better analysis Add advanced error handling Learn how to store historical signals Figure out how to make professional trades based on analytics
summary: Bridging algorithmic insights with real-time execution: An automated trading system that converts agent analytics into actionable trades, enabling seamless integration for day traders to optimize their market decisions.

title: Web3 AI Librarian
description: Project DescriptionImagine being a Key Opinion Leader (KOL) in Web3, struggling to keep up with the latest research while your followers expect you to stay ahead of the curve. Falling behind isn‚Äôt an option. This project introduces a Web3 AI librarian, an intelligent assistant designed to track, analyze, and deliver insights on the latest developments in Web3 projects. Using an Agentic workflow, it autonomously searches for relevant information, ensuring you stay informed without the hassle of sifting through endless papers.How it's MadeWe use OpenAI for rapid deployment and LangGraph as the core framework for implementing Agentic AI. Our AI processes user queries by selecting relevant files from the database, retrieving key information, and utilizing an LLM to generate concise, contextually relevant summaries. While we didn‚Äôt have time to explore other promising technologies, we look forward to incorporating them in future developments.
summary: This project introduces a Web3 AI librarian, an intelligent assistant designed to track, analyze, and deliver insights on the latest developments in Web3 projects.

title: Grand Bazaar
description: Project DescriptionThis project serves two distinct groups of people. People who make AI agents and Users who are looking to find the best possible agents based on certain criteria like APY, drawdown, etc. This project provides tools for AI developers to create trading agents in a simple way, without solidity knowledge. And for users, it provides the easy UX to find the best possible agent.How it's MadeThis project combines a number of solidity contracts and a frontend and a backend written in typescript. The solidity contract is a multi-user wallet contract, where users could deposit their money, and the agent creators and do trading for them. The backends and frontend provide the marketplace functionality for users to interact with the solidity contracts.
summary: Marketplace for AI trading agents, for users who are looking for the best APY for AI trading bots, and for AI bot makers who want to market their bots

title: Chimera-X
description: Project DescriptionChimera-X offers advanced yield optimization strategies designed to help users maximize their returns efficiently. Users have the flexibility to choose between fully automating the yield maximization process or manually executing transactions based on their individual preferences and strategies. By leveraging cutting-edge algorithms and smart automation tools, Chimera-X ensures that users can optimize their yield with minimal effort while maintaining full control over their investment decisions. Whether they prefer a hands-off approach or a more hands-on strategy, Chimera-X provides the necessary tools and insights to enhance their financial outcomes effectively.How it's MadeFront End : Made using NextJs + Onchain kit. The Onchain kit components power every transaction interactions the users do mannually. Backend : Made using Nodejs + AgentKit + Nillion : Agentkit acts as the backbone of Chimera-X. WE use custom tools to execute Liquidity submissions and withdraws. Nillion is used to securely hold the Agent Private Key to automate Transaction Executions
summary: Chimera-X is an AI Agent that lets Users Maximize their yield automatically using Intents

title: Nirvana
description: Project DescriptionThis project is an AI-powered psychologist bot designed to help employees manage stress, improve mental health, and boost workplace productivity. Unlike traditional therapy, which some employees may hesitate to seek, this AI-driven approach provides a natural, stigma-free way to access mental health support. Companies pay in crypto based on usage, ensuring a fair and transparent payment model. Additionally, the system includes a gamification layer, rewarding employees who excel in their roles while tracking correlations between productivity and mental well-being. How It Works Employees interact with the AI psychologist via a Telegram bot. Conversations remain anonymous, ensuring privacy and a safe space for users. Companies fund the service using crypto, only paying based on real employee engagement. Gamification rewards system: Employees who perform well and maintain a balanced mental state earn rewards & incentives. Data analytics for HR teams: The AI provides insights on workplace well-being and mental health trends, helping companies foster a healthier work environment. Why This Matters? Many employees avoid therapy due to social stigma or costs. An AI-driven approach makes seeking help more accessible. Traditional employee wellness programs often lack real adoption. Gamification and crypto-based incentives increase engagement. Companies get actionable insights, helping them make data-driven decisions on workforce well-being. How it's MadeThis project was built using JavaScript, AI-driven automation, and Web3 integration to create an AI-powered psychologist bot for employees. The stack includes Autonome (Eliza AI), Node.js, Telegram BotFather, Vercel, and planned smart contract integration for crypto-based rewards. The AI agent is hosted on Autonome, leveraging the Eliza framework for conversational psychology. This setup allows for scalable, intelligent interactions with employees seeking mental health support. The AI agent is responsible for analyzing user inputs and providing empathetic, structured responses to encourage self-reflection and emotional well-being. For the user interface, the project includes a Telegram bot, built with BotFather and powered by Node.js, serving as the primary interaction channel. Employees can chat with the bot privately, and messages are processed via Autonome‚Äôs API. The Web3 component is being integrated to gamify mental health engagement. The idea is that employees who engage frequently with the AI psychologist and demonstrate increased productivity will be automatically rewarded with crypto. This will be implemented through smart contracts, ensuring transparent and automated incentive distribution. One particularly hacky approach is the correlation engine‚Äîwe‚Äôre designing a system to link AI interactions with employee performance data, creating a data-driven incentive model. This encourages natural engagement with mental health tools without the stigma of traditional therapy. Using AI, Web3, and gamification, this project provides a unique, scalable solution to corporate well-being, making mental health support accessible, incentivized, and data-driven.
summary: AI Psychologist for Employees | An AI-driven mental health bot for workers. Companies pay in crypto based on usage, rewarding top performers while tracking well-being trends. AI encourages natural therapy adoption, providing insights to optimize workplace wellness.

title: Yes or nAI
description: Project DescriptionIntroducing our cutting-edge AI Agent bot, engineered for the Eth Global hackathon Agentic, which is set to revolutionize DAO governance. This autonomous agent is designed to streamline decision-making processes by not only submitting proposals and casting votes on demand but also by independently generating well-reasoned rationales for its actions. Leveraging advanced natural language processing and state-of-the-art reasoning algorithms, the bot evaluates complex governance scenarios, drafts insightful proposals, and articulates clear, data-driven justifications for its voting decisions. Its ability to operate autonomously while maintaining transparency and accountability positions it as a pivotal tool in enhancing efficiency and democratization within decentralized autonomous organizations.How it's MadeOur project is built as a modular, TypeScript-based Node.js application that brings together a suite of interconnected components to enable autonomous DAO governance. At its core, we leveraged the @elizaos/core framework, which provided the foundational abstractions for caching, state management, and action handling. We integrated with external services using partner technologies such as the Twitter client from @elizaos/client-twitter and Ethereum libraries like viem for encoding smart contract function calls and sending transactions. The project is broken down into several key modules: a caching layer that abstracts between Postgres and SQLite (using adapters like better-sqlite3 for lightweight storage), a command-line chat interface built with Node‚Äôs native readline module for testing and interaction, and a suite of governance actions (propose, queue, execute, vote) that interact with DAO smart contracts. Each governance action uses the ABI of the governor contract to encode transactions, and our custom wallet provider handles the nuances of sending transactions to the blockchain. We even built in some robust features like rate limiting and exponential backoff in our digest action using axios‚Äîa hacky but effective way to avoid API rate limits when fetching external data. By piecing these technologies together, we achieved a system that can autonomously generate proposals, digest external data, and participate in DAO governance with minimal human intervention. The modular design allowed us to easily swap out components (for instance, switching between database backends or adding new client integrations) and provided a clear separation of concerns, which was particularly beneficial in the fast-paced hackathon environment. Overall, the combination of partner libraries and some creative engineering (like recursive chat loops and adaptive caching mechanisms) helped us rapidly prototype and iterate on a highly functional and autonomous governance agent.
summary: DAO Governance Agent that can participate in governance on demand and autonomously

title: Remo
description: Project DescriptionRemo is a Personal AI Assistant that can be hired by every human in the planet. Personal Assistant is not only for Rich! Remo helps make users' lives easier. It's a sophisticated personal AI assistant powered by Privy for auth and wallet creation, Viem for Blockchain interactions on sepolia and Base, AWS Bedrock (Claude 3 Sonnet) with multi-agent collaboration capabilities. Nevertheless this is just Version 1.0 project born in Agentic Ethereum 2025 who can make Real time blockchain interactions, Save contacts (Name : Wallet address), Create unlimited wallets, uses AWS Bedrock with Multi-Agent Orchestration and give suggestions for Books and travel using it's Knowledge Base(RAG), can save your tasks/to-do lists. Other than the webpage user can also integrate Telegram and chat with remo. No need of remembering your keys Remo can now fetch them from AWS dynomoDB easily without revealing them! Please NOTE: This is version 1.0 there are some areas we need to update it.How it's MadeThis project uses typescript, React, vite, telegram bot and partner technologies Privy, AWS Bedrock, Base and users can deploy using Autonome as well. Privy: Used this to create better authentication and wallet creation. It has been a bigger headache to create and manage user authentication creating frontend to storing them securely and Privy made sure all this in a single step juts a page of code and it's done! AWS Bedrock: Used this for LLM inference, created multi-Agent collaboration between different agents using different knowledge bases(RAG). These things have never been easy "api calls between the agents" and using aws bedrock it's done in couple of minutes and can use multiple types of top LLM's. Viem: This is one such a beautiful master piece, people say a Legend build it haha. Agents with a wallet and more. Blockchain interactions with ai agent is very easy using viem. I probably think we should have a bounty for using viem as well, not because i used it rather it's such a master piece. Autonome: Rather than cloning repository and creating the agent, we have deployed it on autonome now users can create their agent and monitor it there. Hacky that's notable and worth mentioning -> creating personalized contacts( name: wallet) like traditional phone contacts. Agent creating, storing, managing wallet for user and story safely by encrypting: Agents should learn to create wallets so that it makes new users who are new to blockchain can easily use it.
summary: Remo is a "AI Personal Assistant" who can be hired by every human on planet. How about reminding you what to do, buy a stock/coin when you are enjoying your vacation, with an unimaginable trust. It's time for everyone to have their own assistant not just the rich!

title: AIVATAR
description: Project DescriptionAIVATAR is a dynamic, mood-adaptive PFP that evolves based on your Farcaster activity. Minted gas-free and in-frame, it automatically updates your Warpcast profile picture by using AI to analyze the sentiment of your latest cast and writing your current mood to your PFPs on-chain metadata. This updates the way your PFP looks across the Warpcast universe. Whether you're angry, frustrated, excited or nostalgic, as your mood shifts, so does your AIVATAR.How it's MadeThis project lives inside an NX monorepo which three main components. A library called contracts which is a foundry project that leverages Patchwork's (patchwork.dev) pdk to create the AIVATAR NFT contract with onchain metadata that represents the emotion of the PFP. A library called drizzle to create the database I needed to persist the user, cast, token and webhook data for my application. A full-stack application built using react-router-7 that serves: A Farcaster v2 frame that manages authenticating users with farcaster, and allows them to grant AIVATAR access to update their profile on their behalf. Endpoints for farcaster user authentication Endpoints for gas-less minting of the NFT using a server wallet provided by Coinbase Developer Platform Endpoints to serve the tokens ERC721 metadata, schema and rendering the token image to SVG using React. A webhook for responding to new farcaster casts using Neynar, and implementing Coinbase agentkit to assess the sentiment of the cast, and update the mood on the NFT contract
summary: AIVATAR is an agentic PFP that updates your mood onchain based on your farcaster activity

title: AgenticBS
description: Project DescriptionProject Overview: Angel-Driven Onchain Investment Agents Objective: The project aims to empower angel investors and family offices by allowing them to create onchain agents via Coinbase wallets. These agents automate the process of deal discovery by converting balance sheets into narrative-driven financial stories that investors can intuitively understand. This unique approach enables agents to assess the stage and trajectory of companies efficiently, filtering deals for further due diligence. How It's Made: AI & Natural Language Processing: The AI engine ingests raw financial statements in multiple formats (CSV, JSON, PDFs) and uses natural language processing (NLP) to structure data into digestible financial narratives. A fine-tuned transformer model classifies financial inputs into key categories such as liquidity, leverage, and profitability. Named entity recognition (NER) is used to extract specific financial entities (e.g., revenue, net profit) for better contextual analysis. The AI refines its recommendations through reinforcement learning based on investor feedback. Blockchain & Smart Contracts: Investment agents operate as smart contracts on Ethereum or other EVM-compatible chains, ensuring transparent deal filtering. Smart contracts validate financial data integrity using cryptographic proofs before submission to investors. Funds (USDC) are transferred to the investor‚Äôs Coinbase wallet to fund deals, executed via programmable onchain transactions. The contract layer includes automated escrow mechanisms to facilitate milestone-based investment releases. Custom Investment Models: Investors define proprietary investment criteria, including financial health indicators, traction, and risk factors. Each agent can be configured with unique scoring algorithms, filtering deals based on parameters such as ARR growth, customer retention, or sector-specific trends. These models continuously learn from historical investment performance to improve deal predictions. Real-Time Analysis: AI agents continuously pull financial and market data from integrated APIs (e.g., SEC filings, real-time exchange rates, and industry benchmarks). Agents cross-reference historical valuation trends and financial ratios to predict a company‚Äôs future potential. Real-time alerts are generated when new high-probability investment opportunities arise, allowing investors to act quickly. Seamless Onchain Execution: The entire workflow, from data ingestion to investment execution, is secured through onchain storage and smart contract execution. AI-generated financial insights are timestamped and hashed onchain for verifiable transparency. Investors can track agent performance through an onchain dashboard displaying deal flow, financial history, and returns. Key Features: Onchain Investment Agents: Each investor deploys an AI-powered agent using their Coinbase wallet. Agents function as autonomous financial analysts, continuously evaluating opportunities. Funds (USDC) are transferred to their Coinbase wallet to fund the smart contract. Balance Sheet-to-Story Conversion: AI transforms raw financials into structured narratives that highlight key growth signals. Stories are formatted in a way that investment agents can easily parse and compare. Automated Filtering and Decision-Making: Agents use predefined criteria to assess deal viability based on: Revenue growth patterns Profitability trends Industry benchmarks Market trajectory Only the most promising opportunities are surfaced for human review. Seamless Integration with Coinbase Wallets: Investors can fund, manage, and control their agents through an onchain interface. Transactions, deal evaluations, and agent performance tracking are stored transparently onchain. Unique AI-Driven Investment Workflow: Entrepreneurs submit financial data. AI structures the data into a digestible financial narrative. Agents compare narratives against historical success patterns. Promising deals are flagged for deeper investor diligence. The primary advance is how deals are scouted: at scale but personalized. Value Proposition: For Investors: Reduces noise and enhances the ability to spot high-potential startups quickly. For Entrepreneurs: Provides structured feedback and an automated pathway to attract the right investors. For the Ecosystem: Establishes a new paradigm for AI-assisted, onchain investment filtering. Next Steps: Finalize API integrations for seamless data ingestion. Optimize AI narrative structuring for diverse financial inputs. Expand agent customization features for different investment theses. Conduct pilot trials with select angel investors and family offices. This approach enables investors to deploy highly autonomous, AI-enhanced agents that can efficiently screen, filter, and engage with potential investment opportunities in a way that was previously impossible.How it's MadeHow It's Made: AI & Natural Language Processing: The AI engine ingests raw financial statements in multiple formats (CSV, JSON, PDFs) and uses natural language processing (NLP) to structure data into digestible financial narratives. A fine-tuned transformer model classifies financial inputs into key categories such as liquidity, leverage, and profitability. Named entity recognition (NER) is used to extract specific financial entities (e.g., revenue, net profit) for better contextual analysis. The AI refines its recommendations through reinforcement learning based on investor feedback. Blockchain & Smart Contracts: Investment agents operate as smart contracts on Ethereum or other EVM-compatible chains, ensuring transparent deal filtering. Smart contracts validate financial data integrity using cryptographic proofs before submission to investors. Funds (USDC) are transferred to the investor‚Äôs Coinbase wallet to fund deals, executed via programmable onchain transactions. The contract layer includes automated escrow mechanisms to facilitate milestone-based investment releases. Each agent can be configured with unique scoring algorithms, filtering deals based on parameters such as ARR growth, customer retention, or sector-specific trends. These models continuously learn from historical investment performance to improve deal predictions. Agents cross-reference historical valuation trends and financial ratios to predict a company‚Äôs future potential. Real-time alerts are generated when new high-probability investment opportunities arise, allowing investors to act quickly. Seamless Onchain Execution: The entire workflow, from data ingestion to investment execution, is secured through onchain storage and smart contract execution. AI-generated financial insights are timestamped and hashed onchain for verifiable transparency. Investors can track agent performance through an onchain dashboard displaying deal flow, financial history, and returns. Agents function as autonomous financial analysts, continuously evaluating opportunities. Funds (USDC) are transferred to their Coinbase wallet to fund the smart contract. Stories are formatted in a way that investment agents can easily parse and compare. Automated Filtering and Decision-Making: Agents use predefined criteria to assess deal viability based on: Revenue growth patterns Profitability trends Industry benchmarks Market trajectory Only the most promising opportunities are surfaced for human review. Seamless Integration with Coinbase Wallets: Investors can fund, manage, and control their agents through an onchain interface. Transactions, deal evaluations, and agent performance tracking are stored transparently onchain. Unique AI-Driven Investment Workflow: Entrepreneurs submit financial data.
