summary: Onchain AI agents for angel investors & family offices‚Äîturning balance sheets into stories. Fund with USDC, filter deals at scale but personalized, and automate investment insights via Coinbase wallets. Smarter scouting, seamless due diligence. üöÄ #Web3 #AI #Investing

title: WagmAI
description: Project DescriptionWe have given life to an AI Agent, WagmAIgent, designed to help users navigate the complexities of our information era, which has evolved from whispered secrets in ancient forums to viral waves in digital feeds. Our AI Agent strives to serve as a neutral and reliable guide, leveraging the collective knowledge of humanity to assist users in discerning valuable information from the vast amounts of data on social networks. WagmAIgent's info: Tweeter: https://x.com/WagmAIgent Telegram: https://t.me/WagmAIgent_Bot Gender: undefined WagmAIgent's mission is to highlight credible and insightful contributions, whether they are essays, research papers, blog posts, or any publications. At the same time, it will identify and flag misleading or false information, providing evidence and context to help users make informed decisions. The AI Agent will analyse data on social networks, identifying and sharing high-quality content. Users will receive reward tokens, known as $WAGMAI, for their valuable contributions. These tokens act as points and reputation markers. Accumulated $WAGMAI tokens can be used to unlock badges, granting access to services, events, debates, and more. Our AI Agent aims to improve the quality of information dissemination and foster a community of informed users. By rewarding credible contributions and highlighting falsehoods, we hope to create a more trustworthy and insightful digital environment.How it's MadeOur AI Agent is built using a combination of advanced technologies and methodologies: ElizaOS with NLP: We use ElizaOS with Natural Language Processing (NLP) techniques to analyze and understand the content on social networks. This helps in identifying high-quality and credible information. RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation): RAG algorithms are employed to efficiently process and manage the vast amounts of data, ensuring the AI Agent can discern valuable content from misleading information. Ethereum Layer 2, Arbitrum, Smart Contracts, and Hardhat: The reward tokens, WAGMAI, are implemented using Ethereum Layer 2, Arbitrum, for scalability and low fees. Smart contracts are used to manage the distribution and redemption of WAGMAI tokens, automating the process and ensuring fairness. We use Hardhat for deploying smart contracts, ensuring a robust and reliable deployment process. React App: A React app is used for observing $WAGMAI balance and redeeming badges, providing a user-friendly interface for interacting with the reward system. By integrating these technologies, we have created a robust and reliable AI Agent that can effectively navigate the complexities of the digital information era. The use of Ethereum Layer 2, Arbitrum, and smart contracts not only adds a layer of security but also ensures that the reward system is transparent and fair. Our approach to using ElizaOS with NLP and RAG allows the AI Agent to adapt and improve over time, making it a valuable tool for users seeking credible information.
summary: An AI Agent that navigates the complexities of social networks, curating high-quality content and distributing $WAGMAI tokens to reward valuable contributions, fostering a trustworthy and insightful digital environment.

title: Taigo
description: Project DescriptionTaigo is a cutting-edge platform that combines advanced artificial intelligence with comprehensive cryptocurrency capabilities, offering a seamless experience for both novices and experienced users. Leveraging self-adaptive models and optimized LLMs, it effectively interprets user intent, while its LLM memory functionality enables continuous self-training and performance enhancements through a powerful data flywheel. We are focusing on bring out the best of DeFi on Ethereum for this Agentic Ethereum Hackathon, specifically, our mission is to simply the interactions with EigenLayer. With Taigo, restaking with EigenLayer is easier than ever before, creating a hassle-free, conversation based restaking experience.How it's MadeThis project utilizes our self-built agent framework and integrates the OpenAI LLM API. We employ several advanced LLM techniques, including methods for handling complex operations and developing small, self-training LLM models. These approaches enable us to accurately process user requests for DeFi protocols.
summary: Taigo is the first AI-agent-based DeFi gateway designed for broad crypto adoption. By leveraging self-adaptive models, LLM memory, and real-time analytics, it empowers seamless DeFi interactions across major social platforms like Telegram, Twitter, and Discord.

title: Commer
description: Project DescriptionCommer is an innovative platform designed to streamline the creation and integration of smart, data-driven bots for Discord servers. With Commer, users can easily set up bots by providing essential details like bot name, server ID, a project description, and token address. These bots are seamlessly connected to Coinbase‚Äôs AgentKIT, enabling them to fetch and deliver real-time blockchain data to answer user queries. The platform empowers project teams and communities by enhancing engagement and transparency. Bots can help users stay informed about transactions, on-chain activities, and key project information without leaving their Discord environment. Commer bridges the gap between blockchain data and community communication, providing a smarter and more interactive way to share insights and information.How it's MadeThe project consists of blockchain, backend and frontend parts We've deployed smart contracts on sepolia base network (factory smart contract and implementation). Smart contract for each bot is being deployed through factory with ServerID data. It has methods for the airdrop of tokens in discord (via our bot with agentKit), payment of the bot (currently it's free, but we made a logic to make a subscription based model). When discord bot is created, it should be linked to the smart contract. We've deployed TheGraph for these purposes Core logic was written on the backend, we've made integration with Discord API for bot management, AgentKIT and langchain for AI integration and usage of onchain info for the bot, SerpAPI integration for internet search functionality for the bot (if it lacks data from system prompt and user's description), theGraph integration to collect data from events of our smart contracts (to link smart contract and discord bot, to make a status active/disabled) On frontend we've made classic authorization (frontend detects which extensions user have), connected to our factory smart contract (to make a deployment of Bot) and connected backend endpoints for management of the bot
summary: Commer: a powerful platform that lets users effortlessly create bots, integrate them with Discord servers, and enable blockchain-powered Q&A using Coinbase‚Äôs AgentKIT. Simplify community engagement by providing real-time insights and project data directly from the blockchain.

title: paulmf
description: Project DescriptionMindshare on Crypto Twitter is a strong signal for the next big trend in token projects. Many mindshare indexes are becoming popular among traders. We introduce our AI investor agent, Paul, the Grand Partner of our investment DAO, "YaiC." He retrieves the latest top mindshare-gaining tokens and executes token purchases on behalf of liquidity providers. Worried about potential mistakes? No worries‚Äîwe use the Lit Protocol to enforce policies on delegated wallet actions.How it's MadePaul is an investor agent. He will check in the trendy top gaining token info from original sources and invest, and there the result on twitter with engaging with other user's comments. Original data source: coockie.fun, kaito.ai. goatindex.ai Web scraping: playwright AI Agent: using Coinbase Agent Kit Twitter client: collab-land Kit Knowledge data hosting: Gaia node wallet control policy: Lit Agent Kit Dex info: DexScreener Dex execution: Uniswap, Coinbase Onchain Kit
summary: PaulMF is an AI investor agent that invests in the latest top mindshare-gaining tokens‚Äîjust like Paul Graham spotting the next big startup.

title: Lord Of The Flips
description: Project DescriptionLord Of The Flips is a smart agent that can play an on-chain game called Flippando. It can start games, flip tiles, create complex NFTs, and tweet, or post a cast, about these actions. It can also suggest potential art creations, using the existing basic NFTs. It has its own wallet and can observe potential arbitrage opportunities across chains for the game's fungible token, $FLIPND.,How it's MadeThis projects uses or it is inspired by Eliza OS and CDP. The plan is to integrate CDP existing workflows into making the agent autonomously perform the tasks described in the project goals. I started by forking coinbase/agentkit and gradually build on top of it, by creating specific workflows for playing Flippando.
summary: A smart agent that plays Flippando, suggests best art creations, manages $FLIPND arbitrage across chains and tweets about it.

title: Rekt-AI
description: Project DescriptionREKT-AI: A Platform for Training AI Through Real-Time Prediction Battles What is REKT-AI? REKT-AI is a cutting-edge platform designed to allow humans and AI to compete in prediction battles within dynamic financial markets. Unlike traditional AI models that rely on static data and pre-defined algorithms, REKT-AI leverages live competition to train AI models in real-time. The platform offers a place where users (whether they are professional traders, retail investors, or AI enthusiasts) can engage in market predictions and compete directly with AI. This competitive format not only enhances the user experience but also provides a powerful method for AI to learn, evolve, and improve its strategies with every battle. How Does It Work? Prediction Battles: Users participate in prediction battles, where they predict the movements of financial assets‚Äîsuch as whether the price of BTC will rise or fall within a specific timeframe. Users can apply their own trading strategies, analysis techniques, and market insights to make their predictions. Every prediction requires users to specify a price target, adding more precision and realism to the market dynamics. AI Competition: Alongside human participants, REKT-AI‚Äôs proprietary AI models enter the battlefield. These AI models don‚Äôt just rely on historical data but adapt based on outcomes from each round of competition. The AI models are constantly refining their strategies after each prediction battle, learning from both human participants and market changes. This ensures that AI evolves based on real-world conditions rather than relying on outdated datasets. Rewards System: Winners‚Äîwhether human or AI‚Äîare rewarded based on the accuracy of their predictions. The platform encourages a fair and transparent ranking system, ensuring the most precise and effective strategies are rewarded. Incentivizing AI growth: The rewards also contribute to the continuous development of the AI, making it smarter over time. AI Learning Process: With every competition, the AI models learn from their mistakes and adapt to improve. Instead of relying on a one-time training model, the AI evolves through ongoing real-time data and predictions, becoming more efficient and effective after each battle. This model shifts the paradigm from static AI training (based on past data) to dynamic, live learning‚Äîallowing AI to react to market trends, volatility, and even human behavior. The platform enables a cyclical learning process, where both humans and AI constantly push each other to evolve and outperform. Why REKT-AI Is Revolutionary Real-Time AI Training: Traditional AI models are trained on large, static datasets. REKT-AI flips the script by allowing AI to learn dynamically, in real-time, as it competes against live market predictions. This makes the AI more responsive to changes and gives it a significant edge in volatile markets. Gamified Engagement: The competitive, gamified nature of the platform keeps users engaged while contributing to the AI‚Äôs evolution. As users compete, they‚Äôre actively helping the AI improve, while at the same time, receiving rewards for their success. Permissionless Participation: Anyone can join the prediction battles‚Äîwhether you‚Äôre an experienced trader, a beginner, or just someone interested in testing AI strategies. The platform is open and accessible, promoting a decentralized approach to AI development and market prediction. Adaptive AI: Unlike conventional models, where AI is trained once and set aside, REKT-AI ensures that the AI constantly learns and adapts, making it a powerful tool for a wide range of financial applications. As it learns from each battle, it gets better at predicting market movements. Potential Use Cases for REKT-AI Hedge Funds & Professional Traders: Use REKT-AI to train and refine AI models for real-time market predictions. Hedge funds can optimize their trading strategies by testing AI models in competitive environments. Retail Traders: Retail traders can use the platform to test AI-driven strategies alongside human strategies. It can help individual traders improve their understanding of AI‚Äôs potential and use it as a tool for more informed decision-making. AI-as-a-Service: Businesses can leverage REKT-AI to offer AI-powered market predictions as a service. It provides an opportunity for companies to build products that use AI predictions for market insights, financial forecasting, or risk analysis. Why REKT-AI Is the Future Adaptive AI: With the constant, live learning process, REKT-AI ensures that AI models stay ahead of market trends and evolve at a rapid pace. Engagement & Incentives: By allowing humans to compete directly with AI, REKT-AI offers a unique gamified experience, making it both an educational and competitive tool. Open Access: REKT-AI promotes permissionless participation, allowing anyone to join and contribute, democratizing access to AI-powered market predictions. Conclusion REKT-AI is not just a prediction platform; it‚Äôs a space where AI evolves through real competition. Whether you‚Äôre a trader, an AI enthusiast, or a business looking to use cutting-edge AI to predict market movements, REKT-AI offers a dynamic, evolving platform that improves AI in real time. By combining human intelligence and AI‚Äôs adaptability, REKT-AI is shaping the future of AI-driven market prediction.How it's MadeHow REKT-AI Was Built Frontend: We used Next.js to build the frontend. It helps us create fast, responsive pages and manage dynamic content, making the user experience smooth. Backend: The backend is built with TypeScript, which helps us maintain clean, reliable code. This backend handles user interactions, connects with the AI, and fetches data from various sources like Binance for real-time market data. AI Agent: The AI model is powered using Coinbase's Developer Platform (CDP), which allows us to access their tools to gather market data and help the AI make predictions. The AI improves over time by learning from the outcomes of each prediction battle. Smart Contracts: We use Foundry for developing smart contracts. These contracts manage user predictions, verify outcomes, and distribute rewards. Data: We gather real-time market data from Binance and use Subgraph to query blockchain data. We store everything in a PostgreSQL database to keep track of user predictions and rewards.
summary: REKT-AI is a battle royale-style AI prediction market where users and AI compete to make the most accurate market predictions. Win rewards, train AI through competition, and shape the future of decentralized trading intelligence. Train-to-earn meets high-stakes forecasting!

title: AgentForge
description: Project DescriptionAgentForge: No-Code AI Agent Launchpad for Automated DeFi Yield Optimization Project Overview AgentForge is a revolutionary platform that enables users to create and deploy AI-powered DeFi agents without coding knowledge. The platform specializes in cross-chain yield optimization, allowing users to either create their own yield-generating vaults or invest in existing ones. Core Features Vault Creation System Users can create customized yield-generating vaults without coding Set specific parameters for asset allocation and risk management Define investment strategies through a user-friendly interface Implement custom policies and constraints for the AI agent Configure fee structures for vault administration AI Agent Management AI agents monitor market conditions across multiple chains Automated yield optimization based on user-defined strategies Real-time strategy execution within defined parameters Smart rebalancing across different protocols and chains Risk management and policy enforcement Vault Explorer Browse existing vaults and their performance metrics View historical yields and risk metrics Transparent fee structures and admin information Easy deposit and withdrawal interface Real-time portfolio tracking Technical Architecture Smart Contract Layer HyperHarvest contract for cross-chain yield farming Integration with AAVE and other DeFi protocols Chainlink CCIP for secure cross-chain operations ERC4626 compliant vault structure Secure fund management and yield distribution Security Features Lit Protocol's Agent Wallet for secure key management Policy-based execution constraints Multi-layered security checks Emergency withdrawal mechanisms Automated risk management Protocol Integrations AAVE for lending and borrowing Chainlink for cross-chain communication DEX aggregators for optimal swaps Yield protocols across multiple chains Market data oracles User Benefits For Vault Creators Earn admin fees from successful vault performance No coding required to create sophisticated strategies Full control over investment parameters Customizable risk management Access to advanced AI optimization For Investors Access to AI-optimized yield strategies Transparent performance metrics Simplified investment process Reduced gas costs through optimization Professional-grade portfolio management AI Strategy Execution Market Analysis Real-time yield comparison across chains Gas cost optimization Slippage prediction Market sentiment analysis Risk-adjusted return calculations Optimization Process Continuous monitoring of yield opportunities Automated rebalancing when profitable Gas-efficient execution of trades Cross-chain arbitrage when beneficial Dynamic asset allocation Technical Requirements Frontend React/Next.js for user interface Web3 integration for wallet connection Real-time market data display Portfolio visualization tools Strategy configuration interface Backend Node.js server for AI agent coordination Python for market data analysis API integrations with DeFi protocols Cross-chain monitoring system Performance analytics engine Blockchain Multi-chain support (Arbitrum, Base, etc.) Smart contract deployment and management Cross-chain message passing Gas optimization Secure transaction execution Unique Value Proposition No-Code Solution: Makes sophisticated DeFi strategies accessible to non-technical users AI Optimization: Leverages artificial intelligence for optimal yield generation Cross-Chain Efficiency: Seamlessly operates across multiple blockchain networks Security First: Implements robust security measures through Lit Protocol Automated Management: Reduces manual intervention while maintaining control Future Developments Additional protocol integrations Advanced AI strategy templates Enhanced risk management tools Social features for vault creators Mobile application development Target Audience DeFi enthusiasts seeking automated yield optimization Investment managers looking to create digital vaults Retail investors wanting professional-grade portfolio management Crypto projects seeking treasury management solutions Traditional finance users entering DeFi This project combines the power of AI, DeFi, and automation to create a user-friendly platform for maximizing yield opportunities across the blockchain ecosystem, all while maintaining high security standards and user control.How it's MadeAgentForge is built as a multi-layered DeFi platform that combines AI-driven automation with secure cross-chain operations. At its core, it uses Lit Protocol's Agent Wallet system to create secure, programmable wallets that execute AI-optimized strategies while adhering to user-defined policies and constraints. The platform's smart contracts are based on the ERC4626 vault standard and integrate with AAVE for lending operations, while using Chainlink CCIP for cross-chain communication. The AI agent system continuously monitors market conditions and executes yield optimization strategies through registered tools that are bound by predefined policies. Users interact with the platform through a React/Next.js frontend that provides intuitive interfaces for vault creation and management. Behind the scenes, a Node.js backend coordinates the AI agents and manages market data analysis, while smart contracts handle the secure movement and management of funds across different chains. The vault creation process is simplified through a no-code interface where users can define their strategies, which are then translated into executable policies and tools for the AI agent. All transactions and strategy executions are secured through Lit Protocol's MPC-based key management system. For cross-chain operations, the platform leverages HyperHarvest contracts that utilize Chainlink CCIP to securely bridge assets and execute strategies across different networks while maintaining optimal gas efficiency. The system implements a comprehensive security architecture that includes multi-layered policy enforcement, secure key management, and automated risk controls to protect user funds while maximizing yield opportunities. Each vault operates as an autonomous entity, with its AI agent working within the defined parameters to optimize yields while automatically distributing profits between users and vault creators according to predetermined fee structures.
summary: AgentForge is a no-code platform that enables users to create and deploy AI-powered DeFi vaults, where fund creators can define custom strategies and policies for automated yield optimization across multiple chains

title: ecofren
description: Project DescriptionThis document describes an interactive game designed to help people move towards an eco-social lifestyle. The game is called "ecofren" in English. It explores themes such as materials, movement, energy, ownership, and well-being. The game encourages players to reflect on their consumption habits and consider more sustainable alternatives. The hidden agenda of the game is to educate commons to enter the web3-space. Tools like dWallets are essential, there should be a great reason to use them. Gaming is a natural method to rise interest, especially with the connection with sustainability and DeFi. The game should inspire individuals and it is supposed to be fun. It aims to promote a lifestyle that is both ecologically sound and socially responsible. The game is designed to be non-judgmental and encourages players to realistically assess their daily choices. The game could benefit from AI assessing the questions and statements and even giving some easy tasks during the game to activate physical actions during the game. The production of the game is related to values that aim for sustainability in every area of influence. At the same time, the game should be entertaining and slightly challenging. Typical features of the games can be used. One idea is to fit the game into some existing and well-known imaginary environment.How it's MadeThis game is a small part of a larger whole and can be implemented within this short timeframe: at least some features of it. Technical details are open and will be defined after the team is established. The game will be build on web3 and it will benefit from AI. The information and the features will be added at the time the project evolves. Dev tools: arbitrum stylus for SC development and foundry's cast Network: arbitrum sepolia Programming languages: rust, typescript Libraries: react, nodejs, wagmi, and phaser AI-tools: Synthesia, Gemini, Grok Databases: supabase (with postgresql) Design: Figma, Figma-libraries
summary: make sustainable lifestyle fun again!  smart moves can be fun via gaming

title: RunJudge
description: Project DescriptionRunning challenges with friends should be fun, fair, and rewarding. RunJudge makes it happen by combining Strava activities, AI verification, and USDC prizes on Base. Create a challenge, set a distance and prize pool in USDC, and let our AI judge analyze Strava activities to determine the winner - all without needing crypto knowledge! The platform uses AI to analyze Strava data, ensuring fair competition by detecting potential manipulation and normalizing performances across different distances. Heart rate data verification and pace analysis guarantee legitimate submissions.How it's MadeSmart Contracts Deployed on Base, our RunJudge.sol contract handles: Challenge creation with USDC staking Participant management (max 2 per challenge) Activity submission via Strava activity IDs Automated prize distribution to winners Gasless transactions via Base Paymaster & Coinbase Smart Wallets AI Verification with Coinbase Agent Kit Our agent service leverages Coinbase's Agent Kit for autonomous on-chain actions: LangChain with Google's Gemini for activity analysis Image processing of Strava screenshots Heart rate data verification Pace normalization across distances Automated winner declaration on-chain Secure wallet management via Coinbase Developer Platform's Wallet Provider Modern Web Stack Frontend Framework Next.js 15 with App Router Coinbase OnchainKit for: Wallet connections Fiat on-ramping Identity management Viem/Wagmi for type-safe contract interactions shadcn/ui components built on Radix primitives Tailwind CSS for styling Backend & Data The Graph for challenge data indexing: Lifetime earnings tracking Available challenges discovery Participant statistics Subgraph deployment on Base OpenRouter as an AI load-balancing platform Challenges Our main technical hurdle was Strava's API limitations. We built a respectful web crawler to extract essential activity data while awaiting approval for API access. This temporary solution lets us analyze key metrics but misses out on richer data points available through official integration since we rely on what's normally shown to the user.
summary: RunJudge - An AI-powered judge for social fitness challenges that verifies Strava runs while funds are staked. Think of it as a decentralized fitness escrow with a sassy personality that won't let you get away with taking the bus. üèÉ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èüöå ```

title: Treekipedia
description: Project DescriptionDeepTrees is an AI-driven, agent-centric platform that revolutionizes tree research. When a user initiates a research request, our AI research agent (powered by AgentKit) scours the web via the Perplexity API to gather unstructured tree data. GPT‚Äë4o then refines this raw data into a standardized JSON format that fits our database schema. The structured research is stored in PostgreSQL and uploaded to IPFS, generating a unique CID. A custom AgentKit action subsequently triggers an on‚Äëchain EAS attestation on Base L2 to verify the data. Finally, two NFTs are minted‚Äîan NFTree (ERC‚Äë721) to the central repository wallet and a Contreebution NFT (ERC‚Äë1155) to reward the contributor. This end‚Äëto‚Äëend process transforms raw, scattered information into actionable, verified knowledge.How it's MadeDeepTrees automates tree research through a modular, end‚Äëto‚Äëend workflow: AI-Powered Data Gathering: The AI research agent (powered by AgentKit) initiates a search using the Perplexity API and then employs GPT‚Äë4 to convert raw, unstructured tree data (from scientific and common names) into a standardized JSON format. Data Storage & Persistence: The structured JSON is stored in a PostgreSQL database and simultaneously uploaded to IPFS via Lighthouse, which returns an immutable CID as a reference. On‚ÄëChain Verification & NFT Minting: Using AgentKit, our system calls the attestation module to perform an EAS attestation‚Äîrecording the IPFS CID on Base L2‚Äîand then calls our NFT minting module to create two NFTs: NFTree (ERC‚Äë721): Sent to the Treekipedia wallet. Contreebution NFT (ERC‚Äë1155): Sent to the contributor‚Äôs wallet. Unified API Response: The backend (Node.js/Express on a DigitalOcean VM) orchestrates the entire process and returns the final structured JSON‚Äîcomplete with research data, the IPFS CID, and on‚Äëchain transaction details‚Äîto the Next.js frontend, where users view the verified research.
summary: DeepTrees is an AI-powered platform that automates tree species research‚Äîtransforming unstructured data into verified, structured knowledge. Using AgentKit on Base L2, it stores data in PostgreSQL & IPFS and mints NFTs to reward contributors.

title: Savant Chat
description: Project DescriptionSavant Chat is an advanced AI-driven platform that audits Solidity smart contracts for potential security threats and vulnerabilities. Leveraging the deepseek and voyage models, it automatically pinpoints critical and major issues‚Äîsuch as reentrancy attacks, overflow/underflow bugs, and access control flaws‚Äîbefore they can be exploited. Savant Chat empowers developers with rapid, accurate, and actionable insights, helping them build and maintain secure blockchain solutions without the complexity of manual code reviews.How it's MadeSavant Chat operates as an AI agent that orchestrates multiple steps in a layered auditing process. First, we use tree-sitter and voyage-code-3 to parse and segment Solidity code, forming a detailed context for the model to work with. Then, for each segment, our AI agent adopts a ‚Äúparanoid‚Äù stance‚Äîevaluating which classes of vulnerabilities could theoretically exist in that snippet. Next, we leverage a reasoning LLM, running it multiple times per segment under the assumption that a specific class of vulnerability is definitely present, prompting the LLM to localize it precisely. Any identified vulnerabilities are then forwarded to a dedicated critic model, which filters out false positives to ensure higher accuracy. Beyond this core flow, we‚Äôre experimenting with further techniques to enhance deep analysis. These include selectively rewriting and simplifying code to better expose security issues and exploring the execution of code in virtual machines for dynamic testing.
summary: Savant Chat is an automated Solidity smart contract auditor powered by the deepseek and voyage models, designed to spot critical and major vulnerabilities. It delivers fast, accurate insights to strengthen code security and reduce risk in blockchain applications.

title: chaintool
description: Project DescriptionChaintool is an on-chain and dynamic toolchain built for CDP AgentKit that enables AI agents to discover and interact with smart contract tools dynamically. The system consists of a smart contract registry where anyone can register new tools, making them immediately available to all agents. Each tool is documented with descriptions and ABIs, allowing AI agents to understand and utilize them without prior knowledge. The key innovation is that agents can discover and use new tools while they are running, even if they didn't have access to them during initialization. Furthermore, agentic tools are now realized as on-chain assets, exposing them to the many applications of dApps. This creates an expandable ecosystem of agent-compatible smart contract tools that can grow organically.How it's MadeThe project is built using several modern web3 technologies and devtools. Smart Contracts Solidity (solc 0.8.28) Foundry for development and testing Deployed on Base Sepolia network Agent SDK Built with Bun runtime Integrates with CDP (Coinbase Developer Platform) Uses OpenAI for the AI component Implements HDKey wallets with Viem for blockchain interactions, derived from CDP Wallet seed AgentKit integration for agent behaviors, 4 actions for Chaintool Nillion SecretVault to save & restore used Chaintool history via 2 actions Frontend Web interface deployed on Vercel Uses OnchainKit for blockchain interactions Used React & Vite for development Architecture Core registry contract (AgentToolRegistry) that manages tool registration Tools are defined as structs containing metadata (name, description, ABI types, categories) where ABIs are human-readable ABI types for better AI comprehension Implements EVM-compatible smart contracts for multi-chain capabilities
summary: An on-chain toolchain for CDP AgentKit, where agentic tools can be dynamically defined as smart-contracts.

title: Bai Shi
description: Project DescriptionBai Shi (or Whiterock in Chinese) is a financial advisory service powered by multiple AI agents. We guide you in discovering your unique financial objectives, curating personalized strategic asset allocations, and seamlessly managing on-chain investments on your behalf. We believe that as RWAs (Real-World Assets) move on-chain, investors will face an overwhelming surge of opportunities. By leveraging large-scale intelligence through LLMs, we democratize financial advisory services‚Äîmaking them accessible to everyone, not just the wealthy. We will disrupt this ~$100 billion market by eliminating unnecessary intermediaries and drastically reducing fees.How it's MadeWe use reasoning LLM to understand the investor's risk preference and translate that into strategic asset allocation by using the RAG technique. We use AgentKit by Coinbase to handle on-chain transactions on behalf of our users. And let the Graph do indexing for calculating financial information on-chain for us.
summary: Your personal financial advisory agent. Helping you reach your investing goals through on-chain economy.

title: TrexFood by Nata
description: Project DescriptionTrexFood by Nata is a cutting-edge decentralized food delivery platform that seamlessly blends AI intelligence with Starknet‚Äôs high-performance infrastructure and Nethermind‚Äôs technology to create a secure, efficient, and personalized food ordering experience. At its core, TrexFood features Nata, an AI-powered food concierge that understands user preferences, provides tailored meal recommendations, and facilitates orders through natural language interactions. Core Technologies Behind TrexFood üöÄ AI-Powered Intelligence with OpenAI Assistants Conversational ordering using advanced natural language processing Personalized meal recommendations based on dietary preferences Real-time image generation for meal previews using DALL-E 3 Dynamic menu customization, learning from user interactions AI Agent (Nata) powered by OpenAI‚Äôs Assistants API, using Threads & Runs for external tool access and enhanced adaptability üîó Web3 Integration with Starknet & Nethermind Built entirely on Starknet for high-speed, low-cost transactions Smart contracts on Starknet handle order processing, payments, escrow, and loyalty rewards Nethermind‚Äôs infrastructure powers fast and reliable blockchain interactions Wallet-based authentication with Starknet-compatible wallets like Braavos & ArgentX Transparent fund management and on-chain verifications for secure payments üé® Enhanced User Experience with React & Vite Frontend built with React, TypeScript (Vite), and TailwindCSS Neon-themed, responsive UI with smooth animations Gamified favorites system with on-chain loyalty rewards Mobile-first design with intuitive gesture controls Interactive AI-driven chat interface for a seamless ordering experience How TrexFood Uses Starknet & Nethermind ‚úÖ Fetching Menus & Restaurant Listings: Smart contracts store restaurant details and menus on Starknet Nethermind‚Äôs technology powers optimized Starknet interactions, ensuring smooth data retrieval ‚úÖ Placing Orders & Payments: Smart contracts on Starknet handle order placement, payments, and loyalty points Blockchain-based escrow system ensures fair and transparent transactions Secure, low-cost transactions using Starknet‚Äôs scalability ‚úÖ AI-Driven Order Management: Nata interacts with the Starknet blockchain, retrieving real-time order statuses AI-driven chat assistant facilitates voice/text-based food ordering Future Roadmap Blockchain escrow system for dispute-free payments Community leaderboards & rewards for frequent users Cross-chain expansion beyond Starknet for broader adoption Currently Implemented Features ‚úîÔ∏è AI-powered food recommendations & chat ordering ‚úîÔ∏è Real-time menu fetching via Nethermind‚Äôs Starknet infrastructure ‚úîÔ∏è Secure wallet authentication with Starknet ‚úîÔ∏è On-chain smart contracts for payments, orders & loyalty points ‚úîÔ∏è Voice-activated ordering with AI speech recognitionHow it's MadeTo start with, yes, we did integrate partner technology‚ÄîNethermind‚Äîto power key aspects of this project. For transactions, we use Stark as our transactional token, ensuring secure and efficient payments within the platform. On the frontend, we‚Äôve built the platform using React-TypeScript on Vite, styled with TailwindCSS, for a seamless and responsive user experience. For Nata, the AI Agent, we leverage OpenAI‚Äôs API to create Assistants, Threads, and Runs. Runs enable flexibility by allowing the agent to access external tools, enhancing its capabilities. Additionally, we are developing smart contracts on Starknet, enabling food ordering transactions, an escrow system, and a loyalty points mechanism.

title: BasedContracts
description: Project DescriptionContractors are not as direct as I am. It may take several texts/calls/emails to get to a meeting set up or some other finality. If this happens for only one contractor, imagine managing this for several contractors across multiple areas (plumbing, electrician, flooring, siding, etc.) I don‚Äôt have the capacity (sometimes patience) to want to deal with all of that and I don‚Äôt think I should have to if I don‚Äôt want to deal with that admin work. Especially if I have a full time job I need to focus on. Drains mental capacity trying to organize all this too.How it's MadeTech Stack Frontend: Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS Blockchain: Hardhat, Solidity, wagmi AI: Coinbase AgentKit (Enhanced) Wallet: Coinbase MPC Wallet (coming soon) Payments: Coinbase Onramp, Fund Components (coming soon) Design: Onchain Kit components Testing: Hardhat test suite Deployment: Vercel Back end: We have users: Going to a site Connecting wallets Filling out forms/training LLMs Verifying identity/onchain profile Receiving rewards/tokens for onboarding contractors/other users? We need incentives! We have agents communicating back and forth with the goals of Roughly agreeing on job opportunity Setting a meeting date Agreeing to terms Reviewing and signing a contract Client paying contractor agreed amount Checking client‚Äôs balance for enough funds Possibly funding client‚Äôs wallet Sending money (crypto or fiat) to contractor‚Äôs balance Subtracting money (crypto or fiat) from client‚Äôs balance Langchain/LLM: Train it with my thinking/reasoning/expectations Want best quote/price May not be able to afford full price and may request financing or payment plan Want qualified professionals Either in a soon timeframe or I have some time May be late for a meeting, or have to reschedule due to other conflicts May have something in mind for a project Train contractors thinking/reasoning/expectations Wants to get job done ASAP (in order to receive payment) May quote higher price initially in order to make a profit May be late for a meeting, or have to reschedule due to other conflicts May have recommendations for how to achieve best result on project
summary: AI agents to help homeowners work with contractors during house renovations

title: Xtreamly
description: Project DescriptionüöÄ Multiagent Application for Token Swapping with mindshare Data Evaluation & Xtreamly Volatility Optimization üåç Overview This project implements a multiagent framework ü§ñ for user-driven token swaps. Multiple agents collaborate to assist users in making optimal swap decisions while navigating market volatility üìà. A key feature is the dynamic agent tool selection based on the Xtreamly Volatility 60-minute prediction model ‚è≥. üîë Key Features: ü§ù Multiagent decision-making: LLM-powered agents analyze market data and provide recommendations. üîÑ Dynamic agent selection: Adaptive selection of top-performing agents based on real-time market conditions. üìä Xtreamly Volatility Prediction: A predictive model optimizes tool selection and execution speed. üí∞ Swap management strategy: Ensures an equally distributed exposure among high-potential tokens. ‚ö° AI-Powered Trading Agent Development The core of this project is the LLM-driven agent, which autonomously selects, rebalances, and executes trading strategies based on market conditions. Technologies Used: Eliza Framework ‚Äì A production-ready AI framework used to build the agent. Gaianet (Custom Gaia Node) ‚Äì A decentralized knowledge base that enhances the AI agent's decision-making capabilities. Collab.land‚Äôs AI Agent Starter Kit ‚Äì Used for rapid development and integration into the DeFi ecosystem. Autonome: our AI agent framework has been Uploaded on Autonome and launched via AltLayer‚Äôs Autonome. Xtreamly AI Models ‚Äì Provide real-time volatility predictions and quantitative analytics. Decision-Making Process: 1Ô∏è‚É£ Market Volatility Classification The agent uses xtreamly_volatility() to determine market conditions: Low Volatility: Prioritizes stable & undervalued assets. High Volatility: Focuses on volatile & active assets. 2Ô∏è‚É£ Token Selection The agent selects the top 10 tokens using multiple ranking functions, evaluating: Market cap growth Price momentum Engagement metrics (social & trading activity) Volatility & risk-adjusted returns 3Ô∏è‚É£ Exposure Rebalancing & Execution Closes positions on non-selected tokens. Allocates funds equally across the new top 10 tokens. Executes transactions autonomously on-chain. üè¶ Smart Contract Deployment & Automation The trading logic is executed via smart contracts, ensuring transparent, trustless, and secure operations. ‚úÖ Deployments: Arbitrum Mainnet ‚Äì Optimized for low-cost, high-speed execution. Tech Stack for Smart Contracts: Solidity ‚Äì Core language for smart contract development. Hardhat ‚Äì Used for testing, deployment, and debugging. Chainlink Oracles ‚Äì Provides real-time price feeds & volatility data. MEV Protection Tools ‚Äì Integrated to prevent front-running & sandwich attacks. üîê Hosting & Security (Autonome Integration) To ensure secure execution and verifiability, the AI agent is hosted on Autonome, a platform for deploying autonomous AI agents. Implementation Steps: ‚úÖ Uploaded the AI agent framework onto Autonome. ‚úÖ Created a hosted AI agent to run trading strategies in a verifiable environment. ‚úÖ Built a user-facing interface with a ChatGPT-like UX, enabling users to interact with the agent. üîó Blockchain & API Integrations To enhance performance and data accuracy, we integrated with major blockchain APIs and DeFi infrastructure. Key Integrations: ‚úÖ Eliza framework ‚úÖ Gaianet (Custom Gaia Node) ‚Äì Provides a comprehensive knowledge base for AI-driven decision-making. ‚úÖ Autonome ‚úÖ Xtreamly API ‚Äì Supplies real-time volatility forecasts to the AI agent. ‚úÖ Autonome ‚Äì Protects against front-running & ensures efficient trade execution. ‚úÖ cookie dao API for mind-share data ingestion for better decision making üí° Notable Innovations Multiagent Collaboration: Agents work together in real-time, optimizing decisions through collective input, enabling more accurate and efficient swap strategies. Adaptive Agent Selection: The framework dynamically chooses the best-performing agents based on real-time market data, ensuring that users always receive the most effective advice and execution. Smart Exposure Management: Ensures balanced token exposure across multiple assets, minimizing risk and maximizing potential returns through an optimized swap management strategy. Optimized swap Execution ‚Äì analyze and collaborative recommendation of best performers based on market volatility conditions, whale attention patterns, Process social signals before price movement.Track real-time mindshare metrics and Monitor whale attention patterns. to maximize capital efficiency without liquidation risks. Autonome + TEE for AI Verifiability ‚Äì usnig Autonome framework ensured tamper-proof AI execution for trustless automated trading. üîÆ Future Enhancements üì¢ Social Media Sentiment Analysis: OpenAI models to detect influencer-driven trends. ü§ñ Reinforcement Learning: Dynamic optimization of agent selection. üìâ Advanced Volatility Prediction: Improved ETH price correlation models. üè¶ Expanded Agent Pool: More specialized agents for granular decision-making. üîé Enhanced Cookie DAO Token Evaluation: New volatility-based investment strategies. ü§ñ Mev protection integration Multiple integration with DEXes to make swap seamlessly PS: We have selected AutoGen üîÑ as our framework due to its: üì° Flexible API for defining agents and multi-agent communication. üß† Integration with human inputs, enabling AI-human collaboration. üõ†Ô∏è Streamlined workflows with built-in utilities like caching, API unification, and error handling. Other frameworks such as LangChain, LangGraph, CrewAI, and AutoGPT also offer robust features. However, AutoGen stands out for its advanced capabilities in building complex, scalable multi-agent systems with an improved user experience.How it's Made AI-Powered Trading Agent Development The core of this project is an LLM-driven AI agent that autonomously selects, rebalances, and executes trading strategies based on real-time market conditions. Technologies Used: Eliza Framework: A production-ready AI framework deployed on Arbitrum and BASE for high-speed, low-cost execution. Gaianet (Custom Gaia Node): A decentralized knowledge base enhancing the AI agent‚Äôs decision-making abilities with deep insights. Collab.land‚Äôs AI Agent Starter Kit: For rapid development and seamless integration into the DeFi ecosystem. Xtreamly AI Models: Deliver real-time volatility predictions and quantitative analytics, enabling dynamic decision-making. Decision-Making Process: Market Volatility Classification: The agent uses xtreamly_volatility() to classify market conditions: Low Volatility: Prioritizes stable, undervalued assets. High Volatility: Focuses on volatile, high-momentum assets. Token Selection: The agent selects the top 10 tokens based on a series of ranking functions, evaluating: Market cap growth, price momentum, engagement metrics (social & trading activity), volatility, and risk-adjusted returns. Exposure Rebalancing & Execution: Closes positions on non-selected tokens. Allocates funds equally across the new top 10 tokens. Executes transactions autonomously on-chain for seamless trading. 2. Smart Contract Deployment & Automation All trading logic is executed via smart contracts, ensuring transparency, trustlessness, and security. Deployments: Arbitrum Mainnet: Optimized for low-cost, high-speed execution. Solidity: Core language for smart contract development. Hardhat: For testing, deployment, and debugging. Chainlink Oracles: Provides real-time price feeds and volatility data for reliable decision-making. 3. Hosting & Security (Autonome Integration) To ensure secure execution and verifiability, we hosted the AI agent on Autonome, a platform designed for deploying autonomous agents in trust-minimized environments. Implementation Steps: Uploaded the AI agent framework onto Autonome. Created a hosted AI agent to run trading strategies in a verifiable environment. Built a user-facing interface with a ChatGPT-like UX, enabling users to interact with and monitor the agent‚Äôs performance. 4. Blockchain & API Integrations We enhanced performance, data accuracy, and security by integrating with major blockchain APIs and DeFi infrastructure. Key Integrations: Lit Protocol: For secure access control and cryptographic tools. Gaianet: Providing a comprehensive knowledge base for AI-driven decision-making. Xtreamly API: Supplies real-time volatility forecasts to inform the agent‚Äôs decisions. Innovative Approaches (What We Did Hacky) We pushed the boundaries of traditional DeFi strategies with some bold, hacky innovations: Optimized Recursive Leverage Execution: We customized loan loops to maximize capital efficiency and minimize liquidation risks, enabling more flexible and resilient strategies. Smart Exposure Rebalancing: Our LLM agent dynamically adapts, closing underperforming positions and reallocating funds to higher-performing assets automatically‚Äîallowing the agent to respond to market fluctuations in real-time. Autonome + TEE for AI Verifiability: By hosting the agent on Autonome, we ensured tamper-proof AI execution, promoting trustless and automated trading that‚Äôs verifiable and secure. Multi-Layered MEV Protection: We designed gas-efficient transactions and implemented strategies to minimize MEV exploits, protecting traders from front-running and sandwich attacks.
summary: multiagent framework optimizes token swaps w. predictive data evaluation. Multiple agents collaborate in realtime, dynamically selecting top performers based on market conditions, delivering AI-driven volatility optimization for smarter, faster, and more efficient swap decisions.

title: AgentStatuette

title: Blackbeard
description: Project DescriptionBlackbeard is an open-source decentralized application (dApp) designed for Ethereum developers and enthusiasts who need seamless access to essential Ethereum testnet functionalities. Built specifically for the ETHGlobal "Agentic Ethereum" Hackathon, Blackbeard provides an all-in-one solution for managing testnet wallets, retrieving balances, acquiring test ETH, and staying updated with real-time crypto news. This project is deployed on the Sepolia Ethereum testnet, making it a valuable tool for blockchain developers, testers, and researchers working on Ethereum-based applications. With its user-friendly interface and AI-powered search capabilities, Blackbeard enhances the developer experience by reducing friction when working with Ethereum testnet operations.How it's MadeTech Stack Backend NestJS (with Prisma ORM) PostgreSQL (Database) Frontend Next.js (with i18n support) Tailwind CSS TypeScript AI Module Python (for AI-powered search and price fetching) Tools TurboRepo (Monorepo management) PNPM (Package manager) Ethers.js (Ethereum interaction)
summary: Blackbeard is your all-in-one AI powerhouse built for multitasking, secure management, and dynamic agent connectivity on a single platform. Our MVP takes automation to the next level simply chat with our AI agents, and they‚Äôll handle trading, decision-making

title: Chroma
description: Project Descriptionwe‚Äôre building an agentic settlement layer, kind of an Agent to agent decentralized intent solver protocol for any on-chain operation. Basically you ask the agent to handle your wallet, and ask it to do onchain actions like transfer, deposit in a protocol or any other onchain action. Then the agent will convert your wishes in an intent and broadcast it to the solver network (via gossip network Waku). Here the solvers will receive the intent and answer with a way to solve it. After that the agent/user can confirm the proposed actions, sign them and send to the blockchain.How it's MadeThe protocol will be focused in agents, so we will have an api for the agents to interact with chroma-agent to translate intents and manage the solvers operations. We use eliza framework to build the chroma-agent that the other agents will interact with and translate the intents. Waku gossip network (decentralized message protocol) to broadcast the intents and receive the proposals. Then the solvers could be in any technology that can listen and push messages to Waku (or any other network in the future) to answer proposals. Now it's integrated in the same Eliza for simplicity
summary: Agent to agent decentralized intent solver for any on-chain operation

title: NeuralFi
description: Project DescriptionNeuralFi Yield Aggregator is a sophisticated DeFi protocol designed to enhance yield farming and asset management. By leveraging Uniswap for efficient token swaps, Aave for lending and borrowing, GMX for decentralized trading, and Curve for stablecoin liquidity optimization, this smart contract provides users with an AI-powered yield generation system. The contract allows an AI agent to automate DeFi strategies, ensuring optimal returns by dynamically interacting with multiple DeFi protocols. With security, efficiency, and decentralization at its core, NeuralFi Yield Aggregator enables seamless and intelligent asset management in the evolving Web3 ecosystem.How it's MadeNeuralFi Yield Aggregator is a decentralized AI-driven DeFi protocol that optimizes yield generation by integrating Uniswap, Aave, GMX, and Curve. It leverages EigenLayer AVS for secure validation and Coinbase AgentKit for seamless automation. Built on Arbitrum, it ensures efficient token swaps, lending, and trading with minimal gas fees and maximum returns. üöÄ
summary: NeuralFi Yield Aggregator is a decentralized finance (DeFi) smart contract that optimizes yield generation by integrating Uniswap, Aave, GMX, and Curve. It enables token swaps, lending, and trading strategies through an AI-driven agent.

title: AIMen
description: Project DescriptionAIM streamlines onchain programming by leveraging a Markdown-inspired language that lets you write near-natural language instructions for AI-driven blockchain workflows without the usual verbosity. Instead of writing extensive boilerplate, AIM enables you to perform tasks like filtering tokens on Uniswap or checking your balance with simple, intuitive commands, seamlessly integrating with Ethereum‚Äôs ecosystem. This approach not only reduces the overhead associated with traditional coding and LLM token usage but also frees you from vendor lock-in, offering a more accessible, cost-effective, and adaptable solution for decentralized applications.How it's MadeFor this hackathon, I extended AIMX (the CLI tool for executing AIM documents) to support tools and plugins, adding Coinbase Agentkit tools and The Graph for fetching onchain data as tools. I've implemented several core features for AIM‚Äîa Markdown-based language for onchain agentic workflows‚Äîincluding filesystem support to load referenced documents at runtime, an aim.config.ts for project configuration, a minimal server with GET/POST endpoints for managing docs, and a Tailwind-styled UI to neatly visualize workflow flows. Additionally, I enabled running inference locally via a CLI that respects environment variables and deployed the application on fly.io. These implementations lay the groundwork for AIM‚Äôs extensible framework‚Äîincluding the new plugin system‚Äîwhich will allow further integration of external data sources and services.
summary: Create reusable onchain agentic workflows with natural language programming

title: Squarebox
description: Project DescriptionAI Agent Explorer is a Web3-focused search engine platform that utilizes AI agents to help users explore and analyze blockchain data, smart contracts, NFTs, and the latest Web3 trends. The platform personalizes the search experience, processes real-time data, and offers an intuitive interface for both Web2 and Web3 users.How it's Made Autonome Trend Analysis and Automation: Leverages Autonome AI agents to analyze the most searched keywords and news, automatically posting them on social media platforms like Twitter. Custom Agent Creation: Deploys search agents tailored to specific topics based on user needs. Covalent Data Visualization and Analysis: Uses Covalent‚Äôs AI Agent SDK to help users visualize and analyze Web3 data. Context-Aware AI: Understands user search intent and provides tailored results.
summary: AI Agent Explorer is a Web3-focused search engine platform that utilizes AI agents to help users explore and analyze blockchain data, smart contracts, NFTs, and the latest Web3 trends.

title: BnB3DAO
description: Project DescriptionKey Features: Decentralized booking system with smart contract-powered reservations Property listing and management system for hosts Secure guest verification and booking process Automated payment settlements and refund handling Technical Stack: Smart contracts deployed on ethena testnet Web3 frontend for seamless user interaction Decentralized storage for property details and user data The platform aims to bring the benefits of blockchain technology to the hotel sector, offering reduced fees, increased transparency, and automated trust mechanisms for both hosts and guests.How it's MadeSmart contracts deployed on ethena testnet Web3 frontend for seamless user interaction Decentralized storage for property details and user data Goals after the hackathon Launch BnB3 on mainnet Expand property listings globally Integrate additional features like dynamic pricing and reputation systems Partner with existing hotel platforms for wider adoption
summary: BnB3 (Bed & Breakfast Web3) is a decentralized hotel platform that revolutionizes short-term property rentals using blockchain technology.

title: M-P Wonderful Life
description: Project DescriptionMachu Picchu is like the Inca citadel of same name, that is made of huge stone blocks tightly fit together. Machu Picchu is composed of tools in DeFi, IPFS, AI, Earth Observation, low cost Raspberry Pi-style SBCs with AI HATs. In this hackathon we will address a subset of Machu Picchu functions. The following resources explain Machu Picchu and its technologies: Our scenario: ‚Ä¢ the actors are the person in need who posts a free text profile : age, gender, location, occupation, needs an international helper organization, represented by an agent that creates an embedding of the profile (a vector of 512 parametres) and stores the profiles + embeddings on IPFS and their CID hashes on blockchain ‚Ä¢ an agent that would create in free text a Helper Program (objectives, target region, target group, duration, KPI, scale, budget), make an embedding of the Helper Program an agent that would match the vector of the persons in need and match with the vector of the Helper Program, finding the person who are the most entitled for help How it's MadeTech Stack Frontend: Next.js 14, ethers.js, TailwindCSS,Framer Motion, etc. Authentication: Privy for wallet connection and social login Blockchain: Remix IDE, Deployed on Sepolia testnet, etc Storage: IPFS via Pinata for decentralized storage of profiles and program data AI/ML: Autonome (Eliza) AI Agent integrated with Telegram and Twitter to assist users with undestanding of application and answer queries related to it. Vector similarity matching for program-profile compatibility Smart Contracts: Solidity for storing CIDs and managing program data Key Features & Implementation Profile Management: User profiles are converted to embeddings using AI API Both original profile and embeddings are stored on IPFS IPFS CIDs are stored on-chain for verification Helper Program Matching: Program requirements are converted to embeddings Vector similarity comparison with stored profiles Automatic matching of suitable candidates Decentralized Architecture: No central database - all data stored on IPFS and blockchain Smart contracts manage data integrity and access control Fully decentralized authentication via Privy Notable Technical Implementations Custom vector similarity algorithm for profile matching Hybrid storage approach combining IPFS and blockchain Responsive UI with server-side rendering for better performance Real-time updates using blockchain events Integrated with Telegram an Twitter In-App Chatbot to assit users throughout the application.
summary: Wonderful Life is humanitarian. It collects free-text profiles of persons in need, creates embeddings, stores profiles & vectors on IPFS, stores CIDs on blockchain. Given a helper program, it makes its embedding and matches the closest profiles to help, based on the embeddings

title: Thaink Tank
description: Project DescriptionThaink Tank is an onchain platform for collaborative idea development, where contributions are anonymous and encrypted using Lit Protocol actions initially inspired by old social games ¬´—Åadavre exquis¬ª and ¬´bouts-rim√©s¬ª. Participants add to discussions without seeing the full history, ensuring fresh perspectives. Each contribution is evaluated by AI before acceptance, determining its impact and influencing the participant‚Äôs share of rewards. While participation is public, individual inputs remain private. Fees from minting an ERC-1155 token and accessing AI-generated summaries via gated prompting are collected in a dedicated contract and claimable by contributors based on their assessed contributions. The main mechanism is the following: one initiates a think tank in a form of ERC1155 token (Idea) others can provide their thought (note) on the initial idea and if pass AI-agent evaluation it's being included in a digest combining all of the previous notes but condensed and systematized, both are getting decrypted and stored in the smart contract users interested in the results of this idea development can mint it and this way get access to the agent in order to prompt digest this gets a certain fee fees collected are then claimable by contributors based on their addition's evaluation score The evaluation is based on grading its relevance, novelty, depth, clarity and impact from 0 to 10 and producing a resulting weighted score. Thaink Tank addresses several problems related to collaborative ideation, knowledge-sharing, and incentivization in decentralized environments: Bias & Idea Contamination ‚Äì Traditional brainstorming can be influenced by groupthink or dominant voices. By keeping contributions anonymous and restricting visibility to prior inputs only, Thaink Tank ensures fresh, independent thinking. Intellectual Property & Attribution ‚Äì Contributors often don't get credit or compensation for their ideas in open discussions. This platform secures inputs onchain, fairly distributing rewards based on AI-evaluated impact. Lack of Incentives in Open Collaboration ‚Äì Many idea-sharing platforms rely on goodwill, with no direct compensation for valuable input. Thaink Tank introduces a transparent, automated reward system, aligning incentives for participation. Overload of Unstructured Information ‚Äì Open discussions generate large volumes of text, making it hard to extract value. AI-powered summaries condense contributions into actionable insights, accessible only to those who pay and distribute fees to contributors. Privacy & Idea Security ‚Äì Many online collaboration spaces are either too open or locked behind centralized platforms. Thaink Tank ensures privacy with Lit Protocol encryption while keeping participation verifiable and decentralized. Overall, the app creates a permissionless, incentive-aligned space for structured, high-quality, and anonymous idea development.How it's MadeThe main challenge was to grasp Lit Protocol in such a short amount of time as it's quite a complex system of terms, primitives and techniques. I really loved digging it but i wish i had more time to implement all features i planned. Building an AI agent which is evaluating users input and providing a meaningful insights from the collaboratively arranged knowledge was also quite a tough task, but i'm really proud of the results :) Frontend: React 18 with TypeScript, using Vite as the build tool Smart Contracts: Solidity (Thaink.sol, Tank.sol) Blockchain: Base Network integration via Wagmi 2.x Privacy Layer: Lit Protocol v7 for encrypted contributions AI Integration: Custom AI agent based on Coinbase AgentKit for contribution evaluation UI Components: Radix UI primitives with Tailwind CSS for styling Key Technical Features Privacy-First Architecture Implements Lit Protocol for client-side encryption of contributions Anonymous participation while maintaining on-chain verifiability Encrypted storage right in the smart contracts with controlled access mechanisms AI Evaluation System Custom AI agent (thainky.ts) for real-time contribution assessment Automated scoring based on relevance, novelty, and impact Structured digest generation with AI-powered summarization Blockchain Integration Smart contract-based tokenized (ERC1155 with proxied contract for data and access management for each of the token) store and reward distribution system On-chain metadata Automated input evaluation via Lit Actions based on AI-evaluated impact scores Base network deployment for scalable and cost-effective operations Privy.io integration for seamless web3 authentication
summary: Decentralized, anonymous and incentivized AI powered collaboration for ideas, stories, and solutions

title: AgenticPlaceholder
description: Project DescriptionLet me help craft a polished project description for AgenticPlaceholder that highlights its innovative features and technical architecture. AgenticPlaceholder: Revolutionizing Digital Advertising Through Autonomous Web3 Infrastructure AgenticPlaceholder represents a groundbreaking advancement in digital outdoor advertising, seamlessly merging blockchain technology with Internet of Things (IoT) capabilities to create a fully autonomous, decentralized advertising network. Deployed on the Base blockchain, our platform reimagines how digital billboards operate in the Web3 era by introducing intelligent automation at every level of the advertising process. At the heart of our system lies a sophisticated dual-agent architecture powered by Coinbase's AI Agent Kit. The first agent serves as an intuitive interface for advertisers, eliminating traditional barriers to entry in the digital advertising space. Through natural language conversations, users can effortlessly create and mint advertising content as NFTs, without requiring direct interaction with cryptocurrency wallets. This agent handles everything from generating ad copy to creating AI-powered visuals, making digital billboard advertising accessible to everyone. Our second agent introduces unprecedented automation to the bidding process. Operating continuously in the background, this autonomous agent employs dynamic bidding strategies to secure optimal billboard placements for advertisers. It analyzes market conditions, adjusts tactics in real-time, and participates in dutch auctions within our PlaceHolder Marketplace, ensuring advertisers achieve their display objectives without manual intervention. The technical infrastructure is built on a foundation of smart contracts that manage both the NFT minting process and our specialized marketplace. These contracts facilitate transparent, trustless transactions while maintaining the platform's autonomous nature. The physical display network consists of Raspberry Pi devices running custom Flutter applications, which monitor the blockchain in real-time and instantly display new advertisements as they're confirmed on-chain. To maintain high advertising standards and publisher accountability, we've integrated True Network's attestation layer. This system collects and verifies user ratings for advertisements, computing reputation scores for publishers. These attestations are permanently recorded on the blockchain, creating a transparent and immutable record of advertising quality and publisher reliability. This combination of autonomous agents, blockchain technology, and IoT infrastructure creates a self-sustaining advertising ecosystem that operates with minimal human intervention while maximizing efficiency and transparency for all participants. AgenticPlaceholder represents the future of digital outdoor advertising, where artificial intelligence and blockchain technology converge to create a more accessible, efficient, and accountable advertising landscape.How it's MadeAgentic Placeholder is an autonomous, blockchain-powered ad network that ensures trust, transparency, and efficiency in digital advertising. Automated Ad Creation: AI agents interact with advertisers, generate ad content and images, and issue an NFT in exchange for ad creation. Decentralized Ad Display: Operators provide screen space for ad placements, and publishers compete for slots through a bidding system. A bidding agent runs Dutch-style auctions, securing optimal ad slots based on predefined criteria. Reputation-Driven System: Ads include an on-chain reputation score for publishers, along with a QR code that enables viewers to rate ads (1-5 stars) and leave feedback. Onchain Attestation : Simple, structured, and immutable pieces of information given to the users on True Network. COMPONENTS : Operator Display App (Raspberry Pi + Flutter) Runs on Flutter, deployed on a Raspberry Pi device. Listens to smart contract events for auction status updates and displays ads once a bid is placed. Reacts dynamically to state changes in real-time. Smart Contracts (Solidity) NFT Contract: Mints an NFT for each ad created. Bidding Contract: Implements a Dutch auction mechanism for ad slots. Token Contract: Uses PSDT (Placeholder Stable Dollar Token) as the reward and payment token. AVS FeedbackManager: Manages AVS and Eigen Layer contracts. Mobile App (Flutter) Allows users to connect their wallets and scan QR codes on ads. Users can rate ads (1-5 stars) and leave feedback, which gets attested on-chain via True Network. Attestations contribute to publisher reputation scores, ensuring transparent feedback. Publisher Dashboard (Next.js + Backend APIs) Built with Next.js for a seamless UI/UX experience. Displays bid data, and real-time updates. Backend APIs (JavaScript) connect the dashboard, display app, and mobile app. Uses WebSockets to listen for smart contract events and push updates instantly. AI Agents (Coinbase AI + EigenLayer AVS +) Ad Creation AI: Built on Coinbase Developer Platform, using DALL¬∑E to generate ad titles, descriptions, and images based on minimal publisher input. The AI-generated content is then minted as an NFT. Bidding AI: Autonomously bids on behalf of multiple publishers, optimizing for the best slots and prices. Sentiment Analysis AI: When users leave feedback, an AI agent analyzes sentiment and creates on-chain proofs to further refine publisher reputations.
summary: AgenticPlaceholder is an On-Chain Ad network for Digital Billboards driven by ai agent automation.

title: NotAIry
description: Project DescriptionNotAIry is a decentralized platform that combines AI-powered analysis with Web3 identity to create trusted, verified stories about blockchain technology and AI developments. The platform helps writers create high-quality technical content while providing readers with confidence in the accuracy and authenticity of the information.How it's MadeKey Features Smart Contract Integration MetaMask wallet integration for Web3 identity On-chain identity scoring using transaction history and DeFi activity Wallet-based authentication and authorization AI-Powered Content Analysis Automated story review and scoring system Technical accuracy validation Content quality assessment Engagement potential analysis Story Management Multi-status workflow (draft, in review, published) Real-time story updates and notifications Rich text editing and formatting Story categorization (smart contracts, AI models, DeFi protocols) Identity & Trust Web3 identity verification Trust scoring based on on-chain activity DeFi participation metrics NFT holdings analysis Social engagement tracking Technical Stack Frontend: SvelteKit Backend: Supabase Blockchain: Base (Coinbase L2) AI: Gaia AI for content analysis Data: Covalent API for on-chain analytics Privy.io for authentication Core Mission NotAIry aims to bridge the gap between technical content creation and verification in the Web3 space. By leveraging AI for initial content validation and combining it with Web3 identity, we create a trusted environment for sharing and verifying blockchain and AI-related stories. The platform helps ensure that technical content about smart contracts, AI models, and DeFi protocols is accurate, well-written, and properly contextualized, while maintaining the decentralized ethos of Web3.
summary: NotAIry is a decentralized platform that combines AI-powered analysis with Web3 identity to create trusted, verified stories about blockchain technology and AI developments.
